story:
We wanted to create a camera that can be used anytime and anywhere for people who love photography, who take photos every day and want to record their travels.   Knowing that DSLR and Mirrorless cameras are is still very heavy and expensive and finding that the current phone lens camera lens systems don’t cut it at the level we needed we set out to create a new generation of phone lenses that would help everyone, from the traveler to the professional photographer and videographers, to go out and take better shots, more often, in even more amazing locations.

At Aochy we’ve finally created our dream phone camera kit - it’s a professional lens kit system for photographers who want a new level quality camera kit options for their iPhone without the weight, cost or size of regular bulky camera gear. With Aochy’s new lens design you can now realize your iPhones full potential and unleash your creativity with the pocket-sized multi-lens-case system. It’s quality camera lenses now give you a full camera kit options without the bulky camera bag."
 

 

THE AOCHY LENS SYSTEM

•    Purpose Built Multifunction Phone Case

•    Professional Quality Compact Camera Lenses

•    360 Degree Aluminum Alloy Protective Lens Case.

Professional Quality Compact Lenses

All of our lenses have been handcrafted from the highest quality glass and finished with a multi anti-reflective coating and then polished ensuring anything captured by the phone is clear, crisp and colorful. The optical system has been optimized by multiple rounds authentications of rigorous testing.

 

Purpose Built Phone Case

The newly created and stylish Aochy phone case has been specifically designed to both houses the camera lens system and a be a lightweight, sleek and protective case for your phone. Crafted from fine quality PU leather the durable case is soft to the touch allowing it to be both tactile and shock resistant. With an integrated card slot and a flick out stand the case is can be used for either an impromptu photo session or simply everyday life on the go.

 

360 Degree case protection

Made of aluminium alloy inside with a soft PU leather exterior the 360 Degree lens case protects the all the lens from small accidents such as drops and scrapes which give you one less thing to worry about while shooting on the run and outdoors. We’ve made the lens case unbelievably light and durable, so you’ll have no problem carrying it in your pocket or simply clip it to the outside of your bag.

 

 

No APP Needed

The Aochy lens system doesn’t need to install any iPhone camera app. Some camera lens systems require their own apps that often have in-app purchases or need constant updating. At Aochy, we’ve spent more time ensuring our lenses are of the highest quality, so the all you need to do is to choose the right lens for the shot!

iPhone X/Xs For the iPhone X/Xs there is a Trio of Double Lenses is only for models that offer a staggering 6 additional lens options to ensure you always have a solution to capture any moment.

Maxmium Protection & Quick Access:

When not in use on or the move the lenses are protected by the case which can fit snugly into your pocket, or are light enough to be easily be clipped to the outside of your daypack for quick access.

iPhone 7/8

Made specifically for the iPhone 7/8 only Aochy has a created two superbly designed 238°fish-eye lens 15mm wide-angle lens to pair with new phone case.

Capture Everything! In Wide Angle.

The 15mm wide angle lens is perfect for landscapes, group shots, or even the occasional yet necessary selfie! 

Get Creative!

Show off your creative talents with the 238-degree fish-eye lens. 

 

TIMELINE

Challenge & Risk

Shipping: Delivery times will vary depending on the region and location we are shipping to. While we make every effort to ensure prompt delivery to all customers, please be patient and understand that there may be delays that are beyond our control during the shipping process.

 Legal variances from country to country: Regulations vary significantly across regions and countries, especially for electronic goods. We will take every precaution in ensuring that our product and shipping policies meet with local legislation in all areas, but there could be minor delays in fulfilling compliance requirements.

Defective products: It is our responsibility to make sure we deliver the best products we could to our customers. However, with limited resources, there might still be some issues that we need to overcome along the way to get this product ready for mass production.if you do receive a defective product that falls below expectations, please contact us and we will send you a replacement.

Startup: As a small startup company, this is a very busy time for us, during which our team is operating at full capacity. We apologise if we cannot respond immediately, but please be assured we will get back to you as soon as we can.

 If you like what we do, please support us and back us up by pledging to this project and help us spread the world! Thank you!

story:
Our Team 

We are a team of tech. gadgets people and we know what are the problems people are facing in their daily life and activities whilst using those electronic products.  We are doing our best to come out with innovative products with unique ideas to combat our daily problems with Our new Electronic gadget. 

 

Our Founder

Daniel is the Founder of ISMART and has been piloting this for a long time for the Launch of ISMART. He has been studying and analyzing the common problems and limitations for  electronic gadgets. 

His  Goal for ISMART is to improve everyone lives with his products.  He want to help  everyone so we  can perform their daily task without frustration . This way, end users do not need to worry about of how to use the products and where to store the electronic gadgets.

The 1st Goal of the product is to ensure everyone is able to use with it simplicity design and user features.  The 2nd Goal is to ensure the Product is small and portable so they can bring their favorite gadget along to anywhere they go. Lastly the ultimately Goal is to create a premium feel to the product so the end user would feel go and proud of his product anywhere they go. 

 

The Current Keyboard Problem 

Our wireless keyboards does not always have the best of the worlds as it is either too heavy, too big , too slow and its incompatibility to pair with Multiple computers.  Not to mention, keyboards doesn't comes with wireless mouse . 

  •  Bulky , Heavy & Inconvenient 
  • Long Untidy Wires Dangling around 
  • Unbalanced & Tilt to either side while Typing 
  • Troublesome Switching Power Button 
  • Either suited for Computer or Mobile Phones 
  • Inability to pair with New and Multiple  Devices 
  • No Compatibility with wireless Mouse

Our Solution +  Invention 

To Design a Keyboard that all users can use would be to use a premium aluminium Alloy material which is light , durable and classy.  This way , everyone can type comfortably onto the keyboard without any worry of damaging. 

We also need to come out with a mechanism where the keyboard can be folded in the best and fastest way while we integrate the wireless mouse inside together.  The rotational joint and the soft sponge will cushion the folding mechanism when you fold so it will not damage the keyboard which also has a Auto-On off switch when you close and open the keyboard. 

  • Foldable Keyboard ( 2 Ply ) 
  • Wired / WIreless ( Up to 3 Devices ) 
  • Shortcut Toggle Buttons to toggle between 3 devices 
  • Balancing Mechanism at the bottom 
  • Wireless Tracking Mouse 
  • Extendable  & Hidden Phone Stands to convert into work station 

Our Idea towards to the User 

We want to create the ideal keyboard for everyone to use regardless indoor or outdoors. We want to give the safe and assurance feeling for our customers so that they do not need to worry about bringing the mouse and squeezing the Chunky keyboards into the bag . 

WIth its ability to pair up to 3 devices and phone stand, users can transform any tablets and phones into Mini Laptop configuration while still being able to type onto the desktops . 

  • Bring the Keyboard anyway you go
  • Look Good & Classy with this Gadget 
  • Able to Slot into Pockets 
  • Forget about the hustle of Wireless Mouse 
  • Able to turn the keyboard into Work station 

The Extendable Phone Holder Section  

 This extendable phone clip holder allows you to

 

 

The Outlook 

We do not want to create a keyboard using ABS and Plastic material where it would look cheap and damage easily with knocks and dents. Therefore we use a premium titanium metallic material where it is classy , stylish and light. This way people can carry it easily without the fear of damage and outlook . 

  • Premium Metallic Material 
  • Anti Rust & Oxidation protection 
  •  Locking Magnet Mechanism to prevent it from opening 

Use it Anytime Any Where You want 

A Wireless Keyboard has to be very effective where you can use it anytime of the day and any devices that you need to pair it with that you want.  You can send emails , create a proposals or reports anytime of the day that you want .  All you need is to take out ISmart WIreless Keyboard and you are good to go for the entire Day  

  • Bluetooth Pairing for any Devices
  • Use it with or without the Phone Stand 
  • Flip & Fold it the moment you want to use it

1 Keyboard , Multiple Abilities & Awesome Features 

ISmart allows user to use it with Desktop and convert into a Phone or Tablet stand anytime they want.  ISmart also assure you that you can close and open easily with it soft contact points and Magnet closure to ensure the Keyboard intact and in place.  You do not need to pair devices multiple time to use it as ISmart wireless keyboard can take 3 devices at 1 Go. 

Lastly it's sensitive track mouse allows you to move around smoothly and easily, where you can click left & right anytime you want . 

  • Extendable Dual Phone Stands - >  Use only when you need 
  • Safety Contact Points With Magnet Mechanism - > Easy closing & Opening 
  • Automatic On & Off by itself -> No Worry on Power Button 
  • Easy Wireless Track Mouse ->  Comprises of Left & Right Click 
  • Pairing of up to 3 Devices at 1 time ->  Toggling between 3 devices with Shortcut Buttons 

Sturdy & Durable Extendable Phone Stands 

We do not want a phone stand that is weak and incompetent to hold a Phone & Tablet. Therefore we use a robust ABS material to hold your phones intact. The distance of the stands are calculated where you can put tablets and phones at the same time without interference . 

  • Foldable Extendable  Phone Stands
  • Safety Distance between the 2 Stands
  • Strong Sturdy ABS Extendable Stands 

Wireless Track Mouse 

Firstly most Foldable wireless keyboard doesn't comes with mouse . Even if it comes, it does not have the left and right click separately similar to a wireless Mouse. Therefore we pack a real wireless mouse into the keyboard where users can move around and click for the data they want

  • Sensitive finger Cursor
  • Left and Right Click 

 

Safety Contacts With Magnet Mechanism 

Creating a Keyboard has to be safe and extremely easy to users to use. Therefore we introduce soft contact points for protection and use magnet mechanism to ensure the keyboard intact in different situations 

  • Automatic Off & On by Folding
  • Soft Cushion Contacts for Protection 
  • Magnet Mechanism to protect Keyboard from opening 
  • Rounded corners to easy holding 

2 Fold Easy Closure & Opening 

We have the designed in a way where people can open and close regardless how good they are with Gadgets. Therefore user can flip it open with 2 actions , and it will lock itself automatically when it unfolds itself into a sturdy keyboard 

  • Easy Opening by Flipping sideways 
  • Automatics Locks when in Straight mode 

 

 

 

Extremely Thin at 12 MM 

ISmart has designed to be thin so it will be easy for users to slot into their pouches , bags and back pockets like a wallet. This way , they can carry it anywhere and anytime they want . 

  • Thin Breath measured at 12 MM 
  • Enhanced with Extendable Phone stands to 18 MM 

 

Balancing Mechanism / Track Mouse 

This Keyboard has a balancing stand on the bottom which allows you type steadily on any surfaces. This balancing stands fixes the keyboard firmly on the surface and allows you to type aggressively without the fear of losing its place 

Its built in Track Mouse is made of Matte Material which has a very readily fast response for fast fingers . It also has its left and right clicks at the bottom for users of either LEFT or RIGHT Handers 

  • Firm Bottom Balance Anti Slip Base
  • Built in Mouse
  • Suitable for Either Left or Right handers 

Finger Designed Buttons 

This Buttons are comes with a spring mechanism which allows users to type fast and comfortably without any mistakes .  It's spring buttons tells you when the buttons is being activated or not , hence reducing the time to counter check and go back to the previous typing mistake

  •  Fast response Typing Pace
  • 3 Millions Buttons Clicking Life Span 
  •  Less typing errors 
  •  No need to track back to previous Typing mistakes anymore 

Highly Durable Built it Lithium Battery 

You do not need to replace the batteries of your keyboard anymore with this highly durable built in batteries.  You can use it continuously for 3 months and let it hibernate for 218 Days. 

WIth its Micro USB Charging cable , where people use it to charge android phones . it only takes 2 hours to fully charge this device and you can use it for another 3 Months . 

  •  Standby Time  of 218 Days
  • Normal keyboard usage of 90 Days 

Bluetooth Pairing of up 3 Devices 

ISmart allows you to use 3 devices at the same time , which reduces your time to change and pair another keyboard and mouse. There a lot of instances where people uses 3 computers at 1 time and  moving from 1 place to another just to use different devices and peripherals . 

ISmart makes you sit down and becomes the master brain of all devices at the same time. 

  •  Compatible with Apple , Android & Windows 
  • Shortcut Buttons to toggle between different OS 

Extendable Phone Stands 

  •  Holds your devices Landscape or Potrait
  • 2 devices at the same time 
  • Maximum of 1 Tablet and 1 Phone at 1 time 

 

Carry Case 

ISmart WIreless Multi Keyboard comes with a Black Carrying Pouch for you to carry the keyboard on the Go . You can slot the keyboard into anyway with an ease of mind now . 

  •  Protection of dust , marks and scratches 
  • Easy Carrying Case 

Our Goal 

We want to help everyone who has the problems of using keyboards & wireless Mouse in their daily life . 

Regardless of their problem and situation , ISMART wireless Multi keyboard would be the right product to solve your typing and tracking activities from now on . 

Our Aim 

We would like to raise $28000 USD for the production of ISMART Wireless Multi Keyboard  into the market. 

You would definitely be the trendsetter  to carry this product and people would be amazed at how awesome ISMART at the looks of it at how it is going to help their day to day routine 

I would like to express my Heartfelt gratitude and much soughted thankful appreciate for each and everyone for going through this entire product pitch with me.  

Our team thank you for your each and every contribution given and we sincerely thank you from the bottom of our heart. 

Our Brother  / Accessory

ISmart  World Smallest Handsfree  Wireless Speaker 

Weighing at 25 grams and a miniature item on our Palm, this is the world smallest speaker to date given its awesome abilities all round . with its solid Sound driver, it can power up within a room for Music and listening pleasure. 

Slot them into your Pocket anytime of the day and place them anywhere with its anti Slip Base . 

With its built in Microphone , You can use it to make Phone calls and Sound Recording as well. 

With its Premium Aluminium housing case , ISmart World Smallest Speaker is sure to pump your room and take the world by storm . 

  • Weighing a Mere 25 Grams
  • Measuring at only 30 MM in Height 
  • Built in Microphone 
  • Make Phones call and Sound Recording 
  • Study Anti Slip Base
  • Aluminium Premium Housing 
  • Camera Activation Snap Button 

Our  Sister

ISmart  Leather KeyChain  Dual Charging cable 

This 2 in 1 Leather Charging Cable has a breakthrough technology ability which is able to charge Android phone on the front side  and charge Apple phones on the reverse side of  the connector Cable.

A Leather Designed Cable is premium and stylish where you can match together with your Accessories and day to day activities . I Smart Has uses a premium metallic Silver housing where it shows the exquisiteness and elegance of  the charging Cable. 

Lastly it also has a small rubber grove to protect the charging cable from excessive damaging due to wear and Tear 

  •  Leather Premium Designed
  • Dual Charging Connector
  • Metallic Silver Housing Cable Case
  • Small Rubber Protection Groove

On top of it, you can extract the cable fully by unbuckling the Keychain  off the strap. you can use the fully extended cable.  This Keychain Option allows user to keep the cable when not in use and hides the Cable inside where it is functioning as a Leather Key chain. 

The beautiful portion of this cable allows theusers to use that Cable as a keychain . They can tag it onto their bags and luggages.  On top of it, user can even tag their house keys, USBs and accesories onto the cable.  THis creates a user product relationship where they will keep it closer to them  and becoming an integral part of the lives. 

Dual Compatibility For Apple and Android 

This cable is able to charge both android and apple with its same connector head. There is no need to remove and interchange any connector head to use the charging cable . You can use this cable to charge Android & Apple devices leaving no one behind . 

Extendable & Interchangeable  Cable Design 

You can extend the cable length depending on your requirements.  Its design allows you to unbuckle the Leather Pouch and use the cable solely all it itself.  This way, you can use the charging cables in a couple of different variations depending how you would want to charge it . 

 

Leather Braided Design

With its thick Leather Material and braided with lines, it makes the product looks classy and stylish to bring it as a key chain itself.  The design of the Keychain allows the cable to be hidden in  its stylish Leather design . 

Vibrant Colour Designs 

 

ISMART Mini Work Station 

When you fund ISMART Mini Workstation, you will get a complete set of the products. WIth this set, you can now work as a fully operational work station .  With this awesome setup , you can now use your keyboard onto your computers/tablets , listen music with the smallest speaker even and even use our Cables to charge your phones and speakers . 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

b

 

 

Our  Official Product Video 

 

For  Corporate & Distributor Queries , Please kindly email to 

"  daniel@thesmarterwaytolife.com " 

For general queries , Please kindly email to 

" info@thesmarterwaytolife.com

We would like to raise $28000 USD for the production of ISMART Wireless Multi Keyboard  into the market. 
You would definitely be the trendsetter  to carry this product and people would be amazed at how awesome ISMART at the looks of it at how it is going to help their day to day routine 


I would like to express my Heartfelt gratitude and much soughted thankful appreciate for each and everyone for going through this entire product pitch with me.  Our team thank you for your each and every contribution given and we sincerely thank you from the bottom of our heart. Our Brother  / AccessoryISmart  World Smallest Handsfree  Wireless Speaker Weighing at 25 grams and a miniature item on our Palm, this is the world smallest speaker to date given its awesome abilities all round . with its solid Sound driver, it can power up within a room for Music and listening pleasure. Slot them into your Pocket anytime of the day and place them anywhere with its anti Slip Base . With its built in Microphone , You can use it to make Phone calls and Sound Recording as well. With its Premium Aluminium housing case , ISmart World Smallest Speaker is sure to pump your room and take the world by storm . 
Weighing a Mere 25 Grams
Measuring at only 30 MM in Height 
Built in Microphone 
Make Phones call and Sound Recording 
Study Anti Slip Base
Aluminium Premium Housing 
Camera Activation Snap Button 
Our  SisterISmart  Leather KeyChain  Dual Charging cable This 2 in 1 Leather Charging Cable has a breakthrough technology ability which is able to charge Android phone on the front side  and charge Apple phones on the reverse side of  the connector Cable.A Leather Designed Cable is premium and stylish where you can match together with your Accessories and day to day activities . I Smart Has uses a premium metallic Silver housing where it shows the exquisiteness and elegance of  the charging Cable. Lastly it also has a small rubber grove to protect the charging cable from excessive damaging due to wear and Tear

Dual Charging Connector
Metallic Silver Housing Cable Case
Small Rubber Protection Groove
On top of it, you can extract the cable fully by unbuckling the Keychain  off the strap. you can use the fully extended cable.  This Keychain Option allows user to keep the cable when not in use and hides the Cable inside where it is functioning as a Leather Key chain. The beautiful portion of this cable allows theusers to use that Cable as a keychain . They can tag it onto their bags and luggages.  On top of it, user can even tag their house keys, USBs and accesories onto the cable.  THis creates a user product relationship where they will keep it closer to them  and becoming an integral part of the lives. Dual Compatibility For Apple and Android 
This cable is able to charge both android and apple with its same connector head. There is no need to remove and interchange any connector head to use the charging cable . You can use this cable to charge Android & Apple devices leaving no one behind . Extendable & Interchangeable  Cable Design You can extend the cable length depending on your requirements.  Its design allows you to unbuckle the Leather Pouch and use the cable solely all it itself.  This way, you can use the charging cables in a couple of different variations depending how you would want to charge it .  
Leather Braided DesignWith its thick Leather Material and braided with lines, it makes the product looks classy and stylish to bring it as a key chain itself.  The design of the Keychain allows the cable to be hidden in  its stylish Leather design . Vibrant Colour Designs  ISMART Mini Work Station When you fund ISMART Mini Workstation, you will get a complete set of the products. WIth this set, you can now work as a fully operational work station .  With this awesome setup , you can now use your keyboard onto your computers/tablets , listen music with the smallest speaker even and even use our Cables to charge your phones and speakers .         b  Our  Official Product Video  For  Corporate & Distributor Queries , Please kindly email to "  daniel@thesmarterwaytolife.com " For general queries , Please kindly email to " info@thesmarterwaytolife.com

story:
Enjoy your trip from start to finish!

The travel industry is encouraging travelers to take advantage of streaming and WiFi services. With VuWing, you can easily interact with your cell phone while seated on aircraft, trains, buses, and more! We developed a thin, flexible device that adapts to your phone, holds it in wide-screen format, keeps it from falling out, requires no complicated setup, and needs no stickers, magnets, or clamps.

Compatible with phones of up to 3.5in wide including iPhone XS Max / XR / XS / X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6S / 6S Plus / Galaxy S10/ S10+ / S10e/ Galaxy Note9 / Galaxy S9/ S9+/ S8 / S8+ / S7 / Galaxy S7 Edge / LG / Nexus

 

 

  • Compatible with most slim fit cases; may not be compatible with bulky cases like Otter Box, military styled, phone wallet cases, or cases with extended batteries
  • Soft thermoplastic molded design to help prevent marring and scratching of glass surfaces
  • Final product appearance may differ from those illustrated

 

VuWing is thin and flexible, allowing it to easily fit inside your carry on or even your back pocket!

VuWing expands to accommodate various device sizes, slim fit cases and attached phone accessories.

Be assured even before you step on board, that hands free viewing is available.

Like aircraft, you can easily lock the thin VuWing into the tray system for elevated viewing. Protect your phone from dropping or falling out, and enjoy your entertainment hands free.

Accommodate younger travelers on a train by placing it through the tray extension bar! There are many uses of VuWing, we're sure you will find one that works for your situation.

Use on luggage and bags, hang from handles, pockets or straps! The VuWing keeps your hands free while you wait. Watch your programs, interact with apps or flip through your vacation photos while relaxing before your journey.

Stop using your cup to prop up your phone! The angle of the VuWing works perfectly on counters, tables, trays, and other flat surfaces.

 

Shaker Gilbert
Founder/Inventor

As a frequent traveler and phone addict, I often use my cell phone for entertainment on aircraft, trains, and even buses. I held my phone upright, sometimes for hours, so I could view my screen at the correct angle. Doing it this way was inconvenient, and it didn't always provide the best view, but it was the only option I had. After doing this for a short time, I started to experience severe neck strain (known as "text-neck") and I also began to lose feeling in my left hand, from my elbow pressing into the arm rest. When I looked around me on the plane, train, or bus, I saw that my fellow travelers were all in the same situation. They had bent necks and were struggling to hold their phones upright for viewing, especially while eating!

My discomfort finally became so great, that I knew I had to do something about it. Naturally, I did what anyone would do. I searched the Internet for a product that would hold my phone for me while traveling, but I couldn't find a single one that provided the features I needed. I wanted to elevate my phone so my neck would be straight instead of constantly bent forward. I also wanted a device that would work across multiple travel systems and situations, and lastly, I wanted it to travel and use easily. There wasn't a single one on the market that had all of these features. So, I invented one! VuWing was created for me and you, Enjoy your trip!

*VuWing LLC is not affiliated with any airline, train, or bus lines; all trademarks and logos are the sole rights of their respective owners.

 

Everyone you know is looking for a way to hold their cell phone on the go! Help us get the word out by letting others know about VuWing!

story:
World’s first all-in-one portable phone printer. P2S delivers 300 dpi high resolution in the effective printing area, it allows you to print sticky notes, labels, photos in colored or black & white via 7 types of affordable thermal paper.

 

 

Connect P2S to your Smartphone via Bluetooth 4.0, download the free Paperang app from Android or iOS, choose the image/text on your phone and press one button to print. 7 types of thermal paper rolls can be easily replaced in just seconds.

Thanks for the unbiased and detailed review of P2S from Nate, he owns a great youtube channel " Blunty" for innovative gadgets. Check how great P2S compared to some cheap ones! 

 

 

  •  Pomodoro tool to boost your productivity 

Printing a to-do list and then allocate each task to a Pomodoro Timer on the front,  press button "M" to set up as"Work 25 minutes" and press button"S" to set up as " Take break 5 minutes". All of which will helps you stay focus and boost your productivity in work. 

 

For those who want more flexibility, the working time and break time can be customizable in App. 

 

  • Alarm Clock & Count Timer 

12-hour/24-hour clock can be easily set up in App to keep everything on the schedule. you can also get countdown timer and count timer through 3 buttons on the front.

 

 

  • Photo Printers on the way. 

Paperang App allows you to add fun text, borders, emojis to your selfies on the way. Transforming your best memories to unique physical paper instantly in colored or black & white. 

 

 

  • Printing Arts for kids 

 Printing out the kid’s arts or line drawing photos to help them explore the world in a different way. 

 

 

  • Portable and lightweight 

  • 300 dpi high-resolution printing 

  • Affordable & easy accessible thermal paper 

Paperang officially offers 7 types of affordable thermal paper in white, yellow, blue and pink. All of them are eco-friendly, water-resistant, tear-resistant, and smudge-proof. Any third party thermal papers (57x30mm) are compatible with P2S. 

 

Paperang Technology Co., Ltd is established in 2016 and it consists of young and passionate printing enthusiasts based in Xiamen, China. Paperang has been focusing on hardware innovation and Internet application development. With professional talents in product design and development, Paperang is dedicated to becoming the No.1 brand of phone printer based on cloud-printing.

Risks and Challenges 

To maximize our success, there are several hurdles we must overcome as a company. We are currently working hard with our partners to consolidate production plans and coordinate third-party vendors. Despite spending the last two years building an efficient supply chain, we may run into component delays or unexpected shortage s. An international logistical risk is present as our product contains a battery which is more difficult to ship internationally. Therefore, the speed and price of shipping may affect the number of units we are able to deliver to each country. If this occurs then we will keep the community informed while doing our best to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

story:
Who Are We?

Ligo is an mobile app and website service that provides virtual business cards for social and professional networking. Our team is made up of college and high school students with varying interests from computer science, to finance, to digital marketing and design. Our team hails from colleges including Cornell, Columbia, Dartmouth, Yale, Tufts, Boston College, Wash U, Northwestern, Richmond, and more. However, as students, we need funding to make our vision a reality. Ligo has been in development for over a year, and we are finally ready to bring it to market, but we need your help!

What We Need and What You Get

  • Ligo needs funding to cover marketing, development, and legal costs.
  • Our funding campaign has five tiers that you can contribute through:
    • Tier one: With a donation of $20, you'll receive a white Ligo T-shirt
    • Tier two: With a donation of $35, you'll receive a whiteLigo T-shirt and a Ligo mask
    • Tier three: With a donation of $50, you'll receive a white Ligo T-shirt, a Ligo mask, and a Ligo hat.
    • Tier four: With a donation of $100, you'll receive a white Ligo T-Shirt, a Ligo mask, a Ligo hat, and a black Ligo T-Shirt.
    • Super Supporter: With a donation of $200, you'll receive all of the aforementioned merchandise (2 shirts, a mask, and a hat) as well as an in-app verification of your Ligocard.

Impact

Ligo provides a shareable 'card' embedded with the user's virtual identity. Users can add their social media accounts, websites, contact information, and other online presences to their Ligocard, which they can then share from a socially appropriate distance via QR Code, AirDrop, URL Code, or In-App Search. In an increasingly contactless and tenchologically driven world, Ligo transcends the classic idea of a business card by combining traditional networking with an intuitive and modern take on social identity. 

Risks & Challenges

Ligo currently faces four major competitors with similar goals. However, their services range from $4.99 to $34.99, and some of our competitors require external hardware to run their services, whether that's a bulb on the back of the phone or a completely separate physical, electronic card, Ligo offers a more simplistic, accessible, and sustainable product. Ligo's sleek, simple, and effective design is free for everyone to use in social and professional settings with no external hardware. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We recognize that not everyone may be able to help fund our company, and that's OK! You can help by sharing our campaign, applying to be an ambassador at https://ligo.best/ambassadors and/ or following our socials - Instagram, twitter: @ligocard  LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/ligocard/  Thank you!

story:
Installs in Minutes

1080p HD Live Video Streaming

 

We've begun production already (these photos are from our last production run).

 

FenSens, Inc has products sold in over 100 countries and launched its first product 2 years ago on Indiegogo successfully. You're investing in a team that delivers. Furthermore, we've partnered with WinPlus Type S out of California whom has over 25 years experience manufacturing the best backup cameras in the world. 

 

Risks & Challenges

As with any business that requires manufacturing, problems can arise in the process due to poor communication, supply chain issues, and more. We have accounted for these as much as possible in our timeline. 

  • We understand that issues that come up in the process of manufacturing a new product and have through through most of the issues. 
  • We realize some products have component sourcing challenges and we have addressed this by working with the best in class provider of chipsets, the same ones used in the Ring Doorbell product
  • It is our commitment to keep you constantly updated through social media and monthly newsletters.
  • Disclaimer: Please always use common sense and look behind you before driving. While the FenSens is a great tool for helping add additional convenience and safety while backing up, we still ask you to look before you drive and please make sure your small kids don't follow you out the door when you head out to your vehicle. Always look before driving and keep good situational awareness. Please follow local state laws for your license plates and have your tabs and numbers clearly visible. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? Use one of the Indiegogo social media sharing buttons at the top of this page to help spread the word! If you refer 5 friends, you can get a free device.

*Must be logged into your Indiegogo account and use Indiegogo’s share tools for our analytics to track their referral contributions.

story:
Hello contributors, we re-posted new campaign here, so please contribute there.

Here is our New Kratos Campaign

Thank you.






Best wireless flash drive with large storage and low price. It is small in size, simple to use, can be shared between multiple devices and support all your devices - iOS, Android, Mac OS and Windows.


1. Product Overview



2. Why we need Kratos

"I've installed many apps on my phone and there isn't much space left"
"I want to take video and pictures with high quality, but I don't have enough space on my phone"
"I prefer to use my phone to watch movie, listen to the music while I'm on the travel"
"I'm sick to upload and download data in poor network status"
...
There is a lot of cases that you feel the lack of storage space on your phone or laptop. Also it really drives us crazy when we have poor network status.
Of course, you can purchase device which has more storage space. But here is how much you need to pay to increase.



As you can see, the price for additional storage space is really expensive.

Kratos can solve this issue. It can provide up to 512GB additional storage space for your devices.


Also Kratos supports streaming to multiple devices and it means all of your devices can extend storage space by using just one Kratos.

Using this functionality, you can also share data with nearby people and devices, so it will be a great tool for your presentation, meeting, discussion, etc.

      

Sometimes you feel that your device doesn’t have enough usb port for the peripherals (for example, MacBook only has one usb port). Kratos can be a good choice for such devices.



3. Advantage

- Kratos provides more storage space than any other existing wireless flash drive.

Currently, SanDisk Wireless Stick has largest storage space (200GB), but Kratos can provide 312GB more than that.


-  the Cheapest Wireless Flash Drive ever.

(Our retail price will be $119 for 256GB and $ 169 for 512GB model)


- Support Dual Band Wi-Fi

Existing models only support 2.4GHz band width. But Kratos supports dual band (2.4GHz and 5GHz both) and it can solve interference issue, so we can increase transfer speed and reliability. Also 5GHz bandwidth is good for video streaming.


- Kratos provides high speed via wire and Wi-Fi

Of course, Wi-Fi transmission is heavily effected by environment, but we've tested it all the devices in same environment.


-  Easy to find using beep functionality

Have you ever lost the memory and spend a lot of time to find it? You don't worry about that with Kratos. Kratos has ability to raise alarm, so user can find it easily. You can raise alaram by using app with your phone.


-  Simple to use and powerful application (support iOS, Android, Mac Os and Windows)

 
You can see our app in the video.

4. Product Specification



5. Current Status


Currently, we've already made working prototype. We need to do tooling for better look and feel. Also we need to improve apps.

6. Timeline



7. How can you help us?

For us to bring the “KRATOS” to life, we need your support!

Your generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first users of the “KRATOS”.  We will also use our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so we are always giving people the best possible solutions.

We will also be using the funding to expand the possibilities for the usage for consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “KRATOS”, to further customize the first version of the “KRATOS” and create additional products and services that will compliment “KRATOS”.

The “KRATOS” needs pledging but above all it needs your attention and interest!


8. About Us

Our company is passionate with creating an USB, Wi-Fi connector and sync cable that is sleek, functional and addresses real problems. KRATOS is not only a concept. We have a working prototype. We have engineered a unique product that solves many problems and our results have been fantastic.  So far all of our feedback has been over the top, everyone from students to world travelers are enjoying the many useful components of the KRATOS.

Together with our team we take our passion for innovation beyond our products and in every decision we make.

In our product development process, simplifying people live always driven us at every stage. Simple products that can way help people.

We were inspired by some existing solutions on the market and tried to combine smartly several technologies into one. The one that you really care about.

As mention above, KRATOS is a combination of different products pack into one device. By performing this, our wish was to reduce the amount of components, packaging an products development emerging from this process.

For us to bring the "KRATOS" to life, we need your support!


9. Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

10. FAQ

1) Where can I set my color?

You can set your color in the kratos site:  http://kratosmemory.com

2) Can the device/wifi network be renamed?

Yes, you can rename it in the app settings.

3) Can you stream a movie from the drive to an Apple TV via an iPhone or iPad?

It’s possible, but it needs some manual steps.

- Connect drive to home access point over wifi

- Determine the Drive’s IP address on your home wifi network.

- Access the web portal through the browser by entering the IP address of step 2

- Browse to the video of your choice, click twice and stream to Apple TV

4) Do I need wifi to access this drive?

You don’t need to be connected to anything the drive puts out its on wifi signal to connect to. While connected to the drives wifi, you can not use the internet unless you connect to the drive through a wireless network.

5) Does it support cryptography?

Yes, Kratos has built in cryptography functionality and you can select whether you want to crypt or not.

6) Can it stream 1080p movies?

Yes, it can stream hd 720p, 1080p and even 4K videos and it can stream to any phone, tablet or pc.

7) Can I use it as a mobile Wifi Hotspot?

No, it only transmit the content it has saved on it to other devices
story_txt:
Hello contributors, we re-posted new campaign here, so please contribute there.

Here is our New Kratos Campaign

Thank you.





Best
wireless flash drive with large storage and low price. It is small in size, simple to use, can be shared between multiple devices and support all your devices - iOS, Android, Mac OS and Windows.




1. Product Overview






2. Why we need Kratos
"I've installed many apps on my phone and there isn't much space left"
"I want to take video and pictures with high quality, but I don't have enough space on my phone"

"I prefer to use my phone to watch movie, listen to the music while I'm on the travel"
"I'm sick to upload and download data in poor network status"
...
There is a lot of cases that you feel the lack of storage space on your phone or laptop. Also it really drives us crazy when we have poor network status.
Of course, you can purchase device which has more storage space. But here is how much you need to pay to increase.







As you can see, the price
for additional storage space is really expensive.

Kratos can solve this issue. It can provide up to 512GB additional storage space for your devices. 




Also
Kratos supports streaming to multiple devices and it means all of your devices can
extend storage space by using just one Kratos.



Using
this functionality, you can also share data with nearby people and devices, so it will be a great
tool for your presentation, meeting, discussion, etc.

      

Sometimes you feel that your device doesn’t have enough usb port for the peripherals (for example, MacBook only has one usb port). Kratos can be a good choice for such devices.




3. Advantage
 - Kratos provides more storage space than any other existing wireless
flash drive.


Currently, SanDisk Wireless Stick has largest storage space (200GB), but Kratos can provide 312GB more than that.

-  the Cheapest
Wireless Flash Drive ever.



(Our retail price will be $119 for 256GB and $ 169 for 512GB model)

- Support Dual Band Wi-Fi
Existing
models only support 2.4GHz band width. But Kratos supports dual band (2.4GHz and 5GHz both) and it can solve interference issue, so we can increase transfer speed and reliability. Also 5GHz bandwidth is good for video streaming.

- Kratos provides high speed via wire and Wi-Fi

Of course, Wi-Fi transmission is heavily effected by environment, but we've tested it all the devices in same environment.

-  Easy to find using beep functionality
Have you ever lost the memory and spend a lot of time to find it? You don't worry about that with Kratos. Kratos has ability to raise alarm, so user can find it easily. You can raise alaram by using app with your phone.

- 
Simple to use and powerful application
(support iOS, Android, Mac Os and Windows) 
You can see our app in the video.

4. Product Specification







  5. Current Status



Currently, we've already made working prototype. We need to do tooling for better look and feel. Also we need to improve apps.



    6. Timeline




7. How can you help us?

For us to
bring the “KRATOS” to life, we need your support!
Your
generous funding will help us get things started in order to realize our
concept. It will assist us with the cost of further development, manufacturing
and production. More importantly you get the chance to be one of the first
users of the “KRATOS”.  We will also use
our funding to test our concept to make it better.  We are committed to continuous improvement so
we are always giving people the best possible solutions.
We
will also be using the funding to expand the possibilities for the usage for
consumers as well as enterprise solutions of the “KRATOS”, to further customize
the first version of the “KRATOS” and create additional products and services
that will compliment “KRATOS”.

The “KRATOS” needs pledging but above all it
needs your attention and interest!



8. About Us

Our company is passionate with creating an USB, Wi-Fi connector and sync cable that is sleek, functional and addresses real problems. KRATOS is not only a concept. We have a working prototype. We have engineered a unique product that solves many problems and our results have been fantastic.  So far all of our feedback has been over the top, everyone from students to world travelers are enjoying the many useful components of the KRATOS.
Together with our team we take our passion for innovation beyond our products and in every decision we make.
In our product development process, simplifying people live always driven us at every stage. Simple products that can way help people.
We were inspired by some existing solutions on the market and tried to combine smartly several technologies into one. The one that you really care about.
As mention above, KRATOS is a combination of different products pack into one device. By performing this, our wish was to reduce the amount of components, packaging an products development emerging from this process.
For us to bring the "KRATOS" to life, we need your support!



9. Legal Disclaimer"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."



10. FAQ

1) Where can I set my color?
You can set your color in the kratos site:  http://kratosmemory.com

2) Can the device/wifi network be renamed?
Yes, you can rename it in the app settings.
3) Can you stream a movie from the drive to an Apple TV via an iPhone or iPad?
It’s possible, but it needs some manual steps.
- Connect drive to home access point over wifi
- Determine the Drive’s IP address on your home wifi network.
- Access the web portal through the browser by entering the IP address of step 2
- Browse to the video of your choice, click twice and stream to Apple TV
4) Do I need wifi to access this drive?
You don’t need to be connected to anything the drive puts out its on wifi signal to connect to. While connected to the drives wifi, you can not use the internet unless you connect to the drive through a wireless network.
5) Does it support cryptography?
Yes, Kratos has built in cryptography functionality and you can select whether you want to crypt or not.6) Can it stream 1080p movies?Yes, it can stream hd 720p, 1080p and even 4K videos and it can stream to any phone, tablet or pc.
7) Can I use it as a mobile Wifi Hotspot?
No, it only transmit the content it has saved on it to other devices

story:
What is the "1,000 Generator Giveaway"?

In an attempt to draw people to our crowdfunding campaign, we are offering portable gasoline generators (>1000W) to our first 1,000 Second Aid Kit customers.

As you will see, the cost of a Second Aid Kit is extremely small, so we are essentially giving them away!

How are we able to offer 1,000 generators?

Because our campaign is All-Or-Nothing style and the size of our campaign, we can budget for this as a marketing expense.  All-Or-Nothing means that the project is only funded when it reaches its goal.

Why are we offering portable gasoline generators?

We felt that most people would love to have a generator if they had a choice.  A generator perfectly complements a Second Aid Kit in a power emergency.  It can supply power to several lights, small appliances, and your cell phone as the gasoline lasts.  They can also be used to charge up your Second Aid Kit so that you can carry around an extra battery for your cell phone.  Together, the generator and your Second Aid Kit will help you get through the power emergency with more comfort.

For those wondering why a green energy technology company would offer a gasoline-based device, she short answer is that we believe there is a place for fossil fuel devices in a future green world.  One of these areas is emergency power.

 

Founder Brian Martin describes the Plan $B Project:

 

What is the Plan $B Project?

  • Everyone knows what a First Aid Kit is. The SECOND AID KIT supplies emergency power for your cell phone so that you can communicate with your family during power emergencies. The Plan $B project aims to get every US family a Second Aid Kit. It will help keep families together during terrorist attacks, storms, and blackouts.
  • To get the ball rolling, we are giving away portable gasoline generators to the first 1,000 Second Aid Kit customers.  See our "Perks" for more information.
  • Also, we are donating all profit from kit sales to disaster relief organizations.

 

What is the Second Aid Kit?

The Second Aid Kit is a second battery for your phone that is charged using the SUN or wall outlet.  Simply charge it up, put it in your pocket, purse, or backpack, and use it when your phone is running low. 

The Second Aid Kit also doubles as an EMERGENCY cell phone charger, for use during power outages and disasters.

 

BOGO >> "Buy one give one"

If you select a BOGO "Perk", we will donate one Second Aid Kit to a disaster relief organization in your or your friend's name.  Imagine how happy a family will be to receive one of these kits in order to stay connected with their loved ones!

 

Who Are We?

Green Buck Labs (est. 2013, Winona, OH) is social enterprise combining a for-profit structure with a non-profit's mission.  The Company’s main product, the Second Aid Kit (formerly the Firefly Charger), is a personal kit designed to bring emergency backup power for 1st World phones, and first electricity to the 20% of the world's population still in the dark.

The company's 20 original shareholder/advisers include teachers, missionaries, pastors, engineers, commercial pilots, financial analysts, former military, college counselors, truck drivers, and construction workers.

Green Buck Labs' Founder and Plan $B leader Brian Martin is an inventor/entrepreneur who co-founded a startup company that developed experimental aircraft.  The company was a DARPA contractor, was covered in National Geographic, Wired, and was the cover story for Popular Mechanics.  Martin spends a significant amount of his spare time volunteering as a church youth leader.  His major influences are Edison, the Wright Brothers, Walt Disney, and Jesus (in reverse order) who all had a flare for large-scale projects.  

THE SECOND AID KIT LITE
The Second Aid Kit sold in the Plan $B project is actually a lite version of the original Second Aid Kit.  Like a first aid kit, the original Second Aid Kit contains a collection of other companies' components in a handy, protective case.  Our proprietary case design allow the original kits to live outdoors in the weather and to double as long-lasting lanterns.  The SECOND AID KIT LITE however contains only the solar charger, so we are essentially providing high quality 3rd party chargers and using our buying power to keep the prices unusually low.

 

THINGS YOU SHOULD KNOW ABOUT PLAN $B:

This is an "ALL-OR-NOTHING" crowdfunding campaign (or "Fixed Goal")

Therefore, if this campaign DOES reach its funding goal, the project will be funded and you will receive your kit or Amazon Card.

If this campaign DOES NOT reach its funding goal, the project will not be funded and all money will be refunded to you

PROS of an All-or-Nothing campaign:  We can offer you very low prices once we reach our goal.

CONS of an All-or-Nothing campaign:  We may not reach our campaign goal -- in which case all Reservations, Perks, and Contest Prizes will be cancelled and your money will be refunded.

All kits are pre-orders.  Delivery will begin within two months of the campaign close.  It will take a couple of months for all of the kits to be delivered.  Kits will be delivered in the order that they were purchased.

We are donating ALL PROFIT on Kits/ Perks to Hurricane Matthew relief.  We will profit only from 3rd-party ads, other products, and other activities.

Campaign Expenses:  Our staff will be paid to manage the campaign and process orders.  Some will be spent on marketing activities.  Most of the proceeds will go towards the cost of manufacturing and delivering kits.

 

Former Green Buck Labs Projects

story:
Atop Wireless charging Dock and Backup power system for Apple Watch! Install your Apple Watch cable into the Dock!
 

17th Aug update!

Promotion! Anyone who share our campaign to your facebook would get a compatible cable for free（as the photo below）,only for the Top 200!

Email to  atopserv@gmail.com leave your shipping information after sharing!  

Get your Atop Charging dock for free!

Don't miss our referral program: 

  • buy at least one Atop Charging dock. Then get 5 friends to buy a Atop Charging dock and you will get one for free! Read more in the FAQ section.   
  • share this link to your facebook twitter or your other website,5% would will get the lucky draw for a chance to get Atop Charging dock free.

What you would get?

 

Use of the fund

We have been working on Atop charging dock for almost a year now. Everything is set and ready to go but we need your help to take the final step.As we show above,the charg dock would use the polymer battery aircraft-grade anodized aluminum shell and highly smart chip,Only with mass production can we ensure it's built efficiently, while keeping costs low and lead times short.So we start this campaign on indiegogo and hope that people around the world who interested in our idea would help it come ture!

About us

Atop was established in 2015 Shenzhen with a goal of creating excellent Apple accessories that had the user in mind. As an innovative and creative company, Atop has always advocated the creation of products that make user’s technological life more convenient and simple. Over the years, members of our team have worked for world class companies like Huawei, ZTE, DJI and more. Our team features experts in the fields of electronics, software, hardware, manufacturing.Our passion for beautifully crafted gadgets paved the way for making technology more enjoyable to users worldwide.

Meet our Team:

 

 

FAQ

First, order at least one Atop charging dock. Then, get 5 friends to order and you will be refunded on one Atop charging dock! Here's how: 

1.Log into Indiegogo and go to the AWESOME Atop charging dock campaign page

2.Click the Facebook or Twitter icons to share the campaign via social media or click the “link” icon to copy your own personal link to share by email.

3. When someone clicks through to the page via your link and contributes, you will automatically be credited as the referrer.

4. 5% of the people who share the campaign would get the lucky draw for a chance to get Atop charging dock free.

 

Q: I'm interested in becoming a retailer. What are the next steps?

A: Send us an email to atopserv@gmail.com and we will be in touch with you asap. 

 

Q: How many times could the Atop charging dock battery recharge Apple watch?

A: About 7 times if fully charged.

 

 Q: How much does shipping cost?

A: Worldwide shipping is free!  However, we do not ship to the following countries: Sudan, Burma, Iran, Iraq, Syria, Afghanistan, North Korea, Somalia, Yemen, Libya and Cuba.  

 

Q: Is that any fast way to get Atop charging dock?

A: Yes, we would send the package to Early Bird first. Also if you like DHL shipping,we could do that to,but you need to pay $20 for the shipping cost.

 

Q: Does it come in any different colours?

A: Yes,we have 2 colors,black and silver,please leave a message what color do you want,or we will send rindomly.

 

Q: Does it come with a warranty?

A: Yes, your charging dock and the battery come with a one year warranty from the day of delivery. if any quality problem,please contact us, we will exchange a new one to you for free.but It does not cover damages caused by accident or misuse.

story:
SUMMARY

  • Fully autonomous driving indoors.
  • Easy touch and voice controls.
  • Compatible with most existing wheelchairs.
  • Affordable and easy to use. 

We're creating the first affordable device that will enable autonomous driving for almost all electric wheelchairs. The autopilot wheelchair system is being developed by a team of dedicated engineers, artists, programmers and designers. This device is a revolutionary step forward that will make transport much easier for anyone with physical disabilities.  Right now, anyone using the autopilot wheelchair system will be able to go anywhere indoors. Instead of having to use cumbersome joystick controls, you can now simply direct your wheelchair to the destination of your choice through voice or touch input on your smartphone.

Our team's founder is Val Spiridonov who is a professional engineer and 3D designer – he knows firsthand how useful a device like this can be. In addition, we have a team of over 30 people working on this project who have backgrounds ranging from advanced robotics development to application programming. We need funding to develop this project commercially and make this device accessible to as many people as possible. Instead of developing a whole new electric wheelchair, this device will attach to your existing wheelchair and use an accompanying app on your phone to work.

Right now, the autopilot wheelchair system is designed to work flawlessly indoors. Our goal is to make a system that is very affordable and easy to use. We don't anticipate that it will cost more than 250$ when it is on the market. This system works as 3 separate components:

1.  The device itself, which will attach to an electric wheelchair and enable autonomous movement.

2.  IR Blasters with cameras that will serve to map out your indoor space and track where you are to avoid collisions.

3.  An application on your smartphone that will allow voice and touch commands.

The most important aspect of the autopilot wheelchair system is to make sure that no collision happens and that the user always has control of the device. The user will always be able to resume manual control at any time. In order to avoid collisions and make accurate adjustments in real time, we've looked at various VR headsets for inspiration. Most Virtual reality headsets on the market today employ some type of tracking technology, so that the headset knows the position of the user. This is especially needed when you're using room scale VR.

The great thing about this is that we can use the same type of technology for the autopilot wheelchair system. IR blasters will map out your room space in real time and attached cameras will track where you are in your room. From there, you can use your application to set destinations in your living space. Then, all you need to do is tell the application where to go. You can do this via voice input or by tapping on your smartphone. Both options are significantly easier than having to manipulate a cumbersome joystick. In many cases, people cannot use their hands anymore, so a system like this could help immensely.

If you use an electric wheelchair, then you understand how frustrating it can be to avoid obstacles, make constant adjustments and generally devote all of your concentration into controlling the wheelchair. Even if you aren't disabled, you probably know someone in your circle of friends or in your neighborhood who is – think about them and how much a device like this can help. If you need to go from your bedroom to your kitchen, then all you need to do is say “kitchen” or tap the name of the place that you want to go to on your smartphone. From there, your wheelchair will automatically take you to your destination. This has the potential to save a lot of time and frees you up to do other things like talking to your friends or reading.

Right now, we've developed the technology needed to make this system safely work indoors. We have plans to eventually update this system so that it works outdoors. We don't have this functionality yet and we will only release it once we are confident that it works outdoors and is completely safe to use.

From a conceptual standpoint, we have a few ideas on how this could work outdoors. Namely, we would use GPS data and perhaps the location of “guides” to make sure that you stay on course. In practice, this would work by using your friend who is walking next to you, to avoid obstacles and make sure that you are on course. Again, right now we have the functionality for this system to work indoors, but we have big ambitions and hope to make this system work outdoors at some point.

We have an outstanding team that's made up of extremely talented engineers, programmers, designers and artists. Together we've designed robots, created applications and worked on various other engineering projects.

Valery is an incredibly talented person who specializes in engineering, programming and 3D modeling. He was born with a disability that significantly limits his movement, but he is unencumbered by it, and goes above and beyond to be positive and make the most out of life. Valery created this project and is the Director of Clever Chair. If Val looks familiar to you, it's because he has been written about in almost every major news outlet, including Reuters, RT, Daily Mail and Mirror. Valery has written extensive editorials for many popular science outlets, including Ria Novosti.

Desire for life is an organization that was founded by Valery Spiridonov with the goal of prolonging the life of people with disabilities like Valery. We made headlines all over the world because we are exploring the possibilities of feasible head transplantation within a period of 5-10 years.

Alexey is the founder of Promobot. He has over 12 years of experience in developing robots. Alexey was named in Forbes' list of the top 30 European technology entrepreneurs. He has a PhD In Technical Sciences.

Why Indiegogo?

We have a great team in place and the technical knowledge needed to complete this project, but we need financing to make a commercial model and bring this system to the commercial market. We have prototypes in development and the technology in place to make this project work, but we need financing to make sure that this project goes from prototype to a completed commercial and affordable system. Our team looked at a lot of options for financing and by far the best way to make sure that we make a system that places priority on ease of use and affordability is to use crowdfunding. This way, we are free to make the system that we envisioned.

By supporting us, you're helping to create a system that has the potential to help hundreds of thousands of people with disabilities.

How much time do you need to release the autopilot wheelchair system?

Our timeline is to deliver the autopilot wheelchair system within 12 months for Indiegogo backers. It takes time to manufacture the IR Blasters with cameras and the device itself on a larger scale. With that in mind, it will take us 14-16 months to deliver orders for non Indiegogo buyers.

We will need to finish the application itself and develop a commercial model form our prototype, so we don't want to misinform you and give you an overly optimistic timeline. This is why we gave you the timeline above. We will always keep you updated and plan to continue updating the Indiegogo project after it ends to keep backers informed.

If you personally don't need a device like this – think or remember that probably in your circle of friends or in your neighborhood, you will find a guy or a girl who fights everyday with their disability and with their wheelchair's joystick.

wheelchair to the destination of your choice through voice or touch input on
your smartphone. 
Our team's founder is Val Spiridonov who is
a professional engineer and 3D designer – he knows firsthand how useful a
device like this can be. In addition, we have a team of over 30 people working
on this project who have backgrounds ranging from advanced robotics development
to application programming. We need funding to develop this project
commercially and make this device accessible to as many people as possible.
Instead of developing a whole new electric wheelchair, this device will attach
to your existing wheelchair and use an accompanying app on your phone to work. 




Right now, the autopilot wheelchair system
is designed to work flawlessly indoors. Our goal is to make a system that is
very affordable and easy to use. We don't anticipate that it will cost more
than 250$ when it is on the market. This system works as 3 separate components:
1. 
The device itself, which will
attach to an electric wheelchair and enable autonomous movement.
2. 
IR Blasters with cameras that
will serve to map out your indoor space and track where you are to avoid
collisions. 
3. 
An application on your
smartphone that will allow voice and touch commands. 
The most important aspect of the autopilot
wheelchair system is to make sure that no collision happens and that the user
always has control of the device. The user will always be able to resume manual
control at any time. In order to avoid collisions and make accurate adjustments
in real time, we've looked at various VR headsets for inspiration. Most Virtual
reality headsets on the market today employ some type of tracking technology,
so that the headset knows the position of the user. This is especially needed
when you're using room scale VR. 
The great thing about this is that we can
use the same type of technology for the autopilot wheelchair system. IR
blasters will map out your room space in real time and attached cameras will
track where you are in your room. From there, you can use your application to
set destinations in your living space. Then, all you need to do is tell the
application where to go. You can do this via voice input or by tapping on your
smartphone. Both options are significantly easier than having to manipulate a
cumbersome joystick. In many cases, people cannot use their hands anymore, so a
system like this could help immensely. 
If you use an electric wheelchair, then you
understand how frustrating it can be to avoid obstacles, make constant
adjustments and generally devote all of your concentration into controlling the
wheelchair. Even if you aren't disabled, you probably know someone in your
circle of friends or in your neighborhood who is – think about them and how
much a device like this can help. If you need to go from your bedroom to your
kitchen, then all you need to do is say “kitchen” or tap the name of the place
that you want to go to on your smartphone. From there, your wheelchair will automatically
take you to your destination. This has the potential to save a lot of time and
frees you up to do other things like talking to your friends or reading.
Right now, we've developed the technology
needed to make this system safely work indoors. We have plans to eventually
update this system so that it works outdoors. We don't have this functionality
yet and we will only release it once we are confident that it works outdoors
and is completely safe to use. 
From a conceptual standpoint, we have a few
ideas on how this could work outdoors. Namely, we would use GPS data and
perhaps the location of “guides” to make sure that you stay on course. In
practice, this would work by using your friend who is walking next to you, to
avoid obstacles and make sure that you are on course. Again, right now we have
the functionality for this system to work indoors, but we have big ambitions
and hope to make this system work outdoors at some point. 

We have an outstanding team that's made up
of extremely talented engineers, programmers, designers and artists. Together
we've designed robots, created applications and worked on various other
engineering projects.Valery is an incredibly talented person who
specializes in engineering, programming and 3D modeling. He was born with a
disability that significantly limits his movement, but he is unencumbered by
it, and goes above and beyond to be positive and make the most out of life.
Valery created this project and is the Director of Clever Chair. If Val looks
familiar to you, it's because he has been written about in almost every major
news outlet, including Reuters, RT, Daily Mail and Mirror. Valery has written
extensive editorials for many popular science outlets, including Ria Novosti.

Desire for life is an organization that was
founded by Valery Spiridonov with the goal of prolonging the life of
people with disabilities like Valery. We made headlines all over the world
because we are exploring the possibilities of feasible head transplantation
within a period of 5-10 years.Alexey is
the founder of Promobot. He has over 12 years of experience in developing
robots. Alexey was named in Forbes' list of the top 30 European technology
entrepreneurs. He has a PhD In Technical Sciences.
Why Indiegogo?

We have a great team in place and the
technical knowledge needed to complete this project, but we need financing to
make a commercial model and bring this system to the commercial market. We have
prototypes in development and the technology in place to make this project
work, but we need financing to make sure that this project goes from prototype
to a completed commercial and affordable system. Our team looked at a lot of
options for financing and by far the best way to make sure that we make a
system that places priority on ease of use and affordability is to use
crowdfunding. This way, we are free to make the system that we envisioned. 
By supporting us, you're helping to create
a system that has the potential to help hundreds of thousands of people with
disabilities. 
How much time do you need to release the autopilot
wheelchair system?

Our timeline is to deliver the autopilot
wheelchair system within 12 months for Indiegogo backers. It takes time to
manufacture the IR Blasters with cameras and the device itself on a larger
scale. With that in mind, it will take us 14-16 months to deliver orders for
non Indiegogo buyers. 
We will need to finish the application
itself and develop a commercial model form our prototype, so we don't want to
misinform you and give you an overly optimistic timeline. This is why we gave
you the timeline above. We will always keep you updated and plan to continue
updating the Indiegogo project after it ends to keep backers informed.If you personally don't need a device like
this – think or remember that probably in your circle of friends or in your
neighborhood, you will find a guy or a girl who fights everyday with their
disability and with their wheelchair's joystick.

story:
Lets face it, we are always touching surfaces that have other people's viruses and bacteria on them. We then transfer those viruses and bacteria to our phones and tablets! Where do you think the germs on your devices end up? They are transferred to your face, hands and even your food. We all know that washing or sanitizing our hands helps us avoid getting sick, but we never sanitize our devices. 

These days we like to use our devices in the bathroom...don't kid yourself, you know you do it too! 

 Well then it shouldn't be a surprise that "16% of phones harbour the E. coli bacteria of fecal origin".  -Dr. Val Curtis of the London School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine.

Kids love using our phones and tablets, and you might have been using that phone on the toilet earlier. Touch screens are a part of our everyday lives it is were we receive most of our news and entertainment. We created DaWipez to be the inexpensive hassle free way to keep all of your devices clean anywhere-anytime and did we mention they are Recyclable! Keeping your device sanitized is just as important as washing your hands to avoid getting sick.


DaWipez are individually packaged for easy on the go use. DaWipez are specifically designed to Sanitize items like cell phones, tablets, car touch screens, laptop screens, keyboards and mouse. Not only do they kill germs, but they leave your device steak free! Stick one in your purse, wallet, or baby bag. Keep a few in your car!

We need to raise 20,000 dollars to lock in a low manufacturing price to insure that our product is affordable for everyone. Please check out our perks and see  which one works for you!

I created this campaign because I believe there is a need for a simple product to help us sanitize our personal devices. I wanted to create an easy and effective way to clean and sanitize my phone anywhere-anytime.  Alternative products I have used in the past such as Lysol wipes are inconvenient to carry around and have left streaks on my phone screen.  While I’m no germaphobe I got to thinking one day about all of the things I touched between uses of my phone.  There must be some serious germs on these personal devices of ours! After a bit of research I discovered there have been many studies conducted which prove our phones are in fact one of the dirtiest things we have on us. With this idea in motion, I put together a team of creative clean freaks to help put my vision together and make DaWipez a reality. 



Risks and challenges

While manufacturing a product has become increasingly easier in today's well-connected world, it is still a fascinatingly complex challenge. To best prepare for these challenges, we've been consulting with both logistical and wipe industry experts over the past year.

We have a strong plan for manufacturing in China, and shipping to our backers around the world. We've studied the details of taking a product to market and have already solidified the partnerships required to do so. We have also setup backup suppliers in case our chosen partner falls through. We pledge to keep our backers well informed throughout the entire production process and commit to doing everything in our power to deliver DaWipez on time for Christmas 2016.

story:
Our phones and tablets have become a hugh part of our daily lives. It is time to use them as a tool to evangelize and express our Christian faith.

 

 The Phone covers are compatible with the most popular models of iPhone and Android phones.  iPhone 4/4S, iPhone 5/5s/SE, iPhone 5c, iPhone 6 Plus and iPhone 6s. Two designs of artwork are available to choose from - Sacred heart of Jesus or Holy Mary.

 Biblezon iPhone cases is a light weight, ultra thin and good quality cases. This iphone case inspires you to live your christian values while also protecting your phone.

From tough drop protection to minimalistic covers, Biblezon provides different phone case options to help you find the best Christian Galaxy case for you. Available for Samsung Galaxy S6 , S6 Edge, S6 Edge+, S7 and S7 edge.

Keep your Ipad protected and stylish with a Christian tablet cases made by Biblezon.

25 Days of Advent app

BibleZon will be releasing an Advent app in mid-November. The app will be your daily companion through advent in preparation for the celebration of the Nativity of Our Lord. The Advent app is loaded with many exciting features including:

  • Daily readings
  • Reflections
  • Prayers
  • Spiritual exercises
  • Activities, Quizzes, Videos, Songs and More

WHY A CHRISTIAN COVER?

We believe these cases will revolutionize the way many of us use our phones and portable devices. Our Biblezon covers will transform your smart phone or other device, into a powerful tool for evangelization and worship time. These covers will allow you to proudly express your Christian faith while planting spiritual seeds in your friends and neighbors; a truly revolutionary way to evangelize. BiblezonCases are a great tool for college students to openly and inconspicuously promote their faith on campus. These cases will serve as a constant reminder of your faith and when you reach for your device will make you reconsider using it for questionable activities.

 

 

 

       FAQ`S

 

How do I choose my image and device  type?

You will be emailed a order process form to your inbox via Backerkit at the end of the campaign. The form will allow you to specify your options..

Can I choose a different image and device type  even if I order them together as 1 perk?

Yes, you can choose a different image and model for every cover purchased. For example if you purchase a Couples Prayer Phone Pak, you can choose 1 Apple and 1 Android case with 2 different images.

What is Advent App?

               During the 25 days of Advent,  it will help you prepare for the nativity of our Lord

How will my order be shipped?

All orders will be shipping with tracking, out of our fulfilment center in Dallas and will be delivered in most cases by your local postal service.

Which countries do you ship to?

We ship to all countries excluding the following which have been flagged by courier services as restricted or high risk: Belarus, Cote d'Ivoire, Cuba, Democratic Republic of the Congo, North Korea, Sierra Leone, Sudan, Syria & Zimbabwe. If you would like a shipment to any these countries we will make alternative arrangements that may cost more, however we can't guarantee the shipment's arrival.

If you have any questions please email  sales@biblezon.com  and we will respond within 48 business hours.
