story:
Our Bible App 
Devotionals. For the rest of us. 

 

Hello everyone. I'm Crystal Cheatham. You may remember me as the creator of the IDentity Kit for Queer Christian Youth, or the queer Christian folk singer that passed through your town once upon a time a million years ago. I'm also the gal around town writing queer faith articles for the Philadelphia Gay Newspaper, HuffPo, The New Civil Rights Movement and other online publications. But I think most of you know me as the most beautiful and hilarious person you've ever met. Ok, just playing. That's definitely wishful thinking.

In all of my writing, singing and performing I've been candid about my time growing up in a fundamentalist church and how confusing it was to come out and deal with that whole clusterf@ck of a second puberty. I've devoted so much of my life to helping others in that position realize that yes, their higher power does love them and that they too deserve the quietude and serenity that comes with being a person of faith.

Every week I get an email or a Facebook post from someone who has seen my Driftwood video or stumbled upon the IDentity Kit and they are looking for answers--answers that I alone cannot give. It's not just the LGBT community looking for affirmation. There are a whole bunch of us with complex identities that don't fit into a fundamentalist mold but do identify somewhere along the spectrum between Christian, spiritual and agnostic. What I know is that we as an international community are hungry for books and media that affirm who we are and how we live our lives. With that on my heart as a primary motivator I've decided to put together Our Bible app. I believe it is the best way to unify us world wide, and set in the light those messages we've all been craving to hear. This way we will all have access to podcasts, devotionals, videos, Bible texts and a community that is out there to inspire and lift us up. I hope you see what I see. I hope you'll help me build this. So you too can read, pray and meditate in peace.

Our Bible App:

  • A library of affirming & diverse devotionals written by some of the leading voices in affirming & accepting Christianity
  • A calendar progress bar that helps you keep up on your daily devotionals so that you can start your own daily plans and follow them for a few days, weeks or months.
  • Multiple Bible translations and daily verses with the ability to highlight, copy and paste
  • Access to podcasts, videos & articles
  • A community board where you can invite friends & build community

THE PROBLEM:  

I don't know about you but I get frustrated when I go to the Christian section of a bookstore and amongst the hundreds and thousands of books, there are none that feel like they are talking to me. None of us is defined by one or two identities, but conservative Christianity today seems to believe we are all the same person with the same needs, wants and desires. (By the way I'm a black, female, lesbian and that's a pretty tall order to fill when looking for something that speaks to me.) 

Devotionals on friendships, romantic relationships, family, love, life journeys and others are all geared towards a very specific kind of Christian, and in today's society that brand of conservative fundamentalist Christianity is seemingly less and less Christlike. It doesn't appeal to LGBT people, their allies, feminists, agnostics, people who feel more spiritual than religious or even folks who just want wise words to meditate on. Instead what is offered is so heteronormative, judgy, shaming and well... political. What's more, those devotionals parcel the true language of the Bible to fit certain molds of faith and worship and let's face it. The Bible doesn't say just one thing about anything. There are as many narratives as there are identities and we need to honor that! The truth is, there are people writing affirming and inclusive devotionals, but you won't find them in a Christian bookstore. 

THE FIX: 

In response to this I've created a Bible app that caters to the rest of us; the Christians who are queer, straight, and generally identify as the Other kind of Christian. We want to explore the Bible through narratives that are inclusive of our identities and whom God made us to be. We are often seen as the outsiders, but we too need devotionals and worship materials that theologize our particular human experiences. 

Our Bible app is just that. 

 That's where you come in. In order to get this app to the next level I need your help. I need, want, am crazy about raising the funds I need to make this app appear on your phone. If we want to make that happen we need to raise $40,000. This cash will go to writing, developing and launching the Our Bible app.

Risks and Challenges

We are currently in the coding and development stage with the goal of launching the app worldwide for Android and Apple software in early 2017. In full disclosure after we receive the funding there are some potential hiccups that could keep us from launching on time. This is a creative project after all, and above all else creativity needs time to blossom and grow. Edits and revisions in the development stage could slow progress, but any extra time taken to shape the app will only result in a cleaner and faster product.

story:
With all of the climate change discussions that have been taking place in Paris recently, the game has completely changed. The world has decided to take the vital steps necessary to get away from using fossil fuels as the primary energy source. It has now turned to the world of renewable energy sources. The ramifications of these actions and changes have an incredible potential to not only change the world, but possibly expand the lifetime of the non-renewable resources currently present. Solar power, which was once thought of as a novelty, can primarily become the predominant player and take its rightful place as the center of our global energy system. As side from providing energy necessary to sustain life, it will then provide energy to power our electronical devices, our cras, and our homes. The possibilities are endless.

With this movement in mind, we are proud to introduce the WristCharge, a wearable device that contains solar cells and a power bank, thus making it possible to charge your smartphones no matter where you are. It is an ingenious way of having the power of a big, bulky gasoline generator in a convenient wristband no bigger than a watch or a bracelet. Yes, the future of energy if here and the WristCharge is leading the march.

We are now turning to you, Indiegogo , for the help needed to raise $40,000. This startup capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the WristCharge, which makes energy usage both environmental friendly and convenient. Your contributions are tremendously appreciated. Thank you.





What We Need & What You Get

In order to manufacture, market, and distribute WristCharge on a large scale, we need $40,000 in funding. This money will go a long way for our small company, making it possible for us to develop our product on a scale that is simply out of reach for us right now.

Once we have this product completed, our contributors will have the first option to purchase it. This is a charging product unlike any other. For a long time, charging your phone has been a stationary, inconvenient thing, so much so that airports and restaurants have begun to offer charging stations and a service. No more: charging will now take place on your schedule and wherever you happen to be.



The Impact

WristCharge is the sort of product that will ripple throughout the tech sector. It is going to take charging and make it something that comes naturally, something that you do when you need to do it, something that you don’t even have to think about. In the same way that smart phones themselves changed the way that we use the Internet and stay in contact with each other, WristCharge is going to change the way we use our smart phones, untethering us from their formerly stationary charging ports.

Risks & Challenges

We are ready to put WristCharge into the later stages of development. Having put in the time and energy necessary to prepare, we are confident that we have a concrete plan and that we know how to avoid the pitfalls commonly associated with new product launches. As a sustainable energy source, WristCharge makes sense both economically and environmentally: it’s smart business all around and relatively low-risk.


Timeline:  

August 2015
I came up with the idea for WristCharge and drew out a preliminary sketch of the concept.

September – November 2015
I thoroughly researched the concept of solar power and learned how to make WristCharge operational.

December 2015
The campaign launches.

February 2016
The campaign ends.

March 2016
I will purchase the materials that are needed to manufacture WristCharge.

April 2016
The first models of WristCharge will be tested.

May 2016
I will contact manufacturing companies and find suppliers who can best meet the needs of WristCharge. 

December 2016
WristCharge will become available to the general public.

lifetime of the non-renewable resources currently present. Solar power, which
was once thought of as a novelty, can primarily become the predominant player
and take its rightful place as the center of our global energy system. As side
from providing energy necessary to sustain life, it will then provide energy to
power our electronical devices, our cras, and our homes. The possibilities are
endless.
With this movement in mind, we are proud to introduce the
WristCharge, a wearable device that contains solar cells and a power bank, thus
making it possible to charge your smartphones no matter where you are. It is an
ingenious way of having the power of a big, bulky gasoline generator in a
convenient wristband no bigger than a watch or a bracelet. Yes, the future of
energy if here and the WristCharge is leading the march. 
We are now turning to you, Indiegogo , for the help needed
to raise $40,000. This startup capital will cover the costs of manufacturing,
marketing, and distributing the WristCharge, which makes energy usage both
environmental friendly and convenient. Your contributions are tremendously
appreciated. Thank you.

What We Need
& What You Get
In order to manufacture, market, and distribute WristCharge
on a large scale, we need $40,000 in funding. This money will go a long way for
our small company, making it possible for us to develop our product on a scale
that is simply out of reach for us right now.
Once we have this product completed, our contributors will
have the first option to purchase it. This is a charging product unlike any
other. For a long time, charging your phone has been a stationary, inconvenient
thing, so much so that airports and restaurants have begun to offer charging
stations and a service. No more: charging will now take place on your schedule
and wherever you happen to be.
The Impact
WristCharge is the sort of product that will ripple
throughout the tech sector. It is going to take charging and make it something
that comes naturally, something that you do when you need to do it, something
that you don’t even have to think about. In the same way that smart phones
themselves changed the way that we use the Internet and stay in contact with
each other, WristCharge is going to change the way we use our smart phones,
untethering us from their formerly stationary charging ports.
Risks & Challenges
We are ready to put WristCharge into the later stages of
development. Having put in the time and energy necessary to prepare, we are
confident that we have a concrete plan and that we know how to avoid the
pitfalls commonly associated with new product launches. As a sustainable energy
source, WristCharge makes sense both economically and environmentally: it’s
smart business all around and relatively low-risk.
Timeline:  
August 2015
I came up with the idea for WristCharge and drew out a preliminary sketch of
the concept.
September – November 2015
I thoroughly researched the concept of solar power and learned how to make
WristCharge operational.
December 2015
The campaign launches.
February 2016
The campaign ends.
March 2016
I will purchase the materials that are needed to manufacture WristCharge.
April 2016
The first models of WristCharge will be tested.
May 2016
I will contact manufacturing companies and find suppliers who can best meet the
needs of WristCharge.  
December 2016
WristCharge will become available to the general public.

story:
"SMARTPHONES WITHOUT LIMITS"

       Have you ever wanted to watch live television like FOX, NBC, PBS and many others without using data? Or how about listen to your favorite radio stations like AM and FM and even satellite radio without using data? This is all possible with my creation of a "module" that is easily attached to your smartphone, any smartphone, rendering it capable of receiving any frequency broadcast through the air. Not only would this device be able to do this but it would also have:

  • A Built-in Battery Pack 8000 MAH. Extending cell phone use tremendously!
  • Solar Cells attached to the surface for charging during times of absent electricity or wall outlets
  • SD Card slot to expand memory for storage like music, pictures, documents and movies
  • Would receive ALL digital HD local television channels that are broadcast in your area for free
  • CB/Walkie Talkie Radio
  • HAM Radio
  • Police/Emergency Scanner
  • Weather-band, long wave, shortwave, and single side band (SSB) World Band Receiver
  • Satellite Radio/ SAT Cell Phone and Satellite TV
  • 5G Data service ( 5G will be unveiled in late November or December this year. Capable of up to 1gps. 50 times faster than 4G. Do you want to have to buy a whole new phone that might cost you hundreds of dollars? Have to familiarize and re-adjust yourself to a new phone? Somehow transfer all of your contacts, pics, music files, website bookmarks etc. etc. And on top of that, you would not have all of the capabilities you would with a "ZM")

        This is all possible with my device ("ZM"-Zequency Module) and a specified "APP" to control each frequency it would pull in. An "APP" as easy to use as a remote. Scan the frequencies, bookmark them and enjoy. Want to watch the game? No problem. Want to listen to the Top 40? No problem. Want to see what the cops are doing? No problem. And on and on and on.

       "A BIG idea with a simple solution". There is no question whether this will work or not. It's whether or not I can get your support to put this device into production? The schematics have been drafted. The hierarchy united. Big corporations have been assigned the rights to produce this. All I need is the funding, and by this time next year, you and everyone else investing their money in this will be the proud owner of a "ZM"

*Please note: The picture of the device is a prototype. The final production will look very similar but will also have an extendable antenna and be attachable to your phone. Making it much more convenient and better overall cell, radio, data and satellite reception.

WE NEED YOUR ORDERS! Without your orders we will be unable to put this device into production. If we meet or surpass our funding goal then everything will be a go. Please do not hesitate to call or write with any questions you need answered. I will personally be addressing and coresponding with ALL contributors.

It's as simple as adding a case to your phone. Sleek, convenient and multiple applications! Have the freedom without the limitations. 

*We are in the process of developing a program to utilize analog cell service signals that were originally developed for the very first cell phone back in the 80's. These analog signals are still broadcast and will be able to capture with this device with the right software, you will never be anywhere without service. There will be no charge once this app/software is available. A simple download on your smartphone will enable this feature.

*Be aware that if we do not meet our funding goal any contributions made cannot be refunded until we DO make that goal.

story:
About Me and This Revolutionary Idea

My name is Joe, I am a 26 year old accountant currently living and working in San Diego, and my Lord do I absolutely hate waiting in lines with a passion. Whether it be in traffic to get to work, at the ballpark to watch the game, or in the grocery store to buy food, I continue to grow impatient with the simplest things in life. With the technologies we have today, why must we continue to expend considerable time in lines?

Now, the lines in traffic and at the ballgame are (arguably) circumstances out of one's control that are best dealt with great patience; However, what about the lines in grocery stores? Are the bottlenecks created by cashiers towards the front of the store avoidable? In my view, YES!

My idea, in short, is to develop a mobile payment app for grocery shoppers that would:

(1) Allow you to scan items as you go on your phone

(2) Give you real-time pricing on items scanned and the total amount of your bill at any point in time while shopping

(3) Supply you with the power to apply coupons yourself electronically versus handing newspaper cut-outs to the cashier

(4) Notify you of any deals or sales going on for any applicable items scanned, allowing you a better opportunity to save money, and finally...

(5) Give you the ultimate satisfaction of not waiting in line for a cashier to scan in all of your items and checkout. Simply proceed to the front of the store to have a bag boy package your goods (if desired), and pay via a kiosk or a store clerk who can quickly confirm via an iPad or other device that you have paid for your groceries through the app.

Scan, apply, review, and pay. That's it.


What I Need & What You Get

To develop this mobile payment app, the amount of funding I'll need is at least $75K. Here's why:
1. First, I need to find a partner in the grocery store business who is willing to be a part of this mobile payment app platform and provide price lists and any other pertinent information to the app's database. This will likely require some type of monetary agreement whereby they receive a portion of the app's revenue generated primarily from app downloads and advertisements/promotional pop-ups paid for by food manufacturers.
2. I need to hire IT professionals who are experienced with programming, testing and debugging, infrastructure, databases, and design.
3. I need to advertise this mobile app to grocery shoppers and owners, which will require social media presence as well as TV ads and any other form of advertising.
So now, what do you get in return?
- $5 investment: A big thank you for your support in revolutionizing the grocery shopping experience!!
-$25 investment: Free download of the app in the app store as well as a possible coupon to be applied on your first virtual grocery store experience!
-$100 investment: Free download of the app in the app store, possible coupon, and a place in one of the TV, newspaper, or billboard ads!
-$2,500 investment: Be a part of my team to develop this mobile payment app !!

The Impact

This mobile payment app for grocery shopping will affect just about EVERY. SINGLE. PERSON. The majority of us go to the grocery store for food and other items, and the majority of us wait in lines even if we only have 5-10 items to check in. Let's streamline the grocery shopping process by developing scan-as-you-go technology that will put the power of shopping in the consumer's hands that will allow them to save money, time, and headaches. Furthermore, let's put an end to cutting out coupons out of the grocery store's weekly newspaper by automating the process. Why do the manual work that requires more time and effort when you can just sign up for sale alerts and promotions going on based on your location and your shopping history?


Risks & Challenges

The primary risk with completing this project is that I will be learning (a lot) on the go. I am not new to putting all of my time and energy into an effort that I knew could be a game-changer, but yes, I am new to the actual development of an app from scratch. However, I am extremely confident that with a little bit of time and connecting, I can create a winning formula. I've been a part of one before, see below link for when my team won first place at a social innovation design competition in college (2011 - Clean2O):

http://www.marquette.edu/social-innovation/PastDesignContestsSocialInnovationMarquetteUniversity.shtml


Other Ways You Can Assist

Spread the word to your friends and family whether it be in person or on social media. Hell, tell it to the random guy sitting next to you on the train or in the bar. A revolution is coming...the long lines and waits in the grocery store are coming to an end...savings in time and money both for the consumer and the business owner are on the horizon...and that person who cancels a purchase in front of you because he/she thought it was on sale but it really wasn't? That will no longer be a thing.

story:
Clever Card - Mouldable Plastic & Rubber that melts in hot water

Hi!  We are a team of family & friends from Auckland, New Zealand with a serious passion for plastics.

We created the Clever Card to enable people to create, fix, craft, prototype & customise utilizing mouldbale plastic & rubber which melts in hot water and is reusable hundreds of times. It is non-toxic (kid friendly) and comes in loads of different colours.

The cards are made from a special bio-polymer that has the ability to melt at only 62 degrees C (about the same as a nice hot choclate).

When in a solid state is is as hard as nylon.  When it is heated it is safe to touch with your hands and feels like Plasticine.  When it cools it returns to its original strength and hardness.

Our campaign and your support will enable us to produce our next project, a Classroom Education Pack, which includes lesson plans and clever cards to teach the next generation about the Science, Processing, Application and Recycling of plastics.

Heat

Shape

Create

Reusable Hundreds of times!

Our Why & What Your Support Means

We are looking forward to developing our new classroom education pack of which the purpose is to teach about the advantages and responsibilities of using and processing plastic. We hope that through this channel we can help the next generation be smarter with plastics.

The Classroom education pack that we are developing will include lesson plans so that any teacher will be able to teach the younger generation about; the science, the processing, the applications and the actual recycling of plastics. Some of these lesson plans will be accompanied by explanatory videos and tutorials.

There will also be some special made Clever Cards which are a part of the learning lesson.

And of course so they can show us how Clever they are!

Creating the Clever Card range has been a labour of love for Mike and his supportive wife. They both maintained full time jobs to support their idea. Vicky has been very strong to make her contributions and exhibit the patience of an angel even after she became pregnant with their first child.

Mike perservered and did his best to balance a full time job, pregnant wife/newborn baby, quality family time and still progress the company.

As we grow the company we are very conscience of maintaining the culture to be environmentally considerate in our operations.

It feels great when you have a clever idea and it works!

The Clever Card range includes mouldable plastics and rubbers in a range of colours so that you can be creative and clever. We believe there are literally thousands of uses for the Clever Card to create, fix, craft, prototype & customise. You can grab your favourite colours or pick up some for someone who you know likes to make and create things.

Please support our campaign to develop the ‘Classroom education pack’ by purchasing some of our current Clever Card range.

story:
Hello everyone !!

We are two young Italian fans of the new technologies. Founders Vi.Rus Accessories.

Do not be impressed by the name of our company's business ...

he comes from the initial letters of our names ... no danger to your devices ...

Our goal is to be the first to launch on the world market the latest innovative products, original accessories and fashionable for smartphones.

We have so many ideas and so many projects .. here we want to launch our first business ...

Vi. rus Accessori

presents

 iMiniCube



Bluetooth  -  Portable Speaker   -   Outdoor Subwoofer   -   Support Anti-Lost - Remote shutter   -   Keychain   -   Handfree.

Bluetooth Speaker for smartphones, tablets, digital products, music bluetooth game. Compatible with iPhone and Android devices. Interface Micro USB. 

iMiniCube is the smallest bluetooth accessory multifunction.





iMiniCube smartphone is Anti-lost !!

When the smartphone is away from iMiniCube over 10 meters, the smartphone is ringing alarm and when iMiniCube is away from the phone more than 10 meters, the speaker will ring to alarm.



iMiniCube è Phone-Locator
Double click the button of the Bluetooth speakers, the smart phone ring, double click the buttons on the speaker again, stop the cell phone ring.
Press the "Searching for Smart Bluetooth Speaker" button, the smart speaker will alarm, releasing the button, the speaker will stop alarm.



iMiniCube is the camera shutter remote for your selfies

Click the button once speaker Bluetooth, enable the interface smart phone camera, click once on the button of the speaker again, the smart phone to take pictures.





iMiniCube is colorful. Choose your favorite of 6 colors!

BLACK - RED - BLUE - WHITE - GREEN - YELLOW

Do not worry if you have not had the chance to choose your color, we will contact you via email at the end of the campaign!


iMiniCube will be provided with a ring-keychain and fake jack 3.5mm  to hang the phone


SPECS:

Size: 26.8mm x 26.8mm x 28.5mm
Weight: 26 g
Material:ABS + Alluminium
Battery: Li-ion Battery
Capacity: 200 mAh




---------------------------------------------------

During the past year we have established a close relationship with our manufacturing partners in Shenzhen, which has been producing quality products quality for us.

We already have the first prototypes in our hands. Already tested and working perfectly.

As of today, all the manufacturers are ready to begin production and your support on our campaign will help us to:

  • Order materials
  • Quality test and inspection
  • Design, produce and manufacture the packaging
  • Shipping to our warehouse
  • International shipping to your home

We are really excited about this, and we hope you are, too. Now we need your help to bring iMiniCube into your pocket.


As a supporter you will have your iMiniCube at a very special price! So, please consider supporting our project, and share with your friends. Each price includes shipping!

  • Contributors will have the option to choose color before we begin shipping.
  • FREE USA Shipping
  • If you are shipping your Perck Business Packof 10  iMiniCube outside of the USA please add the $15 perk to help cover the cost of Shipping.
If you will help us achieve the funding, we will achieve iMiniCube branded with our logo "Vi.rus" and we will launch on the world market.

If you like our project, but you can help, please consider sharing it with the buttons below to share the video with friends and family. This will help us a lot to spread the word!

Thank you, CIAO !!

story:
*Shipping worldwide included in every perk !!

Hi I'm Marco ,I'm 20 , I'm studing programming at the university of Milano , and I'm here to present you my idea , first I want to explain how I came up with this project , I'm a huge apple fun and every time they present a new product I'm always asking myself why they haven't use the magnetic charge just like the MacBook , so i started to developed it by myself ...

I'm so excited about this project and I hope you are too ! For make that all people knows more about this project please share it on facebook or any other social network , and let's start sprade the MagCharge all over the world !

No more scartching...How it works ?

 

This cable is composed by two parts , the first is the plug that will be plugged in to your iPhone , the second is the cable that will lay on your desk ... The only thing that you will need to do to charge your iPhone is to take it closer to the cable , and it will automatically plug in... You will be able to buy the two cable parts separately , just in case you need two plugs for your iPhone and iPad , but you want to use the same cable , or If you want to have a spare one ... After you will insert the plug into your iPhone you just have to leave it there and forget about it , so you won't scratch the bottom of your iPhone every time you need to charge it ...

 

 

 

Stop dropping your phone while is charging !

 

 

You can consider the magnetic plug as a safety feature , if you are using your iPhone while is charging and someone steps on the cable , you won't drop your phone , but the cable will automatically unplug ...

 

 

 

While you're driving you shouldn't have any distractions !

 

 

Or while your are driving and you can't focus on finding the cable and plug it , but just take the iPhone closer to your cable ,and your done !

 

No magnetic induction = No delay !

 

The cable will be available in different length in case you consider the standard size cable too short ... One of my goals is to keep the cable affordable so everyone can have the MagCharge ... The cable doesn't work with magnetic induction , but with two pins that will fiscally touch so you won't have any charging delay , just like a normal cable ... I'm already keeping in touch with a company that will help me with my project , but for make it happens I need your help , thank you for your time , and obviously thank you for your support

 

*The cable works with all apple devices that uses lightning cable.

Here all the compatibily products :

 


Status of the project & next steps

After have tried different products and tested the prototipes , and solved a difficult problem about the magnetic connection and power of the single magnet , I prepare a business plan and I've got in tuoch with different companies for the materials and for start the production , but for make it happen I need your help , here a small business plan on how I will use the funds rased :

  • Order the plastic , magnet , and other materials
  • Studing the design
  • Assemble the product
  • Quality test and inspection
  • Shipping to our warehouse
  • International shipping to your home (price is included in every perk!)
  • *All the steps are made by different companies

 

 

 

Follow this campaign on Facebook and share it with your friends ;)

 

 

 

Facebook

story:
Why is a YouTube-like platform?

We all know that audio content creators have to pay in order to host their work. This happens mainly because audio is has been very difficult to monetise via visual ads. It's obvious: listeners don't interact with the player since the content is purely sound. Because of the innovation that Smab brings, monetising is now possible.

These are some of the features that makes Smab special:

  • Free unlimited upload and bandwidth,
  • In-audio internal search and SEO capabilities at word-level,
  • Authors can benefit from the ad revenue-share option,
  • Easy social share and embedding with interactive widgets,
  • Fast and affordable computer-generated transcription,
  • Visual support layer to sync images, videos, text and links, and lots more.

Testimonials/References

   Lindsay Patterson from www.tumblepodcast.com

“Smab has a lot of exciting features that improve upon the most dominant apps now.”


                        Carlos Sernis from @Nandatic

“El futuro del audio está aquí. Seguiremos el proyecto atentos!”


                 Mathew Passy from PodUp Podcast 

“These are the kinds of features that should make all podcasters really excited about the future of this medium.”

        Atlantico diario (Galician newspaper)

“El MP3 del futuro.”

           

                      Sunne from La Sunnecracia   

"Nace una herramienta que levanta la mano para hablar, su nombre es SMAB."
Smab's current status and needs.

Our development has reached the MVP stage. We are actually running in a private beta mode and planning to launch for public as soon as we finish the beta tests with the help of the contributors from this campaign. If we don’t reach the goal on this campaign, it will not stop us from opening our gates to the public. This is why we have opted for the flexible funding option.  

We have set up this campaign to offer a discount price to our first users. We will use this money for the next 6 months to cover the following:

  1. Server expenses (a SMAB servers network) and continue the development of the web application to compete in the sector.
  2. Cover costs and suppliers (helpdesk, hosting, development related services).
  3. Improve UX (User eXperience. Graphic interface and handling). 

What's in it for you.

We have prepared 3 types of perks depending on our relationship: 
1. For Authors (Podcasters, Writers and Teachers) we offer:
Call Dibs on One Username - $7

Claim your special username. Choose the username you want to reserve and we will make sure you can open an account with that name once the beta version will be ready.


Transcription - $9

Cash balance for authors that can be used to generate the transcription for 60 minutes of audio.

+ All previous perks for authors

English and Spanish available. Return time is half the audio's length.

Early Access to Private Beta - $22

ONLY VIA INDIEGOGO. Early access to all of you, curious and anxious to be the first in the line. You are invited to join our private beta testing phase. Open your account only hours after backing us (the very same day or the day after, at the latest). 

+ All previous perks for Authors

Be our Influencer - $50

I’ll bring you along with me on the developing process, giving you early access to a closed group for supporters, evangelists and influencers (Slack, Facebook or Trello). You can help shape the directions that Smab will take (beta and post-beta)

+ All previous perks for authors

6 Months Junior / Pro / Master Account - $54 / $108 / $214

Special price for 6-months account. It includes:

  • 2/4/8 hours of audio transcription per month, valued at 5€ each hour
  • eCommerce feature (as bonus)
  • advanced audio privacy settings (as bonus)
  • ads income share option (as bonus)
  • ads free page option (as bonus)
  • multiple authors/show (as bonus)
+ All previous perks for authors
Featured Podcast - $220

Staff Pick Badge for your podcast. Your show will appear in:

  • the featured podcasts area
  • the ads area 
 during 6 months and starting the public launch day.
+ All previous perks for authors except Junior, Pro and Master account perks

2. For Audience
Listeners can pay us for a coffee and buy cash balance to use for listening to pre-pay content like audiobooks and eLearning courses hosted on Smab.
3. Corporate
Companies have one pack that lets them reserve 20 usernames and a second one where we include all our study data revealed every 6 months during the first two years of our project. This data cover usage and engagement statistics for both authors and audience regarding our innovation: synced images and links, SEO transcript performance, visual ads, internal word search, snippets sharing on social networks, interactive audio player widget, and much more.

If uploading and bandwidth are unlimited and free, what are the paid accounts for?

As we mentioned, uploading and bandwidth are free to all users, including the Free Account. That is what Youtube does, isn´t it? 

But almost all the benefits you may have from this innovation are limited without the synchronised transcript. At the moment it is a technology in construction and it comes with a cost. Basically, subscribing to one of our paid plans means paying for the transcription service at a very good price: €5/hour. All extra features are a Bonus.


Features

SEO Audio Transcription

Yes, it’s true. The audio content creators are struggling to promote their work and they don’t count on good allies, as other media formats, like Google Search. There ----is---- was no way that Google could index your audios. Up to now.. I’ll tell you how: Upload your audio to Smab, ask for the transcript and you’ll have it in a matter of minutes. When returned, the text transcription is already aligned with your audio and interactive. Now, Google knows all the words that were mentioned in your audio. Now it has more chances to be discovered.

Visual layer sync

The ability to upload and synchronise visual content like images, charts, code blocks, math formulas, links, notes, videos and more gives birth to a visual layer aligned with the audio.



In-track search and browsing

Have you ever rewound your cassette tapes using a pen? Browsing a digital audio track is now faster, but it has the level of accuracy of a pen: none! At Smab, your audio gets chunked in sentences so the navigation can be done accurately. We know the time frame of each spoken word in the audio and we don’t keep it secret. Now, listeners can make word searches inside the audio. How cool is that?!


Widget player, social sharing and the audio virality

An embeddable iframe that is generated by Smab, It offers a similar experience to the original Smab player. You can add it to your blog, playing an audio track and displaying the visual items that were previously synced. It also benefits from the precise navigation system. This is what we call a beautiful packaging. Combined with the ability to share snippets of audio through the social networks, we hope we can make audio go viral.


Monetisation

We believe so much in our new way of monetizing the audio that we offer the possibility to share the income from the visual ads with the authors. Upload your audios and enhance them with quality visual items related to the audio content. We will attach visual banners and share the benefits with you.

By using the visual layer synchronisation, it’s easier to turn listeners into buyers. You just have to sync the URL of the product you have mentioned. In other words: we have put the Call-To-Action button inside the audio! Your Sponsor will boost your paycheck!


eCommerce feature

You are right; nobody wants to pay for listening to a podcast. But they will pay for listening to an audiobook or a specialised course. With this feature you can set your own price for individual audio tracks. You can offer the first two chapters for free and start selling from the third one onwards. Self-publish your books with Smab (Compatible with the visual ads revenue model)


Advanced privacy

You get to choose different privacy levels for your audios. Not everything has to be public. You can decide whether to share it only with your followers or with a closed group of students who have the URL to the track/list.


Scheduled publishing

We know that on a regular basis you finish the editing past midnight. So it may be a bad idea to publish and tweet the event at that time, since all your audience are offline. You can have it uploaded and scheduled to be published first thing in the morning. And you can have a lie-in.



Multiple authors show

Fortunately, podcasting is not a one-man show. We offer you the possibility to have  managing privileges for one show from different accounts.

Equipo

SMAB is the perfect mix of a dream, a good moment of inspiration, and a job well done. What started as the adventure of its creator, Adrian Dogar, has become a community where talent, enthusiasm, and creativity join their forces. SMAB’s team is diverse, rich, and shares a clear goal.

We want to help knowledge to be available to more and more people every day, in an easy, accessible way. As a matter of fact, providing young students with a useful, functional tool to learn was one of reasons behind the birth of the platform.

http://smab.audio/en/about-us/

The Story Behind Smab

SMAB was born out of a fascinating story, and an inspiration emerged from education related problems - the founder, Adrian Dogar has studied and left unfinished two university degrees. He drew the product’s first sketches on the plasterboard walls that he was building as a labourer. The financial crisis which hit hard Spain’s economy these last years also hit Dogar’s trajectory, making him take the decision of recycling itself by going back to study, while still working.

It was during this period of working and studying again when the idea of SMAB was born. Dogar enrolled in two programming courses, but noticed he wasn’t advancing as fast as he wanted. “I didn’t had enough time. I worked many hours during the day, and I have two daughters at home,” explains Adrian Dogar, CEO of SMAB. He decided to convert his courses textbooks, into audio tracks, so that he could listen to and study while installing drywall during his working day.

His experience was bittersweet. Using audio with an educational purpose proved to be a really good idea. Dogar finished his courses with the highest scores. However, the experience of listening to the audio was far from perfect. He needed a precise way to navigate into the audio and wanted to see the examples on screen while they where explained. 

Determined to share with others what had worked so well for him, and to solve the problems of the system he had used, he started to look into existent technology and to develop his first app. These were the first steps of SMAB, a platform to share and consume audio.

During the last years, Dogar has worked to make his idea and dream true. As a matter of fact, SMAB was one of the finalist projects selected for Yuzz’s 4th edition, one of Spain’s most renowned entrepreneur programmes. Thanks to this, SMAB could travel to Silicon Valley and experience first hand how the startup ecosystem works there.


WHAT IS SMAB (ENGLISH)

http://smab.audio/en/what-is-smab/


QUÉ ES SMAB (ESPAÑOL)

http://smab.audio/que-es-smab/


SMAB VIDEO CHANNEL

https://vimeo.com/channels/smab

story:
What is Closure ?


Tired of having tangles every time you leave your earphones for one second?
We present to you, the Closure.
The perfect solution for tangle earphones.
The main advantage of this product is that it can stay on
your earphones in any time


                                                                                          
What is it made of?
Closure is made of rubber, and weights less than 3g,
it is elastic and can be suitable for various kinds of earphones
there are two slots in each side, which through them
Closure can connect easily to your earphone.
We added a plastic white cover to each Closure - so you can
stick your own special sticker (see more information about this below)

 

 


Design Process

When we first thought about the idea, we tested it using a rubber band,
just to make sure the cables will not tangle when connecting all the ends together.

Then we drew some sketches to see how it will look like.


Then we move to Illustrations - to see how the product will look like.

                      

For our prototype, we printed our model using a 3D printer,
and after a few weeks  (maybe more than few...) we got the perfect model.

Before mass production we verified that the sizes are right.

Neon Green !

Awesome Cyan !

     

     

Classic Gray !

                                                                                     
Closure 101 - How to use

Using Closure is simple and easy - it takes only 3 steps
to set up your earphones to be tangled free


The 3 basic steps:
1. Connect the Closure using the two slots.
2. Slide it up - there is no problem if you are having a
    microphone in the middle, just unplug the cable from one
    of the slots and connect it again right after the microphone connector.
3. Insert both of the earphones into the socket, then plug the
  audio plug into its socket and now your earphones are ready to store!

Special Features:

You probably noticed that there's a white plastic cover on each of our closures,
This plastic can be used in several ways:
1. Draw a nice painting and show it to your friends.
2. Stick a sticker or a funny meme you like.
3. For company use, you can add your company logo.

 

 

Shipment Information:

 


Supported earphones: 

 Basically, any earphone with this:

 

And this:


About us:

We are 25 years old entrepreneurs, we know each other since high
school. In these days we are both working in high tech companies.
We love to think about new ideas that could help other people.
Our dream is to quit our jobs and start a business of our own.


                                                                                      
Risks and Challenges:
Like every project, we had challenges during the design process,
first we printed it using a 3D printer, just to see if it will
fit to the earphones cables, we repeated this process several
times until we got a good prototype. Then we moved to a rubber prototype,
at first we got a model that was too elastic so the earphones cables just
slipped from it, after several tests we increased the rubber strength
and got a model that can keep the cables in the right position.


Warning: Not for children under 3 yrs - small parts
Thank you so much for checking out our project!!!

And Remember, Closure is for everyone ! :)

When we first thought about the idea, we tested it using a rubber band,just to make sure the cables will not tangle when connecting all the ends together.
Then we drew some sketches to see how it will look like.


Then we move to Illustrations - to see how the product will look like.

                       

For our prototype, we printed our model using a 3D printer,and after a few weeks  (maybe more than few...) we got the perfect model.
Before mass production we verified that the sizes are right.
Neon Green !


Awesome Cyan !
     

     
Classic Gray !





                                                                                      Closure 101 - How to useUsing Closure is simple and easy - it takes only 3 stepsto set up your earphones to be tangled free 
The 3 basic steps: 1. Connect the Closure using the two slots.2. Slide it up - there is no problem if you are having a     microphone in the middle, just unplug the cable from one     of the slots and connect it again right after the microphone connector.3. Insert both of the earphones into the socket, then plug the  audio plug into its socket and now your earphones are ready to store!



Special Features:
You probably noticed that there's a white plastic cover on each of our closures,This plastic can be used in several ways:1. Draw a nice painting and show it to your friends. 2. Stick a sticker or a funny meme you like.3. For company use, you can add your company logo.

 
 

Shipment Information:
 
Supported earphones: 
 Basically, any earphone with this:
  
And this:


About us: 
We are 25 years old entrepreneurs, we know each other since highschool. In these days we are both working in high tech companies.We love to think about new ideas that could help other people.Our dream is to quit our jobs and start a business of our own.
                                                                                       Risks and Challenges: Like every project, we had challenges during the design process,first we printed it using a 3D printer, just to see if it willfit to the earphones cables, we repeated this process severaltimes until we got a good prototype. Then we moved to a rubber prototype,at first we got a model that was too elastic so the earphones cables justslipped from it, after several tests we increased the rubber strengthand got a model that can keep the cables in the right position.
Warning: Not for children under 3 yrs - small partsThank you so much for checking out our project!!! 
And Remember, Closure is for everyone ! :)

story:
MocialCall

Revolutionary new phone app, using existing mobile connection (not the data connection) to offer extremely cheap phone calls. No need to change phone or provider. Simply install the app and call at the best possible quality:

  • Dial anywhere in the world at low prices.
  • Dial other MocialCall users free.
  • Record your phone calls at no extra cost.

We are looking for funding to help us expand our technology to the entire world. Contribute and you will soon be able to enjoy cheap phone calls in perfect quality.


What We Need & What You Get

Here is what we need:

  • 100.000 USD to help us expand to LatinAmerica, North America, Southern Europe, Asia and the Middle East before the end of 2015. 
  • Everyone who donates will be able to use the app once it is ready in your home country. Your donation will be rewarded with minutes you can use within our app to dial anywhere in perfect mobile quality. 
  • If our goal is not reached we will still expand to the entire world, but at slower pace.


The Impact

Phone calls in true mobile quality don't have to be expensive. Our technology brings wholesale prices to consumers worldwide in the easiest possible way...Through an app. 


Risks & Challenges

MocialCall already has a beta version ready in Denmark, Sweden, Spain, Germany and the UK. We have an experienced team ready to roll out MocialCall to other countries, and we anticipate very few challenges – apart from usual start-up risks.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on Facebook, LinkedIn and other social media. The more donations we get, the faster we will bring our technology to your country. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact support@mocialcall.com

story:
I am pursuing a career in Videogame Design.  I have always wanted to do this since i was younger, but it never seemed realistic enough to me.  Now that i have gotten older and have the "know how" to pursue this dream, i am.   Anything is possible if you set your mind to it and mine is set. What i am asking for funds for are the following.

RAZER RZ03-00384600 Blackwidow Ultimate Mechanical Keyboard

which can be seen here: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16823114052

Cost is $80 + Shipping

RAZER Mamba Wireless Rechargeable Mouse

which can be seen here: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16826153080

Cost is also $80 + Shipping

Heres the real kicker and the main reason i started this project, the Headset. I broke mine during my last move and between bills and life, i dont have spare money to spend on a headset. I network a lot with other people and integral part of this whole thing, is communication, and not only that but QUALITY communication.

It is a Plantronics Stereo - USB - Wired - Over-the-head - Binaural - Supra-aural - Noise Cancelling Microphone

and can be seen here: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=9SIA25V22V7840

Cost $110 + Shipping

All costs + Shipping total to around 350$ However indiegogo wont let me ask for a lower amount than 500$ and after their fees and such ill be sitting right at my goal. This is my passion and my dream and you can help me pursue it!

This all might seem silly and a bit ridiculous to you, and sure it sounds like it.  However it never hurts to ask and that's all i can do, is ask for your help.  So please, every dollar, even every penny helps and if everyone i knew donated a dollar i would have more than enough for this project to be completed. Thank you to everyone for your time and hopefully your contributions!

PS: the video seen is me playing and all editing was also done by me in Sony Vegas 8 Pro. With these peripherals i would be able to make better videos and add to my portfolio. Thanks again!

story:
Hi Everyone, 

Are you sick of mobile phones ringing when your out and about, esp at places that deserve peace and quiet? Like the Cinema, Library, Meeting rooms or Places of Worship? Well I'am. So I came up with this idea when I went away on a spiritual journey to India around three years ago. 

I remember leaving on of the many crazy bizarre's of New Delhi, hot sticky sun,  and entering a secluded building. It was very quiet and chilled out. Everyone was just worshiping God peacefully. Then all of a sudden a phone starts to RING LOOOUUUD! It was some irritating and catchy song I cant remember. So I thought to myself, how can I stop these phones from disturbing people?  Or at least control/minimise noise in an area. I thought by getting away from busy Melbourne life I'd finally find some quiet time. 

So when I got back to Australia, I thought hard and I came up with Hush Hush.

The App/Service:

Hush Hush is an app/service that will assist to silence Android and Apple mobile phones when users enter a Hush Zone. The app is free for Users to download. The service is purchased by our Clients that may need phones silenced at their Business Centers. As I mentioned earlier, business centers such as Cinema’s, Universities, Private Corporations (corporate meeting rooms), or Public Facilities such as Libraries and Places of Worship (Mosques/Church/Synagogue's). The device is a global product and not restricted to a certain country.

Technicality:

This app works alongside external hardware devices such as a Router/Modem. The Hush Radar is installed and activated on the Clients new or existing router/modem. Once the Hush Hush app is downloaded onto a users Android or Apple phone, the Hush Radar will scan a set range to detect any phones with the Hush Hush app installed (FREE to download on the Android Market or App Store). If detected, the app will automatically switch the Users phones to silent mode. Once the User leaves the Hush Zone, the app will automatically set their phones back to their original settings.

Budget:

The initial costs for developing the device is $33,000. This will cover the following...

  • Research and Development
  • Design and Prototype
  • Android and Apple Applications
  • Web app development
  • System testing, performance, and user acceptance testing
  • Deployment 

An extra $16,00 for the bonus feature and its web application and server to support the database. Making the project a total of $49,000. We have already paid off $18,000 of this amount. They developers have tested the app on Android and Iphones, and have full working applications on both phone types. Only $31,000 remaining to finish off the entire project. The software engineers currently working on Hush Hush are finalising both applications for a release. We are in talk with Apple atm, as they are very strict and have certain guidelines that need to be met before going Live. Part of the expenses will also be for the back-end system of Hush Hush Radar and its managing of our Clients database. Eg. Setting up their Accounts and technicalities of Routers/Modems, communication between the Hush App and installed Hush Radar's at their workplace/venues.

Bonus feature: Clients will also be able to notify Users (who've downloaded the free device) once they enter the Hush Zone their phones will be silenced, but also notify them with a message displayed on their screen (optional feature). Such as an urgent messages or promotions/marketing their brand and special sales of all sorts. The phones are silenced where necessary and our Clients marketing needs are met. This feature is yet to be implemented. 

If you help us complete this project, we will have a Global Device to at least minise, or permanently control phones ringing in places they should NEVER be making noises in.

Please go to our website and Subscribe for more information http://www.hushhushmobile.com, and dont forget to Sign Up to our Expression of Interest form.

Follow/Like us also on the social networks...
https://www.facebook.com/hushhushmobile
Sam

story:
Update Two：Coooool Demo


Update one:

Gadia Power takes over Time Square!!!

Featured on Yahoo!

http://finance.yahoo.com/news/gadia-power-bio-s...

 


Gadia Power is a coin-sized gesture control wearable that sits on your forearm capturing electromyography (EMG) signal. It can translate your natural hand gesture into readable information to communicate with your electronic gadgets.

Gaming:  Gadia Power provides a hand-free control system, enabling you to game with natural hand gestures. You can use it to play all kinds of fun games! To make things even cooler, we are currently trying to develop a boxing game using Gadia Power as the gaming console. That’s right! The first ever muscle sensor video game! To play the game, you will need two Gadia Power units attached to both your left and right forearms. Not only can Gadia Power detect when you want to punch, hook or dodge, but it can also detect how hard you actually swing by using EMG and accelerometer and reflection by DC. We believe the game experience should not be limited to visual and sound experience it should be more real as technology evolves. In the future, we intend to  add more fun and realness into your gaming experience. 

Outdoor Control: Gadia Labs believes Gaida Power can be your coolest pal, assisting you in almost any situation. It can control your music when you are working out, capture fun moments with your GoPro when you are skiing, or pick up your phone call when you are climbing.

Fitness: Gadia Power can also act as your personal trainer. It can detect your biometrics while working out and provide feasible training advice. Information on muscle activity, fatigue, cardio, hydration, balance can help you optimize your workout and reduce your chances of getting injured due to over-exercise.

In the future, Gadia Lab intends to make major breakthroughs in certain crucial areas. The first one is to allow Gadia Power to work with VR devices. Gadia Labs thinks it just isn’t right to use a gamepad to interact with your Oculus Rift or other VR devices any more the controlling device should match the level of stunning sense of presence. Secondly, Gaida Labs believes EMG technology should not be limited to gesture control; in fact, it could be used in the gaming system to bring a greater level of reality into our gaming experience. Bio-sensing knowledge like muscle-sensing can detect deeper dimensions of experience, bringing a more immersive gaming experience.

We at Gadia Power believes developing a loving community is crucial to our future. To that end, an open source framework will be designed to help developers create their own immersive experience and share it on our community. In addition, we will open raw EMG to every developer to customize gestures.  We believe this to be an extremely exciting prospect!


About tech: Electromyography (EMG)measures the electrical activity of muscles at rest and during contraction in response to a nerve’s stimulation of the muscle. This technology has only been available to professional athletes and research facilities, howeverm Gadia Power makes EMG easy to use by translating EMG signals into valuable information, providing you with unparalleled knowledge of your muscles.

Using patent pending EMG sensors, Gadia Power measures electrical activity from your muscles to detect different hand gestures made by your hands. Using a 9-axis gyroscope, it also senses the orientation and rotation motion of your forearm. Furthermore, Gadia Power uses BT4.0 to transmit all data to the smart control device to recognize different hand gestures. Due to the complexity of EMG signals, we developed a machine learning algorithm to map them to recognizable gestures. As the projects progresses, we will continue to train the algorithm in order to increase its accuracy. 

Gadia Power is an international team.  We have engineers from United States, designers from New Zealand, and production experts from China to name just a few. The single dream of making and advancing Gadia Power drives us to work together. In the last six months, many of us moved to ShenZhen,China to prepare for the coming mass production. We are excited to announce that we are now ready to take the next step!

We are all gesture control fans and believe an open source gesture control device combining cutting edge EMG technology and gyroscope can truly open unlimited possibilities! The future of gaming is here, and Gadia Power is the gatekeeper .

Here are actual sketches of the watch in the early phase. We spent a lot of time to design the perfect appearance for Gadia Power. “Less is more” is the motto that guides our design inspiration. After countless adjustment, we finally did it. We think it is the perfect look for Gadia Power.

It is our 3D model and rendering picture .


Right now, a several members of our team are based in ShenZhen which is closer to all the manufacturers. Here are some pictures of our manufacturers.

We need your help to finalize our software development and go into mass production.

Here is how we plan to invest the funding from all of our supporters:

1) Software Development: We have started the IOS, Android software development but the majority of the funding requested will be applied to complete final software coding, testing and UI design.

2) Mass Production: We need your support to secure procurement of the long lead components and meet the minimum order quantities required by the EMS factories. 

The amount of funding we require to achieve the final milestones is $50,000. 


MANUFACTURING

As for any electronic products, mass production is always the biggest challenger. Gadia Power is a very complicated system, constituting of PCB, injection molds and other technical components. We have to make sure every step of manufacture is secure and reliable.

But, here is the good news.

(a) We are working with experienced EMS factories (Electronic Manufacturing Services) to ensure the Gadia Power's mass production. 

(b) Our team has spent half a year and had over 10 years of experience in developing electronic devices  and tech products. So, from the beginning, design of ID、PCB layout has put mass production into consideration.

(c)We have a build a strong relationship with a FFA, a community built by current and former Foxconn employees. Foxconn is the OEM manufacturer for Apple, Intel, Sony and many other international companies.   They are acting as our consultant through the whole manufacturing process.

INTERNATIONAL LOGISTICS

Shipping internationally could be another risk. There are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of Gadia Power. Therefore, we will be working directly with world-class fulfillment companies that are extremely experienced in logistic. This will ensure that we are able to get your Gadia Power into your hands in the least amount of time!
