story_txt: Fast print results with standard 0.4 mm layer thickness

story:
We have many stories of our great great grandparents but most of us do not know how they looked like.

Sometimes it is hard to find out the details of past generations where there is no recorded evidence.

How do you want to be remembered?

These questions led us to thinking in the direction of creating a long lasting, physical incarnation of one’s identity through My Portrait Sculpture. 

The idea is to keep the roots of your Family tree for hundreds and thousands of years – imagine your great great great great great grandson/grand daughter wanting to know what you looked like. And you can fulfil the wish!

How would you do it ?

With a Life-size portrait sculpture in Bronze which lasts for more than 2000 years. For that matter, you can choose different media from Die stone, Fibre Glass, Crystal to Silver and even Gold Coated Portrait Sculpture.

MyPortraitSculpture (patent pending) is an App driven Portrait Sculpture service created and offered by industry experts.

Using this App is as simple as taking a Video with your Smart Phone!

  • Shoot your Video through our MyPortraitSculpture App
  • Post it
  • We will transform it into your very own Sculpture and deliver it straight to your door step!

Our team consists of passionate Engineers and Sculptors who apply innovations in Technology to create stunning art forms which was never done before! With successful Entrepreneurship in several industries, the team’s core medium is Art and has been involved in Production Design and Art Direction of Feature Films for over a decade. The combination of Sculptors and Engineers make our team strong both in quality and productivity.

Features:

  • Tracking of your order on any device, any OS
  • Cost-effective
  • Durable through Generations
  • You take Video of your portrait (you define)
  • Receive status alerts in real-time
  • Track from Anywhere / Order from anywhere / Delivered anywhere
  • Complete customization of your Order (with applicable charges)
  • Improved sculpting process

This will save you time, money and its incredibly convenient!

Transform your Video to Life-Size Portrait Sculpture with 99.9% accuracy using CNC Machines in almost no time, and there is no need to visit a sculptor or spending hours on a chair posing for the Portrait.

All at an Affordable Price!

How does it Work?

Simply Shoot your Video using MyPortraitSculpture App and submit. It goes to our Cloud, and the engines on the cloud weave the Video into a 3D Model. It then gets submitted to CNC Machines which carve your completely accurate Life Sized sculpture! Then Sculptors do detailing to that machine- carved life size sculpture. Finally they will perform the process of casting a bronze sculpture like making a Mould, Casting, Sand Blasting, Patination and then delivery to your door step.

The most affordable life-sized Portrait Sculpture

Transform your mobile video to your portrait sculpture in any size and any medium. You can order from anywhere and ship to anywhere in the world To Kick-start this project we are offering this quality service at a discounted price.

Contributors get this Limited time offer!

Enjoy an unforgettable Special Gift to yourself and your loved Ones!

What We Need & What You Get

We Need Capital for Fine tuning of the Mobile App, backend 3D weaving Engine, for procuring 5 axis CNC Router and Kilns. By supporting this project you'll also be helping us to create employment for at least 100 people!

You get your own Portrait Sculpture for every Contribution you make (other than "Hall of Fame" Contribution). You can select your perk for your contribution from the sidebar of this page.

The Process

The Following flow chart gives an idea of bronze investment casting process initiated through MyPortraitSculpture App

We believe that everyone — not just home owners or the wealthy — should have the ability to own a portrait Sculpture. Our approach to the sculpting process and user experience design of MyPortraitSculpture is with the following principles in mind:

  1. Convenience (Less Stress, Handy tracking, Minimal time spent) 
  2. Accuracy (CNC Machines deliver 99.9% accuracy)
  3. Durability (Depending on the media we use; Bronze Sculptures last 2000 years and more) 
  4. Speed (Increased delivery speed - You no longer have to sit before the sculptor for hours and days together)

Pledge Now & save 40%-60% Before our Campaign Ends!

MyPortraitSculpture is Affordable


Note: To view Large: Right click on the image > Click on "Open image in new tab"
All prices mentioned above are in USD.

Perks for Contributors

Here's a breakdown of the perks you can choose from when you support this campaign (select your perk from the sidebar of this page). All perks include your own Portrait Sculpture commissioned and the free MyPortraitSculpture mobile app

(for any number of users & phones).

RoadMap to Delivery 

Meet the Team

In addition to our core team, we've assembled an incredible group of Sculptors, engineers, designers, and industry experts who are collaborating with us to create the best output possible.

What will we do with your money?

Our goal is to bring MyPortraitSculpture into the hands of even more users. Every single cent from this campaign will go into producing sculpture and improving the process of accuracy and speed, with nothing to spare.

Use of Funds:

  • Developing App for all platforms
  • Refining 3D Weaving Engine and adding Features
  • Procuring CNC Machine, Kilns and tools
  • Moulding and Casting

Where we are in development

We currently have a working prototype of the software and we're now focused on:

Finalizing the engineering schematics for the final product, Developing and iterating on the user experience for the mobile app. Testing and fixing bugs in 3D weaving engine.

We will soon begin with: Designing of the supply chain process, Packaging designs.

Why we need your support

We have been working on MyPortraitSculpture for the past year and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing equipment so we can make Own Portrait Sculptures available to you and the millions of people who have never before had a Sculpting option. Let's make our communities recalled, and our lives more remembered — together.

Delivery

MyPortraitSculpture is estimated to start shipping by September 2015. We will contact you a few weeks before to collect your mobile Videos and shipping address, as well as shipping fees with applicable taxes. For the $49 Reserve tier (Pay Later Contribution) where there is a balance due, the remaining payment will be collected at this time.

Risks & Challenges

We have multi talent pool and technically brilliant Engineers & Sculptors and we use our unique blend of old school design skills with the latest software techniques that result in stunning output.

Risks we may face on the way is partial funding or delay in fine tuning Mobile App and 3D weaving Engines to achieve our goal.

For over a Decade, we have been into Art Direction and Production Design of Feature Films and handled major sculpting projects including realistic sculptures. Handling tight deadlines and small Budgets in film making have been our Attributes. All of this was without Mobie Apps, 3D weaving Engines and 5 axis CNC Routing Machines which means any hurdle will not stop delivering perks to our contributors!

Referral Contest - Win a Portrait Sculpture!

Earn yourself a FREE Portrait Sculpture by sharing

As a way of showing our gratitude, we are now running a referral contest open to each of our supporters: sharing is all that is required! Simply log into Indiegogo, find the Preserve Your Existence campaign page and hit one/all of the share tools! (as shown below)



By attaining pre-order of 4 sculptures in contributions via your referrals, you will receive a FREE Die Stone Portrait Sculpture and for 5 pre-ordered sculptures you will receive a White Metal Portrait Sculpture absolutely FREE of charge! 

Keeping track of referral contributions is simple: just check your Indiegogo profile.

FAQ

I WANT My Portrait Sculpture – What should I do?

Reserve any of the offers or perks mentioned in the campaign. Download MyPortraitSculpture App, take the video of the person you want to get the sculpture done and upload it. Contact us for providing the mailing address and to find out approximate delivery time.

What would be the price of the sculpture if I order after the campaigning is done?

The price after the campaign would be vary according to the perks and the material you order. The price would definitely not be the same and it would vary depending on the material chosen.

How soon can I get the sculpture to my address?

We can complete the sculptures mostly in a month once we start them. However, we may have number of projects lined up that comes before your piece. We shall provide the estimated date of completion once you make the first payment.

Can I order multiple pieces of the same sculpture?

Yes, you can order multiple pieces of the same sculpture, however the price will not be the same as the original one. For further details, you may contact us on + 1 323 332 0941 

Can I order any other sculpture other than Portraits?

As a kickstart, we are taking orders of the portrait sculptures only. In future, we may extend the services to sculptures other than portraits.

Will MyPortraitSculpture App work with Android, Blackberry, Windows? When will my platform be supported?

We are designing MyPortraitSculpture App so that it will work with any web enabled device, with extra features to enhance the experience in our native app. Prior to launch, we are developing for iOS and Android. MyPortraitSculpture App will also be accessible through a mobile-friendly and tablet-friendly web app which can be accessed on any web-enabled device.

What are the challenges?

We are doing something that has never been done before: a completely revolutionary sculpting service like nothing else in the market. While there may be manufacturing and production delays outside of our control, we promise timely and transparent communication throughout the process. Soon, MyPortraitSculpture app and it's service will be available and connecting people to their generations and their families like never before.

What if I have spectacles?

If you have spectacles, best features may be inculcated in the sculpture if the video is taken twice, once with the spectacles and once without the spectacles.

What are the precautions I should take while taking video for the sculpture?

The video should be taken very carefully without missing any of the angles. Sculpture is to be preserved for years together and may be forever. So expression is very important while taking the video, which would be inculcated in the sculpture. It is logical to think that a happy person is represented with a smiling portrait. But a person cannot be seen smiling forever. The value of smile is that it is not always present. One should put their own expression instead of forcing themselves to give a smile while taking video. Any forced expression like smile becomes old and boring. 

Generally, if the posture is relaxed and restrained and sustainable, the sculpture will be more elegant and look natural. Action pose might be appropriate if the intention of the sculpture is to express a specific occasion.

It is understood that a large mass of hair can not be represented artfully. Hair styles change with age and personality does not. So if women wear their hair in a classic pony tail or in a fashionable pulled up style, even with advancing age, a person is uniquely identifiable and still retains the same inner beauty.

Why are the sculptures so cheaper when compared to other artists in the world?

As mentioned in the text, only detailing is done by the master sculptors and hence does not involve much of manual work when compared to regular sculpture making.

Can you make smaller sculptures so that it comes to a cheaper price?

Best prices are set for the sizes mentioned to give you the best detailing of the sculptures. Smaller sculpture does not come for a cheaper price as it takes the same efforts and time as it takes for the large size sculpture.

Is it possible to get the sculpture if I want it to be delivered on a particular date?

We do not take rush orders and put the other projects aside. This will effect the quality of work. If you want the sculpture on a particular date, please make sure you order at least four months in advance.

Can you make sculptures for posthumous considerations?

Sculpting a posthumous portrait from a collection of videos is extremely challenging and should only be attempted by an artist who has extensively experience in live portraiture.

How do I preserve the sculptures?

To clean pollen or dust off a sculpture, spray a glass cleaner and wipe it with a soft cloth.

FAQ - Early Bird Franchise

What kind of Franchises are you offering?

We give support to two kinds of Franchises, Executive Franchise and Franchises for Museums for those who can get regular orders and also who can collaborate with the cemeteries and local Art Shops etc.

Can I have more details about the Franchises you offer?

Two types of Franchises we offer: Executive Franchise & Museum Franchise and the details are mentioned below:

Executive Franchise:
  • Low Investment High Returns Model
  • Total Investment is around: $35000 + IPad + 3D Scanner ($500)
  • Margin: 18%
  • Franchise Term : 5 years, renewable
  • Expected minimum turnover in 5 years: 500 sales x 5 years x $2000 (average price) = $ 5,000,000 (USD)
  • Profit Margin (18%): $ 900,000 (increases with increase in number of Cemetery Company collaborations)
  • Break-Even period as low as 4 months
  • Good Return On Investment: over 100%
  • Area Required: Not Necessary
  • USP: Primary Competitive Advantage: Best Price & Quality, Provide Customized Solutions
  • Supported with a well experienced Skilled Professionals, established infrastructure facility which is well-equipped with the latest sculpting technology and machines.
  • Additional payouts for high performance and Brand Conformance
  • Ongoing support with offers and incentives
  • One stop Solution for all Sculpture needs
  • Company will help in collaborating with Local Art shops & Cemetery Companies
Museum Franchise:
  • Low Investment High Returns Model
  • Total Investment is around = $35000 + an Ipad + 3D Scanner ($500) + $20000
  • Margin: 25%
  • Franchise Term : 5 years, renewable
  • Expected minimum turnover in 5 years: 700 sales x 5 years x $2000 (average price) = $ 7,000,000 (USD)
  • Margin (25%): $ 1,750,000 (increases with increase in number of Cemetery Company collaborations)
  • Break-Even period as low as 6 months
  • Good Return On Investment over 100%
  • Area Requirement: 9.2 to 18.5 sq m (100 to 200 sq ft)
  • Preferred location: Museum
  • USP: Primary Competitive Advantage: Best Price & Quality, Provide Customized Solutions
  • Supported with a well experienced Skilled Professionals, established infrastructure facility which is well-equipped with the latest sculpting technology and machines.
  • Additional payouts for high performance and Brand Conformance
  • Ongoing support with offers and incentives
  • One stop Solution for all Sculpture needs
  • Company will help in collaborating with Local Art shops & Cemetery Companies

Should we have any equipment to make the sculptures and how much area is required for a Franchise? And what is my Job after taking Franchise?

No equipment is required to make sculptures in Franchise premises. No space is required for an Executive Franchise. You can operate from home; all you need is only collaborations and order receiving from client’s place. Take the orders and send them to us, we would make the sculptures and ship them to you. You should deliver the art pieces back to the clients. In case of a Museum Franchise, area Requirement for is 9.2 to 18.5 sq m (100 to 200 sq ft) and Preferred location is Museum.

Do we require any equipment - except iPad and 3d scanner for franchise?

No other equipment is required

How many kinds of sculptures do you make and what are the prices?

We can deliver any Sculpture in any size & any medium with Best quality at lower than market prices. The following list gives the approximate price range of Sculptures (Head only) we offer:

  • Portrait Sculpture - Die stone: $699 - $1299
  • White Metal Portrait Sculpture: $799 - $1499
  • Fiberglass Portrait Sculpture: $799 - $1399
  • Portrait Sculpture in Saw Dust: $799 - $1499
  • Marble Dust Portrait Sculpture: $899 - $1699
  • Crystal Portrait Sculpture: $899 - $1699
  • Acrylic Portrait Sculpture: $999 - $1899
  • Ceramic Portrait Sculpture: $999 - $1899
  • Glass Portrait Sculpture: $1399 - $2499
  • Brass Portrait sculpture: $1799 - $2999
  • Copper Portrait sculpture: $1799 - $2999
  • SS Portrait sculpture: $1799 - $2999
  • Bronze Portrait Sculpture: $1999 - $3499
  • Silver Portrait Sculpture: $4499 - $6999
  • Gold Coated Portrait Sculpture: $4499 - $6999

Disclaimer:

Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and may get delayed.

The purchase of these sculptures is intended only for personal use, no replication or modification of these sculptures is permitted without prior consent.

Thanks so much for all your amazing support and contributions.
story_txt:
We have many stories of our great great grandparents but most of us do not know how they looked like.



Sometimes it is hard to find out the details of past generations where there is no recorded evidence.


How do you want to be remembered?

These questions led us to thinking in the direction of creating a long lasting, physical incarnation of one’s identity through My Portrait Sculpture. The idea is to keep the roots of your Family tree for hundreds and thousands of years – imagine your great great great great great grandson/grand daughter wanting to know what you looked like. And you can fulfil the wish!How would you do it ?With a Life-size portrait sculpture in Bronze which lasts for more than 2000 years. For that matter, you can choose different media from Die stone, Fibre Glass, Crystal to Silver and even Gold Coated Portrait Sculpture.MyPortraitSculpture (patent pending) is an App driven Portrait Sculpture service created and offered by industry experts.Using this App is as simple as taking a Video with your Smart Phone!

Post it

story:
ABSTRACT
In our days, devices for the home such as remote controlled appliances, lights, cameras, controllers, sensors and more are available for the mass. However, smarthome scenarios are limited to expert hobbyists or to those who can afford expensive commercial solutions. The closed nature of such systems means that they cannot extend from the end-user and cannot control from a centralized point. Jubito aims to bridge this gap by presenting users with a server-like abstraction for technology in the home. It enables cross-device tasks via customized Instruction Sets [4] written against the framework, and gives users a management interface designed for the home environment.

INTRODUCTION
Assistive domotics is a field where home automation allows people to stay comfortable at home but can also offer possibilities such as increased safety (access control, intrusion detection), robotics, etc. Moreover home automation is becoming a viable option for the elderly and disabled who would prefer to stay in the comfort of their homes rather than move to a healthcare facility. This field uses much of the same technology and equipment as home automation for security, entertainment, and energy conservation but tailors it towards the elderly and disabled [wiki].
jaNET Framework [2] provides multiple functions and APIs that Jubito can use in order to interact with multiple vendor hardware (especially open hardware, e.g. Arduino). It is designed to be absolutely vendor-neutral as well as hardware/protocol-agnostic and can run on any device that is capable of running .NET Framework or mono-runtime [5] (Linux, Windows, Mac). Using Jubito one can take control of its system via a mobile phone, tablet, laptop or anything can connect to the internet/intranet. The use of Jubito is to provide an intuitive user interface for control and manage an abundance of different technologies via a centralized system. The advantage of the tool lies in their ease of use and the usability that is offered by its ecosystem, so that anyone can very quickly set up his controlled environment. No extra programming is required, but someone with that skill can easily adapt its own modules.

MY PERSPECTIVE
When I first started working on this project and had its concept in my mind back in 2010, I had no idea what the Internet of Things (IoT) was. Actually, I'm not even sure if it was defined. So, this is what forced me to start building a platform that would probably inherit that kind of terminology.
I was always fascinated by automations and dreamed of a smart house that would allow devices, sensors, software applications and services to exchange data and finally populate customized environments. These environments would be used for automated tasks or controlled interactively by the user.
Then I decided to start building my own automation systems with various microcontrollers and sensors, scripts and programs to gather information and connect with hardware from other vendors, like IP-Cameras, etc. A lots of other, innovative ideas that came along. The problem I faced back at the time was that. I had a bunch of dispersed stuff that was useful on its own and incapable of operating as a centric block.
To be honest, I didn't have the full picture in my head from the beginning, but eventually it started maturing enough to become a resolver for most of my considerations.

Figure 1: Illustration of Jubito infrastructure


EXAMPLES OF USE AND IMPORTANT PROVIDERS
In this section I will describe in brief, including resources, some useful examples of use for Jubito and jaNET Framework [2] that can very easily be integrated and used in a smart home environment. Jubito consisted by the following providers:

  • Evaluator
  • Scheduler
  • Web Server
  • App Launcher
  • Event Manager
  • Notification Manager

A. DVR system by using a third-party vendor IP Camera
Most IP Cameras on the market, even the cheap ones, has a built-in alarm system that notifies via e-mail, upload image to ftp or send an http request when motion is detected. But what if we want to capture video instead?
http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2013/02/dvr-system-using-ip-camera.html [6]
The post above describes a communication channel of three different components. It demonstrates a physical IP-Camera with motion detection capability, which we override with extended functionality in order to trigger third-party video capturing software (e.g. ffmpeg, cvlc). Plus we apply some extra rules, like evaluation of the user status and send notification (email/SMS) when is away.


B. Arduino temperature and humidity using DHT11/DHT22 modules
Below there is a tutorial on how to measure temperature and humidity of a particular room in the house. The hardware requirements for this example are an Arduino, a DHT11 or DHT22 module (temperature and humidity sensor module).
This post http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2014/06/arduino-temperature-and-humidity-using.html demonstrates the retrieval of sensor values and the synthesis of a customized command or/and the creation of a visual widget {fig.2}. Functionality can be extended by Evaluation method (IV / B). For example if temperature is greater than 30 degrees then turn on a fan or else turn it off, which illustrated as { evalBool(*getTemp > 30); foo1; foo2; } where foo1-foo2 represents the corresponding actions via Instruction Sets [4].

Figure 2: Sensor value in a customized environment

C. Jubito Android app and speech systems
Jubito incorporates speech synthesis technologies, such as Festival [7] and Windows TTS [8]. It is very practical when you’re not in front of a device and need to get notified. Here we preview such a technology as also the speech recognition that is used in the latest version of Jubito Android app (v1.2). It allows the dictation of a command just by hitting the speech button, and finally listens the response.

Full post @ http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2014/07/jubito-android-app-with-voice-control.html
Another significant addition is the geo location based user status according the home location.
Full post @ http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2014/07/jubito-android-client-app-v11-nightly.html

IMPORTANT PROVIDERS
A. Scheduler
One very important tool of Jubito is the scheduler. The scheduler can take the form of a simple notification, a hierarchy of tasks or even a daemon. The scheduler has several parameters such Name (a schedule handler), Date (when a recurring action should stop and be removed from the schedule queue when completed), Periodicity (actions that can take place daily, on weekends, on working days at a specific hour, etc.) and Action (can be a single sentence or an instruction set call).

The scheduler can fulfill a number of scenarios like, wakeup call (ask me to wake up work days at 7am, tell me the weather conditions, turn on the room light), automation control (turn off garden lights daily at 11pm) or check-out after 10am when I'm living for work, etc.
Full post @ http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2013/03/scheduling-tasks.html

B. Evaluator
Almost all jaNET functions can be extended by using the evaluation function. When we need to apply logic we use the evalBool statement. The evalBool function returns one of two states (Boolean), depending on the evaluation of an expression. The parameters we can use are: Expression (required, String or Numeric comparison, it is the expression we want to evaluate), True Part (Instruction Set, it is called when Expression evaluates to True), False Part (Instruction Set, it is called when Expression evaluates to False.
Syntax: { evalBool(expression); <true part>; <false part>; }
Example: { evalBool(*getTemp > 30);  foo1; foo2; }
getTemp Instruction Set represents a value from a temperature sensor attached to Arduino.
Technical Documentation http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2013/02/evaluation.html

C. The Rest
Of course each provider has its own role in the jaNET/Jubito ecosystem but I prefer not to deepen and tire the reader, since everything is documented under Jubito's online sources [3].

IMPLEMENTATION & SYSTEM PERFORMANCE
jaNET Framework [2] implemented in C# on a Ubuntu Linux [9] machine running the MonoDevelop IDE [10]. It is designed to be cross-platform, lightweight and run in most devices with limited resources. It supports multithreading and latest versions are state of the art concerning stability.

My current server (Banana Pi)

Progress details: http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2015/01/testing-jubito-in-multiple-environments.html

CONCLUSIONS AND FUTURE WORK
Looking at the above examples we can understand the power and simplicity of the jaNET Framework [2] for manipulating and integrating software and hardware sources and components and also the versatility that provides. Jubito [3] is an intuitive user interface that can be used with or without a microcontroller (such as Arduino) and both can be used to link different objects regardless technology and manage them from a central point (like a mobile device).
Moreover I offer these tools free of charge to the developer’s community. I have set up a github as well as a code contribution channel [2] for developers.
The primary domain of use at the moment is the AAL environment or Assistive Domotics but this does not mean that Jubito cannot be easily adopted by other domains such as health, industrial automation, where speed and ease of use is essential.
This campaign will give me the opportunity to get involved with technologies which I'm not familiar and hopefully help me improve my expertise in order to develop a single solution for home automation in the era of the Internet of Things.

WHAT I NEED & WHAT YOU GET
This is my first attempt for crowdfunding and a first step towards my aim. This means that this is not the endpoint of my goals.
The objective is to integrate protocols like z-wave for start and then do research to obtain knowhow for the development of a breakthrough product in extremely low cost that will use the available infrastructure for building a smart home.
Achieving that, requires human resources, more than just myself.

THE IMPACT
Jubito has earned its acknowledgement after all this time. The most important award received was the globally recognized "Internet of Things" Award 2014-15 of postscapes.com and the second one was the hackaday prize. That triggered the collaborative spirit and it is a fine example of what can be accomplished by synergies.

RISKS & CHALLENGES
So far it is a risk-free project that is just consuming my spare time and some of my income. However I believe that I can move to the next level with a little bit of your belief.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Do you like the idea? Be social and spread Jubito by adding a reference to your website, facebook, twitter, google+, etc and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
Alternatively, consider donating! Funding a project is always a good way for maintenance and further development. Visit www.jubito.org and make a donation via paypal.

REFERENCES
[1] Project jaNET – An free and open source framework for the IoT. It provides mechanisms for interoperability [ legacy website: https://sites.google.com/site/projectjanet ]
[2] Source code @ GitHub [ https://github.com/jambelnet/janet-framework ]
[3] Jubito website [ www.jubito.org ], Jubito Blog [ http://jubitoblog.blogspot.com ]
[4] Instruction Set Anatomy [ http://jubitoblog.blogspot.gr/2013/02/instruction-set-anatomy.html ]
[5] The Mono runtime implements the ECMA Common Language Infrastructure (CLI). The Mono runtime implements this virtual machine [ http://www.mono-project.com/docs/advanced/runtime/ ]
[6] Jubito examples & tutorials [ http://jubito.org/examples.html ]
[7] The Festival Speech Synthesis System [ http://www.cstr.ed.ac.uk/projects/festival/ ]
[8] Speech SDK 5.1 [ http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=10121 ]
[9] Ubuntu Linux [ http://www.ubuntu.com ]
[10] MonoDevelop IDE [ http://www.monodevelop.com ]

story:
What is The Blue Lock?

The Blue Lock advances technology invented in 1967! The child-resistant locking closure for containers was invented in 1967 by Dr. Henri Breault. Isn't it time for a change? Current technology was invented decades before most of you were born!

Child-resistant bottles only work for the youngest kids and are known to be a problem for some aged individuals or people with disabilities. Not to mention pets! The Blue Lock updates this 49 year old technology by applying a Bluetooth enabled lid on a hard impact polycarbonate box.

The Blue Lock provides responsible drug users an affordable and simple to use box to provide an extra layer of security to their stash of drugs. Using your cell phone, IPad or other Bluetooth device you can lock and unlock your personal stuff.

NEW - EARN YOUR OWN FREE BLUE BOXES!  Click on UPDATES  and read how.

The Blue Lock is simple technology solving big problems.

How The Blue Lock Works

  1. Open your Blue Lock box.
  2. Insert your stash; pills, pills in bottles, buds, joints, edibles, chocolates, money, jewelry, etc.
  3. Close your Blue Lock box.
  4. Lock your Blue Lock box - you can push the blue button on the lid; or
  5. Open the app on your phone, IPad, tablet or other Bluetooth device and tap LOCK.
  6. To Unlock your Blue Box, open the app and tap UNLOCK.


The Free Blue Lock App

Use the simple Blue Lock App to Lock and Unlock your Blue Lock Box. The Blue Lock app is free and easy to use. You can also use the app's unique monitor system to know when and by whom the box has been opened.

  • Timer: The Blue Lock can be set to only open at specific times or intervals (i.e., every 4 hours). This is very important for prescription drugs. (Sometimes painkillers can make you forget when you took them last.)
  • Audit Trails: If you want to know when and who last opened the Blue Lock, you can turn on the audit trail feature.
  • People: You can add and remove different people from having access to your Blue Lock.
  • Battery Strength: You can always monitor the power remaining in the battery.
  • Boxes: You can identify multiple Blue Locks and lock/unlock each independently. (You can have a Blue Lock for Percocet and one for OxyContin. You could also have a Blue Box for gummy bears and a different box for chocolates.)


Who Should Use The Blue Lock?

Everyone with medications, prescription drugs, recreational drugs (especially edibles). Unless you live in a cave and never ever have visitors you need The Blue Lock. Think about it - if your best friends come over and raid your stash you could be liable for their actions. What if their 5 year old finds a MMJ gummy bear someone dropped at your last party?

Don't wait until an accident happens - be responsible and put your stash in The Blue Lock!

If you have kids, protect them from your drugs with The Blue Lock!

If you use painkillers, lock them with The Blue Lock and monitor usage with our free app!

If you have marijuana edibles in the house, keep them away from everyone with The Blue Lock!

Keep your pets away from drugs (especially marijuana edibles) with The Blue Lock.

If you love treats, lock your chocolate, cookies and other sweats in The Blue Lock and set the timer for when you can have some more!


Case Studies

"A friend is on a lot of painkillers. His body is pretty beat up from motorcycle accidents and working a very physical job. He frequently wakes in the middle of the night wondering when the last time he took his painkillers. In a stupor from the painkillers he isn't always thinking clearly. And the first thought is "I  better take more pills before the pain gets worse." It may have only been 1 hour since he last took his pills."

Solution: The Blue Box - my friend will have to use his phone to open the Blue Lock box and the app can be programmed to only open based on the prescription.

"My dog ate my marijuana edibles and I spent over $1,000 at the vet to have his stomach pumped!!"

Solution: The Blue Box - Pets are generally smaller than their owners and can't handle the same dose as adult humans. Its not impossible, but it would be very hard for a pet to eat through the Blue Lock.

"My parents (or grandparents) have terrible arthritis and have a difficult time opening child-resistant pill bottles."

Solution: The Blue Box - Empty the contents of the child-resistant pill bottles into The Blue Lock. You can even program the app to remind them when to take their pills.


Got Drugs? Blue Lock Them!

Drug misuse and abuse is a problem everywhere. We developed the Blue Lock to control access to prescription and recreational drugs creating an extra layer of security for all your drugs. According to the Center for Disease Control and the U.S. Justice Department:

  • In 2011, drug misuse and abuse caused about 2.5 million emergency department (ED) visits.
  • Among children under age 6, pharmaceuticals account for about 40% of all exposures reported to poison centers.
  • Drug overdose was the leading cause of injury death in 2012. Among people 25 to 64 years old, drug overdose caused more deaths than motor vehicle traffic crashes.
According to ABC NEWS, over 100M people should have the Blue Lock: "The use of Vicodin, the most popular pain relief drug in the country, has grown dramatically from 112 million doses prescribed in 2006, to 131 million in the U.S. today, according to a national survey done by the consulting firm IMS Health.

The Blue Lock is lockable boxes that can only be locked and unlocked using your cell phone, IPad or other bluetooth enabled device. The Blue Lock adds an extra layer of security to all your prescription drugs: OxyContin, Percocet, Vicodin and other powerful drugs as well as your favorite marijuana buds, joints and edibles.

The Blue Lock is successful if we save one parent the agony and fear associated with an emergency room visit.


Why This Campaign?

oping new products, especially incorporating new technology, is expensive. We have two choices to raise the money to manufacture The Blue Lock; 1) Raise money from investors; and 2) Use your contributions from this campaign. We choose to use your contributions so we do not have to deal with investors who are only interested in short term profits.
  • Our goal is to raiser $10,000 so we can complete the technical design, buy raw materials, pay for moldings, assemble and distribute the first Blue Lock box design.
  • Not only do you get the opportunity to be one of the first to own a Blue Lock box, but we are offering super discounts to everyone who participates in this campaign. Our perks offer the Blue Lock at prices below prices after this campaign.
  • If we meet our goal, we'll talk with our manufacture and if we can't fill every request, we'll offer you a refund.


Drug Abuse and Misuse

You can help stop accidents from happening - be responsible and keep your drugs locked with The Blue Lock. If we don't  take the first step, we'll soon have government regulations telling us to keep drugs in some ugly, cumbersome device that costs a lot more than The Blue Lock!
 
Young children, teenagers and adults abuse and misuse prescription and recreational drugs. The Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the U.S, Justice Department and WhiteHouse.Gov are just a few of the experts quoting the magnitude of the problem:
  • Among people 25 to 64 years old, drug overdose caused more deaths than motor vehicle traffic crashes.
  • An estimated 36 million U.S. residents aged 12 and older abused prescription drugs at least once in their lifetime.
  • Millions of teenagers and young adults abuse prescription drugs—2.7 million  individuals aged 12 to 17 and 6.9 million individuals aged 18 to 25 abused prescription drugs at least once.


    Specifications

    SIZES

    We are currently offering 4 sizes of the Blue Lock. If you want a different size, please use the COMMENTS and let us know:

    Big: 6" x 6" x 6" 

    Medium: 4" x 4" x 4"

    Small: 3" x 3" X 3"

    Long: 6" x 4" x 2"

    COLORS:

    We are initially thinking of 1 color for the box: GRAY and 3 colors for the lid: RED, BLUE, GRAY. If you think other colors are better (maybe green?), use the COMMENTS section and let us know.

    Smart phone: IPhone/Android Apps - Simply press one button on the smartphone to operate the container.

    Bluetooth Smart Key: Use the Bluetooth smart Key to operate the door.

    Mechanical Key: Conventional way to operate the door.

    Authorized phone:  Use authorized smart phone to operate the lid.

    TECH SPECS

     Lock Type: Bluetooth Smart Container Lock

    Bluetooth identification Duration: <2 Seconds

    Unlock Mode: Smartphone/Mechanical key/Password/Bluetooth Smartkey/Remote Authorized Phone

    Number of USERS: 4

    Working Voltage: 4.8V-6.5V DC

    Low Voltage Warning: 4V±0.2

    Quiescent Current: 0 mA

    Dynamic Current: <180mA

    Working Temperature: -20℃to +70℃

    Mechanism Life: ≥100000 average operation times

    Battery Life: ≥35000 Operation times

    Note: All specification are preliminary and subject to change.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    Because drug abuse and misuse affects so many people, you probably know someone who needs the Blue Lock. PLEASE - order 1 for you and for them! You can help become part of the solution by sending this message to them.
    You can also answer a couple of questions and let us know how we can make The Blue Lock Better. Click Here

    Future Products


    We are developing additional products using the Blue Lock technology adding an extra layer of security where you need it. Bottle tops is one example - you can lock your alcohol! Gun Cases and more...


    Risks and Challenges

    We have excellent engineering and development capabilities throughout the world.  We have already started development of the Blue Lock and the app.

    Even though we work with our own factories, unexpected issues may arise during engineering and manufacturing.  Should delays occur, we will keep you updated and our team will work quickly to resolve the problem.

    You, the contributors to this campaign, are developing this product. Use the COMMENTS section to post your thoughts on Colors, Sizes and other ideas to make the Blue Lock perfect! Click Here


    Innovation Factory

    Innovation Factory is the inventors best friend. We became smart at creating ideas and turning these ideas into products and now we do it for many other companies. We also own our own consumer brands and sell products on our in house retail websites in the U.S. and Australia. We currently ship more than 20,000 units per day for B2C and B2B businesses. In order to effectively manage this, we created a complete process to drive inventions from concept to sales in as little as 90 days. Using our design, engineering, operations and sales teams, we deliver your idea to new customers in record time. A critical component is our world leading, best in class software 'Order Management Systems' that seamlessly integrates into the largest commerce platforms, organizing orders from disparate web sites, managing the orders and preparing them for fulfillment.
story_txt:
What is The Blue Lock?
The Blue Lock advances technology invented in 1967! The child-resistant locking closure for containers was invented in 1967 by Dr. Henri Breault. Isn't it time for a change? Current technology was invented decades before most of you were born!
Child-resistant bottles only work for the youngest kids and are known to be a problem for some aged individuals or people with disabilities. Not to mention pets! The Blue Lock updates this 49 year old technology by applying a Bluetooth enabled lid on a hard impact polycarbonate box. 
The Blue Lock provides responsible drug users an affordable and simple to use box to provide an extra layer of security to their stash of drugs. Using your cell phone, IPad or other Bluetooth device you can lock and unlock your personal stuff. 
NEW - EARN YOUR OWN FREE BLUE BOXES!  Click on UPDATES  and read how.
The Blue Lock is simple technology solving big problems. How The Blue Lock Works

Open your Blue Lock box.
Insert your stash; pills, pills in bottles, buds, joints, edibles, chocolates, money, jewelry, etc.
Close your Blue Lock box.
Lock your Blue Lock box - you can push the blue button on the lid; or
Open the app on your phone, IPad, tablet or other Bluetooth device and tap LOCK.
To Unlock your Blue Box, open the app and tap UNLOCK.



The Free Blue Lock App
Use the simple Blue Lock App to Lock and Unlock your Blue Lock Box. The Blue Lock app is free and easy to use. You can also use the app's unique monitor system to know when and by whom the box has been opened. 




Timer: The Blue Lock can be set to only open at specific times or
 intervals (i.e., every 4 hours). This is very important for 
prescription drugs. (Sometimes painkillers can make you forget when you 
took them last.)

Audit Trails: If you want to know when and who last opened the Blue Lock, you can turn on the audit trail feature.

People: You can add and remove different people from having access to your Blue Lock.

Battery Strength: You can always monitor the power remaining in the battery.

Boxes: You can identify multiple Blue Locks and lock/unlock each 
independently. (You can have a Blue Lock for Percocet and one for 
OxyContin. You could also have a Blue Box for gummy bears and a 
different box for chocolates.)



Who Should Use The Blue Lock?
Everyone with medications, prescription drugs, recreational drugs (especially edibles). Unless you live in a cave and never ever have visitors you need The Blue Lock. Think about it - if your best friends come over and raid your stash you could be liable for their actions. What if their 5 year old finds a MMJ gummy bear someone dropped at your last party? 
Don't wait until an accident happens - be responsible and put your stash in The Blue Lock!

If you have kids, protect them from your drugs with The Blue Lock!

If you use painkillers, lock them with The Blue Lock and monitor usage with our free app!
If you have marijuana edibles in the house, keep them away from everyone with The Blue Lock!
Keep your pets away from drugs (especially marijuana edibles) with The Blue Lock.
If you love treats, lock your chocolate, cookies and other sweats in The Blue Lock and set the timer for when you can have some more!


Case Studies
"A friend is on a lot of painkillers. His body is pretty beat up from motorcycle accidents and working a very physical job. He frequently wakes in the middle of the night wondering when the last time he took his painkillers. In a stupor from the painkillers he isn't always thinking clearly. And the first thought is "I  better take more pills before the pain gets worse." It may have only been 1 hour since he last took his pills."
Solution: The Blue Box - my friend will have to use his phone to open the Blue Lock box and the app can be programmed to only open based on the prescription.
"My dog ate my marijuana edibles and I spent over $1,000 at the vet to have his stomach pumped!!"
Solution: The Blue Box - Pets are generally smaller than their owners and can't handle the same dose as adult humans. Its not impossible, but it would be very hard for a pet to eat through the Blue Lock.
"My parents (or grandparents) have terrible arthritis and have a difficult time opening child-resistant pill bottles."
Solution: The Blue Box - Empty the contents of the child-resistant pill bottles into The Blue Lock. You can even program the app to remind them when to take their pills.


Got Drugs? Blue Lock Them!
Drug misuse and abuse is a problem everywhere. We developed the Blue Lock to control access to prescription and recreational drugs creating an extra layer of security for all your drugs. According to the Center for Disease Control and the U.S. Justice Department:



In
2011, drug misuse and abuse caused about 2.5 million emergency department (ED)
visits.
Among children under age 6, pharmaceuticals account for about 40% of all exposures reported to poison centers.

Drug
overdose was the leading cause of injury death in 2012. Among people 25 to 64
years old, drug overdose caused more deaths than motor vehicle traffic crashes.

According to ABC NEWS, over 100M people should have the Blue Lock: "The use of Vicodin, the most popular pain relief drug in the country,
 has grown dramatically from 112 million doses prescribed in 2006, to 
131 million in the U.S. today, according to a national survey done by 
the consulting firm IMS Health.
The Blue Lock is lockable boxes that can only be locked and unlocked using your cell phone, IPad or other bluetooth enabled device. The Blue Lock adds an extra layer of security to
all your prescription drugs: OxyContin, Percocet, Vicodin and other powerful drugs as well
as your favorite marijuana buds, joints and edibles.

The Blue Lock is successful if we save one parent the agony and fear associated with an emergency room visit.
Why This Campaign?oping new products, 
especially incorporating new technology, is expensive. We have two 
choices to raise the money to manufacture The Blue Lock; 1) Raise money 
from investors; and 2) Use your contributions from this campaign. We 
choose to use your contributions so we do not have to deal with 
investors who are only interested in short term profits. 
Our
 goal is to raiser $10,000 so we can complete the technical design, buy 
raw materials, pay for moldings, assemble and distribute the first Blue 
Lock box design. 
Not only do you get the opportunity to be one of the first to 
own a Blue Lock box, but we are offering super discounts to everyone who
 participates in this campaign. Our perks offer the Blue Lock at prices 
below prices after this campaign.
If we meet our goal, we'll talk with our manufacture and if we can't fill every request, we'll offer you a refund.






Drug Abuse and Misuse


You can help stop accidents from happening - be responsible and keep your drugs locked with The Blue Lock. If we don't  take the first step, we'll soon have government regulations telling us to keep drugs in some ugly, cumbersome device that costs a lot more than The Blue Lock! Young children, teenagers and adults abuse and misuse prescription and recreational drugs. The Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the U.S, Justice Department and WhiteHouse.Gov are just a few of the experts quoting the magnitude of the problem:
Among people 25 to 64 years old, drug overdose
caused more deaths than motor vehicle traffic crashes.


An estimated 36 million U.S. residents aged 12 and older abused prescription
drugs at least once in their lifetime.


Millions
of teenagers and young adults abuse prescription drugs—2.7 million  individuals aged 12 to 17 and 6.9 million
individuals aged 18 to 25 abused prescription drugs at least once.







  
Specifications


SIZES 
We are currently offering 4 sizes of the Blue Lock. If you want a different size, please use the COMMENTS and let us know:
Big: 6" x 6" x 6" 
Medium: 4" x 4" x 4"
Small: 3" x 3" X 3"
Long: 6" x 4" x 2"
COLORS:
We are initially thinking of 1 color for the box: GRAY and 3 colors for the lid: RED, BLUE, GRAY. If you think other colors are better (maybe green?), use the COMMENTS section and let us know.
Smart phone: IPhone/Android Apps - Simply press one button on the smartphone to operate the container.

Bluetooth Smart Key: Use the Bluetooth smart Key to operate the door.

Mechanical Key: Conventional way to operate the door.

Authorized phone:  Use authorized smart phone to operate the lid.
TECH SPECS


 Lock Type: Bluetooth Smart Container Lock

Bluetooth identification Duration: <2 Seconds

Unlock Mode: Smartphone/Mechanical key/Password/Bluetooth Smartkey/Remote Authorized Phone

Number of USERS: 4

Working Voltage: 4.8V-6.5V DC

Low Voltage Warning: 4V±0.2

Quiescent Current: 0 mA

Dynamic Current: <180mA

Working Temperature: -20℃to +70℃

Mechanism Life: ≥100000 average operation times

Battery Life: ≥35000 Operation times
Note: All specification are preliminary and subject to change.


Other Ways You Can Help


Because drug abuse and misuse affects so many people, you probably know someone who needs the Blue Lock. PLEASE - order 1 for you and for them! You can help become part of the solution by sending this message to them.You can also answer a couple of questions and let us know how we can make The Blue Lock Better. Click HereFuture Products
We are developing additional products using the Blue Lock technology adding an extra layer of security where you need it. Bottle tops is one example - you can lock your alcohol! Gun Cases and more...
Risks and Challenges

We have excellent engineering and development capabilities throughout the world.  We have already started development of the Blue Lock and the app. 
Even though we work with our own factories, unexpected issues may arise during engineering and manufacturing.  Should delays occur, we will keep you updated and our team will work quickly to resolve the problem.
You, the contributors to this campaign, are developing this product. Use the COMMENTS section to post your thoughts on Colors, Sizes and other ideas to make the Blue Lock perfect! Click Here

Innovation Factory

Innovation Factory is the inventors best friend. We 
became smart at creating ideas and turning these ideas into products 
and now we do it for many other companies. We also own our own consumer
 brands and sell products on our in house retail websites in the U.S. 
and Australia. We currently ship more than 20,000 units per day for B2C 
and B2B businesses. In order to effectively manage this, we created a complete process to drive inventions from concept to sales in as little as 90 days. Using our design, engineering, operations and sales teams, we 
deliver your idea to new customers in record time. A critical component 
is our world leading, best in class software 'Order Management Systems' that seamlessly integrates into the largest commerce platforms, 
organizing orders from disparate web sites, managing the orders and 
preparing them for fulfillment.

story:
About this project

The Easy Streak iOS app was launched a few months ago with the goal to be the place where every fan can play. We created an app that was simple, addictive and fun.  

We currently host sweepstakes sports pools where fans pick the teams they think are going to win each game, and they win cash prizes for winning contests and earn points to climb the leaderboard throughout the month.

Legal in all 50 states! 

Easy Streak iOS App

Sports Pools:

Leaderboard: 

How to Subscribe:


Why we need you

We're asking for your help to bring our fast-growing iOS app to the Web and Android users. This will give all fans the ability to join our community and have fun competing for cash prizes. You will be helping us to further our goal to be the place where every fan can play. 

You will also allow us to develop different types of contests beyond sports pools and provide us the resources to expand internationally. 

We hope you will come along and help us make our dream a reality, and more so that you will have fun playing our app and being a part of our community.

Check out our Reviews on the Apple App Store:

Some of our favorite reviews:

"One thing I like is that I haven't seen anyone else with this concept - picking teams instead of players on a daily/weekly basis. That's brilliant."

"I tried my luck at draft kings and fanduel. I wanted to try something simple and new, so I’ve been playing Easy Streak for a couple of months. Loving it!!!”

"Very clean app for playing sports pool type games. With the option to win real cash prizes, makes this app even better."

"The best part is that you can create you own private pool with your friends for bragging rights. Playing for cash prizes is an added bonus. Woohoo!"


 Meet the Easy Streak Team

We would love to hear from you!  Tweet us @EasyStreak and connect with us directly.

Matt Williams @ceoeasystreak
-  CEO & Co-Founder | Previous: CEO of Muftie Skateboarding Co.
-  Pepperdine MBA
-  Favorite Quote: "There is no security on this earth; there is only opportunity.” - General Douglas MacArthur

Nobel Chang @nobelchang
-  CTO & Co-Founder | Previous: VP of Development at Topco Energy
-  Pepperdine MBA: Digital Innovation & Information Systems
-  Favorite Quote: “Genius is 1 percent inspiration and 99 percent perspiration.” - Thomas Edison

Annie Respicio
-  Director of Technology | Project Manager at Diamond Web Services
-  University of California, Santa Barbara
-  Favorite Quote: "If you are the smartest person in the room, then you are in the wrong room." - Anon

Bryan Norden @bryanthetech
-  Lead iOS Developer | Previous: App Developer at Sony Music
-  Cal State Fullerton: Computer Science
-  Favorite Quote: “One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.” - Elbert Hubbard

Kelli Williams @kellilynnwill 
-  Content Director | Previous: Riviera Magazine Orange County
-  Cal State Long Beach: English
-  Favorite Quote: "Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.” - Benjamin Franklin


Risks and challenges

The biggest risk we have is running into any unforeseen costs associated with developing the platform for the Web or Android platforms where we may run out of money. This risk is relatively small since we have already created the database, framework, and iOS version after which to model these other 2 platforms. Also, we have already created the iOS from scratch within the budget we gave ourselves, proving we are able to come in under budget.

If we do spend more developing the Web or Android app, we will postpone creating new types of contests to ensure we are able to roll out the other platforms to you.

story:
Backers can get 1 free Magni adapter when you share this campaign on your Facebook or twitter! Just click on the buttons below or the share buttons on the top of the page! 




We use our smartphones all the time, but when our batteries get low, there's one thing that really annoys us, and that's charger. Regular charging cables haven't changed all that much and they can be a pain to plug in. That's why we created Magni Cable. We were tired of the boring old charging cables. We wanted something that would work to make your life simpler. Using magnets and smart design Magni Cable can do some amazing things. No more disappointing micro USB cables. We know you will love Magni Cable! 



The magic of magnets.


Magni Cable comes with mico USB adapters that connect to your mobile devices.


Magni Cable still transfers data like a regular micro USB cable, so you can transfer photos, music and other files just like before.

Thanks to its ingenious design, you can plug it in both ways




Magni Cable works with all your mirco usb devices, not just your phone. From bluetooth speakers, ps4 controllers, headphones, power packs, cameras and much more!


Magni Cable is really easy to use:

1. Plug Magni adapter into your micro USB device i.e. phone or power pack. 
2. Plug Magni cable into your device. 
3. That's it, you ready to use Magni cable!


We need your help

We've really excited about Magni cable and we hope you are too. Now we need your help to bring Magni cable into your life.

As a supporter you will get your Magni cable at a low price! So please back our project, and share it with your friends and family. Help make Magni cable a reality! 


Similar products?

We have received some comments from users who believe that Magni Cable is not a new product, and we would like to clear this up. There are already some similar products on the market but they are either too expensive, or very bad quality. We designed Magni Cable to have the best quality, worked with manufacturers to make it even better and enhanced other features . So we did start from existing products on the market, but we made ours much better!


Our team is ready - so is the manufacturing - now we just need you!

We have spent many hours on building prototypes and working with factories to have this product ready to ship to you in 30 days or less after the campaign. So you don’t have to wait 6 months or even 3 months to get your reward. Were ready to make your Magni cable now!


Risks & Challenges

During the past year we have established a close relationship with our manufacturing partner, who is ready to go once we reach our goal. We also have another manufacturer in as a backup, just in case. They both have been proven with high production capability, therefore manufacturing risk is at a minimum.

As for delivery,we have lined up a top notch fulfillment company who has given us detailed quotes on delivery and times .We are 100% confident that perks will arrive on time or before!

  • FREE USA Shipping
  • If you are shipping your Magni Cable outside of the USA please add the $4 perk to help cover the cost of Shipping.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please SHARE if you like our product, below our video is buttons to help you share.

Remember if you share this campaign on Facebook or Twitter, you will receive 1 free bonus Magni adapter with your reward.

Thanks for your support!
