story: M
story_txt: M

story:
Make Smartphone Photography SMARTER

The PHONESLINGER by COSYSPEED is the Worlds First Set of Bags for Smartphone Photography and Videography.

  • PHONESLINGER Power comes with an integrated QI-Wireless Powerbank. It charges your phone (your phone must be able for QI-Wireless charging) all the time it's in the bag and you'll never run out of power + have your Phone accessible within a second and with one hand
  • PHONESLINGER Prime holds your Smartphone and up to 4 smartphone lenses like the popular Moment Lenses. Have your Phone and Mobile Lenses accessible within a second and with one hand
  • PHONESLINGER Outdoor is rugged and light weight and the safe place for your phone out in nature. Have your phone safe but always in reach within a second and with one hand
  • FLOWBELT Modular Belt System can hold your PHONESLINGER and several accessory bags. Makes your Smartphone Photography even more flexible

Smartphone Photography and Videography has come a long way and image quality reaches a level, that was reserved to professional cameras like DSLRs only a few years ago. Inbetween many Photographers and Videographers discovered their Smartphone as a serious tool for their personal and professional work. We thought it's time to support all you great Smartphone Photography Heroes with a series of functional, well designed and affordable bags for your creative tool of choice – your Smartphone. 

This is COSYSPEEDs 3rd campaign on Indiegogo. Together with our backers wecan transform Smartphone Photography forever. Come and join our new project!!!

--------------------------------------------------------------

 

The PHONESLINGER Power 

The PHONESLINGER Power is for those Smartphone Photographers and Videographers who never want to run out of Power. You do extensive shootings on your trips around the world,  don't want to miss family memories or use your Smartphone to express your creativity in personal and professional projects? The extra juice of 8000 mAh of the integrated Powerbank gives you all the energy you need. All Smartphones with an integrated QI-Wireless Charging function can benefit from the QI-Wireless Powerbank that comes with the PHONESLINGER Power. Simply put your phone in the PHONESLINGER Power and it'll be charged. It's so easy!

 

Features PHONESLINGER Power

  • Quick, one-handed access
  • Fits any QI-Wireless able Smartphones from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
  • FIDLOCK-Magnetic closure
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets 
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
  • Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
  • Hidden pocket for credit cards etc. on the inside
  • NYLON D200 pouch for the Powerbank
  • Soft touch material on the inside
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black
  • Inner Dimensions
    • 165 mm (6.5") height x 32 mm (1.25") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide

How it works

  • Put your Smartphone in the PHONESLINGER Power
  • Press on/off button on the Powerbank CS8000
  • Charging starts as soon as green LED indicator lights up :-)
 

Features Powerbank CS8000

  • Works on the QI-Wirelss Charging Standard with all Phones listed below:
    • Apple iPhone: 8, 8 Plus, iPhone X
    • Samsung Galaxy: Note 9, S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge, Note 5, S6, S6 Edge
    • Sony: Xperia XZ3, Xperia XZ2 Premium, Xperia XZ2
    • LG: G7 ThinQ, V30, G6 (US version only), G4 (optional), G3 (optional)
    • Nokia: 8 Sirocco
    • Huawei: Mate RS Porsche Design
    • Microsoft Lumia: 1520, 1020, 930, 929, 928, 920
    • Google Nexus: 4, 5, 6, 7 (2013)
    • BlackBerry: Priv

  • Can charge your phone wirelessly
  • Can be charged wirelessly (Yes, you can put the Powerbank on a wireless charger and it will be charged)
  • Can be charged with regular phone chargers via Micro USB or USB C cable
  • Can charge other devices via cable with the standard USB connector on top
  • On/Off switch
  • Durable polycarbonate housing
  • High-Quality battery cells (ISO9000/ISO14000) from a top supplier
  • LED indicators for:
    • Charging status
    • Red LED shows divice is not charging
    • Green LED shows device is charging
  • 8000 mAh / charges your phone up to 2 times
  • Input: DC 5V/2.1A
  • Wireless Output: DC 5V/1.0A
  • USB Output: DC 5V/2.1A
  • Wireless recieving: DC 5V/0.75A
  • Dimensions
    • 135 mm (5.3") height x 18 mm (0.7") depth x 72 mm (2.8") wide

--------------------------------------------------------------

The PHONESLINGER Prime

The PHONESLINGER Prime is the perfect, safe and quick-access bag for the Lenses you bought for your Smartphone. It fits your iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus or Galaxy Note or any other phone and up to 4 lenses, like the super duper Moment Lenses. It's so easy to have pro grade image quality and flexibility with Smartphone Lenses these days. The only limitaion though is the way you can access them. Don't dig in your backpack or messenger bag for your Smartphone Lenses, just use a PHONESLINGER prime and get ready within a second and with one hand.

 

Features PHONESLINGER Prime

  • Quick, one-handed access
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
  • Fits up to 4 Smartphone Lenses like the Moment Lenses
  • Fits Smartphones (with case) from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
  • Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
  • Soft touch material on the inside
  • 3 velcro dividers in the lens compartment
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black

​Dimensions

  • Overall: 175 mm (7") height x 72 mm (2.8") depth x 100 mm (4") wide
  • Phone compartment: 165 mm (6.5") height x 12 mm (0.5") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide
  • Lens compartment: 85 mm (3.4") x 85 mm (3.4") width x 40 mm (1.6") depth 

How it works

  • Open Lens Compartment
  • Grab Lens
  • Attach to Smartphone
  • Shoot :-)

--------------------------------------------------------------

The PHONESLINGER Outdoor

The PHONESLINGER Outdoor is the safe place for your phone when climbing in the Alps or Rockys, hiking adventure trails or riding wild trails on your bike. It's leight weight and robust and protects your phone from bumps into rocks or any kinds of rough situations. Attach it to the belt of your trousers, the waist belt of your backpack or your CAMSLINGER Outdoor. And have your Smartphone always ready with one hand in one second to grab the perfect photo.

 

Features PHONESLINGER Outdoor

  • Quick, one-handed access
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
  • Fits Smartphones (with case) from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
  • FIDLOCK-Magnetic closure
  • Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
  • Hidden pocket for credit cards etc. on the inside
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, super robust Nylon D900 fabrics
  • Soft touch material on the inside
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Blue and Grey

​Inner Dimensions

  • 165 mm (6.5") height x 14 mm (0.55") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide

How it works

  • Open FIDLOCK closure
  • Grab Smartphone
  • Shoot awesome photos

 

How to attach your PHONESLINGER Power, Prime or Outdoor to your belt

  • Open detachable loop on the back
  • Slide belt flap through your belt
  • Close loop with the Velcro pad and press buttons
  • You got it!

 

Features of the Belt Loop

  • Stabilizing PE-Plastic Sheet inside
  • 2-way-security with strong velcro pad and two press buttons

 

--------------------------------------------------------------

The FLOWBELT Modular Belt System

If you want to have more space, flexibility and a super comfortable way to carry your Smartphone and accessories, than the FLOWBELT and some cool accessory bags are the right thing for you. The FLOWBELT can be worn at the waist or as a sling over your shoulder. Attach a PHONESLINGER Power or Prime and a STUFFBAG and/or the PRIME Pouch to the FLOWBELT and you have all you need for a day out shooting with you – super comfy and quick accessible.

 

FLOWBELT Modular Belt System – Accessories

  • STUFFBAG for stuff like keys, sunglases, paper tissus, passport, travel documents etc. Comes with a Quality-Wallet for Money, Credit Cards and SD-Cards
  • PRIME Pouch to fit up to 5 Smartphone Lenses like the Moment Lenses, Sunglases or a mini tripod like the Manfrotto Pixie
  • BELTPAD with an additional Slot to take a PHONESLINGER Power, Prime or Outdoor or a STUFFBAG

Features FLOWBELT 

  • Offers two slots two attach PHONESLINGER bags and/or STUFFBAG
  • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
  • Belt adjustable from 70 cm (27.5") to 125 cm (50") and with optional BELTEXTENSION up to 165 cm (65")
  • Safety Buckel at the belt can be opened with two hands only
  • Hidden zipper pocket for Passport and travel documents
  • D-Rings to attach all kinds of accessories
  • Loops on the bottom to attach FLOWBELT to your thigh if needed (thigh band included)
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black

--------------------------------------------------------------

The STUFFBAG and included WALLET

The STUFFBAG fits perfectly to the FLOWBELT and is a great companion to a PHONESLINGER Power or Prime. It comes with an included, perfectly fitting Wallet. Put all the stuff you need for a day out on the streets in the STUFFBAG, like sunglasses, passport, keys, paper tissues, head phones and of course money and credit cards in the included WALLET. You can attach it to the FLOWEBELT or to any belt.

 

Features STUFFBAG 

  • Offers space for all kinds of stuff like passport, travel documents, sunglasses, keys, etc.
  • Including a WALLET to fit money, credit cards and up to 5 SD-cards
  • Easy to open and long lasting quality zippers
  • Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
  • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
  • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
  • Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black

​Dimensions STUFFBAG

  • 175 mm (7") height x 100 mm (4") depth x 100 mm (4") wide

    Features WALLET

    • Offers space for money, 10 credit cards and business cards, coins and up to 5 SD-cards
    • Easy to open and long lasting quality zippers
    • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
    • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
    • Colors: Steel Grey and Charcoal

    Dimensions Wallet

    • 165 mm (6.5") height x 80 mm (3,2") wide x 17 mm (0.65") depth

    --------------------------------------------------------------

    The PRIME Pouch

    The PRIME Pouch is designed to take up to 5 Smartphone Lenses, like the popular Moment Lenses. It can be attached to the top of the FLOWBELT and expands the flexibility of the FLOWBELT Modular Belt System greatly. Instead of Smartphone Lenses, you can also sore stuff of all kinds in it, like sunglasses, keys, up to 3 Kinder Surprise Eggs, a Manfrotto Pixie tripod etc.

    Features PRIME Pouch

    • Offers space for up top 5 Smartphone Lenses or any stuff
    • Easy to open and long lasting quality zippers
    • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
    • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
    • Colors: Steel Grey / Red and Charcoal / Black

    Inner Dimensions

    • 165 mm (6.5") height x 80 mm (3,2") wide x 17 mm (0.65") depth

    --------------------------------------------------------------

    The BELTPAD

    The BELTPAD extends the ability of the FLOWBELT to attach additional pouches or allows you to attach your PHONESLINGER Power, Prime or Outdoor on your belt in a lower position. This comes in handy when you are wearing a jacket. It comes with a thigh band so you can attach it to your thigh if needed.

    Features BELTPAD

    • Offers one slot for PHONESLINGER bags or STUFFBAG
    • Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
    • Loops on the bottom to attach FLOWBELT to your thigh if needed (thigh band included)
    • Made from High-Quality, weather resist, Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
    • Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
    • Colors: Steel Grey / Red and Charcoal / Black

    Dimensions

    • 175 mm (7") height x 80 mm (3,2") wide x 8 mm (0.3") depth

    --------------------------------------------------------------

    Perks

    --------------------------------------------------------------

    Schedule

    August 2017 to August 2018 prototyping and testing 

    September 2018 to November 2018 crowd-funding campaign

    November 2018 to January 2019 manufacturing 

    January 2019 to February/March 2019 shpping to our US and EU warehouses

    March 2019 shipping

     

    Risks and Challanges

    The PHONESLINGER is an already ready-to-production product and will be manufactured as soon as the campaign is successfully completed. The production-ready-prototypes aretested by many smartphone photographers and do work without any problem. As COSYSPEED has already several products in production, and we already successfuly funded two campaigns on Indiegogo. we can access an already well working chain of high quality manufacturing, shipment and distribution. 

    Our manufacturer (certified by SGS) is located in the Chinese Shenzen area and run by a German manufacturing company. It is guaranteed that quality is on a very high standard and that all workers are working under very good and proven conditions. Furthermore the SGS certification ensures environmentaly friendly manufacturing processes.

    With two successful Indiegogo campaigns in the back there are in our opinion no real risks. Only serious circumstances are a risk, such as natural desasters for example.  

    The main challenge is to make this campaign a success. And with your help and recommandations it is realistic that we can master this amazing project :-)

     

    Team & Thanks :-)

    Thomas Ludwig, CEO and founder of COSYSPEED

    Thomas Ludwig has had an advertising agency in Germany for almost 20 years and was working as development aid worker for the German Development Service in African countries. He is a photo nerd since many years and has a passion for street photography (but not much time for it). He lives with his family in Bonn/Germany.

    Stefan Eggers, Social Media Manager at COSYSPEED

    Stefan has a wide variety of skills and is a nerdy guy who is using Moment Lenses with great passion. It was Stefans inspiration that lead to the PHONESLINGER Prime. Stefan is a Brand Ambassador to Moment Lenses and lives in Bonn/Germany.

    --------------------------------------------------------------

    HUGE thanks goes to:

    Anna Tenne and Ben von Wong for being the creative drivers and sources of positive energy during the last months. Anna made amazing product photos on location and you can find Bens detailed ideas in significant parts of the PHONESLINGER, especially the FLOWBELT.

    Valentina Vee for directing, shooting and editing the campaign video. Valentina is straight and focused like only few people are and furthermore simply a wonderful person.

    Tina Pfaffle for some of the great product photos and guiding us through Athens during a busy week of video shooting (and for being a great and spontaneous actor).

    Thomas Leuthard for managing many social media stuff behind the scenes and for being such a great friend for many years. Thomas was also part of the first COSYSPEED Indiegogo campaign back in 2016 and patron to the CAMSLINGER Streetomatic Thomas Leuthard Edition.

    Thanks to Hanna and Sammi from the design and manufacturing team for their constant and constructive support.

    A huge thanks goes furthermore to Horst Dimde, who constantly supported us in the last months and who was involved from the beginning on. He was a great beta tester with precise feedback and lots of good ideas for improvements. 

    Last but not least a HUGE thanks goes to my wonderful wife Friederike and my sweeties Elfriede and Alwin for being so patient with a super crazy photo guy :-)

    And many thanks to all you guys that are not mentioned here. All of you wonderful peeps out there are part of this project and without you we won't be where we are.

     

    FAQs

    When do you ship the PHONESLINGER?

    Shipping should start during March 2019 from our US and EU warehouses. Depending on the country you are living, it may take 2 to 20 days to get your PHONESLINGER to you. US, Canadian and EU backers will get their PHONESLINGERs quicker, as shipping is much easier. It should not take longer than 2 to 5 days in these countries.

    Do I have to pay customs or VAT or shipping?

    We are shipping from warehouses in the US and Germany. So in these countries (and the EU) you dont have to pay customs. In other countries it might be, that you have to pay customs depending on the particular customs regulations in your country.

    Taxes

    VAT is basically included in EU orders respectively is not applicable in other destinations. 

    Shipping

    Shipping will be added when checking out. Depending on your country, it will be between 9,90 $US and 24,90 $US. 

    What kind of company is COSYSPEED and what will you do with the money raised in this campaign?

    COSYSPEED GmbH is a German company (Ltd.) based near Frankfurt/Germany. The money from this campaign will be used for the manufacturing of the PHONESLINGER.

    What will happen to my money if you do not reach the goal of 25.000 $US

    We are using the flexible option wich allows to collect the backed money even if the targeted 25.000 $US will not be reached. However we would start the manufacturing process if we reach 16.000 $US anyway and will ship as planned in March 2019. If we do not reach 16.000 $US, we will refund the collected money to the backers.

     

    DO YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS ABOUT THIS CAMPAIGN YOU'D LIKE TO BE ANSWERED? JUST DROP US SOME LINES...
story_txt:
Make Smartphone Photography SMARTER
The PHONESLINGER by COSYSPEED is the Worlds First Set of Bags for Smartphone Photography and Videography.


PHONESLINGER Power comes with an integrated QI-Wireless Powerbank. It charges your phone (your phone must be able for QI-Wireless charging) all the time it's in the bag and you'll never run out of power + have your Phone accessible within a second and with one hand

PHONESLINGER Prime holds your Smartphone and up to 4 smartphone lenses like the popular Moment Lenses. Have your Phone and Mobile Lenses accessible within a second and with one hand

PHONESLINGER Outdoor is rugged and light weight and the safe place for your phone out in nature. Have your phone safe but always in reach within a second and with one hand

FLOWBELT Modular Belt System can hold your PHONESLINGER and several accessory bags. Makes your Smartphone Photography even more flexible

Smartphone Photography and Videography has come a long way and image quality reaches a level, that was reserved to professional cameras like DSLRs only a few years ago. Inbetween many Photographers and Videographers discovered their Smartphone as a serious tool for their personal and professional work. We thought it's time to support all you great Smartphone Photography Heroes with a series of functional, well designed and affordable bags for your creative tool of choice – your Smartphone. 
This is COSYSPEEDs 3rd campaign on Indiegogo. Together with our backers wecan transform Smartphone Photography forever. Come and join our new project!!!
--------------------------------------------------------------


 
The PHONESLINGER Power 
The PHONESLINGER Power is for those Smartphone Photographers and Videographers who never want to run out of Power. You do extensive shootings on your trips around the world,  don't want to miss family memories or use your Smartphone to express your creativity in personal and professional projects? The extra juice of 8000 mAh of the integrated Powerbank gives you all the energy you need. All Smartphones with an integrated QI-Wireless Charging function can benefit from the QI-Wireless Powerbank that comes with the PHONESLINGER Power. Simply put your phone in the PHONESLINGER Power and it'll be charged. It's so easy!
 
Features PHONESLINGER Power

Quick, one-handed access
Fits any QI-Wireless able Smartphones from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
FIDLOCK-Magnetic closure
Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets 
Made from High-Quality, weather resist Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
Hidden pocket for credit cards etc. on the inside
NYLON D200 pouch for the Powerbank
Soft touch material on the inside
Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black


Inner Dimensions165 mm (6.5") height x 32 mm (1.25") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide

How it works

Put your Smartphone in the PHONESLINGER Power
Press on/off button on the Powerbank CS8000
Charging starts as soon as green LED indicator lights up :-)


 
Features Powerbank CS8000
Works on the QI-Wirelss Charging Standard with all Phones listed below:
Apple iPhone: 8, 8 Plus, iPhone X
Samsung Galaxy: Note 9, S9, S9+, Note 8, S8, S8+, S7, S7 Edge, Note 5, S6, S6 Edge
Sony: Xperia XZ3, Xperia XZ2 Premium, Xperia XZ2
LG: G7 ThinQ, V30, G6 (US version only), G4 (optional), G3 (optional)
Nokia: 8 Sirocco
Huawei: Mate RS Porsche Design
Microsoft Lumia: 1520, 1020, 930, 929, 928, 920
Google Nexus: 4, 5, 6, 7 (2013)
BlackBerry: Priv




Can charge your phone wirelessly
Can be charged wirelessly (Yes, you can put the Powerbank on a wireless charger and it will be charged)
Can be charged with regular phone chargers via Micro USB or USB C cable
Can charge other devices via cable with the standard USB connector on top
On/Off switch
Durable polycarbonate housing
High-Quality battery cells (ISO9000/ISO14000) from a top supplier
LED indicators for:
Charging status
Red LED shows divice is not charging
Green LED shows device is charging


8000 mAh / charges your phone up to 2 times
Input: DC 5V/2.1A
Wireless Output: DC 5V/1.0A
USB Output: DC 5V/2.1A
Wireless recieving: DC 5V/0.75A


Dimensions135 mm (5.3") height x 18 mm (0.7") depth x 72 mm (2.8") wide

--------------------------------------------------------------
The PHONESLINGER Prime
The PHONESLINGER Prime is the perfect, safe and quick-access bag for the Lenses you bought for your Smartphone. It fits your iPhone X, iPhone 8 Plus or Galaxy Note or any other phone and up to 4 lenses, like the super duper Moment Lenses. It's so easy to have pro grade image quality and flexibility with Smartphone Lenses these days. The only limitaion though is the way you can access them. Don't dig in your backpack or messenger bag for your Smartphone Lenses, just use a PHONESLINGER prime and get ready within a second and with one hand.

 
Features PHONESLINGER Prime

Quick, one-handed access
Padding from robust but thin PE-Plastic Sheets
Fits up to 4 Smartphone Lenses like the Moment Lenses
Fits Smartphones (with case) from iPhone X to Galaxy Note 
Made from High-Quality, weather resist Duo-Tone Nylon D600 fabrics
Detachable loop on the back to attach to a belt or to the FLOWBELT
Soft touch material on the inside
3 velcro dividers in the lens compartment
Manufactured under SGS certification (www.sgs.com) for fair working conditions and environmentally friendly manufacturing
Colors: Steel Grey/Red and Charcoal/Black

​Dimensions

Overall: 175 mm (7") height x 72 mm (2.8") depth x 100 mm (4") wide
Phone compartment: 165 mm (6.5") height x 12 mm (0.5") depth x 90 mm (3.6") wide
Lens compartment: 85 mm (3.4") x 85 mm (3.4") width x 40 mm (1.6") depth 

How it works

Open Lens Compartment
Grab Lens
Attach to Smartphone
Shoot :-)

Thomas Ludwig has had an advertising agency in Germany for almost 20 years and was working as development aid worker for the German Development Service in African countries. He is a photo nerd since many years and has a passion for street photography (but not much time for it). He lives with his family in Bonn/Germany.

When do you ship the PHONESLINGER?
Shipping should start during March 2019 from our US and EU warehouses. Depending on the country you are living, it may take 2 to 20 days to get your PHONESLINGER to you. US, Canadian and EU backers will get their PHONESLINGERs quicker, as shipping is much easier. It should not take longer than 2 to 5 days in these countries.
Do I have to pay customs or VAT or shipping?
We are shipping from warehouses in the US and Germany. So in these countries (and the EU) you dont have to pay customs. In other countries it might be, that you have to pay customs depending on the particular customs regulations in your country.
Taxes
VAT is basically included in EU orders respectively is not applicable in other destinations. 
Shipping
Shipping will be added when checking out. Depending on your country, it will be between 9,90 $US and 24,90 $US. 
What kind of company is COSYSPEED and what will you do with the money raised in this campaign?
COSYSPEED GmbH is a German company (Ltd.) based near Frankfurt/Germany. The money from this campaign will be used for the manufacturing of the PHONESLINGER.

We are using the flexible option wich allows to collect the backed money even if the targeted 25.000 $US will not be reached. However we would start the manufacturing process if we reach 16.000 $US anyway and will ship as planned in March 2019. If we do not reach 16.000 $US, we will refund the collected money to the backers.

story:
If you are a business person who travel frequently at home and abroad, you must prepare a foreign SIM card and a car pin. You may lose the SIM cards if manually changing them for your phone, which could be very troublesome.

If you are an elite worker, you must have two SIM cards, one for work and the other for private life. In fact, you often carry two phones to handle affairs of work and life, but it may cause trouble if you forget to recharge a phone and it is out of power; or you need to carry 2 charging lines because the two phones have different charging interfaces.

If you want to stay online, but the signal coverage of an operator is really poor, then you have to switch to another operator with better signal coverage.Therefore, you are often busy replacing SIM cards.

First, to make a dual-SIM iPhone, SIMHUB serves as a card holder to carry two cards in a smart way without changing the original appearance of the iPhone and violating Steve Jobs’ concept of thin and fashionable.

The way SIMHUB realizes the dual-SIM support is completely different from that of other products. It's simpler and doesn't require external devices or Bluetooth connection which are power-consuming, so you don't have to carry extra devices.

It uses the same principle as a normal card holder, and everyone can easily operate it. Only a splitter is required to process two SIM cards and then you can install it easily as prompted.

SIMHUB has a very attractive highlight, that is, its dual-card traffic switching function, which is much more wonderful than the quality of conventional dual cards and shows a qualitative leap compared to the first generation of dual cards.

It makes the voice call easier. There are two ways to make a call: “call by standby card” and “call by non-standby card”.

SIMHUB has enabled dual SIMs on one iPhone to allow separate numbers for personal and business calls. The user can smartly change the settings of the dual-SIM standby smartphone via app.

Time-based schedule: It activates the channel for work number during office hours and automatically switches to that for personal number after work.

Location-based schedule: It activates the channel for personal number when you stay at home and automatically switches to that for work number upon your arrival at workplace based on the signal quality of stations in different locations, avoiding no-signal incidence. This automatic switch from operator A to B in case of no-signal areas will relieve you from the trouble of “No Service”.

SIMHUB supports upgrades to the app and COS, improving user experience with better and more innovations in services.

SIMHUB has a delicate design that has improved SIM combination without damaging your phone. It will replace zero component of your iPhone to realize dual-SIM standby mode.

 

Shenzhen Mocksun Sim Technology Development Co., Ltd. is co-founded by a group of technical enthusiasts specializing in software technology, aiming to create simpler and more convenient solutions of communications with innovative technology that create values. The company follows the philosophy of "Innovation, Quality, Service, Economy, Dedication, and Gratitude". Drawing inspiration from new ideas, controlling quality, providing all-round services and making high-quality products, the company values “Ambition, Staff-orientation, Technology, Spirit and Benefits”. The Super Snow team now consists of capable management personnel and high-quality technical team, while it sticks to a business philosophy of quality as life, time as credit and price as competitiveness.

Contact Us

If you encounter any problem during or after the event, please contact us anytime via:

Hotline: 0755- 83932037

Email: service@2sim.cn

website:http://www.2sim.cn

Project schedule (risks and challenges)

All projects always have risks and challenges but we will reduce these to the highest limit. We have already done all the necessary preliminary work and made relatively perfect project schedule plans.

Before this crowd funding, our products have been tested and improved for many times. After small-lot production, we have organized 500 people to conduct internal tests and fill in inner test reports. Through the content feedback of the 500 copies, we optimized the product again. In addition, our company can produce qualified products. Your support is our unceasing impetus.

You can rest assured that if you encounter risks in any stage, we will give the corresponding compensation and solutions.

 

Thank you for your support

In order to make our life more convenient and enhance the experience of iPhone users, we constantly improve communication technology and strive to create a simple and practical tool to meet consumers’ current demand for dual cards. After the unremitting efforts of Ultrasnow team, we finally developed a SIMHUB smart card slot which can realize the dual-card and smart dual-standby of the iPhone. Each of your concerns and support will be a powerful force for us to continue our efforts to better meet the needs of our users, so thank you for your support.

Great, we have completed the design and production of the entire product.

Factory manufacturing

 

 

FAQs

1: The models supported by SIMHUB?

Answer: Currently supporting iPhnoe5~iPhoneX, including operator-customized sim locked iPhone,it including ICCID active method for Locked iPhone!

2: The color waterproof problem of SIMHUB card slot?

Answer: Simhub uses the original sim card slot of the mobile phone without any change.

3: Packing list of SIMHUB?

Answer: Double-card device (including control circuit SIMHUB) *1x separator*1

4: Can the separated SIM card be restored?

Answer: We used USB heating to soften the SIM card adhesive to separate the SIM card and will not cause functional damage to the SIM card. Re-heating adhesive can restore the combination of SIM card and plastic sheet. The lossless separation and reduction can be realized.

5: How does the secondary card and the master card of SIMHUB stand by for phone call?

Answer: At present, SIMHUB is using the master and secondary cards: for example,if Card A is the master card and Card B the secondary card, then Card A is on and call to Card B will be transferred to Card A.

story:
SPEEDY magnetic coiling data & charging cable is designed to avoid cables in terrible messing while it was using.

 

 

SPEEDY magnetic cable provides 4 optional series to fulfill different charging ports. USB A to Lightning, USB A to USB C(Type-C), USB C to Lightning, and USB C  to USB C.​

For Apple Lightning Devices

 

 

Inside each lightning connector is a tiny authentication chip that tells your device it's Apple MFI Certified. This is important because non-certified, or knock-off, lightning cables can be very dangerous to your device. (You may have noticed a warning message on your phone when a non-MFI cable was detected.)

 

What is Apple MFi certified?

MFi Certified is short for ‘made for iPhone/iPad/iPod’ Certified, which is the official certification from Apple. Accessories that own MFi certification will not damage your Apple devices or cause any danger such as electric leakage.

Those cables designed with fresh ideas below are not able to obtain MFi Certification and can't work well with iPhones. SPEEDY Cable has MFi certification and is trustworthy.

 

 Any time, Any devices & any  charging​

 

 

 

 

For USB-C(TYPE-C) Devices

 

 

 MacBook  PD Fast charging For USB-C Cable​

iPhone PD charging-18W

 

 

  

 

Quick start power to your devices

Stable Coiling as the strong magnetic beads

 

You also have the finger spinner

---Help people to release pressure, relax and get inspiration

 

 

Provides a neat and tidy situation in the car

 

Easy picked up after the charging was completed

 

Keep the SPEEDY anywhere

 

 

Speedy is designed by nylon braided cables, which are durable and reliable, with strong magnetic beads. In order to make the disordered cables clean and tidy

 

 

Every concept comes from real life

 

Before we implement it, make sure that we need to find more materials to compare, identify, test, and get the product we want.​

 

 

 

 

 

All developed cables have been passed a variety of tests by essential testing equipment.

 

 

Reliability test of nylon cable​

 

                                                   

 

 

About Our Teams

Our design concept is to make our cable more simple and effective. We need reliable quality assurance and real charging cable standards. 

Customer Support:  support@ruiysion.com

Share with your friends and spread the world

We don't know everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t purchase SPEEDY Cable right now, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of.  Thank you for your great support!!!

https://www.facebook.com/speedycable2020

story:
Store Your Vices and Charge Your Devices.    

  

Whether it’s jewelry, emergency cash or a secret stash, there are some things you just don’t want others to touch. That’s why you need Charged Box.

 

 

 

 

 

Charged Box comes in a highly secure  Biometric Model with the ability to program up to 10 sets of fingerprints. You have total control over who has access to your valuables in our patent-pending storage unit. Keep your vices locked away until you’re ready to pass them around.

 

Charged Box also is available in three sleek and stylish colors. Discreetly store and charge all your goodies at work or at home. We’ve even installed automated internal LED lights so you can see what’s inside of your box whether it’s day or night.  

5 Reasons why you NEED the Charged Box:

1. Security: Featuring a bio-metric lock with up to 10 Users, you are always in control. The last thing you want is someone tampering with your belongings, taking them, or even knowing that they are there. 

2. Power: The Charged Box Features 40,000 mAh of portable power, imagine charging 17 iPhones, or over 100 Vape pens before having to recharge the box. 

3. Versatility: Not only can you charge and store your 
belongings, but our removable divider keeps things organized and the top tray with it’s silicone mat transforms it into a work space for your greenery or crafts. 

4. Elegance: We made sure to give the box a superior look and feel to help blend it in with your environment. 

5. Discreet: Want to keep your guilty pleasures to your self? Don’t worry, the airtight seal in our patent-pending Charged Box will prevent any odors from escaping the box. and we include it in EVERY Charged Box!

Charged Box measures 14 cm x 27 cm x 19 cm, and the removable dividers will keep all your goods organized. Your secrets are safe in Charged Box.

 

Last but definitely not least, you can’t have a Charged Box without the charge.  Each box will have a long-lasting 40,000 mAh battery. With four USB ports, you can charge several devices at the same time!

 

We cannot wait to deliver the powerful, sleek, and ultra-discreet patent-pending Charged Box to you! Our team spent over a year in research and development and had our first prototype in February 2019, and the second in June 2019. After we received valuable feedback from our clients, we developed our latest model in September 2019. With your support, we can get Charged Box in homes all over the world, and keep their contents safely hidden, and always fully charged.

- The Charged Box Team

story:
AS FEATURED IN


     


The world is changing at a very fast pace and millions of us are now surrounded by digital devices and smart technology, spending hours upon hours on them each and every day. In fact, you could say we are hooked. With the constant viewing of digital screens, a new danger is brought to our eyes - from work to home and on the move, we use our devices of convenience for huge numbers of hours every day, and this is taking its toll on our eyes.


         


What is the effect from UV and Blue light on our eyes?

All digital devices emit UV and artificial blue light.

Ultraviolet rays (UV) attack the cornea every day and the crystalline lens of the eye. The cumulative effect over time can potentially contribute to cataracts.

Meanwhile, blue-violet light penetrates a lot further into the eyes and reaches the retina. These two specific wavelengths have recently been identified as being harmful to retinal cells – in fact, blue-violet light is involved in their gradual degeneration. This is one of the proven causes of AMD (age macular degeneration) which is thought to be a cause of blindness, so protecting your eyes from these wavelengths and children's eyes is vitally important.


Zappi’s computer and gaming eyewear protects you from these two specific wavelengths with our Wavelength Lens TechnologyTM filtering out the artificial blue light and have UV 400 protection. Our computer glasses are non prescription and are designed for people who do not normally wear glasses but view digital screens often, which is almost everyone.

We are essentially rebuffing this radiation and bringing fashion forward to stylish computer and gaming glasses for adults and children. We have thought of every member of the family.



 Zappi is thinking ahead to protecting the eyes of adults, teens and children from the damage of UV and blue light that's emitted from our much-loved technology. Our children start using digital devices from when they are toddlers and will have 25 years more exposure to the blue-violet light and UV that is emitted from our digital screens than we ever did, and this could certainly lead to eye disease in the future.                



We are making our computer eyewear accessible to as many people as we can and that is reflected in our exclusive Indiegogo perks. Zappi is keeping the prices low so you can make great savings on the final retail price. Also, you’ll save by sharing or teaming up with your friends and family to look after each other’s eyes, as the more of our glasses you purchase the cheaper they become. Take a look at our exclusive family bundle perks.

                            Choose your Zappi Wavelength Lens Technology

Zappi will contact you after our Indiegogo Campaign is closed for your choice of lens, frame style and color choice. You can see examples of the lenses and frames in the gallery

             


                              

                                                   Wearing Zappi Spectrum


High Protection Wavelength Lenses

Made from impact-resistant poly carbonate. Our lenses offer UV 400 protection, blocking 99.9% of harmful rays with a special AR (anti-reflective) coating on both sides of the lens to filter out the harmful blue light, and we added EMI coating on the front of the lens for extra protection for your eyes. They also reduce glare to the eyes and the lens is scratch resistant. 

Choose between clear-looking lenses with a slight tint or the more yellow lens 

Job done, protected!


     


                            Choose your frame 

Durable and flexible – Made from high quality poly carbonate, the frames are also flexible. We added the Zappi logo onto the temple.

Premium matte finish – With a special finishing on the frame to give them more comfort to keep your computer glasses in place.

Computer glasses frames - They are lightweight and fashionable to wear, and we have named each model with an electromagnetic theme.

We will ask you for your frame preferences after the Indiegogo campaign closes

(See gallery for larger images of the styles.)


     Zappi Nano Kids                                        Zappi Radar Kids
      

Pink : Blue : Black                                      Pink/White : Blue/White :                                                                                Black/Blue : Black                                                                                                          

                            

1. Eye Lens Size -45mm                                                   1. Eye Lens Size - 47mm

2. The Nose Bridge - 16mm                                            2. The Nose Bridge - 17mm

3. The Temple Length - 123mm                                    3. The Temple Length - 125 mm


         Zappi Frequency                                           Zappi Spectrum

Black : Grey Leopard : Tiger                        White : Black : Red + Black :

                                                                                Yellow Blue Black 


                         


1. Eye Lens Size - 50mm                                                      1. Eye Lens Size - 53mm

2. The Nose Bridge - 18mm                                                 2. The Nose Bridge - 17mm
3. The Temple Length - 136mm                                         3. The Temple Length - 140mm


          Zappi Quantum                                           Zappi Photon

                 Clip on                                                 Black : Tortoise : Pink                                                                                               Pink Leopard                                                                                             


           
     

Width - 140 mm                                                                        1. Eye Lens Size - 53mm

Height - 45 mm                                                                         2. The Nose Bridge - 18mm

All pairs of computer glasses include a quality microfiber cloth and storage pouch to keep your computer glasses clean and branded with the Zappi logo. (See gallery.)




Zappi computer glasses are great for using with all of your digital devices.


                                      

                                     Timeline






Minimizing radiation from electromagnetic waves surrounding digital screens. Our eyewear is designed for use with smartphones, computers, tablets, gaming screens and television, and are also good for driving at night to reduce glare even if you have never worn glasses before. The Zappi computer glasses are designed with you in mind - they are lightweight, comfortable and very fashionable.


                         

                 



Order Today 

Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our computer glasses, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run. Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear the new Zappi computer eyewear this Christmas:

1) Select a perk on the right-hand side to start your order.

2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note: if you would like to contribute the necessary postage cost of £5 it does not matter how many pairs you purchase its just £5 shipping, you can change the figure above.

3) Complete payment via PayPal or using your credit/debit card. 

4) Your Zappi computer glasses will be dispatched early December right in time for Christmas.




Great for gaming - play longer and beat your competition without the eye strain! Gamers seem to prefer the more yellow-tinted glasses to game in, and they look cool too. 

Some photos from a recent gaming event we went to in the UK to show off our computer and gaming eyewear, where we received excellent and positive feedback over the 3 days we were there.



The Impact

  • We believe that your contribution will be a very valuable one and will allow us to make our dreams become reality, which is to protect millions of children's and adults’ eyes from potential AMD around the globe.

  • We will be able to reach out to many people around the world over time and educate them about the dangers of blue light that's emitted from digital screens and reduce digital eye strain.

  • Make it happen! Our future at Zappi will help teach parents and children more about other possible health hazards from our gadgets of convenience. 



F&Q's

What makes our glasses lenses special compared to other lenses ?

We have spent almost one and half years working with our supplier, taking many samples and prototypes to create our computer glasses lenses with the correct coatings, which reduce radiation and filter out the harmful blue light along with offering UV 400 protection. They reduce digital eye strain and visual demands.

YOU WILL LOVE THEM!

Are Zappi glasses available with a prescription ?

Unfortunately we do not currently offer a prescription version of the Zappi computer glasses. However, this is something we wish to provide in the near future. Therefore, we made the clip-on version for everyone who already wears prescription glasses - they fit straight on to your prescription eyewear, giving you all the benefits of the computer glasses by cutting out the blue light. The clip-ons are a melanin lens and reduce blue light by approximately 50%.

What is the difference between the two lenses?

Our two lenses have the same protective coatings on. The clearer-looking lens with a slight tint lets more true light through and reduces the blue light by approximately 30%, whilst the more yellow lens filters out the blue light by over 50%. They both add more contrast and reduce the visual demands on your eyes, allowing them to relax. 

Are Zappi Computer glasses available in other styles and colors ?

Our glasses are currently only available in the models and colors on Indiegogo, but we will look to bring a new range and colors out in the future. 

How will you know which Zappi glasses i have ordered ?

We will ask you after the Indiegogo campaign is closed to get your exact frame style color and lens choices.  

Why is there a £5 shipping fee ?

We have kept the shipping fee low and it does not matter whether you order 1 pair or 5 pairs, you will only pay the set amount of £5 for shipping. 

How long will it take for my glasses to arrive ?

Your Zappi computer glasses will be dispatched in early December - excellent timing for Christmas and extra presents for your loved ones, and a perfect accessory for all of your new and current digital devices.

We have teamed up with a large distribution center to fulfill the orders.  

When shipped to the UK and Europe delivery will take 2-5 days.

USA and the rest of the world will take up to 10 days


Other Ways You Can Help ?

Thank you so much for your support and taking the time to check out our cool computer glasses - we know you’re going to love them!

  • We'd hugely appreciate you caring for other people's eyes you know and sharing them with all of your friends and family. 

  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools for all your social media pages to reach out to them or send them a message with our link.

  • "Don't get Zapped - Get Zappi!" 

         THANK YOU!!!
story_txt:
AS FEATURED IN


     

The world is changing at a very fast pace and millions of us are now surrounded by digital devices and smart technology, spending hours upon hours on them each and every day. In fact, you could say we are hooked. With the constant viewing of digital screens, a new danger is brought to our eyes - from work to home and on the move, we use our devices of convenience for huge numbers of hours every day, and this is taking its toll on our eyes.




         



What is the effect from UV and Blue light on our eyes?
All digital devices emit UV and artificial blue light.
Ultraviolet rays (UV) attack the cornea every day and the crystalline lens of the eye. The cumulative effect over time can potentially contribute to cataracts.
Meanwhile, blue-violet light penetrates a lot further into the eyes and reaches the retina. These two specific wavelengths have recently been identified as being harmful to retinal cells – in fact, blue-violet light is involved in their gradual degeneration. This is one of the proven causes of AMD (age macular degeneration) which is thought to be a cause of blindness, so protecting your eyes from these wavelengths and children's eyes is vitally important.

Zappi’s computer and gaming eyewear protects you from these two specific wavelengths with our Wavelength Lens TechnologyTM filtering out the artificial blue light and have UV 400 protection. Our computer glasses are non prescription and are designed for people who do not normally wear glasses but view digital screens often, which is almost everyone.
We are essentially rebuffing this radiation and bringing fashion forward to stylish computer and gaming glasses for adults and children. We have thought of every member of the family.







 Zappi is thinking ahead to protecting the eyes of adults, teens and children from the damage of UV and blue light that's emitted from our much-loved technology. Our children start using digital devices from when they are toddlers and will have 25 years more exposure to the blue-violet light and UV that is emitted from our digital screens than we ever did, and this could certainly lead to eye disease in the future.                







We are making our computer eyewear accessible to as many people as we can and that is reflected in our exclusive Indiegogo perks. Zappi is keeping the prices low so you can make great savings on the final retail price. Also, you’ll save by sharing or teaming up with your friends and family to look after each other’s eyes, as the more of our glasses you purchase the cheaper they become. Take a look at our exclusive family bundle perks.


                            Choose your Zappi Wavelength Lens Technology
Zappi will contact you after our Indiegogo Campaign is closed for your choice of lens, frame style and color choice. You can see examples of the lenses and frames in the gallery



             


                              
                                                   Wearing Zappi Spectrum


High Protection Wavelength Lenses
Made from impact-resistant poly carbonate. Our lenses offer UV 400 protection, blocking 99.9% of harmful rays with a special AR (anti-reflective) coating on both sides of the lens to filter out the harmful blue light, and we added EMI coating on the front of the lens for extra protection for your eyes. They also reduce glare to the eyes and the lens is scratch resistant. 
Choose between clear-looking lenses with a slight tint or the more yellow lens 
Job done, protected!

     




                            Choose your frame 




Durable and flexible – Made from high quality poly carbonate, the frames are also flexible. We added the Zappi logo onto the temple.
Premium matte finish – With a special finishing on the frame to give them more comfort to keep your computer glasses in place.
Computer glasses frames - They are lightweight and fashionable to wear, and we have named each model with an electromagnetic theme.
We will ask you for your frame preferences after the Indiegogo campaign closes
(See gallery for larger images of the styles.)


     Zappi Nano Kids                                        Zappi Radar Kids      


Pink : Blue : Black                                      Pink/White : Blue/White :                                                                                Black/Blue : Black                                                                                                          


                            
1. Eye Lens Size -45mm                                                   1. Eye Lens Size - 47mm


2. The Nose Bridge - 16mm                                            2. The Nose Bridge - 17mm

3. The Temple Length - 123mm                                    3. The Temple Length - 125 mm



         Zappi Frequency                                           Zappi Spectrum



Black : Grey Leopard : Tiger                        White : Black : Red + Black :
                                                                                Yellow Blue Black 



                         

1. Eye Lens Size - 50mm                                                      1. Eye Lens Size - 53mm

2. The Nose Bridge - 18mm                                                 2. The Nose Bridge - 17mm

3. The Temple Length - 136mm                                         3. The Temple Length - 140mm



          Zappi Quantum                                           Zappi Photon


                 Clip on                                                 Black : Tortoise : Pink                                                                                               Pink Leopard                                                                                             




                  Width - 140 mm                                                                        1. Eye Lens Size - 53mm

Height - 45 mm                                                                         2. The Nose Bridge - 18mm



All pairs of computer glasses include a quality microfiber cloth and storage pouch to keep your computer glasses clean and branded with the Zappi logo. (See gallery.)






Zappi computer glasses are great for using with all of your digital devices.

                                      

                                     Timeline














Minimizing radiation from electromagnetic waves surrounding digital screens. Our eyewear is designed for use with smartphones, computers, tablets, gaming screens and television, and are also good for driving at night to reduce glare even if you have never worn glasses before. The Zappi computer glasses are designed with you in mind - they are lightweight, comfortable and very fashionable.



                         

                 






Order Today 
Due to the initial costs and high minimum order quantities in manufacturing our computer glasses, we need your support to allow us to begin our first production run. Here’s how you can support our campaign and be the first to wear the new Zappi computer eyewear this Christmas:
1) Select a perk on the right-hand side to start your order.
2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details. Note: if you would like to contribute the necessary postage cost of £5 it does not matter how many pairs you purchase its just £5 shipping, you can change the figure above.
3) Complete payment via PayPal or using your credit/debit card. 
4) Your Zappi computer glasses will be dispatched early December right in time for Christmas.







Great for gaming - play longer and beat your competition without the eye strain! Gamers seem to prefer the more yellow-tinted glasses to game in, and they look cool too. 
Some photos from a recent gaming event we went to in the UK to show off our computer and gaming eyewear, where we received excellent and positive feedback over the 3 days we were there.



The Impact


We believe that your contribution will be a very valuable one and will allow us to make our dreams become reality, which is to protect millions of children's and adults’ eyes from potential AMD around the globe.
We will be able to reach out to many people around the world over time and educate them about the dangers of blue light that's emitted from digital screens and reduce digital eye strain. Make it happen! Our future at Zappi will help teach parents and children more about other possible health hazards from our gadgets of convenience. 


  


F&Q's
What makes our glasses lenses special compared to other lenses ?

We have spent almost one and half years working with our supplier, taking many samples and prototypes to create our computer glasses lenses with the correct coatings, which reduce radiation and filter out the harmful blue light along with offering UV 400 protection. They reduce digital eye strain and visual demands.
YOU WILL LOVE THEM!

Are Zappi glasses available with a prescription ?

Unfortunately we do not currently offer a prescription version of the Zappi computer glasses. However, this is something we wish to provide in the near future. Therefore, we made the clip-on version for everyone who already wears prescription glasses - they fit straight on to your prescription eyewear, giving you all the benefits of the computer glasses by cutting out the blue light. The clip-ons are a melanin lens and reduce blue light by approximately 50%.
What is the difference between the two lenses?

Our two lenses have the same protective coatings on. The clearer-looking lens with a slight tint lets more true light through and reduces the blue light by approximately 30%, whilst the more yellow lens filters out the blue light by over 50%. They both add more contrast and reduce the visual demands on your eyes, allowing them to relax. 

Are Zappi Computer glasses available in other styles and colors ?

Our glasses are currently only available in the models and colors on Indiegogo, but we will look to bring a new range and colors out in the future. 
How will you know which Zappi glasses i have ordered ?

We will ask you after the Indiegogo campaign is closed to get your exact frame style color and lens choices.  


Why is there a £5 shipping fee ?

We have kept the shipping fee low and it does not matter whether you order 1 pair or 5 pairs, you will only pay the set amount of £5 for shipping. 
How long will it take for my glasses to arrive ?


Your Zappi computer glasses will be dispatched in early December - excellent timing for Christmas and extra presents for your loved ones, and a perfect accessory for all of your new and current digital devices.
We have teamed up with a large distribution center to fulfill the orders.  
When shipped to the UK and Europe delivery will take 2-5 days.
USA and the rest of the world will take up to 10 days



Other Ways You Can Help ?

Thank you so much for your support and taking the time to check out our cool computer glasses - we know you’re going to love them!  We'd hugely appreciate you caring for other people's eyes you know and sharing them with all of your friends and family.  You can use the Indiegogo share tools for all your social media pages to reach out to them or send them a message with our link.
"Don't get Zapped - Get Zappi!"             THANK YOU!!!

story:
What is Hybox?

Hybox is a Hand-Sized portable fuel power generator that allows you to power or charge any USB device with just a couple of drops of beverage, such as water, soda, juice, vinegar, and salt water, etc. You can charge your device any time any where with no limitations. Unlike the Solar-Powered Chargers, the Hybox generates energy instantly and never impacted by weather or solar position, you no longer need to stay at the same spot while your device is charging, or burnning yourself and device under the sun a whole day for just a single charge with the solar system. It will charge your device whether it's day or night, rain or shine.  Your device will charge at the same rate as plugging it into the USB port of your computer or an electrical wall outlet at home. The Hybox is compact enough for travel, outdoor adventures off the grid, or stashing away at home for emergency situations.


Off The Grid Outdoor Activities

No matter how far away you are from the outlet, know that the Hybox will be a power source for your devices. Whether on adventure trips, fishing or hunting, climbing, canoeing, or hiking, these are activities that most often take place in remote areas with no easy grid access.


Travel On The Go & Emergency Situations

When you're on the go, you don't really have time to charge your devices at a static location,  or there might even be no where to charge your devices, or you may also run out of power during intense communication use. Having a Hybox in your briefcase can helps and save you in certain mission critical situations.


How it works?

In the animation, you can see how Hybox(Micro) & Hybox(Mega) work. The light with the Hybox(Mega) is much brighter than the light with the Hybox(Micro), that's because the Hybox(Mega) generates more electricity than the Hybox(Micro).


Specifications

Note: The quality of the liquid doesn't really matter, you could use the Hybox with the Used/Washed Water! But Please do not use it with any chemical liquid.

(*) Works but not recommended

(X) Doesn't Works

Advantages

  • Instant Power, Anywhere, Anytime
  • High Power Capacity, Small Size, Light Weight
  • No sun needed, could works in a complete darkness environment
  • Power up with couple drops of beverage immediately
  • Charges all USB-Compatible devices
  • Reusable with no recharge needed
  • No longer need to wait at the same spot while your device is charging
  • Low-Cost


What we need?

We need about $25,000 for production and need your help to bring this project to life. Contributing to the project with money is not the only way you can help, you can also share this project with your friends and family, please get involve today, help us to spread the word, thank you!


What you get?

All the contributors would get the perks they contributed and the best wishes. Thank you!


What we have done so far?

Hybox(Micro)

Hybox(Mega)

We have done almost everything we need, such as the circuits & the enclosures design, we also tested it with all the USB devices we have, the Hybox works perfect!


Prototype


The prototype of Hybox that's in the lab, simply tested with the smartphone in the video.

Risks & Challenges

The Hybox is uses the newest Air Battery technologies, so the biggest challenge would be manufacturing, that's the reason why we set the Estimated Delivery date in December 2015, just in case of delay. But we're confident the Hybox would delivered to all of the contributors around September 2015.

The current prototypes are printed by the 3D printer, so, it might looks a little bit different with the final product, probably it would looks much better.

Note: We have all the rights to change the design of the enclosures without notice.


Timeline


FAQ:

Q: Is it reusable?

A: Yes, the Hybox & battery plate are both reusable.

Q: Do i have to recharge the Hybox?

A: No, you don't have to recharge the Hybox before using it.

Q: How long does it takes to start generating the power?

A: The Hybox would generates the power immediately once the liquid added.

Q: How long does it takes to charge a smartphone?

A: With the Hybox(Mega), you could charge your iPhone 6 from 0% - 100% in about 2 hours. 

Q: Does the liquid effects the output current?

A: Yes, different liquid different output current.

Q: What liquid is preferred to use?

A: We preferred to use the Hybox with the salt water or sea water.

Q: How long as the Power Source last?

A: It depends on the liquid and the power capacity of the device you're going to charge. And you have to replace the Power Source plate after a period of uses.


Contacts

Please feel free to contact us if you have any question or would like be partnership with us, thank you!
Email: huipingliang@outlook.com

story:
We will set up our patented process to bring to you ABSOLUTELY FREE; Unlimited talk, local and international, free text, and free high speed internet services, with no hidden charges ever. The best part of this is you get to keep your same phone and same phone number. We guarantee, NO SHUT OFFS EVER, and NO minutes to purchase.  Not only that, you get free Netflix access which means you get to watch all the movies and TV shows you want.   Slim Cell Wireless pays netflix for you. You will no longer be a slave to those cell phone service providers. You get to watch all of the movies you want free. Play games free. Go on social media and stay on as long as you want, free. Send as many text messages as you want, free. And stay on your cell phone all day and all night if you want absolutely FREE.

Here is how it works.  When you place a call, you get a 15 second advertisement instead of a phone ringing in your ear. The advertisement will be targeted to you. You won't be bothered with ads that don't interest you.  Advertisers pay your phone costs.  Ads will also replace voice mail instructions, call waiting, and a couple of other areas.

I can remember a time when we were charged $15 dollars a month for one land line telephone per household. There were no talk limits, with a small charge for long distance calls. Now a family of five pays $500.00 per month, per household for five seperate cell phones. Often times these cell phones have limited talk text and internet use. There also used to be free TV with plenty of movies and our favorite shows. Now with cable tv it cost us $150.00 or more each month for the same movies and shows.

We at Slim Cell Wireless, believe those ridiculous charges can be done away with. Parents now-a-days,  with this lingering recession, find it difficult to provide basic food and clothing, housing, transportation, utilities, and medical necessities, while trying to maintain cell phone bills. Families have to choose between everyday neccessities and paying their cell phone bill. This problem is much worse for single parent families. That whole load falls on one parent. Then we have the minimum wage workers, some of whom have children and are single parents. Almost one third of their income goes to pay cell phone bills. Some have tuition,  car notes, Day- Care bills, on and on. I think you get the picture. The problem is worldwide. However, if we stand together as one; And launch this worldwide service we solve an economic problem for the whole world. We are all citizens of this planet and must all concern ourselves with the well being of others.  Your donations help us to help you, and your family and friends.

We at Slim Cell Wireless realize the importance of maintaining communication with the rest of the family and the rest of the world. Kids constantly have emergancies and need to contact parents. 

With Slim Cell Wireless we free up your tight budget.  All the while we loosen up the countries recession and stimulate the economy with more purchasing power. With money saved with Slim Cell Wireless, you have extra money in your pocket to buy  things you have wanted to, but were unable to do.

 After a small ONE TIME fee of just $70.00, we at Slim Cell Wireless not only bring you free unlimited talk, text, and free high speed internet, we give you free Netflix movies and T.V entertainment.

Our advertising dept. will see to it that you hear only the ads that interest you on your phone. Now you can gain these products through our patented discount methods. Every day you will be able to go to our website and check which gift has your cell number attached. There will be instructions for redeemimg your gift certificate. That gift will be for one of the ads that you heard on your cell phone. With this gift certificate program you can say we are paying you instead of you paying us for using your own phone. The more products you redeem or trade with other people for their certificate, the more products are manufactured. This creates more jobs, which in turn helps our economy.  Every body wins.

STOP...HOLD ON...WAIT ONE MINUTE...THAT'S NOT ALL...Boy have I got a deal for you.

I am here to introduce to you a revolutionary new free cell phone service. SLIM CELL WIRELESS...Slim Cell wireless is the only cell phone service where you pay a one time registration fee. This fee includes  talk, text and 4g high speed internet service.  Absolutely no hidden charges; NO minutes to purchase; NO monthly bill to pay, and NO shut-offs EVER...Just plain FREE.

Not only is there never a phone bill, you get FREE premium Netflix movies and T.V. You watch all of your favorite movies and T.V. shows at NO cost to you EVER.  It's included with the SLIM CELL WIRELESS service.

 

In order to get slim cell wireless up and running world wide, we need you to help us to help you. For a small donation of just $10.00, your registration will be free. And for our appreciation of your donation  Netflix and T.V. will be included in your registration.  We are all in this world together. You help us to save you approx. $70.00 per month or more from cell phone bills you no longer have to pay, plus $12.00 per month for netflix. That comes to an average of $972.00 per year in savings for the average household. 

Never again will we have to worry about how we are going to pay our cell phone bill.  It is already paid.  We now have extra money to do things we couldn't do before. This is a BIG plus for our Seniors. They can now keep in touch with family and friends, and get help if they need it. NO MORE CELL PHONE BILLS. 

With Slim cell wireless,  besides keeping in touch with family and friends, we will always be able to call 911 in case of an emergency, check on our kids when they are out late, and, don't forget, watch the latest shows and movies.  ALL THIS FOR FREE.

With Slim Cell Wireless; we are in this world together.  This will be one of the best decisions you will ever make. Come and join the world for CELL PHONE FREEDOM.

With a little help from a lot of people, together we can make this happen. 
Thank You from Slim Cell Wireless.

All inquiries send email to: Info@SLimcellwireless.com

P. S. When you donate please leave your name and cell phone number so that we can register your phone for free.

 

Patent work done by BROWN and MICHAELS, P.C. 118 North Tioga st suite 400 Itica NY 14850.

Registered Patent Attorney.

We at Slim Cell Wireless realize the importance of maintaining communication with the rest of the family and the rest of the world. Kids constantly have emergancies and need to contact parents. 
With Slim Cell Wireless we free up your tight budget.  All the while we loosen up the countries recession and stimulate the economy with more purchasing power. With money saved with Slim Cell Wireless, you have extra money in your pocket to buy  things you have wanted to, but were unable to do.
 After a small ONE TIME fee of just $70.00, we at Slim Cell Wireless not only bring you free unlimited talk, text, and free high speed internet, we give you free Netflix movies and T.V entertainment.
Our advertising dept. will see to it that you hear only the ads that interest you on your phone. Now you can gain these products through our patented discount methods. Every day you will be able to go to our website and check which gift has your cell number attached. There will be instructions for redeemimg your gift certificate. That gift will be for one of the ads that you heard on your cell phone. With this gift certificate program you can say we are paying you instead of you paying us for using your own phone. The more products you redeem or trade with other people for their certificate, the more products are manufactured. This creates more jobs, which in turn helps our economy.  Every body wins.
STOP...HOLD ON...WAIT ONE MINUTE...THAT'S NOT ALL...Boy have I got a deal for you.
I am here to introduce to you a revolutionary new free cell phone service. SLIM CELL WIRELESS...Slim Cell wireless is the only cell phone service where you pay a one time registration fee. This fee includes  talk, text and 4g high speed internet service.  Absolutely no hidden charges; NO minutes to purchase; NO monthly bill to pay, and NO shut-offs EVER...Just plain FREE.
Not only is there never a phone bill, you get FREE premium Netflix movies and T.V. You watch all of your favorite movies and T.V. shows at NO cost to you EVER.  It's included with the SLIM CELL WIRELESS service.
 
In order to get slim cell wireless up and running world wide, we need you to help us to help you. For a small donation of just $10.00, your registration will be free. And for our appreciation of your donation  Netflix and T.V. will be included in your registration.  We are all in this world together. You help us to save you approx. $70.00 per month or more from cell phone bills you no longer have to pay, plus $12.00 per month for netflix. That comes to an average of $972.00 per year in savings for the average household. 
Never again will we have to worry about how we are going to pay our cell phone bill.  It is already paid.  We now have extra money to do things we couldn't do before. This is a BIG plus for our Seniors. They can now keep in touch with family and friends, and get help if they need it. NO MORE CELL PHONE BILLS. 
With Slim cell wireless,  besides keeping in touch with family and friends, we will always be able to call 911 in case of an emergency, check on our kids when they are out late, and, don't forget, watch the latest shows and movies.  ALL THIS FOR FREE.
With Slim Cell Wireless; we are in this world together.  This will be one of the best decisions you will ever make. Come and join the world for CELL PHONE FREEDOM.
With a little help from a lot of people, together we can make this happen. Thank You from Slim Cell Wireless.
All inquiries send email to: Info@SLimcellwireless.com
P. S. When you donate please leave your name and cell phone number so that we can register your phone for free.
 
Patent work done by BROWN and MICHAELS, P.C. 118 North Tioga st suite 400 Itica NY 14850.
Registered Patent Attorney.

story:
Imagine if your Apple Watch could be a standalone cellphone. 

The Reserve Strap LTE is a special Apple Watch strap that keeps you always connected to the world even when you leave your iPhone behind.  Our strap produces a low strength WiFi Hotspot that your Apple Watch can use to send messages, make calls, and even access your music.

Our first Apple Watch accessory was an Apple Watch band that let's wearers go up to a week without charging their Apple Watch.  We recently started shipping this product and are thrilled to begin building the Reserve Strap LTE. 

  • We believe the Reserve Strap LTE could change the lives of millions of Apple Watch wearers by letting them leave their cell phone at home and still be fully connected to the world. 
  • We are about to begin shipping the Reserve Strap Battery Band to select of pre-order customers.  Our experience creating this earlier Apple Watch smart band will be relevant to the creation of the Reserve Strap LTE. 

Next time your are on a jog or away from your cell phone, think about the possibilities if your Apple Watch could always be connected to the web. 

What We Need & What You Get

We already have a rockstar team consisting of a mechanical engineer, an electrical engineer, and an industrial designer. We are ready to kick this project off! 

  • We recently closed an angel round of financing for the Reserve Strap Battery Band and estimate we need approximately $300,000 to complete and ship the Reserve Strap LTE. 
  • Anyone who contributes will receive FREE Reserve Strap LTE service for at least 3 months. Afterward it will cost $15 a month.  Please who contribute higher amounts will receive a fully functional Reserve Strap LTE.
  • All funds will be directed towards either R&D, machine tooling, part purchasing, and team salaries. 

The Impact

Our startup is on a mission to bring biology & technology together. We view the Apple Watch as an amazing 'stepping stone' towards people eventually having computers embedded in their body. 

  • The Reserve Strap LTE will enable a slew of other smart watch accessories
  • Our first product the Reserve Strap Battery Band demonstrated that a smart Apple Watch bands let people realize more of their potential 
  • We can't wait to see the Reserve Strap LTE on your wrist. 

Risks & Challenges

We have done hardware products before. We understand and appreciate the challenges.  Our rock solid team as a proven track record of shipping wearable hardware products. 

  • Established relationships with world class manufacturers
  • Experience creating and shipping the Reserve Strap Battery Band
  • We raised an angel round for our first band and still have significant funds we can utilize for this product

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love to hear your ideas for scenarios where the Reserve Strap LTE could excel. We have heard from everyone from first responders, to world travelers, to outdoor enthusiasts. 

  • Feel free to repost our video and images of the Reserve Strap LTE
  • Simply click the share button for this campaign

Thanks for making the Reserve Strap LTE a reality!
