The specifications for THEC64 ™ are not fixed at this point in time - we will be engaging with the community and customers over the coming months to deliver the best product we can! We want to hear from you guys what you want us to add!
 
At the core of THEC64 ™ is a low cost, high power ARM Cortex SoC, which provides all the modern interfaces demanded by today’s consumers. This has clear advantages for the consumer. Creating a software/hardware hybrid machine allows THEC64 ™ to be both affordable and flexible, and delivers a product that can expand to meet users future needs. A pure hardware implementation, on the other hand, fixes the specification at design time, and we feel that this is too limiting a solution and a substantial risk. Gate arrays are too costly to give an economic solution. Specifications that are fixed are:

Accurate recreation of the classic Commodore 64.
HDMI video and audio output.
We are considering composite video in addition to HDMI, for use on classic televisions.
Multiple SIDs for stereo sound (6581 or 8580)
New high-capacity (512MB+) writable cartridge support, with an adapter interface available later to provide classic cartridge compatibility.
Support for current storage media (for example SD cards), with emulation of the 1541.
Multiple joystick support for multi-player games.
Support for many of the popular emulator game file formats.
Firmware upgradable to support additional features and machines in the future (DTV64 features, etc.)
Hopefully the possibility to connect original peripherals, or via adaptors.

THEC64 ™ has the same programmability as the original C64, so you can write your own software in BASIC or 6502 assembly (given a suitable assembler). You can therefore re-live the experience of learning to code on such a classic machine, but with the advantage of being able to save your programs onto modern storage, such as SD card, for instant retrieval.
 
(Concept Box design for THEC64 ™)  
THEC64 ™ - Current Status  
The core research and development of THEC64 ™ consoles is complete, and we have working prototypes ongoing, concept case models, and software waiting to go into production as soon as practical. Production and shipping of the first THEC64 ™ consoles for the campaign backers where planned for early December 2016 (but now revised to Spring 2018), Given the chance, and with encouragement from all our supporters, we will reach our funding goal quickly and perhaps we be able to improve on this delivery date potentially. Sadly due to not making our hoped for target time lines have moved but it is coming!
 
Inspiration for THEC64 ™ computer and consoles
THEC64 ™ is the culmination of many years of dedication, and perseverance by our team, who individually and collectively have worked to create something truly special.  We hope that our project resonates with those who grew up with and were inspired by the global phenomena which was the Commodore 64 ™. We hope that both old and new users of the original computer will want to rekindle their passion and will once again be inspired by this new incarnation of that legendary machine. The 64 is dead, Long Live THEC64 ™!
 

 

(photos shows size differences between THEC64™ concepts and an original C64™) 
 
 
The features of THEC64 ™ Computer and Consoles
THEC64 ™ range of computers and console is very simple to operate. It will come preloaded with a range of classic and all new games, but more importantly will allow you to add as many games to it as you want! THEC64 ™ is a Commodore 64 ™ but it’s also so much more!!
 
(Concept Render of original proposed handheld prior to THE64 Mini ) 
 
About the team behind THEC64 ™
Darren Melbourne – Has been in the games industry for over thirty years. During his career in the games industry Darren has created games for almost every major platform of note since the early 1980’s but has always retained a passion for eight bit gaming, especially for the Commodore ™ range of machines. Darren was also one of the key people behind the C64DTV ™ console, striving to constantly breathe new life into the classic Commodore 64 ™.  Darren is leading an experienced and passionate team to bring this project to completion, continuing the legacy of the greatest home computer all of time!
Paul Andrews – Co-Creator of several games based consoles, his prior games company was also behind many PC/mobile based retro games, and also behind the Nintendo Wii C64 games. Paul has extensive experience in digital content publishing and management over many formats, as well as years of selling products to/via retailers.
Chris Smith – Co-creator of several games based consoles, Chris’s code powers much of what we do! He also just so happens to have written the world’s best guide book on how to design and create your own microcomputer!
 
 
(Initial THE 64 ™ joystick concept) 
 
 
 
 
The manufacture of THEC64 ™ range of computer and console
We are exploring various manufacturing and distribution options to ensure global deliveries directly to backers. We have set the currency of this campaign in USA Dollars, but THEC64 ™ is truly a globally loved computer, and we are aiming to set up region specific delivery and distribution options for our backers.
Following our initial production run for those of you who choose one of the various THEC64 ™  computer and console perks in this campaign, we hope to launch to retail after fulfilling backers THEC64 ™ computers and console. Everyone who has pledged in this campaign will receive updates over the coming months, telling them about our progress through the various stages of design, and manufacture through to final delivery to you all. Your support and funding will help us to make the launch of  THEC64 ™ range of consoles a reality. By backing this campaign you will become one of the first people in the world to own a THEC64 ™ computer or console!
 
The risks and challenges of creating THEC64 ™ computer and console
The team behind THEC64 ™ have previously created and brought to market dozens of games and also gaming consoles. From the C64DTV ™ to other computer and handheld consoles, From the C64 ™ games on the Nintendo Wii ™ system to AAA next generation games. We have previously delivered these to both retail buyers and Indiegogo backers.
We have gained all the appropriate Intellectual Property licenses for this project from Cloanto, the owners of the ROMS and BIOS of the Commodore 64 ™.
 
Frequently Asked Questions.
How can I get in touch with THEC64 ™ team?
If you want to get it touch with THEC64 ™ team for anything to do with the campaign, or if you just fancy a chat then fire an email over to us via www.the64.computer or reach out to us on our social channels. We will be happy to help.
Why have you partnered with Indiegogo to raise funds?
Partnering with Indiegogo allows us to kick start our initial production and get THEC64 ™ to you the fans quicker than traditional methods.  As an international platform, the Indiegogo web site can also get us exposure to supporters across Europe, the U.S, and the rest of the world which is important to us.
Why is there a delay from backing the project to delivery?
We are an experienced team but a fairly small new company which does not have limitless access to finance to build a supply of stock.  By supporting us through our campaign, you will help pay for our first full production run which we will ship to you as soon they’re ready on a first come, first served basis.
When will THEC64 ™ be delivered?
Deliveries for the computer version we hoped would begin from December 2016, but in fact backers will now get their initial mini console in Spring 2018.
Does THEC64 ™ come with a warranty?
Of course!  Every THEC64 ™ will come with an appropriate 1 year warranty from any manufacturing faults or defects.
Where are you shipping to?
The territories we are shipping to are listed within the perks & different shipping rates will apply depending on where you are in the world. But in general we hope to ship THEC64 ™ globally.
I would like to change my perk shipping address. What should I do? 
(The answer can be found here).
What will happen after the campaign?
We go into full retail production across the globe of the mini and later the full sized version in spring 2018.
Why are the payments on Indiegogo being taken in US Dollars when you’re a British company?
We are British company but the Commodore 64 ™ and therefore hopefully THEC64 ™ will have a very strong following across the world.  USD tends to be a familiar currency - we hope you don’t mind!
I’m having trouble making a payment for my perk on Indiegogo. Who should I reach out to?
We’re sorry to hear that you are having problems! If you’re having trouble making a payment, please reach out to Indiegogo’s Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. One of their payments specialists should be able to assist you within 24 hours.
Can I get a refund of my perk? 
Yes, if you change your mind about backing THEC64 ™ during the campaign. According to Indiegogo’s refund policy, all backers can get a refund directly through them until the campaign ends. Instructions can be found here.
 
 
 
 
Disclaimer – Retro Games Ltd, THEC64(tm) are in no way associated with Commodore Holdings B.V.  THEC64(tm) have not been prepared, approved, or licensed by Commodore Holdings B.V in any way and are not licensed to use the Commodore(R) name or 'Chicken Head' logo.  The Commodore Roms, BIOS and THEC64(tm) form factor are officially licensed from Cloanto https://cloanto.com/​  The music featured within the video for this crowd fund campaign is owned and composed by Rob Hubbard and is used with kind permission for illustrative purposes only.  The music is used with the permission of the author and High Technology Publishing Ltd http://www.megafounder.com/commodore-64​
Details of THEC64 computers and consoles may vary in the final delivered models.
 
The 64 IS DEAD – LONG LIVE THEC64!

story:
About us

BB Energy group is a company formed by a group of young people who look for the improvement of people’s life quality. We want to make people's daily life easier through technology and renewable sources.

Our most popular product is the solar deck chair, which allows people who use it to recharge their mobile devices (smartphone, tablet, ebook…) while they are sunbathing.

It all started last summer when we were sunbathing on the beach and using our mobile phones; listening to music and searching for some information on the internet. Soon our battery ran out and we were offline for the rest of the day. What would have happened if we had an emergency? At that moment, this idea hit us. Why not invent deck chairs that allow you to enjoy your devices without worrying about the battery?

The company, which was recently created, has worked with important customers such as Barcelona’s City Hall, which has made our chairs available to citizens and tourists in a public square of the city (Pl./Joan Antoni Coderch, Glòries) and it seems there has been a great response from users.

What do we solve?

Currently some mobile devices have numerous applications that quickly drain the battery. When you are at home, charging your battery to 100% is easily done, since you only have to look for an outlet to charge your device. The problem occurs when you don't have access to an outlet. For leisure or for emergencies, we believe that it is important that this doesn't happen.

What do we propose?

The solar deck chair charges your electronic devices (smartphone, tablet, ebook…) while you are sunbathing!

Our philosophy

BB Energy Group is born with the unique purpose of making this world better. Through our products, we seek the improvement of people's life quality, based on our maximum respect to this world and it's resources. 

This purpose concerns both natural and social environment. One of our main objectives is giving jobs to people in a long time unemployment situation, especially those who are more than 45 years old with familiar responsibilities, one of the social groups that is suffering crisis the most.

The value of the company is that we promote dignified working conditions in order to look after our employees.

Furthermore, when the company gets a stable minimum of benefits, we will dedicate a part of these to social actions.

To sum up, we want to take care of our environment and people who form it.

Our market

This product is patented in Spain and is in the process of patenting in Europe, United States and several Caribbean and Asian islands. The product is primarily intended for companies (especially in tourism sector: hotels, cruises...) and individuals who want to have our chairs in their gardens. 

There is not any company that manufactures the same product currently.

We offer the chance of buying the complete kit (deck chair + solar kit) for an good price. In the case that the the customer already has a deck chair, our company offers the chance of obtaining just the solar kit (solar cell + fastening bars), which can be integrated to any deck chair.

*This product can be send to all countries of the world.

Our economic goal

Basically we need about 50,000$ which we will allocate to export and sell to interested companies who have contacted us around the world, licenses and certificates, new contracts of staff and finally to the purchase and transport large volume of material. In addition, part of the investment will be destinated to rent our own working building.

We have worked with Barcelona's City Hall by the moment. In fact, it was our first customer, demanding 4 solar deck chairs for a public square in the city as a test mode. As it seems is successful, they might demand for more. In addition, we are in contact with several other customers from national and international level to sell more solar deck chairs.

What can you do

You can donate from 1$ to 1000$ to our campaing.

If it is imposible for whatever reason, we also will appreciate to share and spread it!

Thank you!

story:
How often do you and your friends want to go out but spend more time wondering where to go rather than actually having fun? No more resorting to the same places or having to rely on outdated Yelp reviews that are months or even years old!

Pop’n Or Not? gives you real-time info on all the places around you! Imagine finding a happy hour, party, or any social event that fits your vibe at that exact moment! Know what’s happening, who’s there, and the best times to head out just by opening up an app!

Pop’n Or Not? is on the verge of development, but to get the app to your city we need your help, and we have plenty to offer you in return!

  • All contributions will go directly to development costs and an expanded market roll out.

  • Contributions help spread the word about Pop’n Or Not? so we know which cities will be serviced first . Get your city to be the first on Pop’n Or Not? before we go nationwide!

  • Be part of the development process

  • Receive VIP treatment at your city’s launch party!

                                                       

Can’t contribute monetarily? Your help spreading the word about Pop’n Or Not? is just as important!

You can do this by:

  • Using Indiegogo’s great tools to share our campaign

  • Following our social media accounts

  • Telling your friends about us the next time you’re planning your night out!

  • Continue checking and sharing our campaign updates

  • Tag #popnornot whenever you mention us online.  We’ll be checking out your photos and comments to share your voice

Our team looks forward to joining you at your city’s launch party! We thank you in advance for your contributions, and we will make sure you receive an app that changes your social life and ensures every night out exceeds your expectations.

story:
Job Site | Camp Site | Survival Kit



The USBeast™ slips onto your Cordless tool batteries to become the most powerful and versatile portable USB charger in the world.
U.S. Patent Pending

Example: A fully charged 4AH lithium battery can charge the latest iPhone or Galaxy S, more than 6 TIMES!  Or provide your phone with over 150 hours of talk time, 75 hours of internet use, or 100 days in standby mode!

Double or Triple how long you can work on your laptop without an outlet.
(laptops that charge via USB)

Where would I use it?

On the Job site:


Construction workers and other technicians frequently find themselves in situations where there are no convenient outlets to charge their devices, which are being drained by dead-zones and increased usage.

At the camp site:

Cordless tools and accessories are becoming a staple of the modern camping trip. Tool batteries are inflating mattresses, lighting the camp site, and now with the USBeast, they will charge your mobile devices as well. Even without a cell signal, you will still want your phone's camera and other features to be working.

In your Emergency kit:

A Lithium battery will stay charged for at least 1 year. When the power goes out, reach for the USBeast™ and one of your tool batteries. You will be able to keep your phone in use for several days or keep it in standby mode for several weeks.

But wont the internet and cell service be down anyway?

Not necessarily ---- During a typical power outage, phones usually continue to work.

During large scale power outages, there have been many instances when the power grid has been down for awhile, yet other infrastructure continues to work.  After Hurricanes Katrina and Sandy, mobile data providers built much larger fleets of C.O.W.s (Cell on Wheels) to roll into a disaster area and provide service (should that be "herds" instead of "fleets"?).

How fast will the USBeast™ charge your devices?

* Some devices are limited closer to 1 amp to prevent damage to their batteries.


How do I use it?

Simply place onto one of your cordless tool batteries. A blue light indicates that the unit is powered on and ready to charge your USB device. Plug a USB cable into the USBeast™ and into your device, as you would normally.


Why buy a USBeast™ instead of another portable USB charger? 

Wanna talk nerdy?


As the chart shows, the USBeast™ devours the competition in every category.

You can purchase a USBeast™, a cordless tool battery + Charger and STILL get MORE charging power for your money than if you bought a competitor's portable USB charger!

Mobile device immortality™

Battery and cable not included.


Your help at any level brings the USBeast™ one step closer to a toolbox near you.


Ryobi is a trademark of Ryobi Limited. We are not affiliated with Ryobi Limited, Ryobi Power Tools, or One World Technologies, Inc.

"DeWalt" and "XRP" are trademarks of Stanley Black & Decker, Inc.
We are not affiliated with DeWalt, Dewalt Tools,
or Stanley Black & Decker, Inc.

"Craftsman" and "C3" are trademarks of Sears Holdings Corporation.
We are not affiliated with Craftsman, Craftsman Tools,
or Sears Holdings Corporation.

"iGo" and "Power Trip" are trademarks of iGo, Inc.
We are not affiliated with iGo, Inc.

'"Random Order" is a trademark of Technocel. We are not affiliated with Technocel.

iPhone and the apple logo are trademarks of Apple inc. We are not affiliated with Apple inc.

Samsung and "Galaxy S" are trademarks of Samsung. We are not affiliated with Samsung.

story:
The App for Moviegoers

We need to meet Snackdish users where they go. We've heard that loud and clear. And that means a mobile app for when you are out at friends, on the couch all weekend binging your favorite show, or out with friends watching a new movie. 

For moviegoers, I really want to create a new experience.  We want to let users tune-in to a movie, include their friends; and as they watch the movie, tag their favorite moments, quotes, Easter Eggs, or whatever they see and want to share.

This means the mobile app will have a unique feature: Theater Mode.  This will dim the screen, similar to the red light dimming function of other tools for those who work at night like the military, pilots, or even astronomers.

  • I am Kevin Hall, and I first crowdsourced and built the first web version of Snackdish one year ago thanks to passionate people who saw the potential in this idea, and how it could help express themselves, and connect them with their friends.
  • This has been an amazing passion project to bring this to light, and I look forward moving this to the next step, to get the Snackdish app in the hands of more people where they want it, when they want it.

What We Need & What You Get

Our plan:

  • We need to raise $46,000 do develop a mobile IOS app for iPhone/iPad. This includes converting the form factor/user experience from the current web platform and develop Snackdish to the unique capabilities of the Apple platform.
  • We have a great set of PERKS to thank you, to keep you engaged, to get the new Snackdish app in your hands, and to have some fun (like an EXCLUSIVE Movie screening).
  • If we exceed our goal, then we plan to extend the mobile experience to other platforms (like Android) and to include a suite of notifications to help keep friends connected around your shared TV and movie watching.  If we fall short (don't let us fall short), then it's about bridging any gap.  We'll  get there it, but will take a little longer.

Snackdish Mockups in Theater Mode.

The Impact

Snackdish has been completely bootstrapped. NO outside money.  That means we need help from those who believe in the power of crowdsourcing, those who believe in transforming the moviegoing experience, and those who understand the power of the shared experience of movies and TV shows.

Help us and make a difference.


Challenges and Controversy

The biggest risk that we face is that some people will not like the idea that people can tune-in to movies and use Snackdish in theaters.  This will be a controversial idea those.   As it is, movies theaters have had an almost 100 year head start in defining and controlling the experience.  That’s a lot of cultural momentum to overcome.   But enforcing this status quo, actually prevents innovation, and new tools that might let moviegoers have new experiences. 

At Snackdish we are trying to break through this barrier.  And when the Snackdish app is in your hands, you will be in control and without limits; and you will have the first exclusive opportunity to use your phone without bothering those around you.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute you can still help Snackdish and stay engaged by following Snackdish on Twitter, and Facebook.  And hey, join the revolution and start using Snackdish now at www.snackdish.com when you watch your favorite shows and movies; and start connecting with your friends.

  • You can share this campaign with your friends using these the Indiegogo share tools!

Ant that's all there is to it!


Read more about Snackdish:

This includes converting the form factor/user experience from the current web platform and develop Snackdish to the unique capabilities of the Apple platform.  We have a great set of PERKS to thank you, to keep you engaged, to get the new Snackdish app in your hands, and to have some fun (like an EXCLUSIVE Movie screening). If we exceed our goal, then we plan to extend the mobile experience to other platforms (like Android) and to include a suite of notifications to help keep friends connected around your shared TV and movie watching.  If we fall short (don't let us fall short), then it's about bridging any gap.  We'll  get there it, but will take a little longer.
Snackdish Mockups in Theater Mode.    The Impact Snackdish has been completely bootstrapped. NO outside money.  That means we need help from those who believe in the power of crowdsourcing, those who believe in transforming the moviegoing experience, and those who understand the power of the shared experience of movies and TV shows.Help us and make a difference. Challenges and ControversyThe biggest risk that we face is that some people will not like the idea that people can tune-in to movies and use Snackdish in theaters.  This will be a controversial idea those.   As it is, movies theaters have had an almost 100 year
head start in defining and controlling the experience.  That’s a lot of cultural momentum to overcome.   But
enforcing this status quo, actually prevents innovation, and new
tools that might let moviegoers have new experiences.  
At Snackdish we are trying to break through this barrier.  And when the Snackdish app is in your hands, you will be in
control and without limits; and you will have the first exclusive opportunity
to use your phone without bothering those around you.
    Other Ways You Can Help 

If you cannot contribute you can still help Snackdish and stay engaged by following Snackdish on Twitter, and Facebook.  And hey, join the revolution and start using Snackdish now at www.snackdish.com when you watch your favorite shows and movies; and start connecting with your friends.
You can share this campaign with your friends using these the Indiegogo share tools!

Ant that's all there is to it!

Read more about Snackdish:

story:
What is Baka Keyboard?

Baka Keyboard is a mechanical keyboard with only two keys.

This is maybe both a useless project and a useful project.

The main idea of Bake Keyboard is : Doing things QUICKLY.

What can it do for you?

Baka Keyboard can be used as OSU! supplement, i wanna supplement, 0/1 keyboard (used for coding?), or for quickly waking up or sleeping your OS, quickly adjusting screen brightness, or used with Photoshop / After Effects , even an escape key for your new RMBP and etc.

Programming port is provided and controlling software is open source, updated and maintained. 

Technical Details

We provide Cherry Blue (Recommended) / Red / Black / Green / White Switches for your Baka Keyboard.

For main controller, ATmega32U4 and ATtiny13(in future) are available.

3D printed PLA Black and PLA White case. For keycap ABS White and PBT Red are provided. (Recommended: Black and White / White and Red)

Baka Keyboard is all-key programmable.

Others

  • We don't want waste your money on taking beautiful photos or making amazing videos.
  • Even if we do not reach the goal amount, you will receive a Baka Keyboard as well.

story:
How It Works

  • This patent pending smartphone retention system features a super-strong magnetic field which keeps your phone securely attached to your arm at all times. 
  • The recess of the mount prevents the Z-Case from sliding off your arm during vigorous activities, but also allows for remarkably easy phone access. 
  • It is appropriate for running, biking, weight lifting, HIIT, CrossFit and much more!


Stretch Goals 

By helping us hit our stretch goals, you’ll be helping us bring the Cotton Candy Pink and Venetian Red Z-Cases to life! If we hit our goals you’ll be able to choose from one of the available color options when this campaign concludes.

So please share this campaign with your friends and followers on social media to help make this a success!  

Here's the link: www.selfiez.me/fund



Selfies Redefined

One of the best things about owning a magnetic Z-Case is the ability to mount your phone to any metallic surface. Whether you're at the gym, a ball game, a park, at the driving range or anywhere else...you'll find that the Z-Case gives you limitless possibilities for creating amazing selfies! It will also give you the ability to get group photos and videos that would have been impossible to get in the past. The Z-Case ensures that no one is left holding the phone and out of the picture or video. 

Below are some creative moments captured by REAL USERS of our magnetic Z-Case Prototypes: (For hundreds of other examples follow us on instagram - @selfie_z)


Take Group Selfies At The Ballpark
Posted by @jaedaleigh - View Full Video on Instagram

Share Workout Ideas at the Gym
Posted by @lina_fit - View Full Video on Instagram

Record Your Swing at the Range
Posted by @selfiezceo - View Full Video on Instagram
Share Your Progress/Gainz
Posted by @caseysamsel_bikini - View Full Video on Instagram
Monitor Your Form
Posted by @samhodous - View Full Video on Instagram




Why We Need Your Help

By contributing to this campaign you will be helping us bring the Samsung S6 and iPhone 6-Plus models to market. Tooling and product development are very expensive and require a lot of hard work and diligence. 

Funds from this campaign will go towards:

  • Z-Case and Z-Band Injection Molds
  • Reward Fulfillment (Inventory and Shipping)
  • Product Packaging
  • Freight From Supplier
  • Kickstarter and Payment Processor Fees
  • Taxes (Uncle Sam counts all contributions as income)


Risks and Challenges

For any startup company there are inherent risks and challenges associated with product development and fulfillment. This is why we have done our homework, received samples from Apple Certified suppliers and made sure our products work 100% before launching this Kickstarter campaign. 

The iPhone 6/6S model of the Z-Case and Z-Band is nearing the end of the production cycle. So we will be fulfilling orders as soon as this campaign comes to a close. Because of this, we have a leg up on most other crowdfunding campaigns.

We have currently have over 300 prototype testers using and loving our products. We have used their feedback to help produce a groundbreaking phone management system that we're sure you'll love as well.

We are prepared as best we can be and will do everything in our power to deliver quality products on or ahead of schedule. 

If we run into any problems, we'll be sure to let you know and present an open and honest plan of action.

story:
Guten Tag and welcome!

Hi, I'm Sanorah aka The Struggling Linguist. I'm an avid language learner and enthusiast with the goal of becoming a true polyglot. That is to say a speaker of many languages. Over the past years of studying over a dozen languages, I've come to find the one recurring flaw no matter the language being studied; the lack of meaningful social interactions. It's my problem and I'm pretty sure it's a large part of your fluency issues as well.

I want to help you reach your fluency goals!

I believe the fastest way to fluency is by using the language. The more we are immersed in meaningful usage, the faster our journey to fluency will be. I have thus come up with a platform that I believe will help people the world over discover and connect to the language community at large whenever and wherever they like. It's the dream app for the traveling polyglot. Here's how I want to help you solve your current language learning problems:

  • Have one platform to search and discover all things language related
  • Connect with language exchange partners who share interests outside of language
  • Promote your events/services to a relevant crowd

I believe in language acquisition and by having a convenient means of staying immersed in one's own backyard through meaningful real life interactions, fluency will become more than just a pipe dream.

What is The Braun Pages & How Does It Work

Think of The Braun Pages as you would the Yellow Pages (a telephone directory) but cooler and more relevant to you. Whether you’re searching for a person or service, it’s all there in one convenient location. The Braun Pages is a directory-based marketing app strictly reserved for the language community.

Post can be made in various categories such as :

  • Games (promote & market your language games)
  • Travel & Leisure (take a trip with a focus on language)
  • Academia (find schools & tutors)
  • Translations (find services for your personal or business needs)
  • Language Partners (connect with people in your local community)
  • Events & Gatherings (always be in the know of what's happening)
  • Mommy & Me (grow your child/youth based language service, immerse your little ones)

By using the same technology present in dating and location apps, The Braun Pages will keep you connected to others near you. Moving? Traveling? No problem, just switch the city and now you know what's happening so you can stay social whenever and wherever you want. 

What We Need & What You Get

It goes without saying that your financial contributions will not only show your interest in the platform but will be the fuel needed to power the project in a professional manner. The Braun Pages works best with a large user database. The more people & services sign up, the more useful it will be.

  • An initial funding of $50K will help bring the project to fruition with the help and guidance of professionals.
  • Your contributions could get a you some awesome prizes such as tickets to upcoming language events
  • Should the full amount not be raised, funds will be used to move the project forward as best as can be done, more research and marketing.

The Impact : Advantages over other platforms

Unlike a platform like Meetup where only the organizer pays an exorbitant fee twice a year, everyone here pays the same low yearly fee to post their events and language partner exchange whether big or small. No need to join several different groups.

The advantage that it holds over Facebook & Instagram, don't get lost in the medley of this and that. Your post will show up on the suggested date. Members can choose a date and location (either on or offline) and be shown all relevant posts for that day. Posts are displayed by earliest upcoming events as well as nearest to you for offline events. Again, no need to join endless groups or endless scrolling.

  • The Braun Pages will give you the convenience of searching for exactly what you want.
  • Don't get lost in a potpourri of irrelevant posts.
  • Post/search events in any city as you move/travel.
  • Discover events, games, people and so much more!

Are you a business?! Get discovered by the customers you're looking for quickly, easily and effectively.

  • Promote your services & events
  • Reach the large relevant audience you're after
  • Grow your sales potential (mass messaging, banner promotions, and more)

 

 

Risks & Challenges

As with anything in life, you can't fail if you don't try and the for the best chances at success be prepared. There are no plans to fail but all efforts are being made to be prepared in order to produce and present a product that is worth using.

  • Your support and contributions will ensure the best outcome by having skilled and dedicated people working to keep you connected.
  • Growing a database from scratch is no easy task. By working together to share The Braun Pages we can have the best outcome possible.

The Team

The project will be prepared and presented by BoutSourcing ( https://boutsourcing.com/ ) They are passionate developers and techies eager to bring this unique project to life.

The Timeline

8000K : At this level development gets started with a sprint phase. The team will begin the development of the app. ( If you are a Decision Maker, your input starts here to the end.) This step is expected to take 4-5 weeks.

18000K : At this price point all efforts to produce a working prototype testing should be around the corner. It will also allow a boost to the marketing and promotion of the app. (This step is expected to take 4-6 weeks.)

30000K : At this level bonus special features can begin to be added. More marketing can be done and a proper beta product should be available. ( This step is expected to take 4-5 weeks)

50000K : At this point you will have a functional beta app. Proper marketing will have been put in place and can continue to help the growth of the app.

65000K : Goal reached! Should we be so lucky to reach our goal with your support, you will have a fully functioning app ready for use complete with chat options, powerful search optimization and more.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Perhaps it's not possible for you to contribute financially and that's understandable. But there are ways you can help support the cause:

  • Like, follow and share this campaign with your friends and family
  • Sign up to be a beta tester
  • Email us about people/services in your area that cater to the language community. The larger the database of users, the better the service becomes

And that's all there is to it.

18000K : At this price point all efforts to produce a working prototype testing should be around the corner. It will also allow a boost to the marketing and promotion of the app. (This step is expected to take 4-6 weeks.)
30000K : At this level bonus special features can begin to be added. More marketing can be done and a proper beta product should be available. ( This step is expected to take 4-5 weeks)
50000K : At this point you will have a functional beta app. Proper marketing will have been put in place and can continue to help the growth of the app.

story:
CLASSIC SOLID COLOR SET

We are releasing an amazing lineup of solid colors. However, L!NK Lanyards is fully customizable, even down to the embroidered patch! We hope to work with Brands, Not-For-Profits, and Merchants to make more exclusive "Limited Editions." We hope you will support us through this campaign and help make that happen!

HANDS-FREE

With the L!NK Lanyard, your phone will always be with you, safely and securely. No more digging in your backpack, purse, or pocket. L!NK offers a hands-free way to enjoy even an active lifestyle, while staying connected!

 

WORKS WITH ANY PHONE

Simply secure the L!NK phone base to any phone or hard case. We recommend extra cure time for the 3M VHB tape on silicone-based, or water-resistant cases.

 

QUICK RELEASE

By pulling straight down, L!NK’s patented design allows for a quick disconnect when needed. No more cumbersome pouches to pull out or dig through.

 

BUILDING ON PERFECTION

Millions of people wear lanyards every day for ID and credential purposes. We built on this tried and true method, and have introduced an innovative, versatile way to carry both your phone and ID/credentials in one complete system.

 

NEVER MISS CAPTURING THE MOMENT

Life comes at you fast. By having your phone in front of you at all times, L!NK eliminates the need to dig in your pocket and miss that moment we all wish to capture.

 

ADDED BONUS

L!NK’s magnetic design has created a convenient way to mount your phone. Using the phone base, attach your phone to the refrigerator while at home to listen to music or look up your favorite recipe. At work, attach your phone to the file cabinet and never misplace it again, during the workday.

 

 

WHY SHOULD I BACK YOU?

As of right now we have completed our final prototype, its packaging, and overall design over the last year. We already have available inventory stock of Version 2.0 on hand, but its only a few thousand units. We are asking for your help to not only raise capital for future inventory and future advertising costs, but also to share our product online to help us gain exposure for this amazing phone accessory! We are also doing this campaign to understand our customer's purchasing preferences, since Version 2.0 Lanyards now has 5 new solid color options.

 

WHEN WE START SHIPPING

We plan to start shipping our first units December 2019. We will be sure to update our backers on our progress and their expected delivery dates. We currently have a few thousand inventory on-hand, but we hope this campaign will assist us with buying more inventory!

We are NOT able to GUARANTEE if our product will be delivered to every single backer by Christmas 2019, but we certainly will try!

*The actual ship dates may vary.*
*We will make sure you are notified when your product ships!*

 

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

  • Packaging (Length x Width x Height): 7 x 4 x 3 inches
  • Package Weight: 5.25 ounces
  • Main Lanyard Material: Polyester
  • Patch Material: Twill
  • Phone Base – 1.5 x 1.5 x 0.25 inches
  • Lanyard Base – 1 x 1 x 0.125 inches
  • Lanyard Strap – 33.5 inches around
  • New L!NK Lanyards compatible with ALL V. 2.0 bases.

 

WARRANTY

At L!NK Lanyards, it is our first policy to implement first class customer satisfaction. We offer a 30 (Thirty) Day warranty on all L!NK Lanyard products purchased from L!NK Lanyards or an authorized reseller. At our discretion, we will repair or replace your product with any defect in manufacturing workmanship (but NOT due to customer damage, abuse, or misuse). The customer is responsible for shipping the defective product to us. Our warranty does not include connected devices, incidental damage, and/or consequential damage of any kind.

 

SHIPPING INFORMATION

VAT and GST not included in perk price and will be determined by country on delivery. Backers are responsible for these costs (VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc) on delivery. Shipping costs vary by country; please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

 

 

PLEASE SUPPORT US!

Thank you to everyone who is supporting our campaign!
Please continue to spread the word about L!NK Lanyards!

story:
We love taking photos on our smartphones to keep memories alive. Introducing 3Lenser, we add 3 most popular lenses on top of a typical lens clip attachment. 

The good thing of lens clip is you can take it to anywhere you go and fit it with any smartphone devices with camera. However, we are not satisfied with the traditional lens clip. 3Lenser is a 3-in-1 universal lens clip that includes the 3 most commonly used lenses to help you improve the content of your photos.

You can apply Wide-Angle Lens, Fisheye Lens, and Macro Lens with an all-in-one universal lens clip. It multiply 3 times of the advantages than a traditional lens clip, it is faster, easier, more efficient when you with 3Lenser.

It is an improvement and evolution of a smartphone lens clip that maximizing the benefits of smartphone photography.

3Lenser allows you to take impressive photos with three High Quality Lenses, including Wide Angle Lens, Fisheye Lens, and Macro Lens.

Wide-Angle Lens:

  • With a Wide-Angle perspective, wide vision
  • Present considerable wide ranges in the photos
  • Widely used when taking group photos

160° Fish Eye Lens:

  • Taking photos with a 160° wide panoramic or hemispherical perspective
  • Stronger effect when you shooting in close to a subject. 
  • Increase the contrast of the objects and background

20X Marco Lens:

  • Effective focus distance 1-2cm
  • Small items Close-up, show the details of the objects

3Lenser is made for any smartphones

3Lenser is designed for any smartphone devices with camera. No matter go raw or with cases. And it can apply to the front and back camera. Super simple to change lens with 1 attachment.

Compatible Brand: All devices with camera

Wide Angle: 0.65X

Fisheye:160 °

Macro:20X

Lens Weight:23.7g

Product Material: Aluminum

 

 

Risk & Challenges


We will try our best to provide in full transparency throughout our process, including to share the biggest challenge of our journey. We've spent a lot of time to research for the right supply chain and manufacturer that believed in our product and could deliver high quality builds and on-time delivery services. 
We are happy to to collaborate with a reliable and experienced manufacturer partner that we have worked with before on the previous version of 3Lenser. Our past experience makes us confident to start shipping in August 2017! 
We know there may be unexpected difficulties can happen. We will put the satisfaction of our backers as our first priority. We’ll update everyone regularly. Thanks for supporting us!

story:
GO to our Website for More Informations: www.effe-app.com

EFFE Make Shopping a Game

Hello, Everyone!
I am Aurora and I am 19 years old
I am a college student pursuing a Marketing Major
I am from Italy, and I moved to the United States two years ago.
I have always loved to invent and create new things, and this app is really important to me because it's a new challenge.
I have had the idea this past summer, and from that moment I have been trying to figure out every day how to make this app a reality. 
Now I am at a point where I have a clear idea of what steps I need to take to realize the app, and this fundraising will allow me to start!

What We Need & Why

This fundraising is to raise 10.000$ to start the developing process. 

With this money, we will be able to meet with an App Development Company to make a business model and a development plan, solve every technical problem and decide every detail of the game.

App 

This app will allow people to find coupons and save money so that even who doesn't have extra money for shopping, can afford to buy clothes they love. 

Moreover, this app will allow even smaller stores to have an efficient platform for hyperlocal marketing.

Finally, users will be able to exchange coupons with their friends, making this app a social platform where they can save money in a fun way. 

How it works

The app is a Location-based Augmented Reality game. 

In fact, the game will take place in the real world. 

After Downloading the EFFE app, you will create an avatar that will follow your location on a virtual map.

While walking around your city, you will find Coupons for Fashion Brands you love.

It’s like playing a treasure hunt, where the playground is your city and the Treasures are Coupons.

(Imagine the game Pokemon Go, but instead of finding Pokemons, players will find Coupons)    

Facts and Statistics

  • The Augmented Reality Market is expected to grow from $ 500 Million in 2016 to $ 5.7 billion in 2021” (Kevin Anderton, Forbes.)
  • 63% of Millennials use Digital Coupons (Valassis.)

PopSocket

story:
The growing agility of life and increasing mobility of the workplace demands quicker adaptation of our daily accessories. The importance of versatility could not be more crucial in today’s workplace gadgets. 

Overcome workplace challenges with readiness, orderliness and calmness.

So was born MagEasy, a hybrid workstation by LHiDS, which combines two of every modern worker’s daily essentials, the ID badge holder (MagEasy Badge) and the desktop organizer (MagBoard Set), into one effective modular kit. So you can shape and shift a work area with ease, and glide from location to location without missing a beat.

Whether you need to quickly scan cards or access small EDC items during transit or in the office, the MagEasy Badge delivers. The MagBoard set keeps your devices and office essentials ready in one place in a customizable, orderly fashion to greatly boost your productivity and creativity.

 

The system declutters your life and clears the way for creativity.

Chaos clutters your mind and affects your mood. The MagEasy Hybrid workstation  includes a magnetic badge holder and an organizing board with a variety of magnetic accessories that work together seamlessly to restore a sense of calm and control. 

Enjoy discovering new ways to use your iPad with the patented magnetic structure of the MagBoard Set. An innovative folding stand combined with strong embedded magnets allows for easy adjustment to of both viewing height and angel of your device. Easily find the perfect iPad position whether you are watching videos, reading, or sketching.

The Hybrid Workstation holds all screens at the perfect height and angle.

Explore the most ergonomic viewing experience with Pholdr, the foldable phone holder. Adjust the angle of your device with the Pholdr stand and the height with Pholdr mini to prompt a healthy posture and reduce stress on your spine, neck, and shoulders. 

 

 

The MagEasy Badge is more of a storage hub that consolidates your daily carry than a pure card holder. It is equipped with embedded magnets that are designed to firmly hold an array of magnetic modules that help you tackle any situation you find yourself in. Keeping what you need accessible without a hitch can be a real-time saver and a helper to start a busy day in a good mood.

Organize your everyday carry into a compact footprint with custom magnetic modules that meet the needs of specific scenarios.

Adapts to your day-to-day needs.

Detachable card holder for convenient contactless payment

Pholdr Mini holds your phone and frees your hands while FaceTiming and video streaming.

Strong magnets firmly hold without demagnetizing your cards.

With strong magnets in every corner, you can detach and reattach all the optional modules in a snap (i.e. Pholdr mini, extra holder, portable mirror, and notepad clipboard). Simply choose from a variety of modules to build your very own customized badge to suit your daily lifestyle.

Wear it around your neck with the included lanyard and the retractable reel.

The MagEasy Badge permits multiple ways of wearing to suit various using scenarios. The lanyard comfortably fits around your neck and is adjustable to any height.

Does your ID card need to be frequently swiped or scanned? The MagEasy Badge offers the perfect solution with its badge reel which can extend to as far as 19 inches (0.5m).

Detach the lanyard and carry it in your pocket or bag.

The pocket friendly size and shape of the MagEasy Badge enables you to use it as a Wallet. Easily remove the lanyard and reel and the slim form factor of the badge allows it to slip right into any pocket, just like a wallet. 

Keep your personal belongings safe and secure with MagEasy Badge.

MagEasy Badge offers you all-round privacy protection on the go.

Uncomfortable with exposing your ID? MagEasy Badge is designed with your privacy in mind. Simply fold the holder to hide your ID, the magnetic design will ensure a secure closure and prevent any accidental or intentional peeping.

Minimum space for maximum storage.

The minimal aesthetic of the MagEasy Badge belies just how many essential small EDC items (cards, cash, coins, etc.) you can place inside instead of letting them all bounce around in your pocket or your bag.

It features a pair of open card slots in both interior and exterior sides of the wallet, so you will always have at least one slot revealed for quick access cards when it is folded. In addition, there is also a clear window slot dedicated to holding your badge. Its capacity and convenience are further enhanced by the extra slim card holder.

MagEasy Badge makes sure you’ll have proper places for at least 4 cards when you get to where you’re going.

Excellent craftsmanship and material stand up to wear and tear like no other ID badge holder.

New environmentally-friendly woven fabric makes up the water-resistant and wear-resistant exterior of the holder. All stress points have been double-stitched and reinforced to avoid frayed edges. Exceptional craftsmanship and premium materials add rigidity to the holder and provide security for your belongings.

 

Unlock more angles, heights, and hence more usages of the MagBoard with the upgraded detachable MagStand.

Adjustable angle and height of MagBoard in portrait orientation with the assistance of the MagStand.

Flexible height in landscape orientation for improved body posture made possible by the MagStand.

The detachable MagStand props the MagBoard up in both portrait and landscape orientations.  Rearrange the board into a more comfortable and healthy viewing position by adjusting its angles and height.

Maximize your workspace with a multifunctional organizing board. Place you badge holder, and other office essentials on the MagBoard to keep them within reach. MagEasy redefines your workspace and contributes to your work efficiency. 

Tailor unique combinations to meet individual organizational styles.

Declutter your desk and neatly arrange your belongings. With limitless setup combinations, unleash your creativity to find what works best for you.

 Feel free to add more packs to your pledge

The brand name LHiDS is an acronym that originates from "Love Hidden in Details". At LHiDS we believe good design is devised by treating every detail with care, and our passion lies in designing projects that optimize your life in clever ways.

 In 2020, through the help of Kickstarter, we launched our first project: MagEasy™ Modular Magnetic Organizing Kit and managed to deliver to 3,000+ backers on time! To our amazement, we were also awarded the Red Dot Design Award for that project.

Since then we have designed and launched many other innovative projects. These products include EasyHouse Wall-Mounted Storage, Pholdr Magnetic Phone Holder, MagEasy Clipboard Series, and a variety of magnetic organizing accessories. Every new addition to the LHiDS lineup helps simplify people’s lives through good design, magnetic magic, and intuitive organizing features.

story:
After years of upsizing, what happens when smartphones try to shrink? Is it possible to put the most important features into a device the size of a pen? We challenged ourselves to create something unique, compact and powerful, something that can help you every day. 

So, after dedicating over a year on the prototype, we present to you, the Zanco S-Pen (Short for Zanco Smart Pen below), a powerful combination of phone, Bluetooth headset, stylus pen, voice recorder, laser pointer, and much more. It is not expected or intended to replace your Smartphone, but in fact, it can be your smartphone’s best buddy!

  •  Hands On Review 

Check Us from Youtube Channel Technical Guruji, Zanco S-Pen is reviewed by  Gaurav Chaudhary , the great and famous technology enthusiast from India. Thanks so much for his awesome work!

 

 
  • A handy multi-feature phone

A pen-sized phone with daily essential functions, such as calling, messaging, camera, mp3, mp4, and more...

 

  • Smartphone’s Best Buddy

Bluetooth enabled and easy-to-use, pair it with your smartphone, when your smartphone rings the S-Pen rings. Perfect for a quick call or text via Bluetooth.


 

  • A Pen-size tiny phone  

ZANCO S-Pen is the ultimate compact backup phone for travel, outdoor activities and emergency situations. Take it with you as a supplement to your primary smartphone. 

 

  • Modern life with less distractions

Most of us spend the day constantly checking email, social media, perhaps the latest news. The truth is, we look at our smartphones way too much! Zanco S-Pen can help break that cycle, letting you concentrate and focus on things that really matter.

 

  • Perfect for the office 

Zanco S-Pen, also functions as a stylus pen which is compatible with all devices, making it an accurate and comfortable method for writing or drawing. Use it to quickly take notes or do graphic design. 

  • Dependable voice recorder

Provides a simple way to record your important meetings or lectures for accurate notes that you can review anytime. With S-Pen, you won’t miss a thing!

  • Laser precision

When used as a laser pen, it makes a convenient companion for meetings and is essential as a professional tool to support your important presentations.

 

Other Features

  • With dual cameras (front and back), S-Pen is great for capturing spontaneous moments, a quick selfie, or for times when using a larger camera is unnecessary. It’s simple, discrete and ready at a click. 

 

  • Voice changer, Zanco S-Pen also support 13 different voices to bring more fun between you and your friends.

 

  • Zanco S-Pen was designed to stay charged when you need it, with a use time of 6 hours and standby time up to 6 days with a full charge.

story:
If it isn't long, you can't charge comfortably

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Many thanks to every backer who made Charby Edge possible! We're now shipping it worldwide. If you're looking to get one right now, it's available on our official web store HERE.

 

One day, our co-founder found himself unable to charge his iPad Pro: his car, backup power bank are all USB-A's, and the cable he carried for his latest iPad Pro is USB-C to C. It came to him that this hassle is caused by the lopsided transition of USB-A to USB-C. Though solutions existed, he realized that having a fixed adapter forever dangling around or an OTG adapter that goes missing easily is inconvenient.

Then the idea struck him -- a convenient, no-compromise solution. He gathered the team and introduced the "Transition Cable". And so 9 months and a few prototypes later, we took Charby Edge from an idea to what you're seeing now.

 

 

 

 

We're a product design team in Malaysia with a curiosity and passion for engineering. We (Charby) have been around since 2017, and have partnered with qualified manufacturers in Shenzhen who have tons of experience manufacturing quality products that pass CE, FCC, ROHS, and other certifications.

We've had experience in bringing crowdfunding innovation to our backers' hands. Notably, with our debut product Charby Sense on Indiegogo, which we are now consistently shipping all around the world. And another Indiegogo campaign now in mass production. Now, we're raising funds here to share our project to the community, and to hit the minimum manufacturing quantity to make Charby Edge happen.

story:
Good Evening All IGG Backers!

We have been silent for a very long time focusing on getting things done. We do apologize for the long period of silence, and now I am extremely excited to announce that we've finally emerged from the BatCave ready to accomplish what we've set out to accomplish so long ago. The Live TV Hostile Takeover is officially about to begin!

As many of you obviously know, our efforts to get Nuclius into the mainstream by way of crowdfunding were thwarted due to the stonewalling efforts of our Cable/Satellite competition, the media companies they own and now even the banks they deal with. But they all doubted our resolve! We have all worked tirelessly and pursued on relentlessly to get the job done and now our final Release-to-Market (RTM) Nuclius Ursa Rhodium, is finally coming to a TV near you in the next few weeks with the Live TV portion going Live this fall! It's all in motion! Take a look at the official photos below.

Over the last few months, we began shipping several dozen Ursa Rhodium devices to the field for final testing. The results have been stunning. We have produced the best, most powerful, premium, portable 4K streaming device on the market... hands-down. A product that has impressed everyone that has experienced it. Take a look at the video below. A link to the official Nuclius page on our Corporate site is below for your review so you can see the dramatic improvements we've made between the IGG Campaign and our RTM version. Also, FYI, the Gold-printed box and Ursa device pictured above is the special Limited Edition device reserved specifically for IGG Backers, investors, etc as promised.


Since our crowdfunding efforts failed, we decided to form a relationship with several private investors/lenders who are providing us with the capital we need to get things done. Obviously, we missed our planned launch date of 2/17/2016 due to many unforeseen issues including both hardware and software related. But now, that phase is behind us and we're finally shipping devices. Nuclius Orders from all sources will resume in June following a major DRM/Security firmware update that needs to be installed by the manufacturer. This is a critical update that is designed to protect both ours and other's Live TV and exclusive content. IGG Backers will get theirs first followed by everyone else. And several IGG Backers will receive their devices prior to that time so you can begin spreading the word and your experience with Nuclius.

We've also completely removed ourselves from our former MLM roots and have converted to a new hybrid Referral-based business model fully positioned to allow all Consumers to capitalize on the Tsunami of customers that will flood into Triniti as a result of people hearing about Nuclius for the very first time. Like Nuclius, this system is a first of its kind and will change the way products/services are introduced to Consumers. The timing couldn't be better because people are ready to make the mad dash from Cable & Satellite as fast as they can. We're paying $100 for each Subscriber Household that Locks-In their Nuclius Order as we prepare for launch. Yes you read that right. $100 Cash for each Nuclius Offer Lock-In and it's paid Lightning Fast... every week. You also make money off of your Referrals' Referrals and we share a portion of the Monthly Service Charges with you as well. And we've paid out thousands in Commissions already and it's growing weekly. This is the only system in existence where regular Consumers can spread the word and actually earn enough income to get your TV, Wireless and other digital services from Triniti at no-out-of-pocket expense.

To make sure you understand, our new Lightning Referral System puts you as a Nuclius Backer in a very unique position. Since you are a Nuclius believer and have expressed such an early dedication to Nuclius by committing funds to the project, we will allow you to get signed up in the Lightning Referral System without an Order Lock-In, so you can make the $100+ on each Referred Subscriber. That means free of charge. The Limited-Time Nuclius Offer Lock-In Details, updated videos and a ton of other information can be found here: http://Triniti.IDitchedCable.TV. Read up and get involved. All you have to do is click the Lock-In link at the bottom of the page, choose Option A and enter your information using the same email address you use for IGG. For the CC/DC info, just provide any card and you will not be charged since you are signing up under the main Triniti account. You will get your own personalized links and Social Media Share Widgets as soon as you signup so you can immediately begin spreading the word. Processing will verify your information and give your account full Lock-In access to make Referral Income to your heart's desire. So feel free to spread the word on Social Media and however else you see fit.

It's time for us to work together unrestricted to let the people of this great nation know that they can finally Switch & Ditch Cable & Satellite and even make some really good money doing it. Long Live the Revolution!

Thank you for your patience, continued Support and Happy Referring!

Darin Miller
CEO
story_txt:

We do apologize for the long period of silence, and now I am extremely excited to announce that we've finally emerged from the BatCave ready to accomplish what we've set out to accomplish so long ago. The Live TV Hostile Takeover is officially about to begin!As many of you obviously know, our efforts to get Nuclius into the mainstream by way of crowdfunding were thwarted due to the stonewalling efforts of our Cable/Satellite competition, the media companies they own and now even the banks they deal with. But they all doubted our resolve! We have all worked tirelessly and pursued on relentlessly to get the job done and now our final Release-to-Market (RTM) Nuclius Ursa Rhodium, is finally coming to a TV near you in the next few weeks with the Live TV portion going Live this fall! It's all in motion! Take a look at the official photos below.Over the last few months, we began shipping several dozen Ursa Rhodium devices to the field for final testing. The results have been stunning. We have produced the best, most powerful, premium, portable 4K streaming device on the market... hands-down. A product that has impressed everyone that has experienced it. Take a look at the video below. A link to the official Nuclius page on our Corporate site is below for your review so you can see the dramatic improvements we've made between the IGG Campaign and our RTM version. story:
Summary

Market Hub aims to create a free financial platform that integrates all key elements of online trading. 
- Stocks/Forex Trading Platform 
- News/Live Data
- Social Media
- Internal communications
- Trading related e-Commerce (Online Store)


Platform Features:

A watch-list that users can add symbols/pairs of their choice.

Real-time Forex and Level II Stock charts (Including oil, metals & small cap stocks).

Forum's where people can discuss topics related to specific markets (see below).

An economic calendar where important economic events are listed.

General economic news-feed.

An online store (MarketStore) that lets service providers sell trading-related products such as courses, signal/alert subscriptions and software (see below).

A social platform where people can “friend” one another, post their trades, post analysis and interact (see below). 

A live chat feature that allows people to communicate with each other directly as well as create group chats. 



MarketStore (extended)

Service providers usually advertise their services through various mediums: social media, their website,word of mouth. It can be hard for both potential customers and the providers to connect. We're introducing an online store that will eliminate this problem. MarketStore will ensure that users have access to quality services in a regulated, success orientated environment. Users will be able find and securely purchase trading related products directly from verified service providers (Market Gurus) who can list products just as easily. Products include trading courses, signal/alert subscriptions and educational material. Each product will have a detailed description, picture(s)/video, contact form for inquiries as well as past performance (if applicable). The store will also have a free section where users AND Market Gurus can share strategies, analysis, free signals/alerts etc. An important aspect of our store will be that anyone offering paid services will be reviewed and verified beforehand. Users will be able to rate and leave reviews on individual products, eventually creating a best-selling and top rated section for reference. This regulated and user-run exchange will remove the uncertainty and risk involved in purchasing trading related products/services online.



Online Chat (Extended)

Our vision for the online chat is for users to have access to a beautifully designed and easy to use instant messaging interface without having to leave the app. Users will be able to message each other directly as well as create their own group chats. Market Gurus can choose to take advantage of this feature for sending signals/alerts to clients.


Perks - Forex Signals

Signals are provided by two of our professional Forex Traders, Kirtis Siemens & Alex Evans.

Signals will be sent through WhatsApp or SMS (US only) and will consist of an entry price, take profit price and stop loss. Here is an example:

Pair: EUR/USD

Action: Buy

Entry price: 1.08560

Take Profit: 1.08612

Stop Loss: 1.08498


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, there are other ways that you can help bring our vision to life. We would massively appreciate help in creating awareness :) 

You can do the following:

  • Follow us on Instagram @markethub 
  • Follow us on Twitter @markethub_app
  • Share our campaign using the Indiegogo buttons!

story:
Why it's Important

They use canes to probe their surroundings, but some obstacles can be hard to spot. Fences, tall cars, and barrier gates for example.

With your help we will make a cheap and efficient ultrasound cane top and badge that can help the visually impaired move around safely. These simple devices will spot obstacles that would otherwise pose a threat and will warn the user by vibrating. The closer the obstacle the more they vibrate. Our U-nozzle cane top can be attached to any cane, while the badge can be hand-held or worn around the neck.

By supporting us you help make the world a safer and more accessible place for the visually impaired.

Our Story

In 2013, the forblind.org community has decided to create cheap and useful devices that would help the visually impaired to navigate the world around them.

We found out that existing ultrasound cane tops were really expensive and inaccessible to most visually impaired people so we decided to make one that would be really cheap.

Who We Are

We are a nonprofit community called forblind.org. Our goal is to make the world a more accessible place for the visually impaired, to make their lives better using technology.

We want our technology to spread around the world as quickly as possible to make life better for as many visually impaired people as possible.

That's why all our developments are distributed on an open source and open hardware principle and we strive to make them very cheap.

We want the world and people who can create new technology to pay more attention to the visually impaired and their problems.

That's why we are crowdsourcing to create and develop technology. Anyone can join our community and help us reach our goals.

Media About Us

Prototypes

We've been working on this for over a year and have tested 12 different prototypes.

More pictures and video of prototypes testing in our gallery.


The U-nozzle

An ultrasound cane top that can be fitted on almost any cane.

3D model of U-nozzle

U-nozzle


The U-box

An ultrasound badge can be hand-held or worn around the neck.

U-box

How Does It Work?


Both devices are based on processing ultrasound waves reflected from obstacles. They measure the time it takes for an impulse to reach an obstacle and bounce back to measure the distance.

Technical Specs For Both Devices

Maximum range to obstacle: 5 feet

Average operating time after full charge: up to 8 hours

Three vibration intensity settings depending on distance to obstacle (5, 3 and 2 feet)

Charge via mini-USB

Our Technology Is Open Source and Open Hardware

We are keeping our developments open because we want our technology to spread around the world as quickly as possible to make life better for as many visually impaired people as possible. You can download 3D-model of U-nozzle and source code here.

We need your help to: 

Produce 100 devices and test them in a real life environment by handing them out to the visually impaired and collecting their feedback. When we finish testing we will be ready to mass-produce a useful and fine-tuned device that will make life better for the visually impaired.
We will mention everyone who supported us on our website.

Tax = Inidiegogo, Paypal, Payment processing fees & campaign expenses.


Timeline


Your Contributions Get You:

Shipping included

Indiegogo community, please support us and spread help spread the word.

Thank you for supporting us!
