story:
The illegal and very expensive "hacking tools" offered in the market are like a total surveillance (continuous tracking and stay control, news monitoring, inspection of incoming and outgoing calls and statistics about usage behavior)..."Big Brother is watching you!"

These programs contradict our ideas of trust and privacy. Because children & teens must also have a right to privacy!

TimeOut - is a system that controls length of use, but not the most personal activity of the offspring. TimeOut represents a fair and gentle setting of boundaries. And at the same time gives kids more freedom for other things in life.  Perfect usability!

The ongoing topic of debate about media use by children and adolescents can be remedied. The TimeOut App offers a double advantage: Leisure time and free time management by your children, but at the same time under restrained control by parents.

The fact that Internet time should be limited for children is well known. In everyday life, this step becomes increasingly difficult. If you do not constantly stand right next to your children and repeatedly admonish them, you easily lose track of what relates to the use of social networks and other online services. At the same time this creates a conflict regarding the privacy of children and teenagers. With mom or dad on one's back, one quickly feels patronized and controlled.

The TimeOut App now allows you to remove the scepter from your hand. And with a good feeling. No longer do you have to keep an eye on the clock, as the app does it for you automatically. This leaves time for other things, without fear of too much Internet use by your children. And that leaves the children with sufficient freedom to divide the chosen time independently. They enjoy new independence while learning to look out for themselves and use their time more meaningfully. According to the motto: "It's time to make our leisure time into a free time again!"

This works very easily. In the beginning, the app automatically reads all applications that are installed on your smartphone, tablet, iPod, iPad, notebook etc. Then you easily select from the applications that you want to limit time with. Of course, you can completely block the device after the allotted time or allow only certain calls or applications thereafter. Works on Windows, Mac, iOS and Android!

Depending on the age of the children and teens, you determine a maximum length of use for them. This time is set in the TimeOut App. When the app starts, it runs discreetly in the background and works like a stopwatch. When the set time is reached, the app automatically blocks the service you selected to be limited, be it Facebook, WhatsApp, games or the Internet as a whole. If these services are not used, the clock does not continue running. A fair system!

The TimeOut App adapts to your personal needs and wishes. It is possible to enable time limited individual services, applications or games, or even set length of use for individual days. Thus, for example, on school days shorter Internet time can be set, with a little more leeway given on weekends. Without stress and regular confiscation of the phone. It's completely automatic. Totally fair.

The TimeOut App can only be deleted after installation with your master password, and all applications that will be installed in the future can also only be downloaded after entering the master password. Kid´s can´t uninstall it!

The perfect solution for controlled media use by your children. The TimeOut App puts an end to the controversy about "media use" within your family. Age appropriate use of media on the one hand, and the status symbol of youth on the other hand are easily accommodated under one solution. Limit the use of smartphones, tablets and PCs for each of your children individually.

In addition, the individual devices can be synchronized with each other! If you have a fixed Internet usage period of two hours daily, for example, the first hour can be on a notebook, then the remaining hour can be on the phone.

Whether smartphone, tablet, iPod or laptop, all devices are synchronized with each other! Your child must first register with their name and personal password on each of their devices. Even if your children share the devices, each of your children has their own personal account, which they use to unlock each device.

The daily residual usage time is synchronized at the start with the other devices. If your kids want to install new applications or delete installed applications, this needs to be confirmed by entering the master password. Parent's can allow such activity online and while on the go via their Control Center.

Benefit mutually from the hours saved. Always being online is not necessary. Especially not if real life suffers and mutates into "off life." Keeping work, media use and leisure time in a healthy balance works quickly and easily with the TimeOut App. So everyone in the family enjoys maximum freedom and privacy - and everyone gets plenty of free time - work-life balance in perfection!

Use the app on all your devices!

The TimeOut App keeps track for you - and allows you and your children more freedom for other things.

"It is not too little time we have, but rather too much time that we do not use meaningfully." Be responsible and allow your children to have a safe and healthy future -  give your children free time!

Use TimeOut for a relaxed everyday family life!


Step 1: Sign up on our website and create an account for each of your children. From now on, you can individually change the settings for each account by entering your email address and your master password, without having to access the individual devices of your children.

Step 2: Download the TimeOut App from our website or from any of the app stores on each of the devices on which you want to set a time limit.

Step 3: Simply assign each child's device to their respective user account.

Step 4: Next, automatically scan all devices and thus all installed applications on each user account. Now, click to select the applications on which you want to set a time limit.

Step 5: Then, set the daily start and stop times, as well as the daily usage time for each user account. Now start the TimeOut App.

That´s all!: The TimeOut App runs discreetly in the background and the usage time is shown on the top right. Every 10 minutes, the current remaining time appears for five seconds. During the last minute, the countdown is displayed flashing red until the end!

TimeOut: Once the available daily time has expired, all selected applications will be locked and cannot be used. The non-locked applications can still be used.



*TimeOut Bonus Time - Will be available soon...


*TimeOut for game consoles - Available in early 2016


Familiar processes provide reliability and security in life, giving your child safety and support. Simultaneously, family life is more relaxed, because if your child knows exactly when what and how something is done, activities don't have to be re-negotiated every time.

Children like rituals and always having the same processes: getting up every morning at the same time; having a bedtime routine in the evening. These things give them security, because they know what's coming and because they can be prepared. Fixed habits in the family can create a sense of belonging. And everyday life with children runs smoothly, because everything that is recurrent and always done in the same way is easier for children to accept. This creates clarity and relief in children and in parents; you're helping your child more than you think!


Through your support we will TimeOut market worldwide! We have big plans - and this is just the beginning...

Please Support us now - invest in the future - encourage the healthy growth of your children!





Die illegalen und sehr teuren "Hacking Programme" die am Markt angeboten werden, gleichen einer totalen Überwachung (Dauertracking & Aufenthaltskontrolle, Nachrichtenbeobachtung, Prüfung der eingehenden und ausgehenden Anrufe sowie Statistiken über das Nutzungsverhalten)..."Big Brother is watching you!"

Diese Programme widersprechen unserem Verständnis von Vertrauen und Privatsphäre. Denn ein Anrecht auf Privatsphäre müssen auch Kinder & Jugendliche haben!

TimeOut - ist ein Programm, das zwar die Nutzungsdauer, nicht aber das persönlichste des Nachwuchses kontrolliert. TimeOut steht für eine faire und sanfte Grenzsetzung. Und bringt den Kindern gleichzeitig mehr Freiraum für andere Dinge im Leben.  Usability in Perfektion!


Dem ewigen Streitthema um die Mediennutzung von Kindern und Jugendlichen kann Abhilfe geschaffen werden. Die TimeOut App bietet Ihnen einen doppelten Vorteil: Freizeit und freie Zeiteinteilung für Ihre Kinder unter gleichzeitiger, aber zurückhaltender Kontrolle durch die Eltern.

Dass die Internetzeit für Kinder begrenzt werden sollte, ist allseits bekannt. Im Alltag gestaltet sich dieser Schritt aber zunehmend schwierig. Wenn Sie nicht permanent neben Ihrem Nachwuchs stehen und diesen wiederholt ermahnen möchten, verlieren Sie leicht den Überblick, was die Nutzung sozialer Netzwerke und anderer Online-Angebote betrifft. Gleichzeitig entsteht ein Konflikt um die Privatsphäre der Kinder und Teenager. Mit Mama oder Papa im Nacken fühlt man sich schnell bevormundet und kontrolliert.

Die TimeOut App ermöglicht Ihnen nun, das Zepter aus der Hand zu geben. Und das mit einem guten Gefühl. Nicht mehr Sie müssen die Uhr im Blick behalten, sondern die App erledigt das automatisch für Sie. So bleibt Zeit für andere Dinge, ohne Angst um eine zu lange Internetnutzung des Nachwuchses haben zu müssen. Und den Kindern bleibt ausreichend Freiraum, sich die gewählte Zeit selbstständig einzuteilen. Sie genießen die neue Unabhängigkeit und lernen gleichzeitig auf sich selbst zu achten und ihre Zeit sinnvoll zu nutzen. Gemäß dem Motto: "Es wird Zeit unsere Freizeit wieder zu einer freien Zeit zu machen!"

Das Ganze funktioniert kinderleicht. Zu Beginn liest die App automatisch alle Anwendungen die auf dem Smartphone, Tablet, iPod, iPad, Notebook etc. installiert sind aus. Sie wählen dann ganz einfach die Anwendungen aus, die Sie gerne zeitlich begrenzen möchten. Natürlich können Sie das Gerät nach Ablauf der Zeit komplett sperren lassen oder nur bestimmte Anrufe oder Anwendungen zulassen. Works on Windows, Mac, IOS and Android!

Dann legen Sie, je nach Alter der Kinder & Jugendlichen, eine maximale Nutzungsdauer für diese fest. Diese Zeit wird in der TimeOut App eingestellt. Startet die App, läuft sie diskret im Hintergrund mit und funktioniert dabei wie eine Stoppuhr. Ist die eingestellte Dauer erreicht, sperrt die App automatisch den von Ihnen ausgewählten, zu begrenzenden Dienst: sei es Facebook, WhatsApp, Spiele oder das Internet insgesamt. Werden diese Dienste nicht benutzt, läuft die Uhr selbstverständlich auch nicht weiter. Ein faires System!

Die TimeOut App passt sich Ihren persönlichen Anforderungen und Wünschen an. Es ist möglich, einzelne Dienste, Anwendungen oder Spiele zeitlich begrenzt freizugeben, oder auch verschiedene Nutzungsspannen für die einzelnen Tage festzulegen. So lässt sich beispielsweise an Schultagen eine kürzere Internetzeit festlegen und am Wochenende etwas mehr Spielraum geben. Ohne Stress und ein regelmäßiges Einkassieren des Handys. Ganz automatisch. Ganz gerecht.

Die TimeOut App kann nach der Installation nur noch durch das Masterpasswort von Ihnen gelöscht werden und alle Anwendungen die zukünftig installiert werden, können auch nur nach Eingabe des Masterpasswortes downgeloadet werden. Kinder können TimeOut nicht einfach deinstallieren!

Die perfekte Lösung für eine kontrollierte Mediennutzung Ihrer Kinder. Die TimeOut App macht Schluss mit dem Streitthema "Mediennutzung" innerhalb Ihrer Familie. Altersentsprechende Mediennutzung auf der einen, das Statussymbol der Jugend auf der anderen Seite werden problemlos unter einen Hut gebracht. Begrenzen Sie die Nutzung von Smartphone, Tablet und PC für jedes Ihrer Kinder individuell.

Darüber hinaus lassen sich die einzelnen Geräte untereinander synchronisieren! Wird bei einer festgelegten Internet-Nutzungsdauer von zwei Stunden täglich beispielsweise die erste Stunde am Notebook verbraucht, steht danach auch am Handy nur noch eine Reststunde zur Verfügung.

Egal ob Smartphone, Tablet, iPod oder Laptop - alle Geräte werden untereinander synchronisiert! Ihr Kind muss sich an jedem seiner Geräte zunächst mit seinem Namen und seinem persönlichen Passwort anmelden. Auch wenn Ihre Kinder die Geräte gemeinsam verwenden, jedes Ihrer Kinder hat seinen eigenen, persönlichen Account mit dem es sich anmelden muss, um die Geräte zu verwenden.

Die tägliche Rest-Nutzungszeit wird beim Start mit den anderen Geräten abgeglichen. Möchten Ihre Kinder neue Anwendungen installieren oder installierte Anwendungen löschen, muss dies durch die Eingabe des Eltern-Master-Passwortes bestätigt werden. Diese Freigabe können Sie auch online und von unterwegs über Ihr Control-Center erteilen.

Profitieren Sie gemeinsam von den eingesparten Stunden. Always online muss nicht sein. Schon gar nicht, wenn das reale Leben darunter leidet und zum „off life“ mutiert. Arbeit, Medienkonsum und Freizeit in einem gesunden Gleichgewicht zu halten, funktioniert mit der TimeOut App schnell und unkompliziert. So erhält sich jeder in der Familie maximalen Freiraum und Privatsphäre - und alle gemeinsam bekommen reichlich time for free - Work-Life-Balance in Perfektion!

Nutzen Sie die App auf jedem Ihrer Geräte!

Die TimeOut App behält für Sie den Überblick - und ermöglicht Ihnen und Ihren Kindern mehr Freiraum für andere Dinge.

"Es ist nicht zu wenig Zeit, die wir haben, sondern es ist zu viel Zeit, die wir nicht sinnvoll nutzen." Zeigen Sie sich Verantwortungsbewusst und ermöglichen Sie Ihren Kindern eine sichere und gesunde Zukunft - schenken Sie Ihren Kindern freie Zeit!

Starten Sie mit TimeOut in einen entspannten Familienalltag!


Schritt 1: Registrieren Sie sich auf unserer Website und erstellen Sie ein Benutzerkonto für jedes Ihrer Kinder. Zukünftig können Sie nach Eingabe Ihrer Email-Adresse und Ihres Eltern-Master-Passwortes die Einstellungen für jedes Benutzerkonto separat ändern und anpassen, ohne auf die einzelnen Geräte der Kinder zugreifen zu müssen.

Schritt 2: Laden Sie die TimeOut App von unserer Website oder aus einem der App-Stores auf jedes der Geräte herunter, die Sie zeitlich begrenzen möchten.

Schritt 3: Ordnen Sie die einzelnen Geräte der Kinder ganz einfach dem jeweiligen Benutzerkonto zu.

Schritt 4: Im nächsten Schritt scannen Sie automatisch alle Geräte und damit alle installierten Anwendungen des jeweiligen Benutzerkontos. Wählen Sie nun per Mausklick die Anwendungen aus, die Sie zeitlich begrenzen möchten.

Schritt 5: Stellen Sie nun für jedes Benutzerkonto die tägliche Start- und Endzeit sowie die täglich zur Verfügung stehende Nutzungszeit ein. Starten Sie nun die TimeOut App.

Das ist alles: Die TimeOut App läuft diskret im Hintergrund und die Nutzungszeit wird oben rechts angezeigt. Alle 10 Minuten wird die aktuelle Rest-Zeit für fünf Sekunden eingeblendet. Die letzte Minute wird bis zum Ablauf rot blinkend angezeigt!

Zeit abgelaufen: Die täglich zur Verfügung stehende Zeit ist abgelaufen, alle ausgewählten Anwendungen werden gesperrt und können nicht weiter verwendet werden. Die nicht gesperrten Anwendungen können weiterhin genutzt werden.



*TimeOut Bonus-Zeit - Bald erhältlich...


*TimeOut für Spielkonsolen - Erscheint Anfang 2016

Vertraute Abläufe vermitteln Verlässlichkeit und Geborgenheit im Leben, geben Ihrem Kind Sicherheit und Halt. Gleichzeitig läuft der Familienalltag entspannter, denn wenn Ihr Kind genau weiß, wann was wie gemacht wird, muss nicht jedes Mal neu verhandelt werden.

Kinder mögen Rituale und immer gleiche Abläufe. Jeden Morgen zur selben Zeit aufstehen, abends mit dem gleichen Ablauf ins Bett, das vermittelt ihnen Geborgenheit, weil sie wissen, was kommt, und weil sie sich darauf einstellen können. Feste Gewohnheiten in der Familie lassen ein Wir-Gefühl entstehen. Und der Alltag mit Kindern läuft entspannter, denn alles, was regelmäßig wiederkehrt und stets nach dem gleichen Schema abläuft, akzeptieren Kinder leichter. Das schafft bei Kindern wie Eltern Klarheit und Entlastung - Sie helfen Ihrem Kind mehr, als Sie denken!


Durch Ihre Unterstützung werden wir TimeOut weltweit vermarkten! Wir haben große Pläne - und dies ist erst der Anfang...

Bitte Unterstützen Sie uns jetzt - investieren Sie in die Zukunft - fördern Sie das gesunde Aufwachsen Ihrer Kinder!
story_txt:
The illegal and very expensive "hacking tools" offered in the market are like a total
surveillance (continuous tracking and stay control, news monitoring, inspection
of incoming and outgoing calls and statistics about usage behavior)..."Big Brother is watching you!"These
programs contradict our ideas of trust and privacy. Because children &
teens must also have a right to privacy!
TimeOut
- is a system that controls length of use, but not the most personal activity
of the offspring. TimeOut represents a fair and gentle setting of boundaries.
And at the same time gives kids more freedom for other things in life.  Perfect usability!
The ongoing topic of debate about media use
by children and adolescents can be remedied. The TimeOut App offers a double
advantage: Leisure time and free time management by your children, but at the
same time under restrained control by parents.



The fact that Internet time should be
limited for children is well known. In everyday life, this step becomes
increasingly difficult. If you do not constantly stand right next to your
children and repeatedly admonish them, you easily lose track of what relates to
the use of social networks and other online services. At the same time this
creates a conflict regarding the privacy of children and teenagers. With mom or
dad on one's back, one quickly feels patronized and controlled.

The TimeOut App now allows you to remove
the scepter from your hand. And with a good feeling. No longer do you have to
keep an eye on the clock, as the app does it for you automatically. This leaves
time for other things, without fear of too much Internet use by your children.
And that leaves the children with sufficient freedom to divide the chosen time
independently. They enjoy new independence while learning to look out for
themselves and use their time more meaningfully. According to the motto: "It's time to make our leisure time
into a free time again!"



This works very easily. In the beginning,
the app automatically reads all applications that are installed on your
smartphone, tablet, iPod, iPad, notebook etc. Then you easily select from the
applications that you want to limit time with. Of course, you can completely
block the device after the allotted time or allow only certain calls or
applications thereafter. Works on Windows, Mac, iOS and Android!


Depending on the age of the children and
teens, you determine a maximum length of use for them. This time is set in the
TimeOut App. When the app starts, it runs discreetly in the background and
works like a stopwatch. When the set time is reached, the app automatically
blocks the service you selected to be limited, be it Facebook, WhatsApp, games
or the Internet as a whole. If these services are not used, the clock does not
continue running. A fair system!

The TimeOut App adapts to your personal
needs and wishes. It is possible to enable time limited individual services,
applications or games, or even set length of use for individual days. Thus, for
example, on school days shorter Internet time can be set, with a little more
leeway given on weekends. Without stress and regular confiscation of the phone.
It's completely automatic. Totally fair.
The TimeOut App can only be deleted after
installation with your master password, and all applications that will be
installed in the future can also only be downloaded after entering the master
password. Kid´s can´t uninstall it!
The perfect solution for controlled media
use by your children. The TimeOut App puts an end to the controversy about
"media use" within your family. Age appropriate use of media on the
one hand, and the status symbol of youth on the other hand are easily
accommodated under one solution. Limit the use of smartphones, tablets and
PCs for each of your children individually.

In addition, the individual devices can be
synchronized with each other! If you have a fixed Internet usage period of two
hours daily, for example, the first hour can be on a notebook, then the
remaining hour can be on the phone. 
Whether smartphone, tablet, iPod or
laptop, all devices are synchronized with each other! Your child must first
register with their name and personal password on each of their devices. Even
if your children share the devices, each of your children has their own personal
account, which they use to unlock each device. 
The daily residual usage time is
synchronized at the start with the other devices. If your kids want to install new
applications or delete installed applications, this needs to be confirmed by
entering the master password. Parent's can allow such activity online
and while on the go via their Control Center. 

Benefit mutually from the hours saved.
Always being online is not necessary. Especially not if real life suffers and
mutates into "off life." Keeping work, media use and leisure time in
a healthy balance works quickly and easily with the TimeOut App. So everyone in
the family enjoys maximum freedom and privacy - and everyone gets plenty of
free time - work-life balance in perfection!

Use the app on all your devices!
The TimeOut App keeps track for you - and
allows you and your children more freedom for other things.
"It is not too little time we have,
but rather too much time that we do not use meaningfully." Be responsible
and allow your children to have a safe and healthy future -  give your children free time!

Use TimeOut for a relaxed everyday
family life!
Step 1: Sign up on our website and
create an account for each of your children. From now on, you can individually
change the settings for each account by entering your email address and your
master password, without having to access the individual devices of your
children.

Step 2: Download the TimeOut App from
our website or from any of the app stores on each of the devices on which you
want to set a time limit.

Step 3: Simply assign each child's
device to their respective user account. 

Step 4: Next,
automatically scan all devices and thus all installed applications on each user
account. Now, click to select the applications on which you want to set a time
limit.Step 5: Then,
set the daily start and stop times, as well as the daily usage time for each
user account. Now start the TimeOut App.That´s all!: The
TimeOut App runs discreetly in the background and the usage time is shown on
the top right. Every 10 minutes, the current remaining time appears for five
seconds. During the last minute, the countdown is displayed flashing red until
the end!

TimeOut: Once the available daily time
has expired, all selected applications will be locked and cannot be used. The
non-locked applications can still be used.


*TimeOut Bonus Time - Will be available soon...*TimeOut for game consoles - Available in early 2016


Familiar processes provide reliability and
security in life, giving your child safety and support. Simultaneously, family
life is more relaxed, because if your child knows exactly when what and how
something is done, activities don't have to be re-negotiated every time.

Children like rituals and always having the same
processes: getting up every morning at the same time; having a bedtime routine
in the evening. These things give them security, because they know what's
coming and because they can be prepared. Fixed habits in the family can create
a sense of belonging. And everyday life with children runs smoothly, because everything
that is recurrent and always done in the same way is easier for children to
accept. This creates clarity and relief in children and in parents; you're helping your child more than you
think!Through your support we will TimeOut market worldwide! We have big plans - and this is just the beginning...Please Support us now - invest in the future - encourage the
healthy growth of your children! Die illegalen und sehr teuren "Hacking Programme" die am Markt angeboten werden, gleichen einer totalen
Überwachung (Dauertracking & Aufenthaltskontrolle, Nachrichtenbeobachtung, Prüfung
der eingehenden und ausgehenden Anrufe sowie Statistiken über das
Nutzungsverhalten)..."Big Brother is watching you!"Diese Programme widersprechen unserem Verständnis von
Vertrauen und Privatsphäre. Denn ein Anrecht auf Privatsphäre müssen auch
Kinder & Jugendliche haben!
TimeOut - ist ein Programm, das zwar die Nutzungsdauer, nicht
aber das persönlichste des Nachwuchses kontrolliert. TimeOut steht für eine
faire und sanfte Grenzsetzung. Und bringt den Kindern gleichzeitig mehr Freiraum
für andere Dinge im Leben.  Usability in
Perfektion!
Dem ewigen Streitthema um die Mediennutzung von Kindern und
Jugendlichen kann Abhilfe geschaffen werden. Die TimeOut App bietet Ihnen einen
doppelten Vorteil: Freizeit und freie Zeiteinteilung für Ihre Kinder unter
gleichzeitiger, aber zurückhaltender Kontrolle durch die Eltern.

Dass die Internetzeit für Kinder begrenzt werden sollte, ist
allseits bekannt. Im Alltag gestaltet sich dieser Schritt aber zunehmend
schwierig. Wenn Sie nicht permanent neben Ihrem Nachwuchs stehen und diesen
wiederholt ermahnen möchten, verlieren Sie leicht den Überblick, was die
Nutzung sozialer Netzwerke und anderer Online-Angebote betrifft. Gleichzeitig
entsteht ein Konflikt um die Privatsphäre der Kinder und Teenager. Mit Mama
oder Papa im Nacken fühlt man sich schnell bevormundet und kontrolliert.
Die TimeOut App ermöglicht Ihnen nun, das Zepter aus der
Hand zu geben. Und das mit einem guten Gefühl. Nicht mehr Sie müssen die Uhr im
Blick behalten, sondern die App erledigt das automatisch für Sie. So bleibt
Zeit für andere Dinge, ohne Angst um eine zu lange Internetnutzung des
Nachwuchses haben zu müssen. Und den Kindern bleibt ausreichend Freiraum, sich
die gewählte Zeit selbstständig einzuteilen. Sie genießen die neue
Unabhängigkeit und lernen gleichzeitig auf sich selbst zu achten und ihre Zeit
sinnvoll zu nutzen. Gemäß dem Motto: "Es wird Zeit unsere Freizeit wieder zu einer freien
Zeit zu machen!"


Das Ganze funktioniert kinderleicht. Zu Beginn liest die App
automatisch alle Anwendungen die auf dem Smartphone, Tablet, iPod, iPad,
Notebook etc. installiert sind aus. Sie wählen dann ganz einfach die
Anwendungen aus, die Sie gerne zeitlich begrenzen möchten. Natürlich können Sie
das Gerät nach Ablauf der Zeit komplett sperren lassen oder nur bestimmte
Anrufe oder Anwendungen zulassen. Works on
Windows, Mac, IOS and Android!

Dann legen Sie, je nach Alter der Kinder & Jugendlichen,
eine maximale Nutzungsdauer für diese fest. Diese Zeit wird in der TimeOut App
eingestellt. Startet die App, läuft sie diskret im Hintergrund mit und
funktioniert dabei wie eine Stoppuhr. Ist die eingestellte Dauer erreicht,
sperrt die App automatisch den von Ihnen ausgewählten, zu begrenzenden Dienst:
sei es Facebook, WhatsApp, Spiele oder das Internet insgesamt. Werden diese
Dienste nicht benutzt, läuft die Uhr selbstverständlich auch nicht weiter. Ein
faires System!
Die TimeOut App passt sich Ihren persönlichen Anforderungen
und Wünschen an. Es ist möglich, einzelne Dienste, Anwendungen oder Spiele
zeitlich begrenzt freizugeben, oder auch verschiedene Nutzungsspannen für die
einzelnen Tage festzulegen. So lässt sich beispielsweise an Schultagen eine
kürzere Internetzeit festlegen und am Wochenende etwas mehr Spielraum geben.
Ohne Stress und ein regelmäßiges Einkassieren des Handys. Ganz automatisch.
Ganz gerecht.
Die TimeOut App kann nach der Installation nur noch durch
das Masterpasswort von Ihnen gelöscht werden und alle Anwendungen die zukünftig
installiert werden, können auch nur nach Eingabe des Masterpasswortes
downgeloadet werden. Kinder können TimeOut nicht einfach deinstallieren!
Die perfekte Lösung für eine kontrollierte Mediennutzung
Ihrer Kinder. Die TimeOut App macht Schluss mit dem Streitthema
"Mediennutzung" innerhalb Ihrer Familie. Altersentsprechende

story:
Together we can become the DOLLAR DREAM TEAM !
If you have a dollar, I have a dream 
and it will come true with support from YOU!

I DREAM TO TAKE SELFIEFIE & AnYCoNs GLOBAL!

SelfieFaze is a next level chat messaging app that has innovated emoji communication. Create custom emojis called AnYCoNs!

SelfieFaze is a chat messaging application ushering in a fun new way of communicating via custom emojis called AnYCoNs. AnYCoNs are no ordinary emoticons, using in-app custom crop functionality, users can transform any of their photos  into emoji's with the option to add SWaGG (written note) and ViBE (audio note)  functionality. 

The concept of AnYCoNs was conceived from an impromptu conversation I had while instant messaging with my friend. 

AN ANYCON IS YOU AND ANYTHING ELSE YOU WANT IT TO BE!

With the advent of emoji's, similar programs, and the social chat messaging craze, two problems arise: 

1. People everywhere long to translate their expression and receive equal representation of themselves and those who look like them to share among themselves, friends, family, and the global community.

2. Secondly, there is a need to shorten communication when personal and professional chat messaging.

Other applications that use or create emojis may limit creativity and silence self-expression. This is not the case with SelfieFaze. AnYCoNs scream "Express Yourself Anyway™".


With SelfieFaze, SelfieFaze Website, Users Can:

* Transform photos of themselves, favorite foods and hobbies... ANYTHING  into AnYCoNs (emojis) !

* Use Unrivaled Crop Functionality to Create AnYCoNs Exactly How They Envision! 

*Remove limitations and merge picture, written and audio messaging by adding SWaGG (written) and ViBE (audio) messages to AnYCoNs! 

*Even Make Celebrity AnYCoNs ! 

As the demand for SelfieFaze grows, so does the need to become a cross platform application and upgrade software and essential functionalities.

With your help, I, Khyrie Alleyne, will continue to innovate the way people all over the world express themselves in the digital and tech communication worlds. 

SELFIEFAZE IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT! So far I have invested a over $35,000 in SelfieFaze and my goal is to raise $50,000. 

The funds raised will go towards enhancing the current version of SelfieFaze. 

With your support, I AM CONFIDENT I will be able to: 

*update SelfieFaze design, software and functionality.

*Make SelfieFaze a cross-platform chat messaging service available on all market platforms.

*Implement fun, innovative, new, cool ways to customize AnYCoNs.

*Launch a marketing campaign that will tell everyone in the chat messaging world "Express Yourself Anyway™".

*Take SelfieFaze and AnYCoNs GLOBAL!"

In the event I exceed my goal, I will use the excess funds to further expand the SelfieFaze brand as well as help others like me, take a dream, make it reality and then transform it into a business to share and profit with others via the BelieveAnyway  of my Anyway Initiative. A program shared at schools that "motivates the entrepreneur in you!" SelfieFaze is here today because we Believe Anyway! 

To learn more about Believe Anyway program please visit:

 http://www.khyriealleyne.com/#!anywayinitiative...

story:
Short Summary

Calatin GmbH, who by the way borrowed its name from a celtic wizard, develops, trades and markets innovative technological products and solutions. We envision a world where technology serves human needs. Today often the opposite is the case. As any organism relies on communication it is crucial to communicate. But there are messages you just want to keep private. This may be business information, ideas or just a private communication to a loved one.  Today privacy is very rare and must be protected were it is needed. 

Towards this aim we are developing a messenger app (iOS and subsequently Android) that encodes messages sent between sender and receiver by applying a very simple but extremely efficient encoding/decoding algorithm: the book cypher. Book cyphers were used in history very successfully. Two identical books were used to encode and subsequently decode the message. Only if the respective book is known to the prying eye the code could be broken. Nowadays there are myriads of book equivalents out there in the web: source codes of billion of websites. These source codes are used by the book cypher messenger smartphone app and are virtually unbreakable as long as the identity of the cypher key website is kept secret. Take privacy in your own hands by communicating truly privately by first selecting any website in the web, then inviting your counterpart to accept the key and finally starting the private conversation. 

We have the complete app plan at hands. We spent hundreds of hours to develop the app outline and logics. As a next step we need a professional team to program the app and the webserver environment. This is exactly why we are reaching out to people like you, who alike us belief that privacy is a human right, to get this important project funded.

What We Need & What You Get

We calculated project costs of $75'000. This includes: project management, translations, mobile app programming, programming of the communication and cypher key intermediate repository server, security testing, beta testing, publishing and app kick-off marketing. In return there will me a smartphone messenger available that allows private conversations that stay private as you take privacy in your own hands. 

If funding is not fully reached we would further follow up project funding efforts on a family and friends bases and try to get minimal funds to obtain a functional proof of principle prototype first and lastly a publishable app, which we would try to sell at a higher price per download instead of providing it at a price as low as 1$ as it is planned today. If we would still not be able to collect the founds needed, we would invest the money into our parallel project applying similar same technology which is about save email encryption on PCs in order to provide email privacy. 

The Impact

The book cypher messenger will provide message privacy and thereby contribute to more personal freedom of thought and expression. Who likes to have his most intimate messages exposed, automatically screened or looked and laughed at by complete strangers? What happens if maliscious minds prie into most confidendential business conversations or private messages you write to your beloved ones? What is the matter if they know your where abouts (location data is often transmitted along with common messenger applications or exposed by the sender via non-/ or badly decrypted messeging)? Well, burglars or people trying to break into your property will feel encouraged as they know, you are not there. What if they know that only your children are around..? What if the amazing idea you had and you wanted to share confidentially with your best friend would be stolen by industrial spies? What about someone reading your most intimate messages to your spouse, husband or partner?

Do not wait until you are spied upon but rather take the opportunity and support our project to bring a little bit more freedom back to all of us. 

Risks & Challenges

As with any IT project there may be technological hurdles that may hard to overcome. In our case, as we have performed due diligence evaluations of the project we are convinced that all necessary technology and programming capabilities are readily at hand. There is a risk for delays in reaching milestones due to the complexity of the project and the number of project interfaces involved. Momentarily there are no significant delays expected. As we are a team of entrepreneurs with scientific backgrounds and subsequent industrial careers we are used to finding solutions where there had been none before. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to support us in another than financial way or in addition to a sponsoring, please promote our cause by suggesting it to friends. This will help us all regain our privacy and freedom.

story:
With this module you are able to play and record sounds or music with very high quality (sterio 16 bits 48.00 kbps) on Micro-SD memory cards up to 32GB capacity
the communication port is UART (serial) with auto detection baud rate and very simple AT-COMMANDS
you just copy your files to memory , plug the memory to module and send the file name that you want to be played . that's it .

module has one line input , 2 right and left audio outputs , RXD and TXD serial pins (automatic baud rate) and 2 power pins for GND and 3.3v

working with this module is verrrrrrrrrrry easy

it will compatible with all kind of micro controllers and development kits such as Arduino .

story:
What is the Neutrino?

The Neutrino is an inexpensive, open source, miniaturized version of the Arduino Zero!

Featuring a 32-bit ARM processor running at 48MHz, and boasting 32K of ram, the Neutrino is far more capable than your typical Arduino.  And because it has the same processor and pinout, all libraries written for the Zero will work on the Neutrino without any modification!

Finally, being open-source, you're free to modify it as you wish and integrate it into your own designs - without ever needing to pay any royalties or licensing fees!

The Neutrino!

Technical Specs

  • Microcontroller: Atmel ATSAMD21G18 ARM Cortex M0+
  • Clock speed: 48 MHz
  • Operating voltage: 3.3V
  • I/O pin limits: 3.3V, 7 mA
  • Digital I/O pins: 14, with 12 PWM
  • Analog input pins: 6, 12-bit ADC channels
  • Analog output pins: 1, 10-bit DAC
  • Flash memory: 256 KB
  • SRAM: 32 KB
  • Voltage regulator: 3.7V - 6V input / 3.3V, 500mA output
  • Dimensions: 1.5 x 0.7" (38mm x 18mm)

Programming

Programming is easy! Like most Arduinos, you simply plug the board into your PC using a MicroUSB cable, select the board you want to program, and hit the upload button in the IDE when you're ready. The Neutrino ships with the Zero bootloader installed, and most of the time it will auto-reset when the USB serial port is opened by the IDE, but in the event that this fails, you can always hit the reset button on the board to force it to enter bootloader mode after your program finishes compiling.


Power

The Neutrino features a convenient power multiplexing circuit, so you can power it from USB or a battery, and it will switch between them automatically.  You can also power the Neutrino directly with a 3.3V regulated supply.   

The Neutrino can also supply power to USB devices when acting as a USB host, but in this case you will need to supply 5V to the VIN pin.


Other Features

Status LED

Like most Arduinos, a green LED is connected to pin 13. This can be used as a status indicator, and on the Neutrino it functions as a power indicator as well; coming on automatically when power is applied to the board. 

10-bit DAC

Say goodbye to the Tone() command forever! Turn your Neutrino into a virtuoso by connecting an amplifier to pin A0 an using the Audio library to play .WAV files with the built-in DAC! 

LiPo charger compatible

Need to use your Neutrino on the go?  The Neutrino features the same pinout on its power pins as Adafruit's Pro Trinket, making it directly compatible with their USB LiPo charging backpack!

With the backpack installed, your Neutrino will look like this, only purple-er!

Thank you for your support!

story:
"A James Bond device, by its versatility & luxury essence."

   "A French artisanal creation. A strong powerbank battery and a reliable electric lighter."

 

"Perfect for a world tour" "Swiss knife & French lighter pair"

 

"A great manufacturing quality" "A marvel born for travelers" "A beautiful gift to offer to tech lovers"

 

"An elegant electric lighter, with unique functionalities."

 

"A unique love story for French craftsmanship."  "A true technical masterpiece, less energy-consuming and durable."   

"A multifunctional creation assembled in France with materials from responsible and sustainable channels." 

 

 

A revolutionary travel high-tech accessory designed and crafted in Paris by the finest craftsmen decorated by the "Entreprises du Patrimoine Vivant" label.

This technological marvel is made from noble and eco-friendly materials such as Piñatex pineapple leather, French Sycamore wood, giving it authenticity & exceptional touch. 

To guarantee their eco-responsibility, traceability and ethical sourcing, the wood we use* for evaZion comes exclusively from French sustainably managed forests.

 *worked by French EPV craftsmen "Marqueterie Lacroix Marrec" 

NO more animals leather! We use cruelty free material, an innovative natural textile made from pineapple leaf ﬁbre and exclusively produced by Piñatex*.

*worked by French EPV craftsmen "Coups de crayon"

We have spent countless hours working with the best engineers, designers and craftsmen to  develop innovative features. To ensure superior quality standards, we partnered with the world’s leading manufacturers and used only high-quality technological components. 

               

Only 20 mm thickness and weighs only 154 g

It will help you whenever you need to light up anything, from precious candles to Havana cigarillos or Asian incense. No matter what the weather is, it will never let you down.                 The windproof electric lighter is removable and transportable by plane.

evaZion’ 6800mAh built-in powerbank fully charges your smartphone on the go, in less than 3 hours! A high-flying performance for a nomadic accessory. Compatible with fast chargers.

If you arrive late at night in a poorly lit city or went hiking in the mountains and didn’t realize night was falling, Evazion is here for you ! Its LED torch light allows you to be lighten up anytime and find more easily your way in the dark.

With Evazion’ fake money detector, you will no longer be stressed about being ripped off.

Using Evazion’ SOS function, you will be able to draw attention in case of an emergency.

Evazion is built to last! Its integrated protection system against overheating, overloads & short circuits promises you a secure charging experience without risking to damage your device.

With Evazion, become a committed environmental player. Enable positive and lasting changes for the preservation of global natural ecosystems!

EvaZion's packaging uses recyclable paper, certified by “Forest Stewardship Council” label.

All technological components used for EvaZion comply with ROHS environmental standards.

Maison Z wish to donate a part of its sales revenue to world leading organizations in environmental protection such as WWF (www.wwf.fr) and the GoodPlanet Foundation in order to build a brighter future where Human would be in harmony with Nature !

“I have been raised in a respect for French tradition. My education taught me attention to detail and sense of elegance. From my trips, I drew my open-mindedness, my admiration for handmade objects and my sensitivity to the environmental cause. Since then, I always wanted to transmit these values and to build something that would enhance my convictions.    I always thought technology could make a real difference. Evolving in the world of luxury,      I realized it actually was an extraordinary cultural driver. One year ago, I decided to create my own brand. I wanted to bring together the world of luxury, my love for French craftsmanship, my commitment to preserving Earth and the avant-garde spirit of new technologies. That is what Maison Z and EvaZion are all about!”

  

With each evaZion, you will receive a recyclable box including one charging lightning cable to fully charge your evaZion, a French & English booklet with materials certifications.

When we reach 15,000€, we will make EvaZion available in a brand new noble material. Crowdfunding is all or nothing. Please support us! We need your help to start manufacturing EvaZion, bring it to the world and grow our community. Together, let’s make a change for technology and for the world !

 

SHARE THIS PAGE ON FACEBOOK & TWITTER

story:
Everyone Needs a Hottie® Product!

  • Our engineers & staff have worked tirelessly to develop this cool technology, which is patented. We've tested these products in the lab & in the field. We've created manufacturing fixtures & worked with our manufacturer to establish processes—proven in quality assurance assessments to deliver consistently excellent products that perform as intended.
  • We own the US Patent for Hottie® technology which boosts signals to cell phone, bluetooth & WiFi devices, well-above 250%*. They do this without batteries, cables, apps’ or contracts & they work with all cell phones & service providers.
  • Now, we want to make these extremely effective signal boosters available to everyone who uses a cell phone or a wireless device...and isn't that just about everybody?

  • Hot Wireless will use funds from this campaign to build inventory & to further our branding & marketing. 

    * field lab test results

What We Need & What You Get

  • We intend to commit $5,000 for website re-design, including upgrading SEO.
  • We anticipate committing $30,000 toward branding and marketing which will include funds for booth(s) at appropriate show(s).
  • Total campaign $35,000.
  • The above are listed in the order in which funds will be allocated.
  • Besides our sincere thanks and gratitude:
    • We have wonderful perks that include Hottie®(s) and Hottie®Xtreme(s) @ discounted prices.

The Impact

  • These products are extremely effective at boosting signals. This has been demonstrated in the field and in our field test lab.  (watch our video!)
  • Our first IndieGoGo Campaign (Connect With A Hottie) was 102% funded and enabled us to put the first product - Hottie® into production which enabled us to deliver those perks exactly as scheduled. Very cool!
  • Our company was founded specifically to develop and bring these products to market.  Our success to date has been augmented by many factors for which we are really grateful:
    • Our lovely IndieGoGo contributors
    • Our product testers
    • Our hard-working & creative manufacturers (San Diego County, CA)
    • Our wonderful team, including the developer of this extremely effective technology

Risks & Challenges

We will meet our current challenges; further executing branding and marketing objectives. The support of contributors to our campaign will positively enable us to do this more quickly.

In addition, we will meet the challenges by leveraging our team members' mature capabilities:

  • Engineering, Administrative, Sales

As well, meeting our challenges is more likely because:

  • Our company has zero debt
  • We believe in this technology
  • The products are mature, in production
  • Our technology is protected by US Patents

We are thriving on every challenge we face to bring these exceptional products to those who need stronger signals.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can make a huge difference. In addition to your contribution, please help out...

  • Use those little icons on the top page of this campaign to share on Facebook, Twitter & via Email. Please spread the word to all your contacts...even people you talk to in person!

Thank you.  We love you!

story:
QI WIRELESS CHARGING CASE

Reason to make

  SAMSUNG GALAXY S8 comes with QI wireless charging, but most people do not know the powerfulness and convenience of wireless charging. We want to show you G-CELL, a safety, fast and convenient battery case powered by QI.

 

Phone battery expander

  Within G-cell, up to 4400mAh of LG Li-Poly battery doubles the life of your phone. You don’t need to carry the heavy power bank, but still fully enjoy using your mobile phone.

Efficiency

Powered by the latest NexFET Power Block from Texas Instruments with innovative power management system, we improve the end-to-end efficiency of wireless charging to more than 87.9%*, and at the same time decrease heat releasing. Much lower temperature (**), enables us to pack the whole wireless charging system into the G-CELL.

*(Measured in laboratory environment with RIGOL DP823 Power Supply, Keysight U1273AX DMM, receiving unit is bq51025EVM-649)

**(Measured with Keysight 1186A Thermocouple Kit, Keysight 1273AX DMM, the surface temperature of MOSFET reach 42°C at worst circumstance, and 8°C more than surroundings temperature on the surface of product，which compare our old modules, which reach 92°C on surface of power MOSFET and 26°C more than surroundings temperature, all the tests are conducted at 24°C, using STM8S+AON MOSFET solution randomly got on market)

Smart Power Path

  When you plug the type-C cable into G-cell, it will charge your phone first. After the phone has been fully charged, it will start charging itself. With Smart Power Path, it will automatically adjust the current flow through the wireless transmitting modules and battery, providing excellent charging experience with safety

Safety

  With 5 temperature sensors on board through all stage of running, G-CELL prevents critical components from over heat, ensuring durable and safe. To further strengthen the idea of build product with quality, all parts are sourced from certified distributors of top brand suppliers, such as TDK, Murata, Texas Instrument and STMicroelectronics

Exterior and Protection

  Taking human engineering and aesthetics into consideration, polycarbonate case enhanced by adding more than 30% of fiberglass, strengthen the structure to a new level - while protecting your phone, it also providing light weight and durability. Through the process of “mobile printing – cutting & molding – pressing”, we can make a perfect combination of art and technology, creating the perfect color that lasting long.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

With the efforts given by our powerful hardware and mechanical group, G-CELL is almost finished.

The leader of Hardware team has worked at Shenzhen for more than 4 years and built strong connections with local industry chain. We pick the suppliers we trust, preventing any fake, refurbished components from entering our products, maximumly ensuring the product’s safety. With industrial products background, we think we can achieve our goal of safety and durability.

Our hardware teaming is focusing on getting G-CELL certified around the world, including RoHS, FCC, CE, CCC, UL and QI. Pre-manufacture is already done, and send the sample for further testing. All device shows on video is fully function, and we have already using the G-CELL in our daily life for more than a month, it works perfectly.

We hire one of the top brand mold company -Younet Mold Co., LTD- in Shenzhen, China for the mold of G-CELL. With the help of them, we have completed both tooling and finishing of the mold of S8 and S8+. The leader of the mechanical group has more than 15years of working experience of molding and metal finishing, and we believe we can make the product that deserved our efforts.
story_txt:
QI WIRELESS CHARGING CASE

Reason to make
  SAMSUNG GALAXY S8 comes with QI wireless charging, but most people do not know the powerfulness and convenience of wireless charging. We want to show you G-CELL, a safety, fast and convenient battery case powered by QI.

 
Phone battery expander
  Within G-cell, up to 4400mAh of LG Li-Poly battery doubles the life of your phone. You don’t need to carry the heavy power bank, but still fully enjoy using your mobile phone.

Efficiency
Powered by the latest NexFET Power Block from Texas Instruments with innovative power management system, we improve the end-to-end efficiency of wireless charging to more than 87.9%*, and at the same time decrease heat releasing. Much lower temperature (**), enables us to pack the whole wireless charging system into the G-CELL.
*(Measured in laboratory environment with RIGOL DP823 Power Supply, Keysight U1273AX DMM, receiving unit is bq51025EVM-649)
**(Measured with Keysight 1186A Thermocouple Kit, Keysight 1273AX DMM, the surface temperature of MOSFET reach 42°C at worst circumstance, and 8°C more than surroundings temperature on the surface of product，which compare our old modules, which reach 92°C on surface of power MOSFET and 26°C more than surroundings temperature, all the tests are conducted at 24°C, using STM8S+AON MOSFET solution randomly got on market)

Smart Power Path
  When you plug the type-C cable into G-cell, it will charge your phone first. After the phone has been fully charged, it will start charging itself. With Smart Power Path, it will automatically adjust the current flow through the wireless transmitting modules and battery, providing excellent charging experience with safety

story:
LiveBlox- Build powerful apps without coding


How do you learn to code? Plain and simple, they said. But as an old proverb said, "The plain and simple things are rarely plain and never simple".

Many of us have given up on the idea for many different reasons - some because it's just too time-consuming to learn it, while others think it adds no value. Why? Because for many of us, we know that there is usually someone nearby who we can pay… although often a lot of money… to come to our rescue. 

What if there was an easier way to cut out the middleman and do it yourself?

Apulus introduces LiveBlox, a software platform that unleashes the technical creativity you never knew you had!

Our website: http://liveblox.org/


Our team designed this product because few of us have been able to invest the huge amount of time required to become computer wizards; many of us have very limited computer skills, and could not develop a software or an app, even if our life depended on it. 

But now you can! 


Try it yourself in the LiveBlox demo. 



With LiveBlox you can

Through LiveBlox's simple drag and drop interface, you can choose from a list of Blox (elements) and connect them together to build the functionality. 

The LiveBlox platform revolutionizes the way software and apps are developed, by eliminating the hundreds of man hours associated with software development, and making the process accessible to for non-technical people.

But that's not all! We have built in features that will enable you to do some incredible stuff.

One app built with LiveBlox was smile detection, here Rob and Nik goes through how to build it. (audio recommended) 



  • Computer Vision : LiveBlox was spawned to make computer vision easy. It contains hundreds of blocks that make this accessible. Such as detecting movement, faces or other objects.
  • Interactivity:  Build interactive components in the software, such as virtual buttons or gesture control.
  • Video Composition: A new twist on video composition and live video. Use blocks to build the video editing environment you want rather than being restricted by the layout of the software.
  • Audio: A high-quality audio engine allows real-time audio processing and synthesis.
  • MIDI: Use either a midi keyboard or controller as inputs into LiveBlox.
  • Visual Dj-ing: If you like to throw some insane parties at home or you run a club / festival LiveBlox is your tool to create some really cool effects. 



LiveBlox is so flexible; by connecting the 'Blox' what you can build is only limited by your imagination.


How it Works

It has never been so easy to develop software applications.

The functionality of your software will come from the "Blox". They can each handle a single task. By adding and connecting them together, you can make the application you want.

The "Blox" come in all shapes and sizes. Some are inputs, such as webcam, video file, audio input. Others can act as a filter such as changing colors on a video stream or equalizing audio. LiveBlox contains elements for computer vision, which gives you the power to detect objects, faces, people, movement and colors and act on that input.

LiveBlox makes it simple to build your own software applications, by following a simple 4 step approach:

  1. Drop the Blox you want into the editor
  2. Connect them together
  3. Build your own Graphic User Interface (GUI)
  4. Export and run

Exported application


An Example Application - Air Drum Kit

We built an air drum kit using Liveblox. In this video you can see one of our Cambodian friends trying it out:


This works by detecting movement in sections of the video and triggering drum sounds.

Inside the video button, the finger is detected as movement in a small area of the video. It can  trigger actions such as playing a sound.


Technical Details

Key Points: 

  • LiveBlox is a software platform for building complicated and high performance applications.

  • It provides a visual interface that allows the user to really understand the data-flow through the software.

  • It has a drag and drop interface allowing “Blox” to be added and connected in order to build a pipeline.

  • It has hundreds of elements for computer vision, image processing, audio processing, video, 3D, midi control, networking and many more.

  • It allows custom applications to be exported with their own GUI.


Core Features: 

  • Element controls can be changed at runtime.

  • Stream based node connection system, allowing data transfers between blocks.

  • Pipelines can be exported and run as standalone applications.

  • CUDA support allows algorithms to run on GPU.

  • Mapping connections, allowing parameters to be locked together.

  • LiveBlox utilizes many functions from OpenCV. 

  • LiveBlox supports standard software interfaces (platform dependent) such as Syphon, allowing for the transferring of video data between other applications.

  • The GUI builder allows for creation of custom user interfaces, using a selection of the controls already available on the blocks.

  • LiveBlox will contain a number of blocks for inputs and outputs, including plug-ins to support manufacturer-specific hardware such as SDI / DVI interfaces, audio interfaces and perhaps even lighting controllers and other I/O devices.

  • For power users, Python support allows scripting at run time.


LiveBlox In Amsterdam

In Amsterdam, we used LiveBlox to thrill and enthrall, generating and projecting complex, real time visuals from a moving platform to support a marketing campaign for a global brand.



What We Need & What You Get

We, at Apulus, have funded the design and development of LiveBlox ourselves, in between all our other projects. But this is only the start. We believe that the best way to get our product out there is by giving prospective users a first-hand experience of using LiveBlox, so we now need additional funding to bring this to the market (participating in trade shows and exhibitions across Europe and Asia is important but comes at a cost), and to further develop our brilliant product. 

At the moment, we are a small operation and now need to dedicate effort to LiveBlox, especially to help prospective customers fine-tune it to their own requirements. The funds we aim to raise through this campaign will help us beef up our staff so that we can do this and purchase additional equipment. It will also help us devote more time and effort to the testing stages of our software before we can make it commercially available.

Visionaries like you can contribute to the development of LiveBlox in many ways. We have prepared an exciting rewards program that truly values your contribution.


The Impact

Our business is located in one of Southeast Asia's booming metropolises, with a pool of fresh and dynamic talent. Cambodia has treated us well , so we want to give something back to this country by providing jobs for the local talent. So, by funding our campaign, you don't just help Apulus build its software, but you also enable us to support our community here in Siem Reap by generating much needed jobs. We need a team of dynamic software engineers, and sourcing talent locally, providing them with first class training, and the experience to pursue a career as software engineers is part of our strategy as a socially responsible business.


Risks & Challenges

Our group is comprised of amazingly talented individuals with experience in management and software development, yet, like any startup, we are faced with the challenge of financing the continuing development of its products. We aim to use IndieGoGo as a tool to help us to address this challenge. We know that good people like to support the 'little man'; we may be small, but only for now! Your contribution will help us develop into a company that offers innovative superior products, generates jobs for our communities, and continues to be responsive to the ever changing demands of our customers. 

We aim to release early September.  


Other Ways You Can Help

Your financial contributions are important, you can help us generate awareness about our Indiegogo campaign by doing the following:

  • Share, Repost, Retweet - Help us gain more followers on our social media accounts on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram. Help us get the word out.
  • Organize a LiveBlox Demo and Fundraiser Barbecue - while our team cannot be personally with you, we can send you tools and resources to introduce LiveBlox to your friends, and help us raise funds. We can give your group a perk if you raise at least US$ 100.00 for our campaign! Don't forget to get a Groupfie and post in on social media with the hashtag #LiveBloxonindiegogo.
  • In the neighborhood?  - If you are in the area, why not swing by our office and help us to refine our product by providing your insights and feedback. If it is after office hours, lets have a beer! 

Rob, Myself (Nik) and Steve wish to thank all of you for your contribution to this campaign! 

Video by Simon Taplin Photography
http://www.simontaplin.com/

Music by Tobu & Jordan Kelvin James
http://www.youtube.com/tobuofficial

story:
KeyTipp is the first mobile app that lets you ask any question and offer a reward for a satisfactory answer. In just a few seconds, you can reach out to thousands of people, getting their knowledge and experience, so you don’t have to do the whole searching and learning process again!

Why spend lots of time trying to find information for a mediocre or unsatisfactory outcome, when someone already knows the answer and is keen to share it?!

We need your support to grow this app into an even better way of sharing and earning!


support us!

Ever travelled to somewhere new and wanted inside knowledge or tips?

Ever wanted to translate something better than just guessing on google translate?

Ever wanted product recommendations from people with experience?

Ever had to find specific information and failed after hours of search?

Ever struggled with finding inspiration for a present to a relative?

Everyday we struggle with at least one of these things!

KeyTipp could be useful to millions of people everyday, whether it is getting knowledge or a means of earning!

We want to grow this project from an interesting experience for some, to a useful tool for everyone! We need your support to develop this product and make its limitless possibilities accessible to everyone worldwide.


challenges

As all new start-ups, we have challenges up ahead, but to be perfectly honest, our risks are minimal. The product is already launched and is self-sustainable but the key challenge is market expansion. We currently have lots of users scattered around the world but our real strength will be when we achieve hundreds of users for each location.

With your support, we will be able to fuel some critical developments that would make this app a real game changer.

If you can’t donate, just download the app and share this campaign on Social media. The app is free and you get 20 points for joining.

We would be tremendously grateful for any contribution you can make!


about us

Our story is similar to many; we are two childhood friends from Geneva, who went our separate ways and met a few years ago in another business. Complementing each other so well we decided to build KeyTipp together.

Beyond merely excellent professional compatibility, it is the perfect trust in one-another that allows us to work well together year after year.


If you want to get in touch directly, connect with us on linkedin!

Nathan Chauvet                              Edward Cassels
 Linkedin profile                                 Linkedin profile


PS: Making the movie was fun ! After 196 takes, 3 helicopters, 2 lawn mowers, 6 dogs, 24 people, one curious little pigeon and lots of laughters, we are proud (not really) of our home made video made on an iphone. Shaky camera and stuttering compliments of Nathan and Edward respectfully.

story:
Access to any e-book or reading app in the world... and more

If you buy an e-reader these days, in many cases you will enter a certain ecosystem. For instance if you buy a Kindle, you will need to buy your books with Kindle as they have their proprietary format and no support for other formats. With Kobo it is comparable. This is the way that they do business but it is not what we want for our customers.

From the moment we started the Icarus brand in 2010, we have advocated an open system in which the user could get books from many sources, including the standards ePub and PDF. In 2014 we took this one step further by basing our e-readers on the Android system. This enabled the user to install many apps (reading apps, RSS, news,...) on their e-reader, expanding its opportunities. Apps needed to be installed via so-called side-loading or via our appstore in cooperation with Goodereader. 

Customers have always asked us to include the Play Store and with this edition of the Illumina, this is finally a reality.

The inclusion of the Play Store allows much more convenience for search for apps, installing them and keeping them up to date. And of course the Google Apps (drive, books) now also work on the Illumina.

There really is no limit now to what you can do with your e-reader: use new and innovative ways of reading books (subscriptions like Scribd, Skoobe, Mofibo, Bliyoo, Bookmate, ReadFy and library apps), use apps for offline reading of articles or web pages and more.

There is no e-reader on the market that offers the possibilities that our Illumina does.


The new Illumina with Google Play Store

The Icarus Illumina enters a new era with the inclusion of the Google Play Store. When launched originally, the Illumina carried its own app store in cooperation with Goodreader. This offered a selection of apps among which a curated section of reading apps.

We now take it one step further: this version of the Illumina comes with a pre-installed Google Play Store. So in addition to reading apps that are installed out-of-the-box, you can now easily download thousands of apps available in the play store. Keeping apps up to date is now also a breeze. 

The E-Ink Carta screen displays text crisply and with high contrast (212 DPI).

The Illumina is compact, lightweight and comfortable to hold, It includes physical page turning buttons that offer 'one hand reading' and a screen refresh button, which is very helpful with certain apps that are not optimized for E-Ink screens.

The integrated front light enables comfortable reading even in low light situations and of course the Illumina has a touchscreen, Wi-Fi and plenty of storage for your books (8Gb).

What makes the Illumina truly unique, it its compatibility with all e-book platforms. From e-book web shops to all-you-can-read subscriptions, from public libraries to public domain books and more. 

Note: this product is not yet on sales via our website or web shops. The Illumina E653BK that you find elsewhere does not contain the Google Play Store. The product in this campaign is the E653BK-GP.



Out-of-the box our Illumina e-reader - running on Android 4.2 - can run apps from all reading platforms, such as Scribd, Skoobe, Kindle, Kobo, Mofibo, Bliyoo and many more. Public libraries have Android reading apps to, so with our e-readers you can also lend books at your library. If you own a library of books of a closed ecosystem already (for instance Kindle) you can easily access it on the Illumina using the Kindle app. By using cloud storage apps like Dropbox (pre-installed) or others, you can access your library stored in the cloud.

Via the Google Play Store you have access to thousands of apps.

Below you find some screenshots of apps running on the Illumina :


The Illumina is also future proof: as Android is the dominant mobile device operating system you can rest assured that any future reading app will be available on Android.


The Illumina at work (video)

This video shows Play Store at work on the Illumina. Opening the store, searching, downloading and installing apps with the example of an RSS Reader.


Full specifications:

  • 6"  E-Ink Carta touchscreen (1024 x 768 pixels, 212 DPI)
  • Integrated frontlight (adjustable intensity and can be turned off)
  • Wi-Fi
  • Android 4.2: install your own apps
  • 1Ghz Dual Core A9 Cortex with 512MB RAM
  • 8 Gb internal memory
  • Micro SD card slot for expanding the memory with maximum 32Gb
  • Supports ePub and PDF with Adobe DRM and in addition FB2, RTF, MOBI, TXT, HTM
  • Audio support (MP3) and 3.5mm headphone jack
  • Battery: 2,000mAh Lithium Ion
  • 168 x 1185 x 9mm,197 gr.

Icarus is active worldwide, from Amsterdam to Munich, from Toronto to New Delhi. Thousands of customers have purchased our e-readers over the last years. We offer e-readers for all customer groups, from casual readers to avid readers and professionals that use e-readers for sustained reading and creating a paperless office. Our customer base values our fairly priced but advanced devices and favors open systems versus being locked in. Now is the time for you to join them!


What We Need & What You Get

This is not your typical campaign. Why? The e-readers will be available within a month! 

This campaign provides you with the opportunity to be among the first to purchase and use this product. Contribute to our campaign now and you can already have your e-reader before end of April.

We have a couple of great perks for our contributors:



This is a flexible funding campaign, the e-readers are already in stock. Via this Indiegogo campaign, you will be among the first to call the Illumina Google Play Edition your own!


Timeline

The Illumina Google Play Edition is already in stock.

  • March/April 2016: Indiegogo campaign
  • April 2016: shipment to Indiegogo backers


The company

The Icarus brand belongs to Distriread B.V., one of the pioneering companies in the e-reader market in the Netherlands. DistriRead originated from the company iRex that developed one of the first E-Ink e-readers many years ago. Since 2008 DistriRead is active in the e-reader market and in 2010 the Icarus brand was founded. Icarus products are sold worldwide by a network of distributors and major retailers and e-tailers like Mediamarkt, Fnac, Expert, Coolblue, Paradigit, Vobis, Bol.com, Amazon to name a few. 

The Icarus team is composed of a mix of people with a combined experience in the consumer electronics industry of more than 20 years.

DistriRead is located in the city of Eindhoven, the tech capital of the Netherlands.

DistriRead B.V. |  Luchthavenweg 81 - 1.39a  |  5657 EA  |  Eindhoven  | The Netherlands  |  +31 40 304 00 10  |  info@icarusreader.com

In 2015 the Icarus Team launched its' Illumina XL 8 inch e-reader via an Indiegogo campaign as well. You can read back on this campaign here: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/illumina-xl-8-inch-android-e-reader 


FAQ

Q: Why would I not just read on my phone or tablet?

A: For casual reading on the go you could use a phone or tablet. But only E-Ink devices offer you a comfortable reading experience if you are reading for longer periods as the screen does not lead to eye fatigue. Also if you want to read outside on a LCD screen this is very difficult due to the reflections. If you are serious about reading, the best device to do so on is an e-reader.

Q: How can I read Kindle books on the Illumina?

A: For reading Kindle books on the Icarus e-reader, simply run the Kindle App. This will allow you to access your existing library and to read those books.


Q: I see the Illumina on sale on other places on the web. Does that version also include the Google Play Store?

A: No, this Indiegogo campaign page is the only place where you can purchase this edition with Google Play at the moment. 


Q: How can I read Kobo books on the Illumina?

A: For reading Kobo books on the Icarus e-reader, simply run the Kobo App. This will allow you to access your existing library and to read those books.


Q: How can I use apps like Skoobe so I can read unlimited books at a monthly fee?

A: Simply install the Skoobe app on the Illumina. Like any app, simply open the Google Play Store, search for the app and press Install. It is that easy!


Q: Will all apps work on my e-reader?

A: Not all apps will run on the Illumina. Apps that were designed for a newer Android version (the Illumina runs 4.2.2) might not work. Additionally apps are generally designed for use on LCD screens in mind. They might behave differently on an E-Ink screen. Apps that were designed for reading (ebooks, news, RSS etc.) in general work really well on our e-readers. 


Q: Do you ship to my country too?

A: We ship our e-readers worldwide via Fedex and DPD. Shipping charges do apply.

Shipping to Europe: $ 7. Shipping to US and Canada: $15, Shipping to Rest of the World: $25. Custom duties might apply.
story_txt:
Access to any e-book or reading app in the world... and moreIf you buy an e-reader these days, in many cases you will enter a certain ecosystem. For instance if you buy a Kindle, you will need to buy your books with Kindle as they have their proprietary format and no support for other formats. With Kobo it is comparable. This is the way that they do business but it is not what we want for our customers.From the moment we started the Icarus brand in 2010, we have advocated an open system in which the user could get books from many sources, including the standards ePub and PDF. In 2014 we took this one step further by basing our e-readers on the Android system. This enabled the user to install many apps (reading apps, RSS, news,...) on their e-reader, expanding its opportunities. Apps needed to be installed via so-called side-loading or via our appstore in cooperation with Goodereader. Customers have always asked us to include the Play Store and with this edition of the Illumina, this is finally a reality.The inclusion of the Play Store allows much more convenience for search for apps, installing them and keeping them up to date. And of course the Google Apps (drive, books) now also work on the Illumina.There really is no limit now to what you can do with your e-reader: use new and innovative ways of reading books (subscriptions like Scribd, Skoobe, Mofibo, Bliyoo, Bookmate, ReadFy and library apps), use apps for offline reading of articles or web pages and more.There is no e-reader on the market that offers the possibilities that our Illumina does.The new Illumina with Google Play StoreThe Icarus Illumina enters a new era with the inclusion of the Google Play Store. When launched originally, the Illumina carried its own app store in cooperation with Goodreader. This offered a selection of apps among which a curated section of reading apps.We now take it one step further: this version of the Illumina comes with a pre-installed Google Play Store. So in addition to reading apps that are installed out-of-the-box, you can now easily download thousands of apps available in the play store. Keeping apps up to date is now also a breeze. The E-Ink Carta screen displays text crisply and with high contrast (212 DPI).The Illumina is compact, lightweight and comfortable to hold, It includes physical page turning buttons that offer 'one hand reading' and a screen refresh button, which is very helpful with certain apps that are not optimized for E-Ink screens.The integrated front light enables comfortable reading even in low light situations and of course the Illumina has a touchscreen, Wi-Fi and plenty of storage for your books (8Gb).What makes the Illumina truly unique, it its compatibility with all e-book platforms. From e-book web shops to all-you-can-read subscriptions, from public libraries to public domain books and more. Note: this product is not yet on sales via our website or web shops. The Illumina E653BK that you find elsewhere does not contain the Google Play Store. The product in this campaign is the E653BK-GP.Out-of-the box our Illumina e-reader - running on Android 4.2 - can run apps from all reading platforms, such as Scribd, Skoobe, Kindle, Kobo, Mofibo, Bliyoo and many more. Public libraries have Android reading apps to, so with our e-readers you can also lend books at your library. If you own a library of books of a closed ecosystem already (for instance Kindle) you can easily access it on the Illumina using the Kindle app. By using cloud storage apps like Dropbox (pre-installed) or others, you can access your library stored in the cloud.Via the Google Play Store you have access to thousands of apps.Below you find some screenshots of apps running on the Illumina :The Illumina is also future proof: as Android is the dominant mobile device operating system you can rest assured that any future reading app will be available on Android.The Illumina at work (video)This video shows Play Store at work on the Illumina. Opening the store, searching, downloading and installing apps with the example of an RSS Reader.Full specifications:
6"  E-Ink Carta touchscreen (1024 x 768 pixels, 212 DPI)
Integrated frontlight (adjustable intensity and can be turned off)
Wi-Fi
Android 4.2: install your own apps
1Ghz Dual Core A9 Cortex with 512MB RAM
8 Gb internal memory
Micro SD card slot for expanding the memory with maximum 32Gb
Supports ePub and PDF with Adobe DRM and in addition FB2, RTF, MOBI, TXT, HTM
Audio support (MP3) and 3.5mm headphone jack
Battery: 2,000mAh Lithium Ion
168 x 1185 x 9mm,197 gr.
Icarus is active worldwide, from Amsterdam to Munich, from Toronto to New Delhi. Thousands of customers have purchased our e-readers over the last years. We offer e-readers for all customer groups, from casual readers to avid readers and professionals that use e-readers for sustained reading and creating a paperless office.
