story:
About this project

Hot Pink Newest Smallest Wireless Invisible Bluetooth Mini Earphone Earbud Headset Headphone Support Hands-free Calling For iPhone Samsung Xiaomi Sony Lenovo HTC LG and Most Smartphone. (Pink)

1 The Newest bluetooth headset with lightweight and compact portable design.We are committed to creating the most Mini bluetooth headsets. Simple and Stylish.

2 Built-in HD and sensitivity microphone. Ideal for in-car calling or working use. Support A2DP , makes you can enjoy clear and natural sound when calling.

3 Built-in 50 Mah polymer battery. Up to 4 hours of continuous talk time, 3.5 hours of music time. Only need to charging 2 hours. Do not over 2 hours.

4 Pairing Instruction: Press and hold the button until the voice states"Ready to pair" or the LED light flashing Red and Blue.

5 Notice : The bluetooth is only for one ear . Not a pair. Due to the difference of people's ear, this earphone maybe not fits everyone. If the one you get is not perfect for you, please let us know. We will find a best way to help you.


Risks and challenges

There is no risk in this investment. We are first in the market with a complete advertising plan and sale plan. We will target Amazon USA , Amazon Canada , Amazon UK , Amazon Spain , Amazon France , Amazon Italy , Amazon Germany. 

in addition to above , we will go to trade shows like ASD las vegas and will get different retailers. 

I am CPA and law graduate and give 100% surety that we will succeed in this project.

There is no chance of failure.

Please help to build our profitable business.

I bought two domains. 
www.MiniEarbud.com 
www.Smallestearbud.com 
i will apply for trademark upon receipt of your blessings.

story:
Flipmaster3000

 

We invented a Modular Smartphone Case that is affordable and features lots of new Functions. The Case stores the Modules and has four Holes to quickly remove everything. We provided Flipmaster3000 with a holding Mechanism allowing you to use some Modules like the Gamepad or the Keyboard on the go. The holding Mechanism is semi-elastic for an easy flip around of the Case. You can also adjust the holding Angle by pulling the knots up or down. After flipping the Case around you can place it upright.

 

 

The Modules are flexibly combinable insinde the Case and stick to it due to Nano Suction Pads.   

 

 

Compatibility

 

 

Flipmaster 3000 is available for every Smartphone, either Android, iOS or another OS. Most of the modules work with Bluetooth Low Energy, so they are compatible with any device that has Bluetooth Low Energy. You can check that by downloading the free App BLE Checker for Android. All of the iPhones since the 4S have got Bluetooth Low Energy. Please consider that some features, such as programmable buttons, won't work on iOS. The module side of the case will be adapted to the size of your smartphone for a perfect fit. For very big phones or phablets it might be that the case will have another module slot depending on the overall space.

 

The Modules

Are you looking for a portable Gamepad for your smartphone? Are your fingertips burning because of your super hot and smudgy display? Check out our Günther. It pairs with any phone, as well as with your notebook or PC. It is only 5 mm thick, fits right into your pocket, its battery lasts over two Weeks due to Bluetooth Low Energy and it has everything you need to play your favorite Mobile Games.

  • Product Name: Günther the Gamepad
  • OS: Android, iOS, Windows, Linux
  • Compatible Games/Apps: all HID games/apps, PS2 emulator, Gameboy emulator, any Emulator with HID support
  • Colors: matt black, matt white, customized
  • Keys: 4-way D-Pad, 4x keys, 2 action keys, 2 triggers, all configurable
  • Actuation Force: 80 - 90 g
  • Size: 138 mm x 34,5 mm x 5 mm
  • Weight: 40 g
  • Connection: Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0
  • LEDs: Status LED, charging indicator
  • Body Material: recycled ABS
  • Battery: 250 mAh Li-Po Battery
  • Holding Mechanism: 2 x nano-suction pads
  • Battery Life: 2 weeks @ 4 hours daily
  • Charging Port: Micro USB
  • Specials: Multifunctional use as PowerPoint Presenter or similar, Keybind App for Android

Help us bring Günther up to series and make the second Günther - a version with two additional joysticks - also possible.

Are you a friend of haptic Feedback while texting, too? Do you write many e-mails on your smartphone or do you dislike it because the touchscreen is not big or comfortable enough? Try out our Kerstin, a fully-fledged Keyboard for your smartphone and tablet. Kerstin has mechanical Keys and is designed for the use with two Fingers. Thanks to Bluetooth Low Energy, its battery lasts several weeks and it also has configurable Hotkeys.

 

 

  • Product Name: Kerstin the Keyboard
  • OS: Android, iOS, Windows, Linux
  • Compatible Apps: All Office and writing apps like WhatsApp, Microsoft Office and similar
  • Colors: matt black, matt white, customized
  • Layout: QWERTY and QWERTZ, we can deliver any other layout as well, attach a message to your order with the desired layout
  • Keys: 66, including programmable keys for shortcuts and smiley key
  • Actuation Force: 40 - 50 g
  • Size: 138 mm x 69 mm x 5 mm
  • Weight: 40 g
  • Connection: Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0
  • LED: Status LED, charging indicator, Capslock light
  • Body Material: recycled ABS
  • Battery:  280 mAh Li-Po Battery
  • Battery Life: 2 weeks @ 3 hours daily
  • Holding Mechanism: 4 x nano-suction pads
  • Charging Port: Micro USB
  • Specials: Keybind, Shortcut and Layout App for Android

The time of carrying big and heavy Bluetooth speakers with you to the park or from one room to another just to keep enjoying your music is coming to an end. All you need from now is Sandra. With Sandra, you have a Portable Speaker System that connects via Bluetooth to your phone or any other Bluetooth device. Its battery lasts for a couple of hours and the 2.2 Speaker Array with 2 Subs and 2 Tweeters provide you with clear and warm sound.

 

 

  • Product Name: Sandra the Speaker
  • OS: Android, iOS, Windows, Linux
  • Speaker: 2 x Subwoofer (150 - 6000 Hz) and 2 x Tweeter ( 250 - 20000 Hz)
  • Controls: Audio control keys (Play, Pause Record, Skip, Volume Up/Down)
  • Colors: matt black, matt white, customized 
  • Size: 138 mm x 34,5 mm x 5 mm
  • Weight: 25 g
  • Connection: Bluetooth 4.0 (A2DP)
  • Loudness: 85 dB max SPL
  • Body Material: recycled ABS
  • Battery:  350 mAh Li-Po Battery
  • LED: Status LED, charging indicator
  • Battery Life: 2 h @ maximum volume
  • Charging Port: Micro USB
  • Holding Mechanism:  2 x nano-suction pads
  • Specials: Built-in microphone for Intercom, recording interviews or espionage, Android app with multi-band equalizer

 

Do you have a good smartphone camera but a crappy flashlight? With our Flashlight-Larry you have the ability to shoot professionally-exposed Images due to its 9 LEDs, each containing warm white, cold white and amber color temperatures. For this get the Larry with the WWA LEDs. You simply connect your Android or Windows Phone to it and adjust the color temperature according to your needs. Larry is triggered with every Camera Shot you take, or it can be toggled manually by clicking its side-button.

 

  • Product Name: Larry the LED-Module
  • OS: Android, iOS
  • LEDs: 9 x QUAD LED with Red Green Blue White or 9 x TRIPLE LED with warm-white, cold-white and amber
  • Usecase: RGBW: Mood Light, Flashlight, Bike Light WWA: Photography Illumination, Camera Flash, Flashlight, Bike Light
  • Controls: Brightness adjustable for each color with 254 steps for perfect color mix
  • Scenes and Steps: Easy In-App customization for your own light-show with nearly unlimited scenes and steps, storable shows
  • Colors: matt black, matt white, customized 
  • Size: 69 mm x 34,5 mm x 5 mm
  • Weight: 15 g
  • Connection: Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0
  • Body Material: recycled ABS
  • Battery: 150 mAh Li-Po Battery
  • Battery Life: 4-6 h, 2 h @ maximum brightness
  • Holding Mechanism: 2 x nano-suction pads
  • Charging Port: Micro USB
  • Specials: LightMix App for Android and iOS, manual trigger for flash


If you want to use a fully adjustable ambient light, get Larry with RGBW LEDs. Every LED can set a different color, controlled by your phone via Bluetooth, or set up beforehand and started manually when Larry is disconnected from the phone.

A dark pub. Your Make-Up is running in the stuffy atmosphere. But with Michelle, you just need to flip your phone open and attend to your problem easily no matter where you are. If you are feeling adventurous, you can even film around the corner with your smartphone camera. Or think about something new to do with a mirror. 

 

 

  • Product Name: Michelle the Mirror
  • Mirror: High-grade acrylic mirror with 60 mm diameter, no magnification
  • Colors: matt black, matt white, customized 
  • Size: 69 mm x 69 mm x 5 mm
  • Weight: 12 g
  • Body Material: recycled ABS
  • Holding Mechanism:  4 x nano-suction pads
  • Specials: Shock-resistant, scratch-resistant

 

 

You have ordered a gamepad and the speakers and you like using them together but you don’t feel like charging them separately? That is what the charging station is for: charge up to four modules at once and do not worry about having too many cables attached to your phone!

Designed to fit any module, the charging station is suitable for passionate gadget collectors who cannot bear using only one of the modules.

 

 

Perks

 

Customization

 

The Flipmaster3000 and all of our modules are available in three Themes: simple white, simple black, or custom.

If you choose the custom Design, you will get your Flipmaster3000 and all ordered Modules with a theme of your choice. Simply choose from our Templates or upload your own Image. Check out the design examples in the pictures and enjoy the awesome Colors.

After you have completed the ordering process on this page, the perks orders will be processed through our company webshop, where you can proceed with your specifications and preferences. This will happen at the stage when the prototypes are finalized and you will receive Updates to our progress regarding their development and the timeline until your order arrives.

But what does it cost?

Well, nothing! Become one of our backers and support us in bringing our prototype to its end-user stage, and have your perks customized for free.

Design examples:

Timeline

 

Not done yet...

 

You want to collaborate with us and implement your own Gadgets into Flipmaster3000? We build everything Open Source and looking forward to be a Platform for other Gadget Developers.  

Spread the word and help us get more contributors to make this idea become reality. You can use the Indiegogo tools to share our campaign on your social media channels. Visit our website if you are interested in what else we do, follow us on Facebook and be a part of our dream.

And last but not least, a big thank you for any kind of contribution, because every single gesture of support you make helps us get a step closer to finishing this project. Stay tuned for updates on the process!

Any Questions?

Do you have a good smartphone camera but a crappy flashlight? With our Flashlight-Larry you have the ability to shoot professionally-exposed Images due to its 9 LEDs, each containing warm white, cold white and amber color temperatures. For this get the Larry with the WWA LEDs. You simply connect your Android or Windows Phone to it and adjust the color temperature according to your needs. Larry is triggered with every Camera Shot you take, or it can be toggled manually by clicking its side-button.
 


Product Name: Larry the LED-Module

OS: Android, iOS

LEDs: 9 x QUAD LED with Red Green Blue White or 9 x TRIPLE LED with warm-white, cold-white and amber

Usecase: RGBW: Mood Light, Flashlight, Bike Light WWA: Photography Illumination, Camera Flash, Flashlight, Bike Light 


Controls: Brightness adjustable for each color with 254 steps for perfect color mix

Scenes and Steps: Easy In-App customization for your own light-show with nearly unlimited scenes and steps, storable shows

Colors: matt black, matt white, customized 

Size: 69 mm x 34,5 mm x 5 mm

Weight: 15 g

Connection: Bluetooth Low Energy 5.0

Body Material: recycled ABS

Battery: 150 mAh Li-Po Battery

Battery Life: 4-6 h, 2 h @ maximum brightness

Holding Mechanism: 2 x nano-suction pads

Charging Port: Micro USB

Specials: LightMix App for Android and iOS, manual trigger for flash

If you want to use a fully adjustable ambient light, get Larry with RGBW LEDs. Every LED can set a different color, controlled by your phone via Bluetooth, or set up beforehand and started manually when Larry is disconnected from the phone.



A dark pub. Your Make-Up is running in the stuffy atmosphere. But with Michelle, you just need to flip your phone open and attend to your problem easily no matter where you are. If you are feeling adventurous, you can even film around the corner with your smartphone camera. Or think about something new to do with a mirror. 
 

 


Product Name: Michelle the Mirror

Mirror: High-grade acrylic mirror with 60 mm diameter, no magnification

Colors: matt black, matt white, customized 

Size: 69 mm x 69 mm x 5 mm

Weight: 12 g

Body Material: recycled ABS

Holding Mechanism:  4 x nano-suction pads

Specials: Shock-resistant, scratch-resistant



 
 
You have ordered a gamepad and the speakers and you like using them together but you don’t feel like charging them separately? That is what the charging station is for: charge up to four modules at once and do not worry about having too many cables attached to your phone!
Designed to fit any module, the charging station is suitable for passionate gadget collectors who cannot bear using only one of the modules.
 

 
Perks


 
Customization

 
The Flipmaster3000 and all of our modules are available in three Themes: simple white, simple black, or custom.
If you choose the custom Design, you will get your Flipmaster3000 and all ordered Modules with a theme of your choice. Simply choose from our Templates or upload your own Image. Check out the design examples in the pictures and enjoy the awesome Colors.
After you have completed the ordering process on this page, the perks orders will be processed through our company webshop, where you can proceed with your specifications and preferences. This will happen at the stage when the prototypes are finalized and you will receive Updates to our progress regarding their development and the timeline until your order arrives.
But what does it cost?
Well, nothing! Become one of our backers and support us in bringing our prototype to its end-user stage, and have your perks customized for free.
Design examples:



Timeline


 
Not done yet...

 
You want to collaborate with us and implement your own Gadgets into Flipmaster3000? We build everything Open Source and looking forward to be a Platform for other Gadget Developers.  

Spread the word and help us get more contributors to make this idea become reality. You can use the Indiegogo tools to share our campaign on your social media channels. Visit our website if you are interested in what else we do, follow us on Facebook and be a part of our dream.
And last but not least, a big thank you for any kind of contribution, because every single gesture of support you make helps us get a step closer to finishing this project. Stay tuned for updates on the process!
Any Questions?

story:
A Pink Racing Campaign For A Cause


For those of you meeting me for the first time, my name is Pippa, and this is the third year of my partnership with Susan G. Komen. With the support of my team, Dale Coyne Racing, my helmet, suit and racing car will feature the Komen logos and marks at this year's Indianapolis 500. We pair our on-car partnership with this campaign, raising funds for breast cancer care and research. This is our second year on Indiegogo, and for the 100th Running of the Indianapolis 500 this year, we have an ambitious goal.


$100,000 At The 100th Running

Despite all the advances in research did you know that 1 in 8 women in the US will be diagnosed with breast cancer in her lifetime?

  • $100,000 could fund over 750 screening mammograms for underinsured and uninsured women, or go to help over 7000 individuals navigate their way through the breast cancer care path.
  • $100,000 could fund 2 years of support stipend for a graduate student studying disparities in breast cancer outcomes.
  • $100,000 could fund 1 month of support for the Translational Breast Cancer Research Consortium which conduct innovative and high-impact trails for breast cancer.

    • We admit that we're going to be promoting a lot of pink over the course of this campaign, but this goes so much deeper than a color. 

    The money we raise through this campaign will help save lives.


    Photo from Susan G. Komen Central Indiana Race for the Cure 2015.


    Our Goal

    We know the goal we've set ourselves is scary, but let's break it down. 

    We're looking for 1000 people to get involved for $100. 

    You could purchase a signed Bell mini-helmet, a signed print of our 2016 car by artist Doug Garrison, or you could put the name of a loved one in the cockpit of my race car. You could get your whole family involved in the campaign through our family pack, you could sign the biggest young Pippa fan you know up for our Ultimate Youth Supporter Pack, or you could go for the pink signed 100th Running cap and pink 100th Running koozie from IMS.

    Or we're looking for 2000 people to get involved at $50. 

    You could come and race me in a go kart at Fastimes, or choose a signed pink or charcoal Pippa cap. You could help us power towards a cure with our custom campaign power bank to charge your phone, sign up someone young in your family for the Youth Supporter Pack (including the mini 1:64 Pippa themed diecast car), decide to go for one of our 2016 campaign posters, or a Pippa water bottle.

    You can start out by becoming a supporter for as little as $20, or you could spend big and take home my race worn gloves or fire suit. The choice is yours.

    And if $20 to get involved is still too steep, you can still help us reach our goal. We need you to tell your friends, share our campaign on social media, and get involved to help us find the supporters who will help our total climb!


    The Perks

    This year we are bundling our perks together to create a "Supporter Pack," and then almost every perk you see builds from there.


    Our Supporter Pack includes a custom Pippa helmet pin, only available via the campaign, a Komen wristband, a BREVAGenplus mini stylus/penlight, a signed autograph card, a 1 year free membership to Travel for the Cause, and a 25% off one-time use coupon for Pippa's store that will be emailed out in the days following your contribution. Our first 100 campaign contributors will also receive a pink Komen Koozie along with their selected perk.

    As we did in 2015, we will be sending as many items out as possible as the campaign goes on. Please take photos of your Perks as they arrive, and share them with us on social media!


    Campaign Posters

    Our campaign posters were a big hit in 2015, but they ended up joining our campaign fairly late in the game. We had a lot of requests months and months after the campaign as to where people could find them... 

    For 2016 we are launching our posters as a Perk right at the start of the campaign. 


    We are asking for your help in sharing our poster image from the campaign gallery with the internet at large, so people know we have them, and they are available for purchase only here, and only through May 29! 

    Posters will once again be printed following the race, and Pippa will sign them before they are sent out.

    Race With Pippa Night

    Race with Pippa Night is back for it's second year as part of the Get Involved Campaign, but this time, we've switched things up!


    • Every racer gets one practice session AND one heat on the night of the event.

       This means things will move more quickly, and everyone will get more track time. It also means that when you're not on track, Pippa will have more time to hang out, and spend more quality time with all of our guests.

    • The fastest 7 times will set the field for the Championship Race.

       Pippa will join these drivers on track for the Big Race of the night.

    • Every racer has the opportunity to bring 1 non-racing guest to the event.

       Within 24-48 hours of selecting this perk you will receive an email from our campaign allowing you to access a "Secret Perk" to sign up your guest for $1. 

    • For the first time, Fastimes also has 2-seater karts.

       There are four, 4 minute rides with Pippa in the 2-seater kart that also available as a Race With Pippa Night Perk. Every rider may bring a guest with no guest sign-up needed.

    * All racers must be over 18 years old, however we can accept 2-seater riders under 18 who are over 42" tall and accompanied by a parent to sign the Fastimes waivers. Rides for those under 18 will be in one of the slower 2-seater karts with a Governor active that restricts speed. 

    *  If you wish to bring a non racing guest to meet Pippa, enjoy the food and beverages, and take part in the end of night raffle, please look for an email from our campaign offering you that option for $1 extra 24-48 hours after you select this perk. 


    Turn The Cockpit Pink

    Our favorite and most personal perk from 2015 returns. If you select this perk, please watch your email inbox for an email from pippawebteam@gmail.com to collect your name. If you have not seen an email within 48 hours, please reach out to the same email address.


    • The final day for this perk will be May 22nd.

       On midnight after qualifying ends at the Indianapolis 500, we will close this perk, collect any final names, and all names will go to the printers. The names will go in the car on Carb Day, Friday, May 27th.

    • Photos will be uploaded to social media as the names go in the cockpit.

      After the Indianapolis 500 they will all be uploaded to the campaign gallery here, and to Pippa's Flickr. Once we have uploaded the photos to the campaign we will post a campaign update to let all our contributors know they can now view these photos. We will follow this with an email containing the direct Flickr gallery link to everyone who selected this perk and placed a name in the cockpit.

    • Last year we had a lot of requests for this perk after it was closed.

      Due to the time constraints of having to get the names printed and into the cockpit, we were unable to accept many contributions and names in 2015. If you know someone who was interested in this last year, or who might be interested this year, please help us share this perk using our 2015 pink cockpit images that are in the campaign gallery so that we can honor as many people as possible in 2016.


    * Name position and visibility of a specific name in the cockpit will be random, and unfortunately we cannot take requests to place any name in a specific location. Everyone is treated equally, but given the confines of the space, it will be tougher to spot some names than others.


    Doug Garrison Prints

    One of our biggest fundraising items of 2015 is back for 2016 through the generosity of artist Doug Garrison, who has created a new piece of artwork featuring Pippa's car at the 100th Running of the Indianapolis 500. 


    This artwork will be available in 19x13 proof print size, and we are also offering the original artwork itself for purchase. All prints will be numbered 1-100, but please do not request a specific number. As Doug's artwork progresses photos will be shared here in the campaign gallery and on social media.

    * Shipping costs for the prints include the cost of printing the 100 prints, cost of shipping the print to Indianapolis to Pippa for her to sign, and cost of shipping the signed print on to you. This means shipping costs for this perk are higher than normal, so please check them before you commit to purchasing.


    Pippa's Race Worn Suit

    As in 2015, Pippa's race-worn suit will be available as a one-of-a-kind perk through this campaign. Post-race, Pippa's suit will be laundered, and then she will sign it before we send it on to you. We will also reach out to you via email and find out whether you would like to receive our Supporter Pack.


    * Please note: You will be receiving the race-worn item from the 100th Running of the Indianapolis 500, and it will have the belt/wear marks from being worn. However the suit will be laundered before it is signed and sent out.  


    FAQs

    Q. Does the money you raise go to fund the racing program, or go to Komen?

    All of the profits from this campaign are donated on to Susan G. Komen, none of the money raised here goes to the racing program. There are some hard costs associated with some of the perks, and Indiegogo does charge us fees for being here, but after those costs, everything else gets donated on. 

    Q. What happens if you don't make your goal? 

    This is a "Flexible Funding" campaign, just like in 2015, so even if we don't reach out ultimate goal, we are still able to donate all of the profits from the campaign onto Susan G. Komen. However, if we don't make our goal, we have to pay higher fees, so less money gets donated on.

    Q. Can I get a tax receipt from this campaign?

    No. This campaign is being run by me (Pippa Mann) to benefit Komen as part of our partnership. By running the campaign myself, and with my team, I am able to offer perks and rewards for people who get involved, and I am able to absorb those hard costs per the answer to question one. So, once the funds raised through this site are donated to Komen post-campaign, there are no further costs at all associated with that donation. The one downside to this system is that my business is not a nonprofit; therefore, we can't issue tax receipts.


    If you would like more information about Susan G. Komen, please click here.



    Our Amazing Partners of the 2016 #GetInvolved Campaign

story:
Connect the internet is our purpose. Help everyone by improving quality of web research. ‪#‎Pathways‬ is the first collaborative library of web results.
For All Informations and Updates :www.pathwaysearch.com


8024$  Thanks to All, we are very Happy.

In 2016 we will continue to work hard to put Beta Version on line soon!


Help Us Grow!

"United we stand, divided we fall" 


WOW 20% Funded!!

Each cent is a brick to build our dream. And our dream is a real sustain to everyone work.

Explaining Pathways to everyone...

Imagine you are searching on the internet and a system could tell you if a friend or colleague of yours has searched for the same thing before and then show you the "path" of sites they visited before finding what they were looking for. At that point, our system will not only serve as a way to compare the two paths, but also as a way of modifying them, for example, by adding or deleting a site that was more or less useful, respectively. Now all of your other friends will see the work you did on that search query and can also give their suggestions by editing the "path" with the additions that the network will then judge as more or less valid. The system thus creates a continuously updated database that increases the speed and the quality of what we look for on the web.

That’s Pathways - a worthwhile project for everyone!



How many times each day do you search on the internet? Imagine if one day, with just a few simple clicks, you could see what other people who did the same search as you had found - even seeing the path that led them to that result.

Imagine if you could also improve this path by modifying or updating it, constantly adding more suitable and up-to-date web-sites.

This will be possible thanks to this campaign. In fact, we can create a public database of internet search paths that will save time and improve users productivity.



We have been working successfully in the field of technological innovation since 1997.

We are programmers, marketing experts, philosophers, and fantastic, carefree and zealous workers, all togheter focused towards creating PathWays.

We are not asking you for a simple donation, but rather for the chance to kick start a project that will become useful for everyone. Every penny raised will be fully invested into creating a beta version of the project.

It all started with one crazy dream: to create something that can become useful to the entire online community. We have already invested time, sleepless nights and money. Now we need you.

For us, every single penny is a line of code, and each line of code is a step towards the impossible.

Each donation will put us towards completing Pathways so we can succeed in providing our supporters and the rest of the world a more productive and efficient way to connect the internet. In return for your support, we promise to keep you up to date on our progress and important developments throughout each stage of the creation of PathWays.

If we don't be able to reach our funding goal, we will create a simple MVP (Minimum Viable Product) that we can showcase to a business incubator or possible investor.

Your money will not be wasted.

If we succeed, the impact will be incredible for the technological world. We want to create a product that isn't a direct competitor to search engines, but rather uses their services. Each time you search for something on the net, you will instinctively come to use PathWays to see if someone has previously found something better.

Some members of our team have already achieved a number of successes: we have patent agreements with major companies and have been awarded funds to develop software for online children protection - but PathWays is an even more ambitious project.

The market needs a product like ours to constantly improve the quality of internet searches and to reduce "wasted" time.

A Problem worth solving

Today, many people perform the same searches on the Internet, but the "path" of exploring websites that leads to the same results may be different. This is a problem in terms of lost time and quality of information.

Our solution

The project allows anyone to share their "trail" of results of a web search and, through an editor, allows others users to explore it, complete it and change it for the benefit of their social network or across the Internet population.

Product

Pathways is a collaborative project that targets anyone who uses digital technology, from students to professionals, from companies to universities.

The product will consist of a online editor (like Google Docs) that allows you to keep track of the sites explored by generating a set of logically related sites which represent the path followed to get to a certain point.  This is done using Pathway’s own algorithm.

Pathways will be free for all users. Our revenues will come from three streams:

·  For Companies, Business and Professional: an Analytics Profile systems and a solution to help productivity

·  For Business and Consumer: a mobile app.

To understand what we mean by the Analytics system, imagine a situation where a Company or a freelancer wants to know if their online communication strategy is producing the results they expected in terms of messaging and feedback on the web.

For example, if a company is preparing an event to launch a product, and users, researching on the internet, associate that product with something incorrect, there is a problem to be resolved. This is the value of Pathways, namely the ability, via notifications, to understand if you are going in the right direction and in which contexts the company's product was searched for, thus allowing you to review your strategies and improve the quality of what you are offering.

In addition, we also offer a solution to improve productivity on online search, that allows employees to see if someone has opened an "online path" on the same topic and to benefit from it in the future.

Finally, once the Pathways research database has grown, an app will be introduced in on-demand virtual stores, allowing users to explore and share research with friends using their mobiles.

Pathways will be implemented and optimized for all devices on the market, ensuring full compatibility.

Sample User

We want to offer our users a “zero defect customer experience”, highlighting the failings of the current search experience and working better to solve them.

A navigation path is automatically associated with a query that describes the content. The query can be the one entered in the search engine at the beginning of the navigation, but can also be generated automatically by the system, analyzing the information available on the sites.

By analyzing this information, the system can semantically index a set of interconnected sites and allow fast searches that will produce a set of paths that best capture the information sought after.

An advanced visualization system allows you to view each of the paths so that it is easy for the user to understand, at a glance, which of the suggested paths is the one that best suits their needs. Lastly, Pathways offers the chance to "watch" a certain query, notifying the user of the appearance of new routes (built by others) that are considered related to the query.


Advanced User

By subscribing to the Pathways platform, the user has access to a client (integrated as a web page in the style of Gmail) that lets them surf the Internet acting as a "sub-browser". To go into more detail, in a central frame which occupies most of the page you can surf internet pages (starting for example from Google), while the side panels offer access to Pathways services.

The left pane displays a list of tracks that you have created, together with those shared by other users or recently explored, with different shares or comments.

The right pane displays the navigation path that you are currently building, thus allowing you to add the current page, to create relationships with other pages and to mark information of interest, as well as to carry out research to find locations of interest.

Working with Search Engines


Compared to the major search engines we position ourselves not as competitors but as users of their services, thus paving the way for a new tool like Pathways. We can consider anyone with the technological means capable of developing any product as competitors, but as yet no one does what we want to do.

Specifically, the differences between pathways and browser extensions, like Google BookManager, are that Pathways allows the user to explore a research path born of a query departure and modified by users each time, while other softwares act as "organizers" sites (favourites) without indicating the point of departure and arrival.

Many people who liked the project have asked us if they can help in other ways, here is how we responded:

  • Happiness is only real when it is shared.

Share our project with Social Network, talk about it, tell us what is wrong, tell us about those who are doing something similar, tell us if you want to work with us...

We know that without having a beta version of the product it can be difficult to persuade people to contribute, but it would be the biggest mistake we could ever make not to try.



We can't offer you the moon but we can offer you something.  Everyone who decides to support us (500$ donation) will be able to use our services for their work free of charge for one year and get a 20% discount for the following year.
We want to do more and if all goes well it's possible that something beautiful may happen

.




Founder Profile
Alessandro Leonetti Luparini

Some works experience:

• 2004 Software for cell phone data recovery in case of loss

• 2006 Hypobaric Filter for the treatment of cancerogenous substances, sold to a Tobacco Company.

• 2007 Software for Safer internet navigation for young people (Junior Explorer): In collaboration with LinebankingSrl, Winning project for € 1,7 million - law 488

• 2008-2009PiezoMobilePhone Project in collaboration with IPECC – Italian Piezoelectric & Ceramic Company and ISTEC-CNR (Institute of Science and Technology of Ceramic). Finalist in the competition Mind the Bridge.

• 2010 Development and study with the IPEECsrl and the Politecnico di Milano for a greenbattery Piezoelectric sensors to transmit signals to rail.

• 2011 Second prize in the Liteon Awards Asia with the project TBOX, a turbine that uses the air currents created by the passage of trains. (In collaboration with designer QIAN JIANG)

• 2012-2013 Study of a bulb Laser named Laila in collaboration with Prof.Eugenio Fazio Sapienza University in Rome

• 2014-2015 Promoter and creator of the project Kindie (Educational and Activity Park) promoted by the ItaliaCamp as one of eight ideas on Social Innovation

• 2015PathWays (work in progress)

There are risks for the project which, for transparency and accountability, we have listed below:

  • The algorithm we are studying presents technical difficulties that would benefit from additional human resources and further investment than what we have requested. If this campaign succeeds, we will produce a finished and user-tested product and begin a second crowdfunding campaign to carry out further improvements.
  • The major players of the technology world have the necessary resources to produce a product similar to PathWays - and could start to do so at any time. Our competitive advantage is to deliver the product from the bottom up and become strong enough to have a voice.
story_txt:
Connect the internet is our purpose. Help everyone by improving quality of web research. ‪#‎Pathways‬ is the first collaborative library of web results.For All Informations and Updates :www.pathwaysearch.com


8024$  Thanks to All, we are very Happy.
In 2016 we will continue to work hard to put Beta Version on line soon!




Help Us Grow!


"United we stand, divided we fall" 


WOW 20% Funded!!
Each cent is a brick to build our dream. And our dream is a real sustain to everyone work.


Explaining Pathways to everyone...
Imagine you are searching on the internet and a system could tell you if a friend or colleague of yours has searched for the same thing before and then show you the "path" of sites they visited before finding what they were looking for. At that point, our system will not only serve as a way to compare the two paths, but also as a way of modifying them, for example, by adding or deleting a site that was more or less useful, respectively. Now all of your other friends will see the work you did on that search query and can also give their suggestions by editing the "path" with the additions that the network will then judge as more or less valid. The system thus creates a continuously updated database that increases the speed and the quality of what we look for on the web.
That’s Pathways - a worthwhile project for everyone!






 

How many
times each day do you search on the internet? Imagine if one day, with just a
few simple clicks, you could see what other people who did the same search as
you had found - even seeing the path that led them to that result.
Imagine
if you could also improve this path by modifying or updating it, constantly
adding more suitable and up-to-date web-sites.
This
will be possible thanks to this campaign. In fact, we can create a public
database of internet search paths that will save time and improve users
productivity.







We have been working successfully in the field of technological innovation
since 1997.
We are programmers, marketing experts, philosophers, and fantastic,
carefree and zealous workers, all togheter focused towards creating PathWays.
We are not asking you for a
simple donation, but rather for the chance to kick start a project that will
become useful for everyone. Every penny raised will be fully invested into
creating a beta version of the project.


 

It all started with one crazy dream: to create something that can become
useful to the entire online community. We have already invested time, sleepless
nights and money. Now we need you.







For us, every single penny is a line of code, and each line of code is a
step towards the impossible.
Each donation will put us towards completing Pathways so we can succeed in
providing our supporters and the rest of the world a more productive and
efficient way to connect the internet. In return for your support, we promise
to keep you up to date on our progress and important developments throughout
each stage of the creation of PathWays.
If we don't be able to reach our funding goal, we will create a simple MVP
(Minimum Viable Product) that we can showcase to a business incubator or
possible investor.
Your money will not be wasted.
   
 

If we succeed, the impact will be incredible for the technological world.
We want to create a product that isn't a direct competitor to search engines,
but rather uses their services. Each time you search for something on the net,
you will instinctively come to use PathWays to see if someone has previously
found something better.
Some members of our team have already achieved a number of successes: we
have patent agreements with major companies and have been awarded funds to
develop software for online children protection - but PathWays is an even more
ambitious project.
The market needs a product like ours to constantly improve the quality of
internet searches and to reduce "wasted" time.




A Problem worth solving
Today, many people perform the same searches on the Internet, but the
"path" of exploring websites that leads to the same results may be
different. This is a problem in terms of lost time and quality of information.
Our solution
The project allows anyone to share their "trail" of results of a
web search and, through an editor, allows others users to explore it, complete
it and change it for the benefit of their social network or across the Internet
population.
Product
Pathways is a collaborative project that targets anyone who uses digital
technology, from students to professionals, from companies to universities.
The product will consist of a online editor (like Google Docs) that allows
you to keep track of the sites explored by generating a set of logically
related sites which represent the path followed to get to a certain point.
 This is done using Pathway’s own algorithm.
Pathways will be free for all users. Our revenues will come
from three streams:
· 
For Companies, Business and Professional: an Analytics Profile systems and
a solution to help productivity
· 
For Business and Consumer: a mobile app.
To understand what we mean by the Analytics
system, imagine a situation where a Company or a freelancer wants to know
if their online communication strategy is producing the results they expected in
terms of messaging and feedback on the web.
For example, if a company is preparing an event to launch a product, and users,
researching on the internet, associate that product with something incorrect,
there is a problem to be resolved. This is the value of Pathways, namely the
ability, via notifications, to understand if you are going in the right
direction and in which contexts the company's product was searched for, thus
allowing you to review your strategies and improve the quality of what you are
offering.
In addition, we also offer a solution
to improve productivity on online search, that allows employees to see if
someone has opened an "online path" on the same topic and to benefit
from it in the future.
Finally, once the Pathways research database has grown, an app will be introduced in on-demand
virtual stores, allowing users to explore and share research with friends using
their mobiles.

Pathways will be implemented
and optimized for all devices on the market, ensuring full compatibility.



Sample User


We want
to offer our users a “zero defect customer experience”, highlighting the failings
of the current search experience and working better to solve them.
A
navigation path is automatically associated with a query that describes the
content. The query can be the one entered in the search engine at the beginning
of the navigation, but can also be generated automatically by the system,
analyzing the information available on the sites.
By
analyzing this information, the system can semantically index a set of
interconnected sites and allow fast searches that will produce a set of paths
that best capture the information sought after.
An advanced visualization system allows
you to view each of the paths so that it is easy for the user to understand, at
a glance, which of the suggested paths is the one that best suits their needs.
Lastly, Pathways offers the chance to "watch" a certain query,
notifying the user of the appearance of new routes (built by others) that are
considered related to the query.


Advanced User


By
subscribing to the Pathways platform, the user has access to a client
(integrated as a web page in the style of Gmail) that lets them surf the
Internet acting as a "sub-browser". To go into more detail, in a
central frame which occupies most of the page you can surf internet pages
(starting for example from Google), while the side panels offer access to
Pathways services.
The left
pane displays a list of tracks that you have created, together with those
shared by other users or recently explored, with different shares or comments.
The right
pane displays the navigation path that you are currently building, thus
allowing you to add the current page, to create relationships with other pages
and to mark information of interest, as well as to carry out research to find
locations of interest.
Working with Search Engines

Compared to the major search engines we position ourselves not as competitors but as users of their services, thus paving the way for a new tool like Pathways. We can consider anyone with the technological means capable of developing any product as competitors, but as yet no one does what we want to do.
Specifically, the differences between pathways and browser extensions, like Google BookManager, are that Pathways allows the user to explore a research path born of a query departure and modified by users each time, while other softwares act as "organizers" sites (favourites) without indicating the point of departure and arrival.





Many people who liked the project have
asked us if they can help in other ways, here is how we responded:

Happiness
     is only real when it is shared.

Share our project with Social Network, talk about it, tell us
what is wrong, tell us about those who are doing something similar, tell us if
you want to work with us...
We know that without having a beta version
of the product it can be difficult to persuade people to contribute, but it
would be the biggest mistake we could ever make not to try.








We can't offer you the moon but we can offer you something. 
Everyone who decides to support us (500$ donation) will be able to use our
services for their work free of charge
for one year and get a 20% discount for the following year.
We want to do more and if all goes well it's possible that something beautiful
may happen


.



Founder ProfileAlessandro Leonetti Luparini
Some works experience:
• 2004 Software for cell phone
data recovery in case of loss
• 2006 Hypobaric
Filter for the treatment of cancerogenous substances, sold to a Tobacco Company.
• 2007 Software for
Safer internet navigation for young people (Junior Explorer): In collaboration
with LinebankingSrl, Winning
project for € 1,7 million - law 488
• 2008-2009PiezoMobilePhone Project in
collaboration with IPECC – Italian Piezoelectric & Ceramic Company and
ISTEC-CNR (Institute of Science and Technology of Ceramic). Finalist in the
competition Mind the Bridge.
• 2010 Development
and study with the IPEECsrl and the Politecnico di Milano for a greenbattery Piezoelectric sensors to transmit signals to rail.
• 2011 Second prize
in the Liteon Awards Asia
with the project TBOX, a turbine that uses the air currents created by the
passage of trains. (In collaboration with designer QIAN JIANG)
• 2012-2013 Study of a
bulb Laser named Laila in collaboration with Prof.Eugenio Fazio Sapienza University in
Rome
• 2014-2015 Promoter and
creator of the project Kindie (Educational and Activity Park) promoted by the ItaliaCamp as one of eight
ideas on Social
Innovation
• 2015PathWays (work in progress)




There are risks for the project which, for transparency and accountability, we have listed below:

The algorithm we are studying presents technical difficulties that would benefit from additional human resources and further investment than what we have requested. If this campaign succeeds, we will produce a finished and user-tested product and begin a second crowdfunding campaign to carry out further improvements.
The major players of the technology world have the necessary resources to produce a product similar to PathWays - and could start to do so at any time. Our competitive advantage is to deliver the product from the bottom up and become strong enough to have a voice.

story:
Summary

Do you use a manual wheelchair? Ever feel the need to travel farther or faster?    Pop n Drop might be just what you need!

My name is Sergio, inventor of the Pop n Drop. The Pop n Drop was developed out of necessity. Since experiencing a debilitating spinal cord injury many years ago, I have been using a manually propelled wheelchair to get around. I always resisted 'moving up' to a power wheelchair because as long as I am capable of pushing a manual chair, I don't want to use a power chair.  Well, fast forward more than 25 years, and I find that I can't push the long distances I used to. I have actually damaged my shoulders several times going on long wheelchair pushes. I needed to find a way that I could continue using my manual chair 80% of the time, but occasionally get a motorized boost when I needed to go a longer distance.

So, with my manual wheelchair, an electric scooter and motivated by the need for speed, I got to work. My initial trial used bungee cords and zip ties to connect the wheelchair to the scooter. Needless to say, that first trial was not too successful, but I learned something important! There is enough power in the scooter to propel a wheelchair (and I better wear a helmet)! In fact, every trial taught me something new. Now, after almost a year of development and 10 prototypes, Pop n Drop is ready to benefit others too. Pop n Drop has exceeded all expectations!  It's easy to hook up (with some practice) and soooo fun to use!

I’m excited to be sharing the benefits (and the fun!) of Pop n Drop and I am ready to do a first production run of 50 units.  For a contribution of $175, you will receive a Pop n Drop made to the size of your wheelchair. That's a saving of $50 off the anticipated retail price of $225.

FREE Pop n Drop for disabled vets!

To all the US vets out there, I want to thank you for your service and the sacrifices you made. If you are a vet who uses a wheelchair and you are interested in a Pop n Drop, you deserve to get one for FREE.  So, as part of this campaign, I am providing a 'FUND A VET' option, for those interested in sponsoring a Pop n Drop for a disabled vet. 

I will also keep a tally in the comments area of how many vets are requesting this, and how many Pop n Drop units are sponsored. I hope that contributions will match the demand.                                                                

A Pop n Drop will be provided to qualified disabled vets on a first come first serve basis.  If you are one of our Nations Heroes that could benefit by Pop n Drop, please contact me via email.  We need to check your wheelchair compatibility and make this happen!


Wheelchair Compatibility

Pop n Drop does not require any hardware mounted onto the wheelchair (an important point for most manual chair users), but couples directly to the wheelchair. Since wheelchairs come in various sizes and styles, each Pop n Drop is made to fit your wheelchair.The two measurements required for fitting are the foot support width and the tubing diameter (generally standard at ¾“ ). Please see photo that illustrates measuring of the foot support.

Pop n Drop is not intended to be used with folding wheelchairs or wheelchairs that have swing away foot rests. If your foot support is not of the style shown in the photo, please contact me before ordering.

While riding the scooter with Pop n Drop attached, your wheelchair will be in a ‘popped’ position. If your wheelchair foot support normally is positioned very close to the ground (1” to 2”), you may consider raising the foot support so that you are not riding in such an extreme ‘wheelie’ position. The compatible scooters below have a deck height of about 6”.

Scooter Compatibility

Pop n Drop does NOT include the scooter. Recommended scooter for the Pop n Drop is a lithium battery powered scooter. The scooter deck should not be more than 6-1/8“ wide.

The scooter featured in the video is the EcoReco M3. It's a  high quality product with incredible performance features, like 20 miles on a charge and a top speed of over 20 miles per hour!

·  EcoReco M3 or M5 – available online or in US scooter stores

http://ecorecoscooter.com/

For any scooter with a deck wider than 6-1/8", please contact me before ordering. Compatibility may be an issue.

Risks & Challenges

Up until now, Pop n Drop has been tried by a about 10 wheelchair users. One of the challenges all along has been making a device that fits well on a large variety of wheelchairs.  Therefore wheelchair compatibility is a challenge.

Connecting to Pop n Drop has been a bit challenging for some. Dropping into the correct spot can be tricky initially. This issue can be overcome by lots of practice. I am also looking at ways to make this step easier.

Locking the pins into place is another area that could use improvement. I am looking for options that will allow an automatic locking of the chair, without the need for pins.

There is a risk that some users will go too fast and cause injury to themselves or others.  High end power scooters can go upwards of 20 mph. However, they also have the ability to limit the maximum speed, for the safety of the rider.

I have always been very persistent when faced with obstacles and challenges. I feel all potential challenges on this project can be overcome with perseverance and ingenuity. When faced with hardship or adversity, count your blessings, focus on them and be thankful to God for all of them. There will be no more room for negativity!

I am very excited about Pop n Drop and I am ready to take this to the next level!

story:
Looplio - Where Imagination Meets Collaboration

1/13/16 As we continue the build-out of this platform we've went ahead and cleaned up this page a bit. We don't want to give away all of our trade secrets just yet. :) Stay tuned for further updates!

9/28/15 UPDATE: We have successfully reached our $55k goal via an outside contributor! See our update tab above for additional information.

Looplio is a revolutionary new mobile iOS and Android application platform that allows users to record, edit, collaborate and share their creative videos anytime, anywhere. Are you in the loop?
 

Looplio's patent pending technology provides simple point-and-shoot video with just the right amount of features to create brilliant video montages for both the amateur and professional alike.





 


Why now? Driven by the need to eliminate the crowded, chaotic and rather noisy mobile video app environment, Looplio is intended to position itself as a simple, gamified, collaborative and uniquely featured platform. Currently there's not a  social video app on the marketplace that has an associated website editor to enhance user video creation. With the combination of our easy-to-use creative interface, gamification piece, collaboration features, desktop enhanced editing and social media style approach it should pave the way for Looplio to become a proven leader in the market segment.


Desktop and Tablet visualized.


Future phases of development will take the Looplio platform to another level with the introduction to Xbox and Playstation for the ultimate user experience.


Fundraising donations will be used for the build-out of the mobile platform (MVP). After our development firm reviewed the functional specs it was determined this cost would be $55,000. With your donation you can help take us from concept to a working product. How cool is that? If we reach our goal and continue to raise money we will use the additional funds towards our go-to-market plan and future phase development. If we do not reach our goal we will use the collected donations to build as much as we can and we will continue to create a working application. However, this will unfortunately cause extraordinary delays in development and the launching timeline of the mobile application.

Challenges can arise during development but with our careful planning and realistic expectations between the co-founders and the development firm we will mitigate unexpected delays and unnecessary expenses.

Dates for delivering a working app (MVP) and beta testing will be March 2016. (revised 1/13/16)

___________________________________________________________________________


REFERRAL CAMPAIGN CONTEST   

We are offering a referral contest. For the top three people who refer the most people to our campaign we will reward them with the following rewards:

  • 1st place: A GoPro Hero 4 video camera 
  • 2nd place: Pebble Stainless Steel Smart Watch
  • 3rd place: Fitbit Charge HR fitness tracker
You do NOT need to donate to the campaign to enter the contest. Simply share our campaign with Indiegogo's share links while signed into your Indiegogo account. The dates for the contest will begin when the fundraising campaign launches and ends December 15th 2015. We will announce the winner on our campaign page.

Remember, to make sure you receive credit for your referrals be sure you're signed into your Indiegogo account. More info. here: How To Participate


___________________________________________________________________________


Thanks for your interest in Looplio!

Even if you’re not able to donate to our campaign you can still help us out by sharing our campaign to your friends, family and colleagues. You can do this by using Indiegogo’s share tools below!

__________________


FAQ

Will I get charged right away if I donate today?

Yes. Contributors are charged at the time of the transaction.

My pledge level includes numerous items.  When will they all be delivered? / When will my reward(s) arrive? / When should the donation packages be received?

Most rewards will be shipped in December 2015 or early Spring (i.e. launch party perk).

Where does my donation go?

Your donation will go towards developing the Looplio minimum viable product. A minimum viable product (MVP) is a development technique in which a new product or website is developed with sufficient features to satisfy early adopters. The final, complete set of features is only designed and developed after considering feedback from the product's initial users.

How do I upgrade my rewards?

If you’d like to upgrade your perk to a higher-priced perk, you can click "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk” on the Indiegogo page.

How will you know where to send my rewards?

Your shipping information and address will be collected during the check-out process. If you need to upgrade your shipping address, please email support@indiegogo.com.

Do you ship to the EU?

Yes, international shipping is available.

How will shipping be handled internationally?

Domestic shipping is $10 for most perks that requires shipment. The wristbands will be $2 to ship. The shipping cost for all orders outside of the US and Canada is $30 per order.

What devices will the Looplio app work on?

The Looplio app works on iOS, Android, tablets and desktops. Future supported platforms will be available on Xbox and Playstation.

How much will it cost to download?

The basic Looplio app along with access to the desktop version will be free. There will be an advanced "pro" version that will cost a small one-time charge upon downloading.

How and when will I be able to download it?

The app will be available once development is completed. We expect a beta version to be ready by December 2015.

How many people work for Looplio and where are you based out of?

We are a team of 5 with various entrepreneurial backgrounds working out of Chicago.

What are your backgrounds?

See our Indiegogo team page right here on our campaign page.

How long did it take to develop Looplio?

Looplio has been a concept for a few years and continues to be developed but we started moving from concept to reality late 2014. 




Don't get left out of the loop! Become a part of something special today!


Looplio - Where Imagination Meets Collaboration

development and the launching timeline of the mobile application. Challenges can arise during development but with our careful planning and realistic expectations between the co-founders and the development firm we will mitigate unexpected delays and unnecessary expenses. Dates for delivering a working app (MVP) and beta testing will be March 2016. (revised 1/13/16)___________________________________________________________________________REFERRAL CAMPAIGN CONTEST    We are offering a referral contest. For the top three people who refer the most people to our campaign we will reward them with the following rewards:

1st place: A GoPro Hero 4 video camera 

2nd place: Pebble Stainless Steel Smart Watch


3rd place: Fitbit Charge HR fitness tracker

You do NOT need to donate to the campaign to enter the contest. Simply share our campaign with Indiegogo's share links while signed into your Indiegogo account. The dates for the contest will begin when the fundraising campaign launches and ends December 15th 2015. We will announce the winner on our campaign page.

Remember, to make sure you receive credit for your referrals be sure you're signed into your Indiegogo account. More info. here: How To Participate___________________________________________________________________________Thanks for your interest in Looplio!
Even if you’re not able to donate to our campaign you
can still help us out by sharing our campaign to your friends, family and
colleagues. You can do this by using Indiegogo’s share tools below!
__________________

FAQ
Will I get charged
right away if I donate today?
Yes. Contributors are charged at the
time of the transaction.
My pledge level
includes numerous items.  When will they all be delivered? / When will my
reward(s) arrive? / When should the donation packages be received?
Most rewards will be shipped in December
2015 or early Spring (i.e. launch party perk).
Where does my donation go?
Your donation will go towards developing
the Looplio minimum viable product. A
minimum viable product (MVP) is a development technique in which a new product
or website is developed with sufficient features to satisfy early adopters. The
final, complete set of features is only designed and developed after
considering feedback from the product's initial users.
How do I upgrade my
rewards?
If you’d like to upgrade your perk
to a higher-priced perk, you can click "Upgrade to Higher Priced Perk” on
the Indiegogo page.
How will you know
where to send my rewards?
Your shipping information and
address will be collected during the check-out process. If you need to upgrade
your shipping address, please email support@indiegogo.com.
Do you ship to the EU?
Yes, international shipping is
available. 
How will shipping be
handled internationally?
Domestic shipping is $10 for most perks that requires shipment. The wristbands will be $2 to ship. The shipping cost for all orders
outside of the US and Canada is $30 per order.
What devices will the
Looplio app work on?
The Looplio app works on iOS, Android,
tablets and desktops. Future supported platforms will be available on Xbox and
Playstation. 
How much will it cost to download?
The basic Looplio app along with access to the desktop version will be free. There will be an advanced "pro" version that will cost a small one-time charge upon downloading. 
How and when will I be
able to download it?
The app will be available once
development is completed. We expect a beta version to be ready by December 2015.
How many people work
for Looplio and where are you based out of?
We are a team of 5 with various entrepreneurial backgrounds working out of Chicago.
What are your
backgrounds?
See our Indiegogo team page right here on our campaign
page. 
How long did it take
to develop Looplio?
Looplio has been a concept for a few
years and continues to be developed but we started moving from concept to
reality late 2014.  
Don't get left out of the loop! Become a part of something special today!


Looplio - Where Imagination Meets Collaboration

story:
Index

  • The GRIP and Our Mission Summary: Let's get acquainted
  • The Impact: Get pumped
  • What we Need and What you Get: Our Business Model
  • Risks and challenges: We need You!
  • Other Ways you can Help: Spread the Word

The GRIP and Our Mission Summary

Who We Are

  • My name is Dillon Badman. I represent a growing company, Frontier Industrial Applications LLC, in Rochester NY. We are here to make your life easier and worry free. Our team members come from all over the United States, including California, Delaware, Texas, and New York. We are young and motivated to bring a great product to our potential customers.
  • My father sprung this idea on me more than 2 years ago. There wasn't much steam, at first. I started out in my sisters spare room, gluing and cutting materials. Our business was established officially on January 5th of 2016. Over the last 8 months we have had two production lines in both NY and Texas, where only 5 individuals diligently produce black and white prototypes, create package designs, and spread the word through social media and word of mouth. 
  • As of August 18, 2016 we have opened our production line to a Rochester based company. This partnership will allow us to mass produce The GRIP with a variety of colors and designs, propelling us to production capabilities that can match our sales. 
  • We currently sell on https://www.gogrippit.com through purchasing vendors Square, Inc and PayPal. We are also setting up with Amazon fulfillment. Through our perks on Indiegogo you can purchase The GRIP today, by donating. 

What we are all about

  • What is our product? A phone grip accessory. What does it provide? At the heart, it is comfort and security. This accessory attaches to your handheld device and creates a convenient and sleek "holster" for your fingers. That is the bare bones description. 

             The Duo: Black w/o design                          The Hybrid: Black w/o design

  • Why must you have it? Let me ask you some questions. Have you ever dropped your phone?  How about on your face while laying on the couch? Or multiple times in one day? Tired of cracked screens? What about the fear of your phone slipping into the wrong hands? With The GRIP these problems will be a thing of the past.

  • This accessory is revolutionary in the world of phone handling. And yet, it is so simple. Simple enough that we know everyone has the ability to apply it to their phone. Collectively we will create a new era of security and comfort to everyday phone use. 
  • If users happen to run into any application problems we offer 100% guaranteed satisfaction. We will send you another GRIP free of charge, or your money back within 30 days of purchase. All we would like is to know what went wrong, and to give it another chance. This product works. 

How you can help

  • Contributors will help us to expand our production means, follow through with our pending patent applications, create designs on our products, and spread the word through social media, commercial advertising, and popular demand.

 The GRIP: Duo Concept Art!

 

  • Every cent counts! We are running a flexible campaign. That means that every contribution will be put in to growing our company, even if we don't reach our goal! Of course we want to reach our goal, so support us and try The GRIP out for yourself by signing up for one of our perks!

 

  • You can also like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/THEGRIP42/ and share our posts, please!
  • Twitter: @Get_The_GRIP
  • Instagram: @Get_TheGRIP

 

The Impact: Get Pumped

"The total amount Americans have spent on repair and replacement of their smartphones in the last seven years – including iPhones – is over $23.5B, ..." 

 

  • That's a lot of cash! Do we need to say more? The GRIP can help you Never Drop Your Phone Again! That is our bottom line. And we think every person on earth, wielding a phone or precious handheld device should have one. 

Sources for phone damage costs (https://www.squaretrade.com/press/new-study-sho... ,  http://www.bankrate.com/financing/mobile-financ... , http://www.techrepublic.com/article/dude-youre-...)

 

The GRIP allows you to take better selfies and make more extreme poses. You can have a hand free without ever worrying that your phone is in danger of slipping to the ground, or even being snatched by a sneaky passerby. We regret that this is the reality, but with The GRIP you will be squared away both in body and mind that your precious device, with all your pictures, social media plugs, and contacts is safe and secure where it should be, in your hand.

Use your imagination, we often experience and get feedback, that The GRIP allowed someone to peer over a mountain top, without a sweat or smidgen of anxiety. Imagine yourself at a pro sports game or even on the back of a motorcycle, in both cases there is opportunity for great pictures. At both there is great commotion and rattling, opening up opportunity for your phone to be dropped, clipped, or shaken from your very hands. NOT ANYMORE! The GRIP is the leading phone grip accessory and will leave you feeling calm and confident for the remainder of your device using days. 

 

What We Need & What You Get: Our Business Model

Patent Fees

  • We already have filed a provisional patent ourselves, and we have a connection to a local patent lawyer. We estimate the rough cost to fulfill a non-provisional utility patent (the more official filing for those who are not familiar) will cost us $5000. That cost is mostly lawyer fees. Note that, typically, lawyer fees are the bulk of patent costs, because of the technical training and experience a patent lawyer holds ($325 /hr) and the amount of time needed to create a legitimate filing (10+ hours). We qualify as a micro entity and that gives us some USPTO filing fee breaks. Our breakdown is roughly as follows: USPTO filing fees include Basic  Filing ($70), Utility Search ($150), Utility Examination ($180), Issue Fee ($240), Processing (~$150). Summing lawyer ($3250+) and filing ($790) fees, comes to a grand total of $4040+. Unforeseen lawyer hours bring us to roughly $5000. 

Source for filing fees (USPTO fee schedule: https://www.uspto.gov/learning-and-resources/fe...).

  • Internationally we can file through the Patent Cooperation Treaty (PCT) to obtain utility protections in countries honoring the PCT (150+ countrties). This should cost us roughly $4000. 

Source PCT costs (http://www.inventioncity.com/ask-mike/how-much-...)

  • We already have about half of this money, but we need your help to get us all the way there!

Raw Materials, Production, Distribution

  • We're not done yet! In raw materials it costs us, on average $.33667 to produce a single item in our product line. That's 34 cents! And we are selling them at retail for $10. Don't bat your eyes, rejoice with us! This product is worth $10. We use the most high-end, quality materials we could find to build this product, there is no cutting corners (well, literally we do cut corners of fabrics and tapes!),  it just so happens that our assembly is dirt cheap in dollars and cents. But it is worth piles of sugar and gold in effectiveness and functionality, as well as in enthusiasm that our customers display! 
  • Raw Material Grand Total for 7,500 units is $2,550.
  • Our production and distribution costs are our biggest price points. Production will cost us roughly $0.5-$1.0 per item for labor and machine maintenance, and we are still refining this cost analysis. Distribution will cost us roughly another $0.75, including packaging and shipping.
  • Production and Distribution are a big part of our initial funding requirements! This is why we are asking for $11,250 more dollars above and beyond patents and materials, in order to get our first 7,500 off the line.
  • Everything together comes to $16,800. Including some room for added design costs and unforeseen fees between shipping, lawyers and production, we come to a grand campaign total of $20,000.

Profit 

  • 10,000 units sold will translate into $81,600 profit and we will be on our way to continue on our own. With roughly 216.9 million phone users in the U.S. alone, we are talking $1.7 billion, if every American phone user bought just one. And multiple users buy more than just one. Are you feeling it yet!

Source for American Phone users (http://www.pcworld.com/article/2999631/phones/p...)

Future Direction

  • Follow me one step further, please! We do not see ourselves ending our product line with this particular phone grip accessory, in the grand scheme, we will still produce this version of The GRIP. But, we have a vision and dream pushing us towards full case integration! Why by a case, and an attachment for your case, when you can buy both in one? But since you already have a case, and you need to protect that case and the phone that it encases, please get behind The GRIP! 
  • A future patent filing for the integrated case would cost us another $9000+, but we are planning on using pure profit to subsidize those costs! So you don't have to worry about it. Just wait and see!

 

  • Our Perks give you the opportunity to feel The GRIP for yourself! And believe us, once you have experienced this new found comfort and security, you won't believe that you've went this long without it! Furthermore, you'll never want to go without one again.

The Welcome Package Perk: Includes 1 Slim, 2 Duos, and 2 Hybrids + previous perks and a sticker!

If we do not reach our entire goal, it's not the end, not even close. You see any amount of funds gets us one step higher, and we know that we have a lot of steps to go.

  • With the first couple hundred of dollars we get, we will move to securing our patent (TM's are already in place for the most part), and make a small production order. We already have enough product to reach hundreds, maybe thousands as I type this.
  • With the first couple thousand, we will make our first large scale production order, secure our patents, and start pushing designs.
  • With the full amount, we are set to secure all of our patents US and PCT, and produce 10,000 units, with a full range of colors and personalized designs. 

 

Risks & Challenges: We Need You!

One of our biggest challenges is getting a large group of people to publicize our products by showing them off and spreading the word. And we are very much alone in this pursuit to secure your phone! Phone companies make profit from you breaking your phone. We want you to profit from not having to fork them over more cash then you already spend on your monthly bill and repair costs!

Mechanically, and in more rare instances, phones that have grooves or notches that do not allow for that adherence of The GRIP may not be fit to accommodate this accessory. There are ways around this, certain phone cases can allow for The GRIP if the phone does not. Further, if you contact us with this sort of problem and explain the particular situation, we may be able to custom fit The GRIP to your phone. All you have to do is ask, and we will try our best to deliver The GRIP to your device.

Another challenge is the naysayers and those who don't believe as hard as we do in this product. But every single person that has owned one, has become a believer. We need help converting the naysayers to yaysayers! Scream it from the rooftops with us. 

Get The GRIP!

Together we can change the way the phone game is played!

Other Ways You Can Help: Spread The Word

The biggest help if you cannot contribute is to spread the word. Tell your neighbor, your coworker, your parents, your kids, you get the picture. Share our commercial on your Facebook page.

As I mentioned before:

  • Please, like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/THEGRIP42/ and share our posts!
  • Twitter: @Get_The_GRIP
  • Instagram: @Get_TheGRIP

Just a reminder, if you think you cannot contribute, it is only $10 to get The GRIP on your phone today, and once you have it you can spread the word by taking more extreme photos, showing it off to your friends, family and everyone you run into.
