story:
What are your dreams? 




IoT or Internet of Things

IoT involves sensors - some of them are digital and some of them analog. The information sensed by these sensors is displayed on your mobile device via Bluetooth or web or smartwatch or using other methods (Twitter, text etc.)

          


Sensing information accurately is critical. The sensors can be used as an IoT device, as a data logger, a controlling device or any other device which depends on accurate information to make some critical decision. Securing the sensors so that they do not fall off or get disconnected is also equally important. Keeping the sensors powered when wall-outlet power fails is also an key consideration. Taking the device with you to test or demonstrate or use the IoT capabilities you have developed is also needed to make your IoT device successful.


Executive Summary

We have four boards or HATs for the Raspberry Pi.

  1. Pi-EzConnect - introduced in 2015, this board or HAT allows multiple  digital sensors or GPIO to be securely connected to a Raspberry Pi. Watch the video here.
  2. Pi-16ADC - a sixteen (16) channel or a 16 port Analog to Digital Converter (ADC) board or HAT. Software, user manual and interface to rpimonitor is provided. Watch video here.
  3. Pi-UpTimeUPS - provides uninterruptible power (or UPS) to the Pi for many hours. Pi-UpTimeUPS also allows power mobility. Compact and securely connected, allow you to take the Pi with you without having to shut-down and reboot it. Software monitors battery level and can shutdown the Pi when battery runs low. Watch video here.
  4. Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO - combines the functions of Pi-16ADC and Pi-EzConnect in a breakout board that works with Pi-UpTimeUPS board, with all GPIO ports and  twelve analog ports available for use. You also get 5V UPS and 3.3V UPS power for other devices. Watch video here.



Our Boards - The How

Pi-EzConnect board allows digital sensors to be connected easily, without messy bread-boards and dangling connector wires. We already have thousands of users using this board across the world! Interact with the sensors using the GPIO capabilities built in the Raspberry Pi. No wiring mess using breadboard, cobblers or other jumpers.

Pi-EzConnect board with a Carbon Monoxide gas sensor

Like the Pi-EzConnect board, Pi-16ADC prevents wiring mess or jumper wires. Pi-16ADC allows sixteen (16) analog devices or sensors to be connected reliably and easily to the Raspberry Pi. All sensors are secured or soldered on the board allowing information to be read reliably over the I2C bus. Sample code converts analog data to an accurate meaningful number, accelerating the deployment and use of sensors. 

Pi-EzConnect board and the Pi-16ADC boards can be stacked neatly on a Raspberry Pi, creating a compact package as shown below.

Picture showing Pi-16ADC, Pi-EzConnect and a Raspberry Pi stacked in a nice compact package. These boards can be stacked in any order.


Developing software to read any sensor is accelerated using the sample code. Or interface to rpimonitor (an opensource software).  Leverage the wealth of other open source software, the Raspberry Pi community, communal or crowd sourced knowledge and your genius to make your dream device!
This combination is a powerful one. Morph the Raspberry Pi into a wizard.  Make your IoT or other dream projects come true - quickly, easily and cost effectively.  Use easy methods of interacting with the sensors with our boards. And the biggest advantage of all - you are still using your familiar, friendly Raspberry Pi.

Raspberry Pi-3 provides Bluetooth   Using a Pi-3 and Bluetooth, develop your custom app on a smartphone.  Access the data collected by the sensors using Bluetooth and send alerts on the phone. Do crazy things on the phone to wow people. 
When you need to take the Raspberry Pi and the sensors away from a wall outlet, the Pi-UpTimeUPS and the Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO (break out) board is there to help you. Use the same sensors. Use the same code.  Install two 18650 batteries on the Pi-UpTimeUPS board and take it with you - away from a wall power outlet for as long as 10-12 hours (time varies depending on what is connected to the Raspberry Pi and battery charge.) If longer run time is needed, use a solar panel to extend the run time. Or a wall plug. Monitor the sensors and the wonderful things you have done with your app on the phone. 
Tired of power fluctuations or power outages rebooting your Pi? Want to continue using the Pi when power fails? Want to take the Raspberry Pi with you to work or school or other places without having to shutdown or reboot it every time?  Pi-UpTimeUPS is perfect for these situations. The board monitors the power level and can shut down the Raspberry Pi in a graceful manner when the batteries run low. If power fails, the Raspberry Pi continues to operate for a long time! It also automatically charges the battery, manages the battery power level and cleans out any power fluctuations the Raspberry Pi may encounter, protecting your hardware. Further, the Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO board allows connections to all GPIO as well as twelve (12) analog ports. It connects to the Pi-UpTimeUPS board and also provides battery backed 5V and 3.3V UPS power for sensors. 

Pi-UpTimeUPS board showing the UPS functionality. The board works with any Raspberry Pi with a 40 pin header. The Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO board can be stacked above or below the Pi-UpTimeUPS board. The Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO board is not shown in the picture. 



Features - The What

(A little tech heavy stuff follows. If you don't like tech details, watch the videos in the Summary section above.)
For Analog Sensors:  Analog to Digital conversion using Pi-16ADC
  • 16 bits resolution - really accurate information (38.1 micro-volt resolution).
  • 16 analog ports - can be used in different configurations - all set via the  software.
  • Sample Python code provided. A user guide also explains the code and how the device can be configured.
  • Uses I2C bus and can coexist with lots of other devices. 
  • Has 27 different configurable address to pick from. This ensures an easy add to the I2C bus and virtually guarantees no conflict with other I2C devices.
  • Low power consumption. Device drains negligible power if the sensor ports are not used.
  • Easy to connect sensors to Pi-16ADC. The board provides solder-less connectors. Board also includes solder points for attaching resistors, power for sensors etc.
  • No re-calibration needed. ADC chip calibrates itself on power reset.
  • Immunity to common 50/60 Hz noise.
  • Turn the LED off to conserve power. 
  • Raspberry Pi HAT form factor - provides compact connections.

Pi-16ADC board. See video below.



For Digital Sensors: Pi-EzConnect board provides GPIO and breadboard connectivity.

Pi-EzConnect board has been selling for sometime now. We already have a few thousand units installed world wide! Now you can combine Pi-EzConnect with Pi-16ADC to make it easy to connect digital and analog sensors or devices together.

  • Connect digital sensors and other electronic components to the Raspberry Pi.
  • Allows all GPIOs to be used and connected to the Raspberry Pi.
  • Soldered as well as solder-less connections.
  • Has soldered as well as solder-less connections for Power as well for both 5V, 3.3V and ground.
  • Raspberry Pi HAT form factor - provide compact connections.
  • Break out board or breadboard like solder points.

Pi-EzConnect Board. See video below.




For Power Mobility and Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS):  Mobility for a Raspberry Pi using Pi-UpTimeUPS

  •  Provides UPS functionality to a Raspberry Pi. Second generation of the Pi-UpTime board.
  • Uses two 18650 batteries for powering Raspberry Pi when there is no power or if power fails. (Batteries are not included.) Choose the capacity of the battery based on your needs. Replace them as needed. No special battery form factor to worry about now or in the future.
  • On-board battery protection provides necessary controls to ensure your battery is protected. These controls prevent over charging and deep discharge, protecting the battery. This extends the life of the batteries. Temperature sensor prevents over heating and shuts down the charging if the batteries get hot. No need to purchase expensive protected batteries.
  • Current limit protects the battery and the electronics against excessive surges.
  • The electronics charges the battery and provides power to Raspberry Pi at the same time. This feature also ensures that the battery is charged automatically after a power failure. 
  •  Protects the Raspberry Pi against brown outs. If additional power is demanded by the peripherals or sensors or the Raspberry Pi, Pi-UpTimeUPS provides that.
  • A reset switch makes the reboot easy after an orderly shutdown. No need to plug/unplug power supply or the batteries.
  • An added solder point is provided for an external reset switch.
  • Provides 12 analog ports. The same analog ports described above with Pi-16ADC board. Please refer to Pi-16ADC for the capabilities.
  • Sample Python code can be used for monitoring the battery level.
  • Instructions and code to monitor battery level and shut down the Raspberry Pi when battery is running low.
  • LED's indicate the status of the battery charging on the board.
  • Sensor on-board monitors if the power is on, the battery level, the current level and power consumed. No need to attach an external meter to measure voltage, current or power consumption. Monitor historical data using rpimonitor.
  • Provides separately generated uninterrupted 5V as well as 3.3V power. The board provided UPS for 5V and 3.3V. 3.3V is not tapped from the Raspberry Pi. Up to 800mA of power can be provided on the 3.3V supply, far exceeding the 3.3V power supply capability on the Raspberry Pi.
  • Interfaces  with rpimonitor to monitor the Pi and the battery and power status. Observe exactly when power fails. Provides both historical trends (graphs) and current sensor readings. Know exactly when power failed or when there is a power surge, and how the Raspberry Pi survived the power glitch!

Pi-UpTimeUPS board. As shown, this board is used as a UPS for the Raspberry Pi. See video below.




Analog and Digital sensors with UPS:  Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO with Pi-UpTimeUPS

  • A board custom built for Pi-UpTimeUPS. Attach the board to Pi-UpTimeUPS. Connect twelve analog devices or sensors as well as all the digital devices and sensors for a Raspberry Pi.
  • Provides solder and solder-less connections for all the analog ports on the Pi-UpTimeUPS as well as all the GPIO ports.
  • Provides solder-less connections for 5V, 3.3V and Ground. 
  • Provides UPS power for 5V as well as 3.3V. Power to these connectors and Raspberry Pi continues even if wall outlet or AC power has failed.
  • Monitor voltage and current consumed by the Raspberry Pi. This provides valuable insights on power consumed by devices on the Raspberry Pi and how power usage can be optimized.
  • Solder points on the board allows other electronic components to be connected easily.

Pi-UpTimeUPS and PI-UpTime-BO board. Boards can be stacked in any order. In this picture, the Pi-UpTimeUPS board is on the top. The board is shown without any batteries. 

The capabilities are summarized below.



Your support - The Why

First of all - thank you for your interest. If you have read all the way here, you have expressed your interest! We have done the necessary hard work developing the hardware, testing it, rebuilding it and testing it again! We have also created the necessary software in Python and an interface for rpimonitor to accelerate your deployment. We have provided the necessary building blocks to launch the IoT applications.

Thousands of Pi-EzConnect boards are already in use across the world. We hope Pi-16ADC along with Pi-UpTimeUPS boards will also be equally successful. 

We need the funds to complete the emission (FCC), safety and regulation testing for USA, Europe and rest of the world. 

FCC testing, CE mark as well as UL testing will provide the validation these boards are safe to use and meets all the export and import regulations set forth by the countries. Once these regulations are confirmed, the boards can be used anywhere in the world. CE mark makes the board available in European and other countries.



Raspberry Pi - the amazing platform 

The Raspberry Pi is an amazing platform. The small size, great performance,  affordable price makes this computer a development tool of choice today over other platforms! The most recent version of Raspberry Pi model 3 also introduces Bluetooth support. Using Bluetooth, you can now interact with your cell phone or other Bluetooth devices.

We want the Raspberry Pi to be the platform of choice for IoT development to speed up creative products. We want people to take their creative work and test it outside - in real use situations. 

 People have used Raspberry Pi in amazing ways. We hope there will be new uses for the Raspberry Pi by providing the Pi a reliable UPS and analog sensor functionality - all at low overhead and high efficiency.

Raspberry Pi offers a flexible environment:

  • OS flexibility: Linux, Windows or others. 
  • Programming flexibility: C, Python, Java, other...
  • Networking flexibility: WiFi, BlueTooth, LAN, cellular....
  • Data storage flexibility: Local, USB drive, Cloud storage...
  • 26 GPIO's for digital sensor connectivity

However, it is not easy to connect all 26 GPIO's via the headers available on the Raspberry Pi. To solve this problem, we introduced the Pi-EzConnect board almost 1 year back. 

Now we are making it possible to add analog sensors and provide UPS functionality to the Raspberry Pi. 

Pi-UpTimeUPS and Pi-16ADC provide that capability. With Pi-16ADC you can add 16 (or 8) Analog sensors. With Pi-UpTimeUPS and Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO, you can not only add 12 (or 6) Analog sensors, you also get battery backup power for the Raspberry Pi and all the sensors - digital or analog. And not for just a short time sufficient to shut down the Pi properly. Enough power to take the Raspberry Pi around or survive a long power outage. 


Risks & Challenges

The risks are minimal. All functionality has been tested. We use over-the-counter (OTC) components in our design. Usually more than one supplier provides these components. Supply side risks are also minimal.

Our challenge and next steps will be to make it easy for everyone to simply add a sensor and start viewing the information from the sensor via an Android app or an iPhone App.


Other Ways You Can Help

The biggest help is to contribute and / or commit to a perk. You can also purchase these boards for your school or friends to learn about IoT and how to leverage sensors to do things on a daily basis. Or warn about things. Or simply turn things on/off. Or flash lights. Your creativity is unleashed. Challenge your children to learn about programming and build devices which will be used on a day-to-day basis. Challenge your school group or your family and friends.
story_txt:
What are your dreams? 








IoT or Internet of Things
IoT involves sensors - some of them are digital and some of them analog. The information sensed by these sensors is displayed on your mobile device via Bluetooth or web or smartwatch or using other methods (Twitter, text etc.)


          

Sensing information accurately is critical. The sensors can be used as an IoT device, as a data logger, a controlling device or any other device which depends on accurate information to make some critical decision. Securing the sensors so that they do not fall off or get disconnected is also equally important. Keeping the sensors powered when wall-outlet power fails is also an key consideration. Taking the device with you to test or demonstrate or use the IoT capabilities you have developed is also needed to make your IoT device successful.


Executive Summary
We have four boards or HATs for the Raspberry Pi.



Pi-EzConnect - introduced in 2015, this board or HAT allows multiple  digital sensors or GPIO to be securely connected to a Raspberry Pi. Watch the video here.

Pi-16ADC - a sixteen (16) channel or a 16 port Analog to Digital Converter (ADC) board or HAT. Software, user manual and interface to rpimonitor is provided. Watch video here.

Pi-UpTimeUPS - provides uninterruptible power (or UPS) to the Pi for many hours. Pi-UpTimeUPS also allows power mobility. Compact and securely connected, allow you to take the Pi with you without having to shut-down and reboot it. Software monitors battery level and can shutdown the Pi when battery runs low. Watch video here.

Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO - combines the functions of Pi-16ADC and Pi-EzConnect in a breakout board that works with Pi-UpTimeUPS board, with all GPIO ports and  twelve analog ports available for use. You also get 5V UPS and 3.3V UPS power for other devices. Watch video here.





Our Boards - The How

Pi-EzConnect board allows digital sensors to be connected easily, without messy bread-boards and dangling connector wires. We already have thousands of users using this board across the world! Interact with the sensors using the GPIO capabilities built in the Raspberry Pi. No wiring mess using breadboard, cobblers or other jumpers.


Pi-EzConnect board with a Carbon Monoxide gas sensor



Like the Pi-EzConnect board, Pi-16ADC prevents wiring mess or jumper wires. Pi-16ADC allows sixteen (16) analog devices or sensors to be connected reliably and easily to the Raspberry Pi. All sensors are secured or soldered on the board allowing information to be read reliably over the I2C bus. Sample code converts analog data to an accurate meaningful number, accelerating the deployment and use of sensors. 
Pi-EzConnect board and the Pi-16ADC boards can be stacked neatly on a Raspberry Pi, creating a compact package as shown below.


Picture showing Pi-16ADC, Pi-EzConnect and a Raspberry Pi stacked in a nice compact package. These boards can be stacked in any order.


Developing software to read any sensor is accelerated using the sample code. Or interface to rpimonitor (an opensource software).  Leverage the wealth of other open source software, the Raspberry Pi community, communal or crowd sourced knowledge and your genius to make your dream device!
This combination is a powerful one. Morph the Raspberry Pi into a wizard.  Make your IoT or other dream projects come true - quickly, easily and cost effectively.  Use easy methods of interacting with the sensors with our boards. And the biggest advantage of all - you are still using your familiar, friendly Raspberry Pi.

Raspberry Pi-3 provides Bluetooth   Using a Pi-3 and Bluetooth, develop your custom app on a smartphone.  Access the data collected by the sensors using Bluetooth and send alerts on the phone. Do crazy things on the phone to wow people. 


When you need to take the Raspberry Pi and the sensors away from a wall outlet, the Pi-UpTimeUPS and the Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO (break out) board is there to help you. Use the same sensors. Use the same code.  Install two 18650 batteries on the Pi-UpTimeUPS board and take it with you - away from a wall power outlet for as long as 10-12 hours (time varies depending on what is connected to the Raspberry Pi and battery charge.) If longer run time is needed, use a solar panel to extend the run time. Or a wall plug. Monitor the sensors and the wonderful things you have done with your app on the phone. 

Tired of power fluctuations or power outages rebooting your Pi? Want to continue using the Pi when power fails? Want to take the Raspberry Pi with you to work or school or other places without having to shutdown or reboot it every time?  Pi-UpTimeUPS is perfect for these situations. The board monitors the power level and can shut down the Raspberry Pi in a graceful manner when the batteries run low. If power fails, the Raspberry Pi continues to operate for a long time! It also automatically charges the battery, manages the battery power level and cleans out any power fluctuations the Raspberry Pi may encounter, protecting your hardware. Further, the Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO board allows connections to all GPIO as well as twelve (12) analog ports. It connects to the Pi-UpTimeUPS board and also provides battery backed 5V and 3.3V UPS power for sensors. 


Pi-UpTimeUPS board showing the UPS functionality. The board works with any Raspberry Pi with a 40 pin header. The Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO board can be stacked above or below the Pi-UpTimeUPS board. The Pi-UpTimeUPS-BO board is not shown in the picture.

Easy to connect sensors to Pi-16ADC. The board provides solder-less connectors. Board also includes solder points for attaching resistors, power for sensors etc.
No re-calibration needed. ADC chip calibrates itself on power reset.
Immunity to common 50/60 Hz noise.
Turn the LED off to conserve power. 
Raspberry Pi HAT form factor - provides compact connections.



Pi-16ADC board. See video below.

Pi-EzConnect board has been selling for sometime now. We already have a few thousand units installed world wide! Now you can combine Pi-EzConnect with Pi-16ADC to make it easy to connect digital and analog sensors or devices together.

Connect digital sensors and other electronic components to the Raspberry Pi.
Allows all GPIOs to be used and connected to the Raspberry Pi.
Soldered as well as solder-less connections.
Has soldered as well as solder-less connections for Power as well for both 5V, 3.3V and ground.
Raspberry Pi HAT form factor - provide compact connections.
Break out board or breadboard like solder points.



Pi-EzConnect Board. See video below.

story:
We are here to provide a reason

Our team has many years of audio experiences as well as iPhone accessories. We foresee that in the near future (approximately 30 days or so), when the new iPhone comes out, there will be a good group of consumers who won't be able to use their existing earphones/headphones with their new iPhone, and we are here to provide a solution for this particular group of consumers. 

This project is co-operated by BomDio and a public company in Taiwan who is our strong partner of manufacturing, more information will be released along the way.

The Campaign

Pre-order a MFI certified Lightning to 3.5mm converter so you can keep on enjoying your music on the new iPhone without change your favorite earphone/headphone

 

Where is my money going?

  • The campaign is asking help for a $50,000 fund, we are using this funding for
    • Product tooling: $10,000 - $15,000
    • NRE for ID and electric engineering
    • MFI fee
    • 2000 pieces of mass production

 

What if the project isn't successfully funded?

  • The campaign is with flexible funding, meaning that the project is a definite "go-ahead", we will  introduce this unique product into global APR/AAR as well as electronic stores with a higher MSRP after the campaign is over.
  • We will have the initial working sample with complete ID design within 2 weeks, and of course updates will be provided. The shipping date is in October.

Features

- Minimalist design element

- Easy to carry, simple to store (a carrying pouch will be provided upon shipping)

- Plug and Play, absolutely no instruction needed to use this product

- A Wolfson DAC is added into this gadget to maintain the digital music quality.

 

Our Goal

We hope to serve the community with this unique and convenient product. With your help, we are hoping to make a difference.

story:
It’s truly as easy as 1-2-3:
  • Select a short, easy, and unique number when you register your account at spellforme.com (easy numbers like 55, 733, 2525, or 334455 are available for the first few backers!)
  • Enter information for future spelling (i.e. “your-name@websitename.com”, “your address”)
  • When needed, just provide your number to the person on the other end and they can find your information on spellforme.com
There are two ways people can search for your number! They can either enter it into the search bar at spellforme.com or type it right after the domain (click to see live example - spellforme.com/3476).
Is there anything else? Yes! We make spelling even easier for you: now you can always say “email me at 3476@spellforme.com”, where 3476 is your number, and the email will be carefully forwarded to your actual email address.

It saves time: saying a few digits is faster than spelling whole words,
It makes spelling mistake-free: the person receiving the information can view and copy your info right from their computer screen,
It’s for everyone: everyone has some piece of information that is either long or difficult to spell,
It makes spelling easy: pronouncing a short number is way easier than spelling words letter by letter,
It free: basic service will be free for everyone, full service will be free for backers (see rewards); so why not use it?

Like anything else that’s great in my life, it started from my wife. She made me remodel our home, which by the way, wasn’t exciting and took more than an entire year. Yea, it was big! I’m the guy who likes to investigate multiple options and compare different opinions and prices before paying any cash. Therefore I was calling a bunch of contractors, electricians, plumbers, painters, and even junk removers. So, every time I called, I had to write their email or they had to write my email or address.

I spelled my email and address about 20 times, and then I asked myself, “is there any way to make this process easier?”

Spelling with numbers came to my mind: we don’t have any problems spelling credit cards despite them being many digits… What if I only needed to pronounce just 4, 5, or 6 digits? Later, I came up with the idea of searching up the short number on a website, and having information displayed on an easy to read website. After searching for a good domain name, we came up with spellforme.com. I say we, because at that point, my oldest son joined me on this venture. My day job is Chief of Technology for an Internet marketing company, so I’m mainly responsible for the tech side while his young mind fits marketing and social media.


All of the perks are pay for the service once and keep it for a LIFETIME!
Free number + 1 Extra LIFETIME: contribute $20
  • 6-digit number to use (i.e. 563745, 473271, 731243) from the Bronze category,
  • service package: unlimited space for spelling and email forwarding.
Silver number + 2 Extras LIFETIME: contribute $50
  • easy, 6-digit number to use (i.e. 252525, 332288, 222555) from the Silver category,
  • service package: unlimited space for spelling and email forwarding,
  • exclusive signature title “Silver Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page.
 Gold number + 2 Extras LIFETIME: contribute $70
  • 4-digit number to use (i.e. 2781, 4537, 7432) from the Gold category,
  • service package: unlimited space for spelling and email forwarding,
  • exclusive signature title “Gold Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page.
Platinum number + 3 Extras LIFETIME: contribute $150, only 15 available!
  • easy, 4-digit number to use (i.e. 2525, 1188, 7700) from the Platinum category,
  • service package: unlimited space for spelling and email forwarding,
  • exclusive signature title “Platinum Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page,
  • your nickname shown among the top backers on spellforme.com
Diamond number + 3 Extras LIFETIME: contribute $200, only 10 available!
  • easy, 3-digit number to use (i.e. 232, 110, 755) from the Diamond category,
  • service package: unlimited space for spelling and email forwarding,
  • exclusive signature title “Diamond Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page,
  • your nickname shown among the top backers on spellforme.com
Executive number + 4 Extras LIFETIME: contribute $1000, only 3 available!
*** AVAILABLE ON INDIEGOGO ONLY ***
  • easy, 2-digit number to use (i.e. 22, 40, 77) from the Executive category,
  • service package: unlimited space for spelling and email forwarding,
  • exclusive signature title “Executive Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page,
  • your nickname shown among the top backers on spellforme.com,
  • your nickname shown on spellforme.com home page!


Right now we are more than half way done with developing the project: the application framework setup is done, database schema is built, and even part of the real app functionality has been developed (i.e. actual app is running when you search 3476 on spellforme.com). Designing and programming applications is a complex process that requires a lot of funding. We are looking for a small $3000.00 of funding because the major part of application development will be done by Gregory. He has over a decade of experience in web-based software development and has no doubts this app will be complete soon. Most of the marketing will be done by Dan. Designing, UX/UI polishing, payment processing integration, and marketing materials is where we truly need the help. We want to deliver an awesome user experience to you. Please help us fund SpellForMe!

I can see most of the rewards providing backers with lifetime service and no hidden charges? Is it true?!

Yes! All backers who obtain lifelong packages will be provided with the service free of charge for the rest of this project life.

Will you provide me with a choice of number?

Yes! For Silver level and above, depending on your backer level, you will be given a choice of number types. For example, if you are a Platinum level backer, then you will be given 10 numbers similar to 2525 from which you can choose one.

When someone views my info using my number, can they see my account information?

Big no-no! Only the information that you place for spelling is available, so there’s no way to associate that information with your personal information from the account (such as name, email, etc.).

Why can’t I obtain an email with an easy number on Gmail? Something like 3476@gmail.com?

It’s not allowed or taken. First, Gmail is asking for a minimum of 6 characters:

Second, all easy 6-digits and probably most regular 6-digit numbers are taken:

Why can't I setup my own domain and create an email with an easy number?

Of course you can, but it will be more expensive in the long-run since backers get the service for a lifetime.

How will you sustain your business in the long run if the base service is free?

We want to use a simple concept: the 6-digit numbers are free; however, you are limited to a 32 character field where you can enter your information and no email forwarding. In order to have unlimited space and email forwarding, you have to purchase a service package for just $1.95 per month. Exclusive, short, and easy numbers are available for purchase from $2.95 to $19.95 per month as well. Explained pricing model is not applicable for project backers: their services are free for a lifetime!

There are only a few hundred short and easy numbers, so how can I make sure I will get one?

Very easy: back now and tell your friends!

Follow us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/spellforme) and Facebook (https://facebook.com/spellforme). Sign up for updates on spellforme.com

Thank you for your extra support!

We are doing our best in order to follow the project timeline, however there are certain issues that can happen unexpectedly. Even though the application is close to being complete, it is still in the development stage. Also, it may take a longer time to resolve these issues than we can expect.

You may find all project updates on our Indiegogo page. We are open for communication, please feel free to ask questions.
story_txt:
It’s
truly as easy as 1-2-3: Select
a short, easy, and unique number when you register your account at
spellforme.com (easy numbers like 55, 733, 2525, or 334455 are available for the
first few backers!) Enter
information for future spelling (i.e. “your-name@websitename.com”, “your
address”) When
needed, just provide your number to the person on the other end and they can
find your information on spellforme.com
 There are two ways people can search for your
number! They can either enter it into the search bar at spellforme.com or type it right after the domain (click to see live example - spellforme.com/3476).Is there anything else? Yes! We make spelling even easier
for you: now you can always say “email me at 3476@spellforme.com”, where 3476
is your number, and the email will be carefully forwarded to your actual email
address.

It saves time: saying a few digits is faster than spelling whole
words,It makes spelling mistake-free: the person receiving the information can view
and copy your info right from their computer screen,It’s for everyone: everyone has some piece of
information that is either long or difficult to spell,It makes spelling easy: pronouncing a short number is way easier than
spelling words letter by letter,It free: basic
service will be free for everyone, full service will be free for backers
(see rewards); so why not use it?
 

Like
anything else that’s great in my life, it started from my wife. She made me
remodel our home, which by the way, wasn’t exciting and took more than an entire year. Yea, it was big! I’m
the guy who likes to investigate multiple options and compare different
opinions and prices before paying any cash. Therefore I was calling a bunch of
contractors, electricians, plumbers, painters, and even junk removers. So, every time I called, I had
to write their email or they had to write my email or address. 
I spelled my
email and address about 20 times, and then I asked myself, “is there any way to
make this process easier?” 
Spelling with numbers came to my mind: we don’t have
any problems spelling credit cards despite them being many digits… What if I only
needed to pronounce just 4, 5, or 6 digits? Later, I came up with the idea of searching up the short
number on a website, and having information displayed on an easy to read
website. After searching
for a good domain name, we came up with spellforme.com. I say we,
because at that point, my oldest son joined me on this venture. My day job is Chief of Technology for an Internet marketing company, so I’m mainly responsible for the tech side while his young mind fits marketing and social media.


All of the perks are pay for the service once and keep it for a LIFETIME!

space for spelling and email forwarding.

service package: unlimited
space for spelling and email forwarding,
exclusive
signature title “Silver Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page.

4537, 7432) from the Gold category,
service package: unlimited
space for spelling and email forwarding,
exclusive
signature title “Gold Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page.

Platinum number + 3 Extras LIFETIME: contribute $150, only 15 available! 
easy,

service package: unlimited
space for spelling and email forwarding,
exclusive
signature title “Platinum Level Project Backer” displayed on your spelling page,
your
nickname shown among the top backers on spellforme.com

story:
E-keyboard PC is the first complete Windows 10 PC housed in a keyboard  that fits your home & office use, just plug it with a monitor or  projector, it perfect   match your needs.
With a desktop, you get power. Build it with the right specs and there’s nothing  you won’t be able to run. Video games, hidef movies, as many windows as your  heart  desires: our Computers today can handle seriously heavy loads. With a  laptop,  however,you get portability. 

You can carry your machine with you everywhere you go throughout the day, and   if you go small enough, it’s no less convenient than carrying a mid-size book. With   these individual strengths, there are also inherent weaknesses. You won’t get very  far trying to lug a decent desktop around with you, and most laptops can run only  the most basic programs.

 

Now, at the crossroads of the desktop and the laptop, there is a new player in the  game. Our all-in-one media keyboard “ E-keyboard PC” combines the speed  and  capabilities of   a desktop with all the ease  and functionality of a laptop. All you  need to do is plug  in a screen and you’ll be able to play video games, watch movies, and surf the Internet with ease. The memory can be expanded, it supports an Android / Windows 10 dual system, and it comes with a four core processor and 32GB SSD. Plus, with ports for WiFi, speakers, headphones,  flash drive, an SD card, and a mouse, you’ll get to customize your experience to  exactly your liking.

                                     Plug & Play 

Just as smartphone technology makes it so a whole computer can fit onto a phone. The Miguol E-Keyboard PC is a computer inside of a keyboard. Now, anywhere 

that there’s an HDMI screen be it a smart TV, a traditional monitor, or a projector  

you can plug in the E-keyboard PC, and the screen will turn into your Windows 10 enabled computer.

Step 1: Connect the E-keyboard PC to an HDMI & VGA cable and 

connect the cable to a screen.

  

Step 2: Connect the power cable to the E-keyboard PC and a power outlet. 
Step 3: Press power button Start working or playing.
 
Here you will see

 Accessories

 Miguol has your peripherals covered. There are ports for an SD card, mouse, flash  drive, camera, headphones, wired connections, an AC adapter, and of course an HDMI monitor hookup. It’s easy to get any file you want on or off the E-keyboard PC.  In the absence of a mouse, the keyboard has an oversized touchpad  to use as a mouse or in  your  favorite apps designed for touchscreen functions. And  a  waterproof film on the keyboard means the E-keyboard PC will stand up to life.

By making the keyboard the center of your computing experience rather than the screen, we can reshape how we think about ownership of that experience. Your files will be in your hands and the power to change them will at your fingertips.

RFQ: 

Q1: How long is the max distance of bluetooth transmission?

A1:Over 10 meters .

Q2: Are all the TVs can be connected with it?

A2: Yes.

Q3: Do I need internet to connect  this PC first then it work?

A3: Yes. without internet  it just like a Isolated computer 

Q4:Does the APP come with both Android and IOS?

A4: Yes.

Q5: How long is the warranty period of the product?

A5: 1 year.

Right now, we have come to Indiegogo, trying to raising $10000. This startup capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing our all-in-one media keyboard. With your help, we will re-define the way people view power and efficiency in computing. Thank you

Contact US

link: https://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/8d2d0e10

Mobile：+8613823321441

Email：info@mgkeyboard.com

web：www.mgkeyboard.com

story:
Look around! It’s 21st century and people still use sticky notes to remind themselves or people around them about important things!
We invented Smart Stickers because we want to improve your workspace and enrich good old idea of colourful sticky notes with smart technology.

Smart Sticker is a real-time display that will keep you updated for anything important for you. It can be wirelessly connected to your smartphone and attached to any surface. Stick it anywhere and get notifications, e-mails, weather forecasts and more in real-time!

No wires, charge it for 2 hours - and it will work for month!


Smart Stickers are perfect for home and office

Discover a new way of being updated with important things, like weather, traffic, stocks or any notifications you need.
Just imagine how your life could be easier with them! No need to keep your eye on your smartphone, no need to wear watches. You can stick them anywhere at your workplace: for example, to your computer or wall or whiteboard. It could also be very useful at home: stick it to your refrigerator or even at mirror at your bathroom!


What's inside?

Top Bluetooth hardware

Manufacturer: Texas Instruments CC2541

  • Li-Po Battery 203040 3.7v 210 mA/h
  • BLE Board
  • on\off button
  • microUSB for charging

E-ink screen

  • Pervasive Displays 2.7" screen

ABS Plastic case and cover
  • TPA moulding
  • dimensions: 85 x 52 x 7.3 mm
  • weight approx. 40 gr
  • battery lifetime: up to 30 days
  • charging cable included

Gorilla glass
Strong cover for your screen means almost no scratches on your device.
Vinyl magnet
Magnet will allow you to attach Smart Sticker to any metal surface. For other types of surfaces we provide you with round steel plates covered with double-sided tape.


Smart Sticker App


Smart Sticker screen consists of 15 segments (3x5). Each segment's content can be customized via Smart Sticker App (will be available at AppStore and Google.Play).

Currently you can use following widgets:

  • weather
  • time/date
  • incoming email notifications
  • any RSS feed
  • notifications from Facebook, Skype, Telegram, Twitter
  • missed calls
  • messages 
  • notes
  • reminders
  • currency rates
Smart Stickers will be hackable, so you can design your own widget - status bars, remote controls, anything you want - and upload it to your smartphone!


Meet our team!

"I am sure people need Smart Stickers, so I have invested all my savings in this company. During previous 9 months all I was dreaming of was to start the production of smart stickers. Thanks to the world, that I have reached the moment of the starting this campaign and God for the strength to do so. Now everything depends on our backers." - Ivan Sanzhura, CEO & Founder 

"Since I've been a child I've been a big fan of SciFi books, and now I'm amazed to see how many of the sci-fi authors' dreams appear in our everyday life. We live in an amazing time when everyone can do something that would change the world around us. And now you can take a customizable widget from your computer, and place it anywhere. Today you can make that connection between virtual and real life, making them both a little bit better. “ - Theodor Atanasov, Hardware Developer

"Today you don't need to postpone your dreams, and all the excuses about not having enough time or resources sound weird. You just need to give a try. And certainly there are people who will believe and support your ideas." - Jordanka Nikolova, UX UI Designer.


Timeline

March 2015 - SMART STICKER concept

May 2015 - First prototype (actually, was too big)

June 2015 - Second and third prototypes (we were looking for a better battery)

August 2015 - IOS and Android Smart Sticker App

September 2015 - First public presentation of Smart Sticker!

October 2015 - Negotiations with manufacturers

November 2015 - INDIEGOGO campaign begins!!!

December 2015 - Design for manufacturing, sourcing, logistics

January 2016 - Full production run and apps release

February 2016 - Packaging, shipping the first batch


Your questions answered:


Q.: I want to put my Smart Sticker to bathroom. Is it waterproof?
A: At this moment it isn't, so we wouldn't recommend you to put it directly into your shower :) But it would work perfectly being attached to mirror. Recently we've received so much requests for waterproof cover that we started developing a special plastic case for such purposes.
-
Q.: Does Smart Sticker support non-english characters?
A.: It does support English, Russian, Chinese and Japanese characters. 
- 
Q.: Is it possible to connect Smart Sticker to my computer directly without a smartphone?
A.: At this moment it is only possible to transfer data to your Smart Sticker from your smartphone only.
-
Q.: Can I connect more than one Smart Sticker to my smartphone?
A.: Sure, your smartphone can be connected to as many Smart Stickers as you wish.
-
Q.: What OS does Smart Sticker use?
A.: It doesn't need any OS as it only has a microcontroller inside that accepts data from your smartphone.
-
Q.: Can I develop new widgets?

A.: We will give every user an access to open API that will allow people build their own widgets.
----

You can always drop us an email at ivan.sanzhura@gmail.com and we will get back to you soon!

Magnet will allow you to attach Smart Sticker to any metal surface. For other types of surfaces we provide you with round steel plates covered with double-sided tape.









Smart Sticker App




Smart Sticker screen consists of 15 segments (3x5). Each segment's content can be customized via Smart Sticker App (will be available at AppStore and Google.Play).
Currently you can use following widgets:


weather
time/date
incoming email notifications
any RSS feed
notifications from Facebook, Skype, Telegram, Twitter
missed calls
messages 
notes
reminders
currency rates

Smart Stickers will be hackable, so you can design your own widget - status bars, remote controls, anything you want - and upload it to your smartphone!





Meet our team!



"I am sure people need Smart Stickers, so I have invested all my savings in this company. During previous 9 months all I was dreaming of was to start the production of smart stickers. Thanks to the world, that I have reached the moment of the starting this campaign and God for the strength to do so. Now everything depends on our backers." - Ivan Sanzhura, CEO & Founder 
"Since I've been a child I've been a big fan of SciFi books, and now I'm amazed to see how many of the sci-fi authors' dreams appear in our everyday life. We live in an amazing time when everyone can do something that would change the world around us. And now you can take a customizable widget from your computer, and place it anywhere. Today you can make that connection between virtual and real life, making them both a little bit better. “ - Theodor Atanasov, Hardware Developer
"Today you don't need to postpone your dreams, and all the excuses about not having enough time or resources sound weird. You just need to give a try. And certainly there are people who will believe and support your ideas." - Jordanka Nikolova, UX UI Designer.


Timeline

March 2015 - SMART STICKER concept
May 2015 - First prototype (actually, was too big)
June 2015 - Second and third prototypes (we were looking for a better battery)
August 2015 - IOS and Android Smart Sticker App
September 2015 - First public presentation of Smart Sticker!
October 2015 - Negotiations with manufacturers
November 2015 - INDIEGOGO campaign begins!!!
December 2015 - Design for manufacturing, sourcing, logistics
January 2016 - Full production run and apps release
February 2016 - Packaging, shipping the first batch


    

Your questions answered:

Q.: I want to put my Smart Sticker to bathroom. Is it waterproof?
A: At this moment it isn't, so we wouldn't recommend you to put it directly into your shower :) But it would work perfectly being attached to mirror. Recently we've received so much requests for waterproof cover that we started developing a special plastic case for such purposes.
-
Q.: Does Smart Sticker support non-english characters?
A.: It does support English, Russian, Chinese and Japanese characters. 
- 
Q.: Is it possible to connect Smart Sticker to my computer directly without a smartphone?
A.: At this moment it is only possible to transfer data to your Smart Sticker from your smartphone only.
-
Q.: Can I connect more than one Smart Sticker to my smartphone?
A.: Sure, your smartphone can be connected to as many Smart Stickers as you wish.
-
Q.: What OS does Smart Sticker use?
A.: It doesn't need any OS as it only has a microcontroller inside that accepts data from your smartphone.
-
Q.: Can I develop new widgets?

A.: We will give every user an access to open API that will allow people build their own widgets.
----
You can always drop us an email at ivan.sanzhura@gmail.com and we will get back to you soon!

story:
Beacon Box:The Ultimate Outdoor Phone Case





Form Meets Function

We designed the Beacon with functionality and versatility in mind. Combining a portable and efficiently sized package with the sustainable power of solar energy. The Beacon will not only charge, but protect a wide range of electronic devices. The Beacon Box is perfect for the adventure junkie who wants to leave the urban jungle behind and enjoy the great outdoors.


Durable


Your typical phone case is just a small shell over the phone. The Beacon Box is an actual container that protects your phone from the elements and charges your phone while protecting it. Does your phone case float? Well this one does!

It is small enough to put in any bag. The beacon box also come with a nylon lanyard to hang on anything. The Beacon box is so lightweight you will never know you are carrying it.

Solar Powered


The Beacon unleashes the power of solar energy to be charged and ready to go wherever you may go. The 15,000 mAh battery is always charging when placed in the sunlight. The solar panel has a 17% conversion rate, so it is always charging, even on the go. The addition of QI charging on the inside lid allows your QI capable device to charge just by touching it, NO MORE WIRES. 

100% Waterproof


Whether you are doing a water sport or just in a downpour, have zero fear of your phone getting wet. Here is proof we can go where no other phone case dares. Need lights underwater it can do that too. Go down 10ft and have zero worries.


What fans are saying

"There have been other gadgets and chargers before, but these are surpassed by the Beacon, a true tool that combines a first-of-its-kind combination of charging, solar, lighting, and waterproof technology"

-Trend inc.

"Beacon is a great product that looks completely developed with a great campaign video and polished campaign page. It's great to see people who have a need and the ability to engineer a product to fill that need."

 - Engineering.com

“well thought out device, I like that it can store and charge two devices simultaniously, securely, safe from both water and other environmental hazards.   - Apocalypseequiped


“Often, these widgets that try to combine a ton of features end up being monstrosities that are larger and heavier than just carry the items separately. The Beacon actually appears to combine the functionality of several items into a package that actually makes it an attractive alternative to the items it replaces.”

-jerkingthetrigger.com


“The Beacon survival container by Smith & Bradley addresses important needs while in the wild: it protects your electronic devices, charges said devices with sunlight, and provides its own light “

-Everydaycarry.com


“I’m really looking forward to it hitting the market”

-Monderno.com


“I’ve become a fan of due to the quality they’ve built into their products – Smith & Bradley.  When they put something together for the outdoors, your bugout bag, or just plain EDC, it’s probably worth a look.”

-Wristwatchreview.com


Tech Specifications

         *** Case will hold I Phone 6 Plus, Nexus 6, and  Samsung Note Edge. ***


Our Manufacturing & Fulfillment Timeline


Our Team



Jerommie Smith (pictured left)

Lead designer and Co-Founder


Having a previous career in Law Enforcement, I ventured into my own businesses about 8 years ago. I am a self taught designer and builder.I do design work and consult for other companies as well.  I have designed and built Motorcycle parts, car parts, and my favorite of all wristwatches for Smith&Bradley. Designing and building products is a passion. I am a hands on type of designer. I love to be on the floor as they are making parts to approve every step. (when the Beacon Box goes into full production I will physically be in the factory to oversee the set up)

Having grown up and done most of my activities outdoors, I love outdoors products. The Beacon Box is a blend of all the essential tools I always wanted when I was camping and fishing.  This product is one that everyone will truly love.


Ryan Bradley (pictured right)

Operations and Co-Founder


I am an attorney and Partner at Phebus & Koester, LLP, I concentrate my practice in civil litigation, usually on behalf of the plaintiff. My primary focus more recently is on defective medical devices such as metal-on-metal hips, defective knee implants, mesh, and defective drugs. I also dedicate a great deal of my time helping victims of catastrophic automobile accidents and severe medical malpractice.


I also am the co-founder of Smith & Bradley, Ltd , an American watch and design company dedicated to making sport and tactical watches and outdoor products that blend form and function. We strive to design and manufacturer watches in American that are both totally functional and durable, but are also affordable. We produce retail watches, while at the same time work with large companies to design custom timepieces that rise above private label.




FAQ’s


Is the battery removable if needed in the future? A person with any degree of technical skill could remove and replace battery if needed.


How long do the lights run on a full charge of battery? The lights we have tested will run for 36 hours continuous.


Will the Beacon Box float with my phone and other stuff in it? Yes, The Beacon Box will float when it’s full of your “Stuff”


How long will the Beacon Box hold its charge once full? In all of our testing we had zero decline if battery storage. This is in part to the solar panel always having some power to give the battery.


How does the QI charge feature work? If your device is QI all you need to do is touch the QI of the device to the lid of the Beacon Box, thats it!

story:
How it works

  • Install Bully app onto your iPad, iPhone, Android tablet or Android phone
  • Tap on the cover to insert your name into the story
  • Insert your photo into the story
  • Insert the bully’s name and photo into the story
  • Select what the bully does to you
  • Select how the bully makes you feel
  • Select the girl or boy version
  • Now the story is about you being bullied
  • Email the story directly from your device to the bully, your friends, your teacher, your parents or the police
  • Bully App helps you stop bullies without having to confront the bully


Install Bully App onto your iOS or android device




Tap on the cover to insert your name into the story.

Select the boy or girl version.

Insert your birthday, age, hair color, eye color, who you live with, address & your school.




Insert your photo into the story




Insert the bully's name into the story




Select what the bully does to you




How does the bully make you feel




Select your mobile phone




Select your favorite social media




Insert the bully's photo into the story




Insert your teacher's name into the story




Insert your teacher's photo into the story





Tell your teacher about the bully



Select the bully's color




Now the bully is in trouble



Email the story of how you are being bullied to the bully, your friends, your teacher, your parents, directly from your device




Jump for joy because you just got rid of the bully




Bullying destroys children's lives. And you

can make a difference.




Help us distribute the Bully app to elementary schools, high schools & sports clubs

 

You can make it happen

How often have you said "someone should do something about that."

Well, here's your chance to make a difference.

Our goal is to distribute the Bully app to every child in every school in the whole world.

It's a big task.

$1 buys the Bully app for one child in one school.

$30 buys a Bully app for every child in the class, and $500 buys a Bully app
for a whole school.

Help us distribute the Bully app. You could be responsible for saving a child's life. And that child could be a child you know!


Statistics

American schools harbor approximately 2.1 million bullies and 2.7 million of their victims - National School Safety Centre.

1 in 7 students in grades K - 12 is either a bully or a victim of a bully.

56% of students have personally witnessed some type of bullying at school.

15% of all school absenteeism is directly related to the fear of being bullied at school.

71% of students report that bullying is a problem at their school.

282,000 students are physically attacked in secondary school each month.

90% of 4th through 8th graders report being victims of bullying.

1 in 10 students drop out of school because of repeated bullying.

Bullying has been linked to 75% of school shooting incidents.


Meet the team


About picstoriz.com

Bully app is made by picstoriz.

picstoriz are interactive stories that make children love to read.

Insert your name into the story. Insert your photo into the story. Insert your age, hair color, eye color, birthday, address and other details into the story.

Now you are in the story, and the story is about you.

Play Tennis, Go White Water Rafting,  Go Skateboarding, Play Ball, Ride a Horse, Go Skiing, Play Football, Go to Hawaii, Visit the Empire State Building, Become Jewish, Meet the Pope, Go on the Hajj, Lord Jesus, Go to McDonald's, Work at Walmart.

Your child in every story and a story for every child. Forty two app now available from iTunes.


Perks

Since we're based in Australia, we're offering Australian themed  perks for your support.

Flag Hamper ($10 support)

  • Australian flag
  • Mini koala bear
  • Kraft cheese stick
  • Cadbury's caramello koala
  • 2 Arnott's chocolate tim tam biscuit
  • Arnott's wagon wheel
  • Twinings Australian afternoon tea



Kangaroo Hamper ($50 support)

  • Kangaroo with joey in his pouch
  • Australian flag
  • Mini koala bear
  • Kraft cheese stick
  • Cadbury's caramello koala
  • 2 Arnott's chocolate tim tam biscuit
  • Arnott's wagon wheel
  • Twinings Australian afternoon tea



Boomerang Hamper ($100 support)

  • Hand painted Aboriginal boomerang
  • Mini koala bear
  • Australian flag
  • Kraft cheese stick
  • Cadbury's caramello koala
  • 2 Arnott's chocolate tim tam biscuit
  • Arnott's wagon wheel
  • Twinings Australian afternoon tea



Didgeridoo Hamper ($200 support)

  • Hand painted Aboriginal didgeridoo
  • Mini koala bear
  • Australian flag
  • Kraft cheese stick
  • Cadbury's caramello koala
  • 2 Arnott's chocolate tim tam biscuit
  • Arnott's wagon wheel
  • Twinings Australian afternoon tea

story:
ENERGY FLYER is now on the Energy Flyer Store


WHO WE ARE


Hello everybody, I'm Marco, I'm a physics researcher and a passionate of technologies and renewable energies. I've got some awards for innovations in that field and when, in 2006, I met Giovanni Soldini (see him in the movie!) we worked together to bring solar energy on sailing boats.

To that extent we started the development of a ultralight, flexible and powerful photovoltaic panel and of a suitable electronics able to maximize the energy yield with strongly variable sunlight (a common condition in a reggata).

Since that time we realized how is important to rest on reliable and powerful energy sources in any place and in any conditions. We thus promoted a start-up company (www.solbian.eu) which is nowaday a leader in the marine solar panels market. Our technology had been used on solar cars competing across the australian desert (www.sunswift.com, www.ondasolare.com), to cross the ocean by rowing, to power shelters on the highest mountains.

We never stopped our innovation path in the field of green mobility (as an example, an electric motor not making use of expensive and environmentally harmful permanent magnets is just under initial test) and recently we focused our attention on the vast field of solar charging devices, realizing that they are generally poorly working or not so good in quality. Thus we reviewed our know how about solar panels and charge controllers, that made sailors almost free from the need of using fossil fuels, to adapt it to that new field, we gathered some friends: designers, solar panel experts, electronic engineers, and after two years of attempts we are very proud of what we think is going to be the most advanced solar USB charger ever realized, the Energy Flyer!

More than 12 W of solar cells and a sophisticate electronic board to reach energetic independence everywhere in the world, in the middle of the ocean or in the top of the mountains, or even on a exotic beach with power outlets too far from your beer! Energy Flyer will recharge quickly your phone (tablet, battery pack, camera...) in a sunny day but will be anyway able to give you some charge if clouds are in your sky. Rugged and lightweight, without any battery to give you only green energy and no pollution.

WHY THE Energy Flyer?

Do you need a solar charger? No problem, just search

Hundreds of models, for any prices, any sizes, any styles...

But... but most of them are just gadgets, they claim they recharge your mobile, maybe in ten hours... maybe never. Most of them also claim they recharge "almost" every device but...

 

SOLUTIONS?

First: POWER!

We cannot really recharge a smartphone or a tablet with a 0.8 W solar panel! We need at least 10 W and we need to shrink the power in the smallest space, namely we need the most efficient solar cells on the market. We choose the best SunPower® cells, we need them if we want to fly!

Second: ELECTRONICS

Solar cells produce current, but you cannot simply push the current in your battery, that would just spoil energy (if it ever works), read why. Electronics must also take care of adapting the charger to every nasty mobile operating system, no more warning message! Electronics must be efficient, reliable, small, and not too expensive too! A great challenge! But we have a great experience in that. Remember that we started working with photovoltaics for race sailing boats, where electronics is absolutely needed.

Third: DESIGN, EASINESS OF USE, ROBUSTNESS. No moving parts, no glass, advanced polymers, ergonomy... and more... NO BATTERIES! To be greener than GREEN!

WHAT WE DID?

The starting point, just ideas. Brainstorming about the design...

In the meanwhile technical job was going on... 

ELECTRONICS

 

High-end solar chargers or solar inverters use MPPT to harvest all the available energy from the sun, why do not introduce the same in a small portable solar charger? We worked hard to fit all the power in a small and relatively inexpensive device.

As far as we know, our device is the smallest MPPT solar charger on the market. It is very efficient and incorporates interesting characteristics as no needs of external supply, namely no needs of batteries: you will see the Flyer waking up as soon as there is enough light!

SOLAR PANEL
To have the most powerful cells on the market is not enough, different materials have been tested for the realization of the solar panel and panel frame. The final product must be highly reliable and extremely durable, even in harsh weather conditions, but we are not worried of that, remember our background. SOLBIAN, the company we promoted more than seven years ago, is helping us in realizing prototypes, and will take care of initial production. Here is some prototypes: #ZERO, ZERO.1 and ZERO.2


DOES IT WORK?

A first prototype under the rain... when the panel is directed toward the sky, even in so low light condition, the telephone is charging! The MPPT charger is able to drain every drop of energy from the sun.


Many thanks to Erica (6 year old) for shooting the movie! 

And if we have sun... see what is going on at the beach:

Starring Sabina, Lucia, Elena, Alice e Caterina. Art works by Sofia

OUR GOAL

Energy Flyer will be the most advanced solar USB charger in the market. The perfect choice for people who need energy without compromises, in the most critical missions, for leisure or work.

The solar panel: four high efficiency SunPower® cells encapsulated in a polymeric structure suited to resist impacts and weathering. A total power of more than 12 W and a special sensitiveness in low light condition.

The panel frame, available in different colors, will protect the edges and the four holes in the corners will allow fixing the Energy Flyer to your backpack or on your tent.



The electronics: a MPPT charger able to maximize the solar panel power and in the meanwhile offer a stable 5V power supply via a standard USB port.

The charger is powered directly by the solar panel, even without any battery you will see its LED indicator glowing green as soon as enough light will shine on the panel face.



The green light will turn red when a USB device is connected, signalling the charging status.  

Energy Flyer is studied to be at the top for technical characteristics, but we want also the Energy Flyer to be available to most of the people, allowing for large volume selling and consequent price decrease. We fixed our initial selling price at $150, with the hope of breaking down the $100 barrier as soon as possible.

WHY DO WE NEED YOU?

The Energy Flyer works! We have been working on it in the past two years by using our personal funds. We started with CAD/CAM design and then we built 40 prototypes complete of solar panels, electronics, and plastic details (the electronics enclosure and the panel frame). Intensive testing on the field and in accelerated weathering environment are on their way. We also started marketing actions, giving some prototypes to testimonials, we hope to have good return from them. The cost of every prototype was obviously much higher than our price target, as can be easily understood:

Item Cost ($) Why so high? Final target
Solar panel 40 Manual custom production 18
Electronics 45 Manual custom production 18
Enclosure 22 3D printing 0.50
Frame 72 3D printing 3
Labor cost 10 non optimized 3

Total prototype cost: $189
Target cost: $42.50

An industrial cost of $42 is what is needed to fit a $100 price on the shelf (packaging, marketing cost, commissions and obviously mark-up need to be added)

That is the way we are used to work. All the projects we realized until now are characterized by a strong technological content and customization. Mass market needs to be addressed in a different way, for that reason we need your contribution.


Needed steps:

Increasing volumes will allow to decrease the cost of the solar panels and of electronics.

  • We already started the contacts with manufacturing companies for mass production. Estimated investment is $5,000, for travelling, know-how transfer, and supply chain optimization.
  • Enclosure and frames need to be made by injection mold to reach the target cost. Mold design and realization cost is about $8,000 (for both the molds).
  • Packaging is under definition. Investment is $6,500.
  • Marketing is a must for the goal of increasing volume selling: $8,000, mainly in web based campaigns.
  • Over the total investment of $27,500 we need to calculate an overhead related to supervision costs and other expenses.
  • Moreover funding is needed to realize the first 1000 units, the minimum quantity for initial price reduction. We still cannot reach the $42 target, but we estimated a total cost of $55,000.

A grand total of about $90,000 is needed. Giovanni and I are not rich people but we want to invest in our idea. Beyond all our efforts until now, we still want to cover 40% of the future expenses, thus we are asking you to make a pledge to reach our goal!


OUR TEAM


HOW CAN I HELP?

Join us in your support for Energy Flyer by pledging a reward towards our cause! Select your Perk or just share the news among your contacts.

Do you think we could offer better rewards? Tell us and do not miss to send us your comments in any case, they will be very valuable!


FAQ

Will Energy Flyer recharge ALL the mobiles?
Never say "ALL"! Mobile phone manufacturers like to change specifications and characteristics of their devices more often than needed. Until now we tried the Energy Flyer with the most common, and even with some not so common, mobile phones and tablets. We did not find problems. We are committed to make Energy Flyer a widely used product and thus we'll continue in testing its compatibility and solve any problem that could rise.

Are you going to add a battery to store the energy during the day and use it in the night?
We decided not to add any battery for several reasons. One is that all the devices have his own battery, we choose to recharge it directly. Another reason is the broad diffusion of battery packs. Choose freely the one you like, Energy Flyer will recharge it while you are discharging your cell phone. Last but not least, we are quite concerned about pollution produced by batteries proliferation. We do want to give you clean energy, directly from the sun!

Energy Flyer is not so small, will you study a more compact design?
We wanted to make Energy Flyer a powerful device and to reach that goal we need space. Foldable solutions are possible but for the first product release we decided to keep it simple and make it robust, suited to the outdoor lifestyle. We are already thinking about the future evolution of the charger, but that will take its time. 

Risks and challenges

Hardware produced in volume is never simple, unforeseen shipping delays are always possible. However, we already built and tested several units and ramping up production should not hide any surprise. Energy Flyer is working and what is still needed is to give it a neat appearance, that can be done only with your help: electronics and PV panels can be "home-made" but we want to give you something beautiful to be kept in your hands! We believe the risks on this campaign are really manageable. We appreciate your support, and we are confident we'll stay inside our timeline.

Even if the crowdfunding campaign will not be completely successful, we are quite confident Energy Flyer will hit the market, thus we shall be able to reward our supporters in any case.
story_txt:
ENERGY FLYER is now on the Energy Flyer Store


WHO WE ARE
Hello everybody, I'm Marco, I'm a physics researcher and a passionate of technologies and renewable energies. I've got some awards for innovations in that field and when, in 2006, I met Giovanni Soldini (see him in the movie!) we worked together to bring solar energy on sailing boats. To that extent we started the development of a ultralight, flexible and powerful photovoltaic panel and of a suitable electronics able to maximize the energy yield with strongly variable sunlight (a common condition in a reggata). Since that time we realized how is important to rest on reliable and powerful energy sources in any place and in any conditions. We thus promoted a start-up company (www.solbian.eu) which is nowaday a leader in the marine solar panels market. Our technology had been used on solar cars competing across the australian desert (www.sunswift.com, www.ondasolare.com), to cross the ocean by rowing, to power shelters on the highest mountains.
We never stopped our innovation path in the field of green mobility (as an example, an electric motor not making use of expensive and environmentally harmful permanent magnets is just under initial test) and recently we focused our attention on the vast field of solar charging devices, realizing that they are generally poorly working or not so good in quality. Thus we reviewed our know how about solar panels and charge controllers, that  made sailors almost free from the need of using fossil fuels, to adapt it to that new field, we gathered some friends: designers, solar panel experts, electronic engineers, and after two years of attempts we are very proud of what we think is going to be the most advanced solar USB charger ever realized, the Energy Flyer!

More than 12 W of solar cells and a sophisticate electronic board to reach energetic independence everywhere in the world, in the middle of the ocean or in the top of the mountains, or even on a exotic beach with power outlets too far from your beer! Energy Flyer will recharge quickly your phone (tablet, battery pack, camera...) in a sunny day but will be anyway able to give you some charge if clouds are in your sky. Rugged and lightweight, without any battery to give you only green energy and no pollution.
WHY THE Energy Flyer?
Do you need a solar charger? No problem, just search


Hundreds of models, for any prices, any sizes, any styles...


But... but most of them are just gadgets, they claim they recharge your mobile, maybe in ten hours... maybe never. Most of them also claim they recharge "almost" every device but...  
 
SOLUTIONS?
First: POWER!

We cannot really recharge a smartphone or a tablet with a 0.8 W solar panel! We need at least 10 W and we need to shrink the power in the smallest space, namely we need the most efficient solar cells on the market.

We choose the best SunPower® cells, we need them if we want to fly!

Second: ELECTRONICS

Solar cells produce current, but you cannot simply push the current in your battery, that would just spoil energy (if it ever works), read why.

Electronics must also take care of adapting the charger to every nasty mobile operating system, no more warning message!

Electronics must be efficient, reliable, small, and not too expensive too! A great challenge! But we have a great experience in that. Remember that we started working with photovoltaics for race sailing boats, where electronics is absolutely needed.

Third: DESIGN, EASINESS OF USE, ROBUSTNESS.

No moving parts, no glass, advanced polymers, ergonomy...

and more... NO BATTERIES! To be greener than GREEN!WHAT WE DID?
The starting point, just ideas.

Brainstorming about the design...


In the meanwhile technical job was going on...  ELECTRONICS 

High-end solar chargers or solar inverters use MPPT to harvest all the available energy from the sun, why do not introduce the same in a small portable solar charger? We worked hard to fit all the power in a small and relatively inexpensive device.As far as we know, our device is the smallest MPPT solar charger on the market. It is very efficient and incorporates interesting characteristics as no needs of external supply, namely no needs of batteries: you will see the Flyer waking up as soon as there is enough light!SOLAR PANEL
To have the most powerful cells on the market is not enough, different materials have been tested for the realization of the solar panel and panel frame. The final product must be highly reliable and extremely durable, even in harsh weather conditions, but we are not worried of that, remember our background. SOLBIAN, the company we promoted more than seven years ago, is helping us in realizing prototypes, and will take care of initial production. Here is some prototypes: #ZERO, ZERO.1 and ZERO.2 DOES IT WORK?
A first prototype under the rain... when the panel is directed toward the sky, even in  so low light condition, the telephone is charging! The MPPT charger is able to drain every drop of energy from the sun.
Many thanks to Erica (6 year old) for shooting the movie! 

And if we have sun... see what is going on at the beach:Starring Sabina, Lucia, Elena, Alice e Caterina. Art works by SofiaOUR GOAL
Energy Flyer will be the most advanced solar USB charger in the market. The perfect choice for people who need energy without compromises, in the most critical missions, for leisure or work.


The solar panel: four high efficiency SunPower® cells encapsulated in a polymeric structure suited to resist impacts and weathering. A total power of more than 12 W and a special sensitiveness in low light condition.

The panel frame, available in different colors, will protect the edges and the four holes in the corners will allow fixing the Energy Flyer to your backpack or on your tent.

The electronics: a MPPT charger able to maximize the solar panel power and in the meanwhile offer a stable 5V power supply via a standard USB port. The charger is powered directly by the solar panel, even without any battery you will see its LED indicator glowing green as soon as enough light will shine on the panel face.

The green light will turn red when a USB device is connected, signalling the charging status.

 

Energy Flyer is studied to be at the top for technical characteristics, but we want also the Energy Flyer to be available to most of the people, allowing for large volume selling and consequent price decrease.

We fixed our initial selling price at $150, with the hope of breaking down the $100 barrier as soon as possible.
 
WHY DO WE NEED YOU?

The Energy Flyer works! We have been working on it in the past two years by using our personal funds. We started with CAD/CAM design and then we built 40 prototypes complete of solar panels, electronics, and plastic details (the electronics enclosure and the panel frame). Intensive testing on the field and in accelerated weathering environment are on their way. We also started marketing actions, giving some prototypes to testimonials, we hope to have good return from them. The cost of every prototype was obviously much higher than our price target, as can be easily understood:
